他得好好睡一觉，才能解乏。
Tā děi hǎohao shuì yí jiào，cái néngjiěfá。
He needs a good long sleep to get over his fatigue.
好好睡他一觉
hǎohāo shuì tā yí jiào
have a good sleep
无家可归的他只好睡在猪栏里。
Wújiā kěguī de tā zhǐhǎo shuìzài zhūlán lǐ。
Being homeless, he has no choice but to sleep in a pigsty.
我昨晚没睡好，头脑昏昏沉沉的。
Wǒ zuówǎn méi shuìhǎo，tóunǎo hūnhūnchénchén de。
I feel in a daze because I didn\'t sleep well last night.
昨晚没有睡好，现在感到十分困倦。
Zuó wǎn méiyǒu shuìhǎo，xiànzài gǎndào shífēn kùnjuàn。
I feel very sleepy because I didn\'t sleep well last night.
昨晚没睡好，吃饭不香。
Zuówǎn méi shuìhǎo，chīfàn bùxiāng。
I have no appetite because I didn\'t sleep well last night.
一宿没睡好
yìxiǔ méi shuìhǎo 
not sleep well the whole night; not sleep a wink the whole night
你们躺好了再睡，别横躺竖卧的。
Nǐmen tǎnghǎo le zài shuì，bié héngtǎng shùwò de。
Lie in order before you fall asleep, don\'t lie in disarray.
睡个好觉
shuì gè hǎojiào
have a good sleep
他忙得甚至好几夜没睡觉。
Tā máng de shènzhì hǎo jǐ yè méi shuìjiào。
He was so busy that he didn\'t even go to bed for several nights.
希望你睡个好觉。
Xīwàng nǐ shuìgèhǎojiào.
I hope you\'ll have a good sleep.
今儿早点睡，明儿好早起赶火车。
Jīnr zǎo diǎn shuì，míngr hǎo zǎo qǐ gǎn huǒchē。
Let\'s turn in early, so as to get up early tomorrow to catch the train.
这孩子睡相不好。
Zhè háizi shuì xiàng bùhǎo。
The child sleeps sprawled all over the bed.
你不能因为睡眠不好就滥用安眠药。
Nǐ bùnéng yīnwèi shuìmián bùhǎo jiù lànyòng ānmiányào。
Because you have difficulty sleeping it doesn\'t mean you can overdose on sleeping pills.
妈妈说宝宝的睡态很好玩儿，像个熊猫。
Māma shuō bǎobao de shuìtài hěnhǎowánr，xiàng gè xióngmāo。
Mom said that the baby\'s sleeping posture was very funny, like a panda.
知道门已关好，她安然入睡了。
Zhīdào mén yǐguānhǎo，tā ānránrùshuì le。
Once she knew that the door had been locked, she fell a sleep peacefully.
他折腾了好几个钟头才睡着。
Tā zhēténg le hǎo jǐgè zhōng tóu cái shuìzháo。
He tossed about in bed for hours before he got to sleep.
我们要从小养成睡前洗漱的好习惯。
Wǒmen yào cóng xiǎo yǎngchéng shuì qián xǐshù de hǎo xíguàn。
We must form the good habit of washing our face, and brushing our teeth before going to bed.
早睡早起身体好。
Zǎoshuì zǎoqǐ shēntǐ hǎo。
Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy.
谁说睡板铺不能做好梦呀？
Shéi shuō shuì bǎnpù bùnéng zuò hǎomèng ya？
Who said that one can\'t have good dreams when sleeping in a bunk bed?
好久没有这样安恬熟睡了。
Hǎojiǔ méiyǒu zhèyàng āntián shúshuì le。
It has been a long time since I had a nice sleep like that.
看他的睡相就知道他睡得很沉，估计又做好梦了呢。
Kàn tā de shuì xiàng jiù zhīdào tā shuì de hěnchén，gūjì yòu zuò hǎomèng le ne。
Look at his posture in sleeping, and you\'ll know that he is fast asleep. Maybe he is having another nice dream.
最近工作忙，好几次衣不解带就上床睡觉了。
Zuìjìn gōngzuò máng，hǎo jǐ cì yībùjiědài jiù shàngchuáng shuìjiào le。
I\'ve been busy recently. I slept with my clothes on several times.
好不容易等到河水落槽，抗洪战士们才能睡上个安稳觉了。
Hǎo bùróngyì děngdào héshuǐ luòcáo，kànghóng zhànshìmen cáinéng shuì shàng gè ānwěnjiào le。
Flood-fighters did not have a sound sleep until the river receded.
他吃得好，睡得也好。
搅得我一夜没睡好觉

天热得甚至连觉都睡不好

好歹有个地方睡就行了。
Sleep tight my darling.
亲爱的，好好睡吧。

I was exactly asleep at that time.
我当时正好在睡觉。

be in a deep sleep; be fast asleep; sleep like a log; sleep soundly

shuì de hěn chénwěn

走江湖
西湖月色
Xī Hú yuèsè
the moon over the West Lake

The water looked silver in the moonlight.

It is a delight to watch the moon rising over the West Lake.
月光照耀下，湖面一片鳞波闪烁。

Under the shinning moonlight, the lake is flickering with scale-like ripples.
明朗的月光下，湖面亮闪闪的。

The Hunan team got the better of their opponents by scoring three baskets in a row at the beginning.
这次去湖南旅游，我们特意去欣赏了当地有名的采茶戏。
Zhècì qù Húnán lǚyóu，wǒmen tèyì qù xīnshǎng le dāngdì yǒumíng de cǎicháxì。
We watched the famous caicha opera when we went to Hunan Province for sightseeing.
湖南省将对公务员的职位进行核减。
Húnán Shěng jiāng duì gōngwùyuán de zhíwèi jìnxíng héjiǎn。
The posts of civil servants will be cut in Hunan Province.
这项基本法只适用于湖南地区。
Zhè xiàng jīběnfǎ zhǐ shìyòngyú Húnán dìqū。
This fundamental law is only suitable for Hunan province.
发现于湖南的女字，是世界上现存唯一的女人之间的“密码”文字。
Fāxiàn yú Húnándé nǚzì，shì shìjièshàng xiàncún wéiyí dì nǚrén zhījiān de“mìmǎ”wénzì。
湖南地区人们普遍使用湘方言。
Húnán dìqū rénmén pǔbiàn shǐyòng xiāngfāngyán。
People that live in Hunan Province speak Hunan dialect.
云南的泸沽湖一带，至今保留着母系社会的民族形式。
Yúnnán de Lúgūhú yídài，zhìjīn bǎoliú zhe mǔxì shèhuì de mínzú xíngshì。
The national form of matrilineal society still exists in the area near Lugu Lake in Yunnan Province.
湖面上往来的篷船构成了江南的一道风景。
Húmiàn shàng wǎnglái de péngchuán gòuchéng le jiāngnán de yídào fēngjǐng。
There are a lot of boats with awnings forming a beautiful landscape in the south of the Yangtze River.
早晨的雾气使得湖面上冥蒙一片，根本看不清东西南北。
Zǎochén de wùqì shǐdé húmiàn shàng míngméng yí piàn，gēnběn kànbùqīng dōngxīnánběi。
The morning fog makes the lake hazy, and people even can not distinguish directions.

Lake Victoria is the source of the Nile.

这个湖介于两座山之间。
Zhège hú jièyú liǎngzuò shān zhījiān.
The lake is situated between the two mountains.
约三两个好友在临湖的水阁上喝茶谈天儿，这样的聚会绝对优雅。

I lost my camera two days ago at the lake and am so sad about it.
我两天前在湖边把照相机丢了，为此我难过极了。
The five hundred acres of woodland and lakes were landscaped two hundred years ago.
Liǎngbǎi nián qián，zhè wǔbǎi yīng mǔ de líndì hé húpō jiù yòng zhíwù měihuà qǐlái le。

We paddled a boat on the West Lake yesterday.

Xīhú yèjǐng，měilì mírén。

相传，这个湖里有个水怪。

有人说，这个湖里有怪兽。

他在湖里捕到了四条鱼。

这个湖里没有鱼。

这条河注入那个湖里。

距离我们镇最远的湖在几百里之外。

那个湖湖宽超不会超过3英里。

湖水太深了，我不敢在里面游泳。

这些古代的江湖方技，很少有科学道理。
Zhèxiē gǔdài de jiānghú fāngjì，hěn shǎo yǒu kēxué dàolǐ。
These ancient folk medicines are seldom based on scientific research.
一群迁徙的大雁飞落到湖边做短暂的停留。
Yì qún qiānxǐ de dàyàn fēiluò dào húbiān zuò duǎnzàn de tíngliú。
A flock of wild geese landed by the lake for a short stay.
《天鹅湖》被奉为芭蕾舞剧的经典。
《Tiān\'éhú》bèi fèngwéi bālěiwǔjù de jīngdiǎn。
&quot;Swan Lake&quot; is honored as one of the classic ballets.
人工湖里芙蕖茂盛。
Réngōnghú lǐ fúqú màoshèng。
The lotus flowers are blooming in the artificial lake.
那个姑娘正在湖边抚琴。
Nà gè gūniang zhèngzài húbiān fǔqín。
The girl is playing the zither by the river.
我们打算在湖中央盖造一个亭子。
Wǒmen dǎsuàn zài hú zhōng yāng gàizào yígè tíngzi。
We plan to build a pavilion in the center of the lake.
我国内陆最大的海子是青海湖。
Wǒ guó nèilù zuìdàde hǎizi shì Qīnghǎi Hú。
The largest inland lake in China is Qinghai Lake.
浩渺的太湖让人心情舒畅。
Hàomiǎo de Tài Hú ràng rén xīnqíng shūchàng。
The vast Tai lake makes people happy.
湖南省将对公务员的职位进行核减。
Húnán Shěng jiāng duì gōngwùyuán de zhíwèi jìnxíng héjiǎn。
The posts of civil servants will be cut in Hunan Province.
这片湖泊里生长着不少红萍，形成了一道独特的风景。
Zhè piàn húbó lǐ shēngzhǎng zhe bùshǎo hóngpíng，xíngchéng le yídào dútè de fēngjǐng。
There is a lot of red duckweed growing in the lake, causing a unique scene.
他给我们讲述了一个湖汊的变迁史。
Tā gěi wǒmen jiǎngshù le yígè húchà de biànqiānshǐ。
He told us the vicissitudes of a lake branch.
他望着闪闪的湖光，心中一片宁静。
Tā wàng zhe shǎnshǎn de húguāng，xīn zhōng yípiàn níngjìng。
Staring at the flashing light on the lake, his whole heart was serene.
湖光山色交相辉映，这样的风景真是太美了。
Húguāng shānsè jiāoxiāng huīyìng，zhèyàng de fēngjǐng zhēnshì tài měi le。
The scenery of the lake shineds that of the mountain. How beautiful the view is!
他们国家的孩子，都有一双湖蓝的眼睛。
Tāmen guójiā de háizi，dōu yǒu yì shuāng húlán de yǎnjīng。
Children in their country all have a pair of lake-blue eyes.
他画了一些湖绿色的浮萍，看起来很自然。
Tā huà le yìxiē húlǜsè de fúpíng，kànqǐlái hěnzìrán。
He has drawn some lake-green duckweeds, which look quite natural.
他家住在大明湖畔，风景清新怡人。
Tā jiā zhùzài Dàmínghúpàn，fēngjǐng qīngxīn yírén。
He lives at the side of the Daming Lakefront with a fresh, and joyful view.
湖羊是优良的绵羊品种之一，具有很高的经济价值。
Húyáng shì yōuliáng de miányáng pǐnzhǒng zhīyī，jùyǒu hěngāo de jīngjì jiàzhí。
Huyang is one of the excellent sheep varieties, and is of high economic value.
这片湖沼很靠近森林，因此没有受到很大的污染。
Zhè piàn húzhǎo hěnkàojìn sēnlín，yīncǐ méiyǒu shòudào hěndà de wūrǎn。
The lake is very close to the forest, thus it hasn\'t been polluted much.
湖绉是浙江出产的一种有皱纹的丝织品，质地轻盈。
Húzhòu shì Zhèjiāng chūchǎn de yìzhǒng yǒu zhòuwén de sīzhīpǐn，zhìdì qīngyíng。
Huzhou Crape is a kind of rugged silk produced in Zhejiang with a light texture.
这项基本法只适用于湖南地区。
Zhè xiàng jīběnfǎ zhǐ shìyòngyú Húnán dìqū。
This fundamental law is only suitable for Hunan province.
我们的快艇在湖面上飞驰，划出一道好看的弧线。
Wǒmen de kuàitǐng zài húmiàn shàng fēichí，huàchū yídào hǎokàn de húxiàn。
Our autoboat sped over the lake in a nice curve.
月光照耀下，湖面一片鳞波闪烁。
Yuèguāng zhàoyào xià，húmiàn yípiàn línbō shǎnshuò。
Under the shinning moonlight, the lake is flickering with scale-like ripples.
天气转暖了，湖面上漂浮着很多流冰。
Tiānqì zhuǎnnuǎn le，húmiàn shàng piāofú zhe hěnduō liúbīng。
It is turning warm; many ice-floes are floating on the lake.
阳澄湖畔的沙家浜生长着茫茫的芦荡。
Yángchéng húpàn de shājiābāng shēngzhǎng zhe mángmáng de lúdàng。
Shajia creek beside Yangcheng Lake is filled with boundless reed marshes.
在靡靡的细雨中走在湖边的小路上，别有一番情趣。
Zài mímí de xìyǔ zhōng zǒuzài húbiān de xiǎolù shàng，biéyǒu yì fān qíngqù。
Walking on a road near a lake in a drizzle is a special experience.
云南的泸沽湖一带，至今保留着母系社会的民族形式。
Yúnnán de Lúgūhú yídài，zhìjīn bǎoliú zhe mǔxì shèhuì de mínzú xíngshì。
The national form of matrilineal society still exists in the area near Lugu Lake in Yunnan Province.
早晨的雾气使得湖面上冥蒙一片，根本看不清东西南北。
Zǎochén de wùqì shǐdé húmiàn shàng míngméng yí piàn，gēnběn kànbùqīng dōngxīnánběi。
The morning fog makes the lake hazy, and people even can not distinguish directions.
发现于湖南的女字，是世界上现存唯一的女人之间的“密码”文字。

湖面上往来的篷船构成了江南的一道风景。
Húmiàn shàng wǎnglái de péngchuán gòuchéng le jiāngnán de yídào fēngjǐng。
There are a lot of boats with awnings forming a beautiful landscape in the south of the Yangtze River.
水面上有个黑影漂动了一下，不会是湖怪吧？
Shuǐmiàn shàng yǒu gè hēiyǐng piāodòng le yíxià，búhuì shì húguài ba？
A black shadow floated over the lake. Could it be a lake monster?
公园里新修建了一个人工湖。
Gōngyuán lǐ xīn xiūjiàn le yígè réngōnghú。
A new man-made lake has been built in the park.
我最喜欢家乡的湖光山色。
Wǒ zuì xǐhuan jiāxiāng de húguāngshānsè。
I like the natural beauty of lakes and mountains in my hometown very much.
约三两个好友在临湖的水阁上喝茶谈天儿，这样的聚会绝对优雅。
Yuē sān liǎnggè hǎoyǒu zài línhú de shuǐgé shàng hēchá tántiānr，zhèyàng de jùhuì juéduì yōuyǎ。
Drinking tea and chatting with some friends in a waterside pavilion is an really elegant kind of party.
湖面上的冰碎裂了，春天又来到了人间！
Húmiàn shàng de bīng suìliè le，chūntiān yòu láidào le rénjiān！
The ice on the lake surface has cracked, which means spring has come back to the world again!
花园里那个假山是用苏州产的太湖石堆成的。

The pavilions beside the lake have an air of great antiquity.
神话传说中的雷锋塔其实就坐落在西子湖畔。

The Leifeng Tower in the legend is actually located by the side of the West Lake in Hangzhou.

People that live in Hunan Province speak Hunan dialect.

Xiao Hong and her friends are going to tour the lake by boat.

他向湖中投了一颗石子，藻花荡漾开来。

He threw a stone at the center of the lake, which caused the water blooms.
住在烟波浩淼的湖边，你可真会享受 。

the Great lakes
五大湖(北美洲湖泊群，分布在美国与加拿大之间)
From my window, I can see the lake and the village beyond.
透过窗，我能看到湖和湖那边的村庄。
That lake is no more than 3 miles across.
那个湖湖宽超不会超过3英里。
Great Salt Lake is the  fourth largest terminal lake in the world.
大盐湖是世界第四大终点湖。
The lakes are named after their exceedingly clear water.
这些湖因其清澈无比的湖水而得名。
The muddy water flowing into the lake clouded the water.
Húnshuǐ liúdào húlǐ，qīngchè de húshuǐ biàn de húnzhuóbùkān。

They went swimming in the lake this morning.
今天早上他们去湖里游泳了。
Sad and angry, Peter started aiming the stones into the lake, trying to calm himself down.
彼特又伤心又气恼，他把石头瞄准湖水扔了进去，试图让自己冷静下来。
From the window of my bedroom you can see the bank of the lake; it is so romantic.
从我卧室的窗户可以看到湖边，感觉很梦幻。
The path leads straight to the lake.
这条小路径直通向湖边。
Birds flew over the surface of the lake.
鸟儿飞过湖面。
He netted four fish at the lake.
他在湖里捕到了四条鱼。
They rowed a boat around the lake all afternoon.
整个中午，他们都在划船游湖。
This summer, we\'re planning on going sailing on the lake every day if the weather permits.
只要天气允许，我们打算这个夏天每天都在这湖里划船。
There are no fishes in this lake.
这个湖里没有鱼。
Look at how beautiful the pen is floating on the lake!
你看那只雌天鹅浮在湖面上，多美啊！
The group of lakes form a wonderful natural reserve in that area.
那个地区湖泊众多，构成了一个风景优美的自然保护区。
I lost my camera two days ago at the lake and am so sad about it.
我两天前在湖边把照相机丢了，为此我难过极了。
The lake crossing was quite an adventure.
渡过这个湖真是十足的冒险行为。
He is not a good swimmer and almost drowned in the lake.
他不是一个游泳好手，曾险些在湖里被淹死。
We like to camp on the flats near the lake.
我们想要在湖边的平地上宿营。
After the lake froze, we could skate on it.
湖面结冰后，我们就能在上面滑冰了。
There were many geese on the lake.
湖面上有许多只鹅。
Peter says he can cross the lake in a boat in less than 20 minutes, but I don\'t believe him.
彼得说他能在20分钟内划船过湖，我才不相信呢。
A dead body was found yesterday in the lake but I can\'t tell you more.

Xiǎodāohuì shì gè yí miàn fǎnqīng，yí miàn mièyáng de tuántǐ。
The Dagger Society is a group which rebelled against the Qing government and fought against the invaders.
爸爸每天累死累活也赚不了几个小洋。
Bàba měitiān lèisǐ lèihuó yě zuànbùliǎo jǐgè xiǎoyáng。
My father can make only a little by working so hard every day.
他看到大势已去，只能望洋兴叹了！
Tā kàndào dàshì yǐqù，zhǐnéng wàngyáng xīngtàn le！
Realizing the situation was hopeless, he could do nothing but lament.
洋布物美价廉，买的人很多。
Yángbùwùměi jiàlián，mǎi de rén hěnduō。
Machine-woven cloth is of low price and high quality, it\'s bought by many people.
洋倒爷也促进了中外的交流。
Yángdǎoyé yě cùjìn le zhōng wài de jiāoliú。
Foreign profiteers accelerated the exchange between China and foreign countries.
他们买了个带花园的洋房。
Tāmen mǎi le gè dài huāyuán de yángfáng。
They bought a Western-style building with a garden.
在国外时间久了，他们的思想都被洋化了。
Zài guówài shíjiān jiǔ le，tāmen de sīxiǎng dōu bèi yánghuà le。
Being abroad for a long time, he thinks in a western way.
上海有很多当年的洋楼。
Shànghǎi yǒu hěnduō dāngnián de yánglóu。
Many Western-style buildings of two stories or more were built in Shanghai in those years.
给我们来点洋嗓子，换换口味。
Gěi wǒmen láidiǎn yángsǎngzi，huànhuàn kǒuwèi。
Give us some voice trained in the western style of singing for a change.
这座洋式的房子在解放前的时候是个教堂。

This Western-style house was a church before liberation.
我们用洋铁的时代已经过去了。
Wǒmen yòng yángtiě de shídài yǐjing guòqù le。
The time when we used galvanized iron has passed.
在海外多年，他穿衣洋味儿浓郁。
Zài hǎiwài duōnián，tā chuānyī yángwèir nóngyù。
After being abroad for a long time, he dresses in a Western style.
我不会说洋文，你别胡弄我。
Wǒ búhuì shuō yángwén，nǐ bié húnòng wǒ。
I don\'t speak a foreign language, don\'t play tricks on me.
过去我们用洋油点灯。
Guòqù wǒmen yòng yángyóu diǎndēng。
We lit kerosene lamps in the past.
过去我都依赖进口的洋油。

我不爱吃洋芋，换个别的。
Wǒ bú àichī yángyù，huàn gè bié de。
I don\'t like to eat yams, let\'s change to something else.

Books with Western-style bindings sell well, everyone looks for novelty.

Qianxuesin travelled all the way across the ocean, finally returning to his motherland after undergoing various difficulties.

Brother has already prepared to travel across the ocean and study abroad.

这个国家的气候为海洋性气候，全年都很湿润。

The country is of maritime climate, and is wet all year round.

tuōɡù zǎotuì

Xǔduō xuésheng tuìchūle，yīnwèi tāmen méiyǒu wèi zhège chōngmǎn tiǎozhàn de xiàngmù zuòhǎo zhǔnbèi。
许多学生退出了，因为他们没有为这个充满挑战的项目做好准备。
He could not keep up and dropped out of the race.
Tā wúfǎ zài jiānchí xiàqù，yīncǐ tuìchūle bǐsài。
他无法再坚持下去，因此退出了比赛。

所有的消沉情绪和退出想法马上一扫而空。
Today is not the time to exit.

眼下还不是退出的时候。

欧洲央行目前拥有退出非常规措施的策略。

退休后他一直沉潜于京剧艺术的研究。
Tuìxiū hòu tā yìzhí chénqián yú jīngjù yìshù de yánjiū。
After retirement, he became absorbed in the research of Beijing Opera.
上级部门通知，如有重征棉纱税捐的情况发生，应当立即退回。
Shàngjí bùmén tōngzhī，rú yǒu chóngzhēng miánshā shuìjuān de qíngkuàng fāshēng，yīngdāng lìjí tuìhuí。
The higher authority was notified that if dual tax was levied on cotton yarn, it should immediately be repealed.
黜退忠良，社稷危矣。
Chùtuì zhōngliáng,shèjì wēi yǐ.
We will endanger our country if we demote our most noble and talented citizens.
革命军催迫皇帝退位。
Gémìngjūn cuīpò huángdì tuìwèi。
The revolutionary force forced the emperor to step down.
自从有了打卡机，迟到早退现象就少多了。
Zìcóng yǒu le dǎkǎjī，chídào zǎotuì xiàn xiàng jiù shǎoduō le。
Since the time clocks were installed much less people have come late, or left early.
能够来这里发挥余热，这些退休老人也得其所哉。
Nénggòu lái zhèlǐ fāhuī yúrè，zhèxiē tuìxiū lǎorén yě déqí suǒzāi。
These retired men are content to devote their remaining energy here.
母亲退休后，他顶职进入了那家工厂。
Mǔqīn tuìxiū hòu，tā dǐngzhí jìnrù le nàjiā gōngchǎng。
After his mother\'s retirement, he took her place and became a member of that factory.
爷爷虽然已经退居二线，但还经常关心工作上的事。
Yéye suīrán yǐjing tuìjū èrxiàn，dàn hái jīngcháng guānxīn gōngzuò shàng de shì。
Though grandpa has stepped down from active service, he still cares a lot about work.
这是一台在二战期间立过功的发报机，如今它“退休”到了博物馆。
Zhè shì yìtái zài èrzhàn qījiān lì guò gōng de fābàojī，rújīn tā“tuìxiū”dào le bówùguǎn。
This transmitter made great contribution during the World War II, and now it has retired and rests in the museum.
有人说，翻牌公司的出现是改革中的倒退。
Yǒu rén shuō，fānpái gōngsī de chūxiàn shì gǎigé zhōng de dàotuì。
Some people believe that government bodies turning into companies is a step backwards.
面对困难，她非特毫不退缩，还积极寻求解决办法。
Miànduì kùnnan，tā fēitè háo bùtuìsuō，hái jījí xúnqiú jiějué bànfǎ。
Instead of flinching from the difficulties, she strived to find solutions.
她终因家庭挂碍，退役离开了国家队。
Tā zhōng yīn jiātíng guàài，tuìyì líkāi le guójiāduì。
Finally, she retired from the national team because she was worried about her family.
运动员退役、教练挂鞭都是正常的事情，大家不必太难过。
Yùndòngyuán tuìyì、jiàoliàn guàbiān dōushì zhèngcháng de shìqing，dàjiā búbì tài nánguò。
It is normal for athletes and coaches to retire, so don\'t be too sad about it.
退休职工活动室的活动项目越来越丰富了。
Tuìxiū zhígōng huódòngshì de huódòng xiàng mù yuèláiyuè fēngfù le。
There are more and more activities in the amusement room for retired workers.
轻易地原谅自己的错误会使自己不汲汲进取，反而退步。
Qīngyì de yuánliàng zìjǐ de cuòwù huì shǐ zìjǐ bùjíjí jìnqǔ，fǎnér tuìbù。
It\'ll make you go backwards instead of actively progressing if you often forgive your own mistakes easily.
他已经90多岁了，但筋力一点都没衰退。
Tā yǐjing jiǔshí duō suì le，dàn jīnlì yìdiǎn dōu méi shuāituì。
He is over 90 years old, but he is still very strong.
我军向敌军发起进击，有望在傍晚将其击退。
Wǒ jūn xiàng díjūn fāqǐ jìnjī，yǒuwàng zài bàngwǎn jiāng qí jītuì。
Our army is attacking the enemy, and hopefully will defeat them by late afternoon.
虽然荆棘载途，他也没有退缩。
Suīrán jīngjízǎitú，tā yě méiyǒu tuìsuō。
爷爷奶奶退休以后，就在家里看养孙子了。
Yéye nǎinai tuìxiū yǐhòu，jiù zài jiā lǐ kānyǎng sūnzi le。
After retirement, grandpa and grandma stay at home and look after their grandson.
老领导刚退休，很不习惯这种靠边儿站的生活。
Lǎolǐngdǎo gāng tuìxiū，hěnbùxíguàn zhèzhǒng kàobiānr zhàn de shēnghuó。
The old leader has just retired, he can\'t get used to a powerless life.
张老师退休后被多所大学聘为客座教授了。
Zhāng lǎoshī tuìxiū hòu bèi duō suǒ dàxué pìnwéi kèzuò jiàoshòu le。
After retirement, Mr. Zhang was employed as a visiting professor by several universities.
退休后，他每天乐悠悠的，读读书，写写字，看看戏，倒也惬意。
Tuìxiū hòu，tā měitiān lèyōuyōu de，dúdú shū，xiěxiě zì，kànkàn xì，dǎo yě qièyì。
After he retired he lived leisurely and comfortably, sometimes reading, sometimes writing, or watching a play.  More simply, he lived a happy life.
离退休人员的社会保障体系在日趋完善，其目的是使老人能够安度晚年。
Lítuìxiū rényuán de shèhuì bǎozhàng tǐxì zài rìqū wánshàn，qí mùdì shì shǐ lǎorén nénggòu āndù wǎnnián。
The social security system for employees who have left or retired from their posts is gradually established. Its purpose is to allow the elderly to live a comfortable, and peaceful life.
我真希望退休后可以终老林泉呀！
Wǒ zhēn xīwàng tuìxiū hòu kěyǐ zhōng lǎo línquán ya！
After I retire I wish to spend the rest of my life in the countryside.
唐朝末年官僚乱政，国力衰退。
Tángcháo mònián guānliáo luànzhèng，guólì shuāituì。
In the remaining years of the Tang dynasty, the country was shattered by bureaucrats, and national power declined gradually.
退休以后，他家渐渐地门庭冷落了。
Tuìxiū yǐhòu，tā jiā jiànjiàn de méntíng lěngluò le。
After retirement, fewer and fewer people visited his house.
经过校董事会的协商，决定对他免予退学处分。
Jīngguò xiào dǒngshìhuì de xiéshāng，juédìng duì tā miǎnyǔ tuìxué chǔfèn。
After the school board\'s consultation, he is spared the punishment of quitting school.
她曾经是个有名的女伶，后因嗓子坏了而退出了舞台。
Tā céngjīng shì gè yǒumíng de nǚlíng，hòu yīn sǎngzi huài le ér tuìchū le wǔtái。
She used to be a famous actress, but she left the stage because she lost her voice.
火车向前疾驰，窗外的平野迅速地往后退去。
Huǒchē xiàng qián jíchí，chuāngwài de píngyě xùnsù de wǎng hòu tuìqù。
The train is speeding forward while the open fields outside the window re moving backwards rapidly.
学校将以往不合理的收费全部清退给了学生们。
Xuéxiào jiāng yǐwǎng bùhélǐ de shōufèi quánbùqīngtuì gěi le xuéshengmen。
The school will check on and return all unreasonable charges that have been imposed on students.
他感到无比迷茫，进退失据。
Tā gǎndào wúbǐ mímáng，jìntuì shījù。
He felt mixed-up and in a hopeless position.
自从被辞退后，我就失却了稳定的经济来源。
Zìcóng bèi cítuì hòu，wǒ jiù shīquè le wěndìng de jīngjì láiyuán。
I lost a steady income after I was fired.
由于上级不断施压要求精简人员，我们只能把一部分员工辞退。
Yóuyú shàngjí búduàn shīyā yāoqiú jīngjiǎn rényuán，wǒmen zhǐnéng bǎ yíbùfen yuángōng cítuì。
We had to dismiss some of the staff because higher authorities are constantly demanding streamlining.
老李退休以后就没有实职了。
Lǎo Lǐ tuìxiū yǐhòu jiù méiyǒu shízhí le。
Senior Li won\'t have any active job after his retirement.
我命各军率部迎敌、不准后退。
Wǒ mìng gè jūn shuàibùyíngdí、bùzhǔn hòutuì。
I ordered that all the armies should lead their soldiers to charge ahead rather than turn back.
听说自己被公司辞退了，他爽然不知所措。
Tīngshuō zìjǐ bèi gōngsī cítuì le，tā shuǎngrán bùzhī suǒcuò。
Hearing that he was fired by the company, he was totally at a loss.
老局长退休后，新嗣位的局长是个年轻人。
Lǎojúzhǎng tuìxiū hòu，xīn sìwèi de júzhǎng shì gè niánqīngrén。
After the old head\'s retirement, the new succeeding bureau head was a young man
据探马来报，敌人已经开始撤退了。
Jù tànmǎ láibào，dírén yǐjing kāishǐ chètuì le。
According to the cavalry, the enemy are beginning to withdraw.
退休后您就在家享享天伦之乐吧。
Tuìxiū hòu nín jiù zài jiā xiǎngxiǎng tiānlúnzhīlè ba。
Just enjoy your family happiness after retirement.
这个地主已经打算明年退佃了。
Zhège dìzhǔ yǐjing dǎsuàn míngnián tuìdiàn le。
This landlord has decided to cancel the tenancy next year.
你什么时候退岗呀？
Nǐ shénme shíhou tuìgǎng ya？
When will you quit your job?
列车马上就要进站了，请乘客退后到安全线以外。
Lièchē mǎshàng jiùyào jìnzhàn le，qǐng chéngkè tuìhòu dào ānquánxiàn yǐwài。
The train is drawing into the station, please step back behind the safety line.
无论遇到什么样的困难我们也不能退后。
Wúlùn yùdào shénmeyàng de kùnnan wǒmen yě bùnéng tuìhòu。
We will never fall back, whatever difficulties we might run into.
我公司一定尽快为用户办理退款手续。
Wǒ gōngsī yídìng jìnkuài wèi yònghù bànlǐ tuìkuǎn shǒuxù。
Our company will refund the users as soon as possible.
明天我们可以拿到一万元退款。
Míngtiān wǒmen kěyǐ nádào yíwàn yuán tuìkuǎn。
We can get a 10,000 yuan repayment tomorrow.
这仅仅是一次小挫折，你绝不能因此而退坡。
Zhè jǐnjǐn shì yícì xiǎo cuòzhé，nǐ jué bùnéng yīncǐ ér tuìpō。
This is only a small setback, you shouldn\'t fall back just because of this.
他在退堂后才有时间接见你，你再耐心地等等吧。
Tā zài tuìtáng hòu cái yǒu shíjiān jiējiàn nǐ，nǐ zài nàixīn de děngděng ba。
He\'ll have time to see you only when he retires from the courtroom, so please continue waiting patiently.
你不能在关键时候打退堂鼓呀！
Nǐ bùnéng zài guānjiàn shíhou dǎ tuìtánggǔ ya！
You can\'t shrink back at this essential moment!
他每个月能拿到一千元的退休金。
Tā měigè yuè néng nádào yìqiān yuán de tuìxiūjīn。
He can get a 1000 yuan pension every month.
陶渊明无心做官，最终选择退隐山林，享受田园生活的乐趣。
Táo Yuānmíng wúxīn zuòguān，zuì zhōng xuǎnzé tuìyǐn shānlín，xiǎngshòu tiányuán shēnghuó de lèqù。
Tao Yuanming was not interested in becoming an official, and finally chose to be a hermit in a forest enjoying the fun of rural life.
他脸上的红晕逐渐隐退了。
Tā liǎnshàng de hóngyùn zhújiàn yǐntuì le。
The color fled from her cheeks.
每次遇到困难你就退缩，真是个窝囊废！
Měi cì yùdào kùnnan nǐ jiù tuìsuō，zhēnshì gè wōnángfèi！
You shrink whenever you encounter difficulties, what a worthless wretch!
邮局一般会将挂号的瞎信退给寄信人。
Yóujú yìbān huì jiāng guàhào de xiāxìn tuìgěi jìxìnrén。
The post office generally will send the dead letters back to the senders.
都快一个星期了，她脸上的淤青还没有消退。
Dōu kuài yígè xīngqī le，tā liǎnshàng de yūqīng hái méiyǒu xiāotuì。
It\'s almost a week now, but the bruise on her face is still visible.
凡是50岁以上的都一刀切地被辞退了。
Fánshì wǔshísuì yǐshàng de dōu yìdāoqiē de bèi cítuì le。
People over fifty are dismissed, without exception.
他退休后依然关心政事。
Tā tuìxiū hòu yīrán guānxīn zhèngshì.
He still cares about political affairs after he retired.
他退休后，组织关系仍然在机关。
Tā tuìxiū hòu，zǔzhī guānxì réngrán zài jīguān。
After retirement, his membership credential remained in the office.
他的视力减退是由角膜炎引起的。
Tā de shìlì jiǎntuì shì yóu jiǎomóyán yǐnqǐ de。
His poor eyesight results from keratitis.
虽然荆姮载途，他也没有退缩。
Suīrán jīnghéngzǎitú，tā yě méiyǒu tuìsuō。
Although the path was beseted with difficulties and obstructions, he did not flinch.
法官宣布退庭，明天继续审理此案。
Fǎguān xuānbù tuìtíng，míngtiān jìxù shěnlǐ cǐ\'àn。
The judge announced a retirement from the court, and decided to hear the case tomorrow.
他被老板斥退了。
Tā bèi lǎobǎn chìtuìle。
He was dismissed by the boss.
他斥退了手下。
Tā chìtuìle shǒuxià。
He shouted at his subordinate to go away.
他因工作不力，被老板辞退。
Tā yīn gōngzuòbúlì，bèi lǎobǎn cítuì。
He wasn\'t hardworking enough, and so was dismissed by the boss.
倒退5年，他只是个学徒。
Dàotuì wǔnián，tā zhǐshìgè xuétú。
Going back five years, he was still a trainee.
她被吓得倒退了几步。
Tā bèi xiàde dàotuìle jǐbù。
She was so shocked that she had to take a few steps back.

寸进尺退
cùnjìnchǐtuì 
advance by inches, retreat by feet; more regressing than progressing
学如逆水行舟，不进则退。
Xué rú nìshuǐxíngzhōu，bújìnzétuì。
Study is like sailing against the current: either you keep forging ahead or you keep falling behind.
轻易地原谅自己的错误会使自己不汲汲进取，反而退步。
Qīngyì de yuánliàng zìjǐ de cuòwù huì shǐ zìjǐ bùjíjí jìnqǔ，fǎnér tuìbù。
It\'ll make you go backwards instead of actively progressing if you often forgive your own mistakes easily.
坚持进步，反对倒退
jiānchí jìnbù，fǎnduì dàotuì
persist in progress and oppose retrogression
打退敌人的进攻
dǎtuì dírén de jìngōng 
repulse an enemy attack
列车马上就要进站了，请乘客退后到安全线以外。

The soldiers held the mountain pass and beat back the intruders.

jītuì díjūn jǐ cì jìngōng
repulse several enemy assaults

我军向敌军发起进击，有望在傍晚将其击退。
Wǒ jūn xiàng díjūn fāqǐ jìnjī，yǒuwàng zài bàngwǎn jiāng qí jītuì。
Our army is attacking the enemy, and hopefully will defeat them by late afternoon.
击退敌人的多次进攻。
The government drove the guerrillas off using infantry.
政府出动步兵团击退了游击队员。
to repel an attack
击退进攻
to turn an attack
击退一次进攻
We will roll back the power of the central state.
Wǒmen huì jītuì zhōngyāng guójiā de wǔlì de。
我们会击退中央国家的武力的。
After the attack, the TF will retire to at full speed.
攻击结束后，这个编队将以最高速度撤退。

retreat on one\'s own initiative in order to wipe out more enemy troops
遇到困难决不后退
yùdào kùnnan jué bú hòutuì 
never shrink from difficulties
他往后退了几步。
Tā wǎnghòu tuì le jǐ bù。
He stepped back a few paces. or He backed up several steps.

The train is speeding forward while the open fields outside the window re moving backwards rapidly.
我命各军率部迎敌、不准后退。
Wǒ mìng gè jūn shuàibùyíngdí、bùzhǔn hòutuì。
I ordered that all the armies should lead their soldiers to charge ahead rather than turn back.
自从被辞退后，我就失却了稳定的经济来源。

I lost a steady income after I was fired.
列车马上就要进站了，请乘客退后到安全线以外。

The train is drawing into the station, please step back behind the safety line.
无论遇到什么样的困难我们也不能退后。

We will never fall back, whatever difficulties we might run into.
雨后炎热减退了许多。
Yǔ hòu yánrè jiǎntuì le xǔduō。
After the rain, the heat abated considerably.
他退休后，把很多精力放到了茶艺研究上。
Tā tuìxiū hòu，bǎ hěnduō jīnglì fàngdào le cháyì yánjiū shàng。
He devoted much energy to tea arts after retirement.
退休后他一直沉潜于京剧艺术的研究。

After retirement, he became absorbed in the research of Beijing Opera.
母亲退休后，他顶职进入了那家工厂。
Mǔqīn tuìxiū hòu，tā dǐngzhí jìnrù le nàjiā gōngchǎng。
After his mother\'s retirement, he took her place and became a member of that factory.
张老师退休后被多所大学聘为客座教授了。
Zhāng lǎoshī tuìxiū hòu bèi duō suǒ dàxué pìnwéi kèzuò jiàoshòu le。
After retirement, Mr. Zhang was employed as a visiting professor by several universities.
退休后，他每天乐悠悠的，读读书，写写字，看看戏，倒也惬意。

我真希望退休后可以终老林泉呀！

After I retire I wish to spend the rest of my life in the countryside.

Just enjoy your family happiness after retirement.
他在退堂后才有时间接见你，你再耐心地等等吧。

He still cares about political affairs after he retired.

When he retired from political life he felt incredibly relaxed.

He lived an easy life after retirement, and signed for his idleness.
爷爷奶奶退休以后，就在家里看养孙子了。

打退敌人的冲锋
dǎtuì dírén de chōngfēng
beat back the enemy assault
打退敌人的进攻
dǎtuì dírén de jìngōng 
repulse an enemy attack
不能遇到点困难就打退堂鼓呀。
Bùnéng yùdào diǎn kùnnan jiù dǎtuìtánggǔ ya。
You can\'t give up the moment you run up against difficulty.
你既然答应了，就别打退堂鼓。

The soldiers held the mountain pass and beat back the intruders.

You can\'t shrink back at this essential moment!

Since the time clocks were installed much less people have come late, or left early.

我本打算告诉他，但却临阵退缩了。

他进退两难，不知道走哪条路。
Koine is a dialect of ancient Greek that was the lingua franca of the empire of alexander the great and was widely spoken throughout the eastern mediterranean area in roman times.
Koine（gòngtóng yǔ）shì yì zhǒng gǔxīlà yǔ fāngyán，shì Yàlìshāndà dàdì dìguó de hùnhé yǔ，guǎngfàn shǐyòng yú luómǎ shíqī de dìzhōnghǎi dōngbùdìqū。
Koine（共同语）是一种古希腊语方言，是亚历山大大帝帝国的混合语，广泛使用于罗马时期的地中海东部地区。
五帝是中国神话传说中的五个天神。
Wǔdì shì Zhōngguó shénhuàchuánshuō zhōng de wǔ gè tiānshén。
The Five August Emperors are the five gods in Chinese legends.
三皇五帝的传说在中国流传得很广。
Sānhuáng wǔdì de chuánshuō zài Zhōngguó liúchuán de hěn guǎng。
The legend of The Three Wise Kings and Five August Emperors is widely known in China.
到了公元五世纪，罗马帝国迅速衰落。
Dào le gōngyuán wǔ shìjì，Luómǎ dìguó xùnsù shuāiluò。
The Roman Empire rapidly waned in power in the 5th century.
三皇五帝
三皇五帝。

传说中的天帝就居住在天庭之中。
Chuánshuō zhōng de Tiāndì jiù jūzhù zài tiāntíng zhīzhōng。
The legendary Lord of Heaven lives in the Palace of Heaven.
御厨们每天都为皇帝准备午膳。
Yùchúmen měitiān dōu wèi huángdì zhǔnbèi wǔshàn。
The imperial cooks prepared lunch for the emperor every day.
每个朝代的开国皇帝得了天下后，都要传檄天下。
Měigè cháodài de kāiguó huángdì dé le tiānxià hòu，dōuyào chuánxí tiānxià。
The founding Emperor of every dynasty would send out a war proclamation after seizing the ruling power of a country.
过了这道天门就到了皇帝的寝宫了。

The emperor demands that we finish the task tonight.
历代的皇帝都想一统天下，结束分裂的局面。
Lìdài de huángdì dōu xiǎng yìtǒng tiānxià，jiéshù fēnliè de júmiàn。
Emperors in all dynasties wanted to dominate the whole world and put an end to the disunited nation.
陪同皇帝游历的这几天，我一直是如临深渊，如履薄冰，生怕自己做错事。

Those days when I accompanied the emperor on his tour, I was afraid of doing something wrong, as if I was standing on the edge of an abyss or treading on thin ice.
现在的皇帝是个昏君，每天只知道在围场打猎。
Xiànzài de huángdì shì gè hūnjūn，měitiān zhǐ zhīdào zài wéichǎng dǎliè。
The current reigning emperor is fatuous and self-indulgent, he just hunts in the hunting enclosure every day.
古时候，文武百官每天早晨都要朝拜皇帝。

In ancient China, government officials at all levels had morning court with the reigning sovereign every day.
古代帝王总以为可以世代家天下，何其狭隘。
Gǔdài dìwáng zǒng yǐwéi kěyǐ shìdài jiā tiānxià，héqí xiáài。
The emperors had a narrow-minded view, they thought they were in possession of the whole country and that it could be inherited by their offspring.
历朝历代的开国皇帝哪个不是出生入死地闯天下。

Koine is a dialect of ancient Greek that was the lingua franca of the empire of alexander the great and was widely spoken throughout the eastern mediterranean area in roman times.
Koine（gòngtóng yǔ）shì yì zhǒng gǔxīlà yǔ fāngyán，shì Yàlìshāndà dàdì dìguó de hùnhé yǔ，guǎngfàn shǐyòng yú luómǎ shíqī de dìzhōnghǎi dōngbùdìqū。
Koine（共同语）是一种古希腊语方言，是亚历山大大帝帝国的混合语，广泛使用于罗马时期的地中海东部地区。
五四新文化运动的锋芒所向是帝国主义、封建主义。

轩辕黄帝是我们的祖先。

Huángdì cèlì le dàhuángzǐ wéi tàizǐ。

mòdài huánɡdì
the last emperor (of a dynasty)

huángdì de dàhūn shèngdiǎn

The emperor\'s carriage is in the middle of the parade.

他被皇帝软禁了起来，过着池鱼笼鸟一样的生活。

He was confined by the emperor, living like a fish in a pond or a bird in a cage.

皇帝传旨在御花园传见封疆大吏。
Huángdì chuánzhǐ zài yùhuāyuán chuánjiàn fēngjiāng dàlì。
An imperial order was delivered that the Emperor would call on the high officer of the frontier at the imperial garden.
每个朝代的开国皇帝得了天下后，都要传檄天下。
Měigè cháodài de kāiguó huángdì dé le tiānxià hòu，dōuyào chuánxí tiānxià。
The founding Emperor of every dynasty would send out a war proclamation after seizing the ruling power of a country.
历朝历代的开国皇帝哪个不是出生入死地闯天下。
Lìcháo lìdài de kāiguó huángdì nǎ gè búshì chūshēngrùsǐ de chuǎngtiānxià。
No founding emperor of a dynasty could seize state power without first going through water and fire.
封谁春闱，皇帝还没有拿定主意。
Fēngshéi chūnwéi，huángdì hái méiyǒu nádìngzhǔyì。
The emperor hadn\'t decided who would be conferred with the title of crown prince.
革命军催迫皇帝退位。
Gémìngjūn cuīpò huángdì tuìwèi。

新皇帝登极了！
Xīnhuángdì dēngjí le！
The new emperor has ascended the throne!
皇帝死后被安放在这座地宫里。
Huángdì sǐ hòu bèi ānfàngzài zhèzuò dìgōng lǐ。
Emperors were put in this underground palace after death.
历史上，发菜曾是进奉皇帝的贡品。
Lìshǐ shàng，fàcài céng shì jìnfèng huángdì de gòngpǐn。
In the past, long thread moss was offered to emperors as a tribute.
古时候，有时皇帝会出于政治的需要而把美丽的公主嫁给番邦国王。
Gǔshíhou，yǒushí huángdì huì chūyú zhèngzhì de xūyào ér bǎ měilì de gōngzhǔ jià gěi fānbāng guówáng。
In ancient times, the emperor would sometimes marry pretty princesses to foreign kings for political reasons.
古时候，人们不能直呼皇帝的名字，因为那是犯讳的。
Gǔshíhou，rénmen bùnéng zhíhū huángdì de míngzi，yīnwèi nàshì fànhuì de。
It was considered irreverent to call the emperor\'s name directly in ancient times.
古时候，皇帝的太太们统称为妃嫔。
Gǔshíhou，huángdì de tàitàimen tǒngchēng wéi fēipín。
In ancient times, the emperor\'s wives were called imperial concubines.
中国历史上，曾经有很多皇帝前往泰山封禅。
Zhōngguó lìshǐ shàng，céngjīng yǒu hěnduō huángdì qiánwǎng Tài Shān fēngshàn。
Many emperors in Chinese history offered sacrifices to heaven and earth on Mount Tai.
皇帝登基以后，总要封赏他手下的大臣。
Huángdì dēngjī yǐhòu，zǒngyào fēngshǎng tā shǒuxià de dàchén。
When the emperors ascended to the throne, they would award all their officials.
两位宫女在皇帝身后手持宫扇。
Liǎng wèi gōngnǚ zài huángdì shēnhòu shǒuchí gōngshàn。
Two maids are standing behind the Emperor with a round fan in their hands.
皇家的宫苑是不许百姓进入的，只能皇帝带领大臣打猎游玩。
Huángjiā de gōngyuàn shì bùxǔ bǎixìng jìnrù de，zhǐnéng huángdì dàilǐng dàchén dǎliè yóuwán。
The common people are not allowed to enter the palatial gardens. Only the emperor has the right to bring his ministers to the palatial gardens for hunting and sight-seeing.
今年杭州的贡奉最让皇帝喜欢。
Jīnnián Hángzhōu de gòngfèng zuì ràng huángdì xǐhuan。
This year, the emperor liked most the tribute provided by Hangzhou.
在大宴群臣的时候，皇帝将贡酒赐予有功之臣以示恩典。
Zài dàyàn qúnchén de shíhou，huángdì jiāng gòngjiǔ cìyǔ yǒugōng zhī chén yǐshì ēndiǎn。
When holding a feast for all the ministers, the emperor granted tribute alcohol to the ministers with great accomplishments as a sign of favor.
这次皇帝御驾亲征，挂甲上阵。
Zhècì huángdì yùjià qīnzhēng，guàjiǎ shàngzhèn。
This time, the emperor personally let his soldiers, buckling on his armor for the battle.
她是皇帝最宠爱的后妃，但也因此招来了很多人的嫉妒。
Tā shì huángdì zuì chǒngài de hòufēi，dàn yě yīncǐ zhāolái le hěnduōrén de jídù。
She was the Emperor\'s favorite concubine, but because of this she attracted the jealousy of many people.
听到皇帝的诏令以后，他感到惶惶然不知所措。
Tīngdào huángdì de zhàolìng yǐhòu，tā gǎndào huánghuángrán bùzhī suǒcuò。
Hearing the order of the Emperor, he felt panic and didn\'t know what to do.
皇帝马上就要驾到了，他们正准备接驾。
Huángdì mǎshàng jiùyào jiàdào le，tāmen zhèng zhǔnbèi jiējià。
The emperor is arriving soon, so they are preparing to meet him.
皇帝鼓励大臣谏诤，以戒除自己的缺点。
Huángdì gǔlì dàchén jiànzhèng，yǐ jièchú zìjǐ de quēdiǎn。
The emperor encouraged his ministers to point out his faults frankly so that he could correct them.
皇帝站在阶墀上注视着下面跪倒的大臣。
Huángdì zhànzài jiēchí shàng zhùshì zhe xiàmiàn guìdǎo de dàchén。
The emperor stood at the painted step, looking down at the those ministers on their knees.
他是个喜欢向皇帝进谗的小人。
Tā shì gè xǐhuan xiàng huángdì jìnchán de xiǎorén。
He is a snob who always slanders others in front of the emperor.
大臣向皇帝进呈运河形势图。
Dàchén xiàng huángdì jìnchéng yùnhé xíngshìtú。
The minister presented the canal situation chart to the emperor.
这些进奉是广西的特产，皇帝很喜欢。
Zhèxiē jìnfèng shì Guǎngxī de tèchǎn，huángdì hěnxǐhuan。
These are specialities from Guangxi Province to be sent to the emperor.
魏征以敢于向皇帝直言进谏而著称于史册。
Wèi Zhēng yǐ gǎnyú xiàng huángdì zhíyán jìnjiàn ér zhùchēng yú shǐcè。
Weizheng is famous for his courage in offering honest advice to the emperor.
他在巴结皇帝的近侍，真是厚颜无耻。
Tā zài bājie huángdì de jìnshì，zhēnshì hòuyán wúchǐ。
That creature butters up the emperor\'s close servant-of all the nerve!
清末的那次维新变法，皇帝曾经想要实施君主立宪制度，但终于没能成功。
Qīngmò de nà cì wéixīn biànfǎ，huángdì céngjīng xiǎngyào shíshī jūnzhǔ lìxiàn zhìdù，dàn zhōng yú méinéng chénggōng。
During the Reform in the last years of the Qing Dynasty, the emperor wanted to implement the constitutional monarchy system but eventually failed.
我们接到皇帝的口谕，今天晚上一定要完成任务。
Wǒmen jiēdào huángdì de kǒuyù，jīntiān wǎnshàng yídìng yào wánchéng rènwù。
The emperor demands that we finish the task tonight.
皇帝登基时，宽赦了一些囚犯。
Huángdì dēngjī shí，kuānshè le yìxiē qiúfàn。
When the emperor ascended the throne, he pardoned many criminals.
皇帝出京一般是在离宫中居住。
Huángdì chūjīng yìbān shì zài lígōng zhōng jūzhù。
When the emperors came out of  the capital, they often lived in summer or winter palace.
清代历朝一共有十四位皇帝。
Qīngdài lìcháo yígòng yǒu shísìwèi huángdì。
During the whole period of the Qing Dynasty, there were fourteen emperors in total.
大凡古代的名臣贤士都有后世皇帝为其立碑以记其功德。
Dàfán gǔdài de míngchén xiánshì dōu yǒu hòushì huángdì wèi qí lìbēi yǐ jì qí gōngdé。
The virtures and merits of most famous ministers, and virtuous scholars of ancient times were recorded by erecting monuments by later emperors.
皇帝每年都要去这个林苑狩猎。
Huángdì měinián dōuyào qù zhège línyuàn shǒuliè。
The emperor would go to hunt in this imperial hunting ground every year.
他触怒了皇帝，被处以流刑。
Tā chùnù le huángdì，bèi chǔyǐ liúxíng。
He offended the emperor, and was sentenced to forced labor in a remote region.
皇帝把茶杯狠狠地砸在地上，龙颜大怒。
Huángdì bǎ chábēi hěnhěn de zázài dìshàng，lóngyán dànù。
The emperor flew into a rage and smashed the cup onto the floor.
皇帝的龙准最近有些不适。
Huángdì de lóngzhǔn zuìjìn yǒuxiē búshì。
The emperor\'s nose hasn’t felt well in recent days.
首都马上就要失守了，皇帝只能蒙尘出逃了。
Shǒudū mǎshàng jiùyào shīshǒu le，huángdì zhǐnéng méngchén chūtáo le。
The capital will be captured soon, so the emperor has to go into exile.
皇帝突然密召大臣们进宫议事。
Huángdì tūrán mìzhào dàchénmen jìngōng yìshì。
All at once, the emperor secretly summoned cabinet ministers to the court to discuss official business.
古时候，只有皇帝才能穿明黄色的衣服。
Gǔshíhou，zhǐyǒu huángdì cáinéng chuān mínghuángsè de yīfu。
In the ancient times, only emperors can wear bright yellow clothes.
慈禧是光绪皇帝的母后，掌握着国家实权。
Cíxǐ shì Guāngxù huángdì de mǔhòu，zhǎngwò zhe guójiā shíquán。
Cixi is Emperor Guangxu’s mother. She holds the real power of the country.
内廷重地，只有少数几位重臣在皇帝召见时才能进入。
Nèitíng zhòngdì，zhǐyǒu shǎoshù jǐ wèi zhòngchén zài huángdì zhàojiàn shí cáinéng jìnrù。
Important due to being the imperial residence, only a few important officials can be admitted when summoned.
古代的皇帝有权力娶很多的嫔妃。
Gǔdài de huángdì yǒu quánlì qǔ hěnduō de pínfēi。
In ancient times, emperors had the right to have many concubines.
他扮演的古代皇帝气度恢宏。
Tā bànyǎn de gǔdài huángdì qìdù huīhóng。
The emperor he played was magnanimous.
皇帝还是个小孩子，暂时无法亲政。
Huángdì háishi gè xiǎoháizi，zànshí wúfǎ qīnzhèng。
The emperor is still a child, unable to assume the reins of government.
权臣的提议有时会影响皇帝的决定。
Quánchén de tíyì yǒushí huì yǐngxiǎng huángdì de juédìng。
Suggestions of domineering ministers sometimes affect the emperor\'s decisions.
古代的臣下都愿意为皇帝孝犬马之劳。
Gǔdài de chénxià dōu yuànyì wèi huángdì xiào quǎnmǎ zhī láo。
Courtiers in ancient times were willing to be at the emperor\'s beck and call.
陪同皇帝游历的这几天，我一直是如临深渊，如履薄冰，生怕自己做错事。
Péitóng huángdì yóulì de zhè jǐ tiān，wǒ yìzhí shì rúlín shēnyuān，rúlǚbóbīng，shēngpà zìjǐ zuò cuòshì。
Those days when I accompanied the emperor on his tour, I was afraid of doing something wrong, as if I was standing on the edge of an abyss or treading on thin ice.
这个地方山高皇帝远，谁也管不了我。
Zhège dìfāng shāngāo huángdìyuǎn，shéi yě guǎnbùliǎo wǒ。
This is a place beyond the reach of the government, so I am safe from all laws and regulations.
皇帝每年都要祭祀神主。
Huángdì měinián dōuyào jìsì shénzhǔ。
Emperors had to worship gods every year.
从电视剧中我们经常能见到持手板朝见皇帝的大臣。
Cóng diànshìjù zhōng wǒmen jīngcháng néng jiàndào chí shǒubǎn cháojiàn huángdì de dàchén。
We can often see ministers holding a tablet when having an audience with an emperor in TV serials.
过了这道天门就到了皇帝的寝宫了。
Guò le zhè dào tiānmén jiù dào le huángdì de qǐngōng le。
After you pass the door of the royal palace, you arrive at the sleeping quarters of the emperor.
皇帝大婚时，天庭中举办了盛大的仪式。
Huángdì dàhūn shí，tiāntíng zhōng jǔbàn le shèngdà de yíshì。
The wedding ceremony of the emperor was held in the royal palace.
皇帝亲自统带军队抵抗外敌。
Huángdì qīnzì tǒngdài jūnduì dǐkàng wàidí。
The emperor himself led his army to defend against the offensive from outside.
现在的皇帝是个昏君，每天只知道在围场打猎。
Xiànzài de huángdì shì gè hūnjūn，měitiān zhǐ zhīdào zài wéichǎng dǎliè。
The current reigning emperor is fatuous and self-indulgent, he just hunts in the hunting enclosure every day.
据说皇宫里有专门的厨师给皇帝温酒。
Jùshuō huánggōng lǐ yǒu zhuānmén de chúshī gěi huángdì wēnjiǔ。
It is said there were cooks who specialized in warming wines for the emperor.
皇帝一发怒，文武百官都跪了下来。
Huángdì yì fānù，wénwǔbǎiguān dōu guì le xiàlái。
Once the emperor got angry, all the officials would kneel down.
御厨们每天都为皇帝准备午膳。
Yùchúmen měitiān dōu wèi huángdì zhǔnbèi wǔshàn。
The imperial cooks prepared lunch for the emperor every day.
弟弟是家里的“小皇帝”，什么都得顺着他。
Dìdi shì jiālǐ de“xiǎohuángdì”，shénme dōu děi shùn zhe tā。
My brother is the &quot;little emperor&quot; of the family, who gets whatever he wants.
皇帝喜欢和卫士们一起行猎。
Huángdì xǐhuan hé wèishìmen yìqǐ xíngliè。
The Emperor liked to go hunting with his bodyguards.
这个地方因为曾是皇帝的行在而出名。
Zhège dìfāng yīnwèi céngshì huángdì de xíngzài ér chūmíng。
This place is famous for having once been visited by the Emperor.
皇帝宠信幸臣实非万民之福。
Huángdì chǒngxìn xìngchén shífēi wànmín zhī fú。
It is not a blessing for people if the Emperor dotes on his favorite courtiers.
康熙皇帝巡风江南，后来留下许多诗词。
Kāngxī huángdì xúnfēng jiāngnán，hòulái liúxià xǔduō shīcí。
Emperor Kangxi wrote many poems during his inspection tour to the Southland.
历代的皇帝都想一统天下，结束分裂的局面。
Lìdài de huángdì dōu xiǎng yìtǒng tiānxià，jiéshù fēnliè de júmiàn。
Emperors in all dynasties wanted to dominate the whole world and put an end to the disunited nation.
皇帝在遗诏中指明要第二个儿子继位。
Huángdì zài yízhào zhōng zhǐmíng yào dìèr gè érzi jìwèi。
In the edict, the dying emperor designated his second son to ascend to the throne.
中国古代皇帝用的印章一般都雕着龙形印钮。
Zhōngguó gǔdài huángdì yòng de yìnzhāng yìbān dōu diāo zhe lóngxíng yìnniǔ。
Generally, the seals of ancient Chinese emperors would have a knob with a dragon carved on it.
皇帝的船即将靠岸，知府带着一帮官员在码头迎迓。
Huángdì de chuán jíjiāng kào\'àn，zhīfǔ dài zhe yì bāng guānyuán zài mǎtóu yíngyà。
With the coming of the emperor\'s ship, the prefect led a group of officers waiting at the harbor in welcoming the emperor.
据说皇帝用膳都需要好几个人来伺候。
Jùshuō huángdì yòngshàn dōu xūyào hǎo jǐgè rén lái cìhou。
It is said that when the emperor is having his meal, he has several attendants.
这个皇帝暴戾恣睢，荒淫无度。
Zhège huángdì bàolì zìsuī，huāngyín wúdù。
The emperor is reckless and debauched.
看到奏章后，皇帝大吃一惊，他不相信自己的爱臣会造反。
Kàndào zòuzhāng hòu，huángdì dàchī yìjīng，tā bùxiāngxìn zìjǐ de àichén huì zào fǎn。
Having read the memorial, the emperor was greatly shocked. He couldn\'t believe that his favorite official would rise in rebellion against him.
奏折送到皇帝手里的时候已经经过了许多人的手了。
Zòuzhé sòngdào huángdì shǒulǐ de shíhou yǐjing jīngguò le xǔduō rén de shǒu le。
The memorial to the throne had been touched by many people when it was finally delivered to the emperor.
古时候，文武百官每天早晨都要朝拜皇帝。
Gǔ shíhou，wénwǔ bǎiguān měitiān zǎochén dōuyào cháobài huángdì。
In ancient China, government officials at all levels had morning court with the reigning sovereign every day.
康熙皇帝秉政61年。
Kāngxīhuángdì bǐngzhèng liùshíyīnián。
The Emperor Kangxi ruled for 61 years.
在封建社会中，皇帝独揽大权。
Zài fēngjiànshèhuì zhōng，huángdì dúlǎndàquán。
During feudal times, emperors had a monopoly on power.
皇帝饶了他一命。
Huángdì ráole tā yí mìng.
The emperor spared his life.
三皇五帝的传说在中国流传得很广。
Sānhuáng wǔdì de chuánshuō zài Zhōngguó liúchuán de hěn guǎng。
The legend of The Three Wise Kings and Five August Emperors is widely known in China.
谏官(古代专门规劝皇帝的官)。
龙辂(皇帝的车)。
舍得一身剐，敢把皇帝拉下马
维新派要求慈禧太后归政于光绪皇帝。
舍得一身剐，敢把皇帝拉下马。
皇帝的宝座
末代皇帝
辛亥革命迫使清朝皇帝退位。
玉皇大帝
三皇五帝
三皇五帝。
His descent has included kings and queens.
Tā de hòudài zhōng yǒu huángdì hé huánghòu。
他的后代中有皇帝和皇后。
The emperor can always treat his people with great charity.
这个皇帝对他的子民总是十分仁厚。
The general is a constant follower to the emperor.
那位将军是皇帝忠实的追随者。
The emperor is no more than a creature of the queen\'s.
这个皇帝不过是这位女王的一个傀儡。
The emperor\'s luxurious life was a large expense to the country.
这个皇帝的奢华生活消耗了这个国家的大笔收入。
The emperor rejects the people\'s hatred of war and persists in making war on his neighbor.
皇帝不理人民对战争的憎恶，坚持对邻国发动战争。
Emperor grapes are grown in California.
Huángdìpútáo zhòngzhí yú Jiālìfúníyàzhōu。
皇帝葡萄种植于加利福尼亚州。
The emperor knew not only how to rule but also how to please.
Zhè wèi huángdì bùjǐn zhīdào rúhé tǒngzhì，yě zhīdào rúhé qǔyuè rénmín。
这位皇帝不仅知道如何统治，也知道如何取悦人民。
The social hierarchy at the time culminated in the king.
Dāngshí de shèhuì jiēcéng yǐ huángdì zuòwéi zuì gāodiǎn。
当时的社会阶层以皇帝作为最高点。
The Mongol emperors were brushed off with disdain.
Měnggǔ huángdì bèi qīngmiè de dǎfa zǒu le。
蒙古皇帝被轻蔑地打发走了。
He appointed himself emperor for life.
Tā rènmìng zìjǐ wéi zhōngshēnzhì de huángdì。
他任命自己为终身制的皇帝。
The emperor\'s tomb had his image carved in stone.
Nàgè huángdì de fénmù de shítou shàng kè yǒu tā de xiàoxiàng。
那个皇帝的坟墓的石头上刻有他的肖像。
He is in disfavor with the king.
Tā bú zànchéng huángdì de zuòfǎ。
他不赞成皇帝的做法。
汉武帝推行罢黜百家，独尊儒术的政策。
Hànwǔdì tuīxíng bàchù bǎijiā，dúzūn rúshù de zhèngcè。
Emperor Wu in the Han Dynasty carried out a policy of proscribing all non-Confucian schools of thought and espousing Confucianism as the orthodox state ideology.
The Chinese Silk Road was constructed under the western Han Emperor Wudi.
中国的丝绸之路是汉武帝在位时开辟的。
反帝斗争
fǎndì dòuzhēng
anti-imperialist struggle
皇帝不顾众朝臣的反对，贸然出兵了。
Huángdì búgù zhòng cháochén de fǎnduì，màorán chūbīng le。
The emperor hastily dispatched troops against objections from his courtiers.
看到奏章后，皇帝大吃一惊，他不相信自己的爱臣会造反。
Kàndào zòuzhāng hòu，huángdì dàchī yìjīng，tā bùxiāngxìn zìjǐ de àichén huì zào fǎn。
Having read the memorial, the emperor was greatly shocked. He couldn\'t believe that his favorite official would rise in rebellion against him.
反帝反封建
Justice and injustice are contrary terms and neither one applies to God.
Gōngpíng hé bù gōngpíng shì yì zǔ fǎnyìcí，érqiě liǎng zhě duì Shàngdì láishuō dōu bú shìyòng。
公平和不公平是一组反义词，而且两者对上帝来说都不适用。
老皇帝去世后，大臣们一致拥立二皇子当皇帝。
Lǎohuángdì qùshì hòu，dàchénmen yízhì yōnglì èrhuángzǐ dāng huángdì。
After the death of the old emperor, officials unanimously supported the second son to be the new emperor.
皇帝在遗诏中指明要第二个儿子继位。
Huángdì zài yízhào zhōng zhǐmíng yào dìèr gè érzi jìwèi。
In the edict, the dying emperor designated his second son to ascend to the throne.
Is Tang dynasty of contemporary of East Rome?
唐朝和东罗马帝国是同一时期的吗？
Koine is a dialect of ancient Greek that was the lingua franca of the empire of alexander the great and was widely spoken throughout the eastern mediterranean area in roman times.
Koine（gòngtóng yǔ）shì yì zhǒng gǔxīlà yǔ fāngyán，shì Yàlìshāndà dàdì dìguó de hùnhé yǔ，guǎngfàn shǐyòng yú luómǎ shíqī de dìzhōnghǎi dōngbùdìqū。
Koine（共同语）是一种古希腊语方言，是亚历山大大帝帝国的混合语，广泛使用于罗马时期的地中海东部地区。
专制帝王
zhuānzhì dìwáng
autocratic monarch; despotic emperor
在选择尊号方面，古代帝王有一套严格的制度。
Zài xuǎnzé zūnhào fāngmiàn，gǔdài dìwáng yǒu yítào yángé de zhìdù。
When choosing titles, ancient emperors had a set of strict regualtions.
清末的那次维新变法，皇帝曾经想要实施君主立宪制度，但终于没能成功。
Qīngmò de nà cì wéixīn biànfǎ，huángdì céngjīng xiǎngyào shíshī jūnzhǔ lìxiàn zhìdù，dàn zhōng yú méinéng chénggōng。
During the Reform in the last years of the Qing Dynasty, the emperor wanted to implement the constitutional monarchy system but eventually failed.
为了推翻帝制，孙中山先生奔走呼号，宣传革命。
这场复辟帝制的丑剧最终以失败告终
废除帝制，建立共和
废黜帝制，建立共和
He appointed himself emperor for life.
Tā rènmìng zìjǐ wéi zhōngshēnzhì de huángdì。
他任命自己为终身制的皇帝。
他将于明日登基，继承帝位。
Tā jiāng yú míngrì dēngjī，jìchéng dìwèi。
He will ascend the throne tomorrow and become the king.
雍正皇帝传位于爱新觉罗弘历，也就是乾隆皇帝。
Yōngzhèng huángdì chuánwèi yú Àixīnjuéluó Hónglì，yě jiùshì Qiánlóng huángdì。
The Emperor Yongzheng passed on his leadership to Aixinjueluo Hongli, also called Emperor Qianlong.

Gémìngjūn cuīpò huángdì tuìwèi。
The revolutionary force forced the emperor to step down.
这位皇帝非常迷信谶纬之言。
Zhèwèi huángdì fēicháng míxìn chènwěi zhī yán。
The emperor blindly worshipped divination by augury and mystical intepretation of Confucianist texts.
清代历朝一共有十四位皇帝。
Qīngdài lìcháo yígòng yǒu shísìwèi huángdì。
During the whole period of the Qing Dynasty, there were fourteen emperors in total.
乾隆皇帝在北京称尊继位了。
Qiánlóng huángdì zài Běijīng chēngzūn jìwèi le。
The Emperor Qian Long succeeded the throne and proclaimed himself emperor in Beijing.
两位宫女在皇帝身后手持宫扇。
Liǎng wèi gōngnǚ zài huángdì shēnhòu shǒuchí gōngshàn。
Two maids are standing behind the Emperor with a round fan in their hands.
内廷重地，只有少数几位重臣在皇帝召见时才能进入。
Nèitíng zhòngdì，zhǐyǒu shǎoshù jǐ wèi zhòngchén zài huángdì zhàojiàn shí cáinéng jìnrù。
Important due to being the imperial residence, only a few important officials can be admitted when summoned.
皇帝的嗣子急于继承皇位，竟然发动了叛乱。
Huángdì de sìzǐ jíyú jìchéng huángwèi，jìngrán fādòng le pànluàn。
The emperor\'s eldest son was so eager to take over the crown that he revolted.
皇帝在遗诏中指明要第二个儿子继位。
Huángdì zài yízhào zhōng zhǐmíng yào dìèr gè érzi jìwèi。
In the edict, the dying emperor designated his second son to ascend to the throne.
为争帝位，兄弟相残。
南面为王(古代以面向南为尊位，所以把登上帝位称为南面为王)。
辛亥革命迫使清朝皇帝退位。

中国的丝绸之路是汉武帝在位时开辟的。
The emperor knew not only how to rule but also how to please.

zhuānzhì dìwáng
autocratic monarch; despotic emperor

古代帝王总以为可以世代家天下，何其狭隘。

在帝王的后宫中，六宫争宠的事并不罕见。

He has a prominent forehead, which is a feature of an emperor.
帝王不惜劳民伤财地为自己建造生圹。

看到奏章后，皇帝大吃一惊，他不相信自己的爱臣会造反。

每个朝代的开国皇帝得了天下后，都要传檄天下。

The founding Emperor of every dynasty would send out a war proclamation after seizing the ruling power of a country.
她是皇帝最宠爱的后妃，但也因此招来了很多人的嫉妒。

She was the Emperor\'s favorite concubine, but because of this she attracted the jealousy of many people.
听到皇帝的诏令以后，他感到惶惶然不知所措。
Tīngdào huángdì de zhàolìng yǐhòu，tā gǎndào huánghuángrán bùzhī suǒcuò。
Hearing the order of the Emperor, he felt panic and didn\'t know what to do.
大凡古代的名臣贤士都有后世皇帝为其立碑以记其功德。

康熙皇帝巡风江南，后来留下许多诗词。

每个朝代的开国皇帝得了天下后，都要传檄天下。
Měigè cháodài de kāiguó huángdì dé le tiānxià hòu，dōuyào chuánxí tiānxià。
The founding Emperor of every dynasty would send out a war proclamation after seizing the ruling power of a country.
历朝历代的开国皇帝哪个不是出生入死地闯天下。
Lìcháo lìdài de kāiguó huángdì nǎ gè búshì chūshēngrùsǐ de chuǎngtiānxià。
No founding emperor of a dynasty could seize state power without first going through water and fire.
刘盈是西汉开国皇帝刘邦的皇子。
Liú Yíng shì Xīhàn kāiguó huángdì Liú Bāng de huángzǐ。
Liu Yin was the son of the Emperor Liu Bang who had founded the state of West Han.
三皇五帝的传说在中国流传得很广。
Sānhuáng wǔdì de chuánshuō zài Zhōngguó liúchuán de hěn guǎng。
The legend of The Three Wise Kings and Five August Emperors is widely known in China.
中国古代皇帝用的印章一般都雕着龙形印钮。
Zhōngguó gǔdài huángdì yòng de yìnzhāng yìbān dōu diāo zhe lóngxíng yìnniǔ。

慈禧是光绪皇帝的母后，掌握着国家实权。

Quánguó gè dì dōu yǒu guāndìmiào，zhǐshì guīmó bùtóng。
There are Temples of Guan Yu all around the country. The only difference is that they are of various sizes.
中国历史上，曾经有很多皇帝前往泰山封禅。
Zhōngguó lìshǐ shàng，céngjīng yǒu hěnduō huángdì qiánwǎng Tài Shān fēngshàn。
Many emperors in Chinese history offered sacrifices to heaven and earth on Mount Tai.

Koine（gòngtóng yǔ）shì yì zhǒng gǔxīlà yǔ fāngyán，shì Yàlìshāndà dàdì dìguó de hùnhé yǔ，guǎngfàn shǐyòng yú luómǎ shíqī de dìzhōnghǎi dōngbùdìqū。
Koine（共同语）是一种古希腊语方言，是亚历山大大帝帝国的混合语，广泛使用于罗马时期的地中海东部地区。

The emperor\'s luxurious life was a large expense to the country.

Shàngdì，háizi nǐ yàoshì zài wāshēn diǎn，jiùyào wā dào zhōngguó le。

Emperors in all dynasties wanted to dominate the whole world and put an end to the disunited nation.
皇帝每年都要去这个林苑狩猎。
Huángdì měinián dōuyào qù zhège línyuàn shǒuliè。
The emperor would go to hunt in this imperial hunting ground every year.
皇帝每年都要祭祀神主。
Huángdì měinián dōuyào jìsì shénzhǔ。

It is said that when the emperor is having his meal, he has several attendants.

The imperial cooks prepared lunch for the emperor every day.
每个朝代的开国皇帝得了天下后，都要传檄天下。
Měigè cháodài de kāiguó huángdì dé le tiānxià hòu，dōuyào chuánxí tiānxià。
The founding Emperor of every dynasty would send out a war proclamation after seizing the ruling power of a country.
大凡古代的名臣贤士都有后世皇帝为其立碑以记其功德。
Dàfán gǔdài de míngchén xiánshì dōu yǒu hòushì huángdì wèi qí lìbēi yǐ jì qí gōngdé。
The virtures and merits of most famous ministers, and virtuous scholars of ancient times were recorded by erecting monuments by later emperors.
古代的臣下都愿意为皇帝孝犬马之劳。
Gǔdài de chénxià dōu yuànyì wèi huángdì xiào quǎnmǎ zhī láo。

中国古代皇帝用的印章一般都雕着龙形印钮。

Generally, the seals of ancient Chinese emperors would have a knob with a dragon carved on it.
古时候，文武百官每天早晨都要朝拜皇帝。

Huángdì yì fānù，wénwǔbǎiguān dōu guì le xiàlái。

He preaches that we are all the children of God.

The emperor\'s carriage is in the middle of the parade.

这位皇帝非常迷信谶纬之言。
Zhèwèi huángdì fēicháng míxìn chènwěi zhī yán。
The emperor blindly worshipped divination by augury and mystical intepretation of Confucianist texts.
乾隆皇帝在北京称尊继位了。
Qiánlóng huángdì zài Běijīng chēngzūn jìwèi le。
The Emperor Qian Long succeeded the throne and proclaimed himself emperor in Beijing.
他被皇帝软禁了起来，过着池鱼笼鸟一样的生活。
Tā bèi huángdì ruǎnjìn le qǐlái，guò zhe chíyú lóngniǎo yíyàng de shēnghuó。
He was confined by the emperor, living like a fish in a pond or a bird in a cage.
皇帝的宠臣多是阿谀奉承之辈。
Huángdì de chǒngchén duō shì ēyú fèngchéng zhī bèi。
The minions of the emperor were generally skilled in flattery.
皇帝传旨在御花园传见封疆大吏。
Huángdì chuánzhǐ zài yùhuāyuán chuánjiàn fēngjiāng dàlì。
An imperial order was delivered that the Emperor would call on the high officer of the frontier at the imperial garden.
每个朝代的开国皇帝得了天下后，都要传檄天下。
Měigè cháodài de kāiguó huángdì dé le tiānxià hòu，dōuyào chuánxí tiānxià。
The founding Emperor of every dynasty would send out a war proclamation after seizing the ruling power of a country.
历朝历代的开国皇帝哪个不是出生入死地闯天下。
Lìcháo lìdài de kāiguó huángdì nǎ gè búshì chūshēngrùsǐ de chuǎngtiānxià。
No founding emperor of a dynasty could seize state power without first going through water and fire.
《创世记》作为《圣经》的首卷，讲述了上帝造人的传说。
《Chuàngshìjì》zuòwéi《shèngjīng》 de shǒujuàn，jiǎngshù le Shàngdìzàorén de chuánshuō。
As the first episode of The Bible, Genesis describes the legend of how human beings were created by God.
封谁春闱，皇帝还没有拿定主意。
Fēngshéi chūnwéi，huángdì hái méiyǒu nádìngzhǔyì。
The emperor hadn\'t decided who would be conferred with the title of crown prince.
革命军催迫皇帝退位。
Gémìngjūn cuīpò huángdì tuìwèi。
The revolutionary force forced the emperor to step down.
在古代，新帝登基总会颁布大赦令。
Zài gǔdài，xīndì dēngjī zǒnghuì bānbùdàshèlìng。
In ancient times, an order of amnesty would be announced when a new emperor ascended the throne.
新皇帝登极了！
Xīnhuángdì dēngjí le！
The new emperor has ascended the throne!
皇帝死后被安放在这座地宫里。
Huángdì sǐ hòu bèi ānfàngzài zhèzuò dìgōng lǐ。
Emperors were put in this underground palace after death.
电视台正在播放一部讲述帝王将相故事的电视剧。
Diànshìtái zhèngzài bōfàng yíbù jiǎngshù dìwáng jiàng xiàng gùshì de diànshìjù。
The TV station is broadcasting a TV show about emperors and high-positioned officials.
他将于明日登基，继承帝位。
Tā jiāng yú míngrì dēngjī，jìchéng dìwèi。
He will ascend the throne tomorrow and become the king.
历史上，发菜曾是进奉皇帝的贡品。
Lìshǐ shàng，fàcài céng shì jìnfèng huángdì de gòngpǐn。
In the past, long thread moss was offered to emperors as a tribute.
古时候，有时皇帝会出于政治的需要而把美丽的公主嫁给番邦国王。
Gǔshíhou，yǒushí huángdì huì chūyú zhèngzhì de xūyào ér bǎ měilì de gōngzhǔ jià gěi fānbāng guówáng。
In ancient times, the emperor would sometimes marry pretty princesses to foreign kings for political reasons.
古时候，人们不能直呼皇帝的名字，因为那是犯讳的。
Gǔshíhou，rénmen bùnéng zhíhū huángdì de míngzi，yīnwèi nàshì fànhuì de。
It was considered irreverent to call the emperor\'s name directly in ancient times.
古时候，皇帝的太太们统称为妃嫔。
Gǔshíhou，huángdì de tàitàimen tǒngchēng wéi fēipín。
In ancient times, the emperor\'s wives were called imperial concubines.
中国历史上，曾经有很多皇帝前往泰山封禅。
Zhōngguó lìshǐ shàng，céngjīng yǒu hěnduō huángdì qiánwǎng Tài Shān fēngshàn。
Many emperors in Chinese history offered sacrifices to heaven and earth on Mount Tai.
皇帝登基以后，总要封赏他手下的大臣。
Huángdì dēngjī yǐhòu，zǒngyào fēngshǎng tā shǒuxià de dàchén。
When the emperors ascended to the throne, they would award all their officials.
两位宫女在皇帝身后手持宫扇。
Liǎng wèi gōngnǚ zài huángdì shēnhòu shǒuchí gōngshàn。
Two maids are standing behind the Emperor with a round fan in their hands.
皇家的宫苑是不许百姓进入的，只能皇帝带领大臣打猎游玩。
Huángjiā de gōngyuàn shì bùxǔ bǎixìng jìnrù de，zhǐnéng huángdì dàilǐng dàchén dǎliè yóuwán。
The common people are not allowed to enter the palatial gardens. Only the emperor has the right to bring his ministers to the palatial gardens for hunting and sight-seeing.
今年杭州的贡奉最让皇帝喜欢。
Jīnnián Hángzhōu de gòngfèng zuì ràng huángdì xǐhuan。
This year, the emperor liked most the tribute provided by Hangzhou.
在大宴群臣的时候，皇帝将贡酒赐予有功之臣以示恩典。
Zài dàyàn qúnchén de shíhou，huángdì jiāng gòngjiǔ cìyǔ yǒugōng zhī chén yǐshì ēndiǎn。
When holding a feast for all the ministers, the emperor granted tribute alcohol to the ministers with great accomplishments as a sign of favor.
这次皇帝御驾亲征，挂甲上阵。
Zhècì huángdì yùjià qīnzhēng，guàjiǎ shàngzhèn。
This time, the emperor personally let his soldiers, buckling on his armor for the battle.
全国各地都有关帝庙，只是规模不同。
Quánguó gè dì dōu yǒu guāndìmiào，zhǐshì guīmó bùtóng。
There are Temples of Guan Yu all around the country. The only difference is that they are of various sizes.
她是皇帝最宠爱的后妃，但也因此招来了很多人的嫉妒。
Tā shì huángdì zuì chǒngài de hòufēi，dàn yě yīncǐ zhāolái le hěnduōrén de jídù。
She was the Emperor\'s favorite concubine, but because of this she attracted the jealousy of many people.
刘盈是西汉开国皇帝刘邦的皇子。
Liú Yíng shì Xīhàn kāiguó huángdì Liú Bāng de huángzǐ。
Liu Yin was the son of the Emperor Liu Bang who had founded the state of West Han.
听到皇帝的诏令以后，他感到惶惶然不知所措。
Tīngdào huángdì de zhàolìng yǐhòu，tā gǎndào huánghuángrán bùzhī suǒcuò。
Hearing the order of the Emperor, he felt panic and didn\'t know what to do.
古代帝王总以为可以世代家天下，何其狭隘。
Gǔdài dìwáng zǒng yǐwéi kěyǐ shìdài jiā tiānxià，héqí xiáài。
The emperors had a narrow-minded view, they thought they were in possession of the whole country and that it could be inherited by their offspring.
皇帝马上就要驾到了，他们正准备接驾。
Huángdì mǎshàng jiùyào jiàdào le，tāmen zhèng zhǔnbèi jiējià。
The emperor is arriving soon, so they are preparing to meet him.
皇帝鼓励大臣谏诤，以戒除自己的缺点。
Huángdì gǔlì dàchén jiànzhèng，yǐ jièchú zìjǐ de quēdiǎn。
The emperor encouraged his ministers to point out his faults frankly so that he could correct them.
皇帝站在阶墀上注视着下面跪倒的大臣。
Huángdì zhànzài jiēchí shàng zhùshì zhe xiàmiàn guìdǎo de dàchén。
The emperor stood at the painted step, looking down at the those ministers on their knees.
据说这个金冠是乾隆帝戴过的。
Jùshuō zhège jīnguán shì Qiánlóngdì dàiguò de。
It is said that this gold crown belonged to Emperor Qianlong.
他是个喜欢向皇帝进谗的小人。
Tā shì gè xǐhuan xiàng huángdì jìnchán de xiǎorén。
He is a snob who always slanders others in front of the emperor.
大臣向皇帝进呈运河形势图。
Dàchén xiàng huángdì jìnchéng yùnhé xíngshìtú。
The minister presented the canal situation chart to the emperor.
这些进奉是广西的特产，皇帝很喜欢。
Zhèxiē jìnfèng shì Guǎngxī de tèchǎn，huángdì hěnxǐhuan。
These are specialities from Guangxi Province to be sent to the emperor.
魏征以敢于向皇帝直言进谏而著称于史册。
Wèi Zhēng yǐ gǎnyú xiàng huángdì zhíyán jìnjiàn ér zhùchēng yú shǐcè。
Weizheng is famous for his courage in offering honest advice to the emperor.
他在巴结皇帝的近侍，真是厚颜无耻。
Tā zài bājie huángdì de jìnshì，zhēnshì hòuyán wúchǐ。
That creature butters up the emperor\'s close servant-of all the nerve!
北京城乃帝王之所，禁卫森严。
Běijīng Chéng nǎi dìwáng zhīsuǒ，jìnwè sēnyán。
The city of Beijing contains the imperial residence, and is strongly fortified.
清末的那次维新变法，皇帝曾经想要实施君主立宪制度，但终于没能成功。
Qīngmò de nà cì wéixīn biànfǎ，huángdì céngjīng xiǎngyào shíshī jūnzhǔ lìxiàn zhìdù，dàn zhōng yú méinéng chénggōng。
During the Reform in the last years of the Qing Dynasty, the emperor wanted to implement the constitutional monarchy system but eventually failed.
我们接到皇帝的口谕，今天晚上一定要完成任务。
Wǒmen jiēdào huángdì de kǒuyù，jīntiān wǎnshàng yídìng yào wánchéng rènwù。
The emperor demands that we finish the task tonight.
皇帝登基时，宽赦了一些囚犯。
Huángdì dēngjī shí，kuānshè le yìxiē qiúfàn。
When the emperor ascended the throne, he pardoned many criminals.
皇帝出京一般是在离宫中居住。
Huángdì chūjīng yìbān shì zài lígōng zhōng jūzhù。
When the emperors came out of  the capital, they often lived in summer or winter palace.
清代历朝一共有十四位皇帝。
Qīngdài lìcháo yígòng yǒu shísìwèi huángdì。
During the whole period of the Qing Dynasty, there were fourteen emperors in total.
大凡古代的名臣贤士都有后世皇帝为其立碑以记其功德。
Dàfán gǔdài de míngchén xiánshì dōu yǒu hòushì huángdì wèi qí lìbēi yǐ jì qí gōngdé。
The virtures and merits of most famous ministers, and virtuous scholars of ancient times were recorded by erecting monuments by later emperors.
皇帝每年都要去这个林苑狩猎。
Huángdì měinián dōuyào qù zhège línyuàn shǒuliè。
The emperor would go to hunt in this imperial hunting ground every year.
他触怒了皇帝，被处以流刑。
Tā chùnù le huángdì，bèi chǔyǐ liúxíng。
He offended the emperor, and was sentenced to forced labor in a remote region.
在帝王的后宫中，六宫争宠的事并不罕见。
Zài dìwáng de hòugōng zhōng，liùgōng zhēngchǒng de shì bìngbùhǎnjiàn。
In imperial harems, it was a common thing that the empress and concubines fought for the love of the emperor.
他龙庭隆起，一看便知是帝王之相。
Tā lóngtíng lóngqǐ，yíkàn biàn zhī shì dìwáng zhī xiàng。
He has a prominent forehead, which is a feature of an emperor.
皇帝把茶杯狠狠地砸在地上，龙颜大怒。
Huángdì bǎ chábēi hěnhěn de zázài dìshàng，lóngyán dànù。
The emperor flew into a rage and smashed the cup onto the floor.
皇帝的龙准最近有些不适。
Huángdì de lóngzhǔn zuìjìn yǒuxiē búshì。
The emperor\'s nose hasn’t felt well in recent days.
首都马上就要失守了，皇帝只能蒙尘出逃了。
Shǒudū mǎshàng jiùyào shīshǒu le，huángdì zhǐnéng méngchén chūtáo le。
The capital will be captured soon, so the emperor has to go into exile.
皇帝突然密召大臣们进宫议事。
Huángdì tūrán mìzhào dàchénmen jìngōng yìshì。
All at once, the emperor secretly summoned cabinet ministers to the court to discuss official business.
古时候，只有皇帝才能穿明黄色的衣服。
Gǔshíhou，zhǐyǒu huángdì cáinéng chuān mínghuángsè de yīfu。
In the ancient times, only emperors can wear bright yellow clothes.
慈禧是光绪皇帝的母后，掌握着国家实权。
Cíxǐ shì Guāngxù huángdì de mǔhòu，zhǎngwò zhe guójiā shíquán。
Cixi is Emperor Guangxu’s mother. She holds the real power of the country.
内廷重地，只有少数几位重臣在皇帝召见时才能进入。
Nèitíng zhòngdì，zhǐyǒu shǎoshù jǐ wèi zhòngchén zài huángdì zhàojiàn shí cáinéng jìnrù。
Important due to being the imperial residence, only a few important officials can be admitted when summoned.
帝国主义侵略者总是向被侵略国施展他们的炮舰外交。
Dìguózhǔyì qīnlüèzhě zǒngshì xiàng bèi qīnlüè guó shīzhǎn tāmen de pàojiàn wàijiāo。
Imperialistic aggressors always use gunboat diplomacy to invade countries.
古代的皇帝有权力娶很多的嫔妃。
Gǔdài de huángdì yǒu quánlì qǔ hěnduō de pínfēi。
In ancient times, emperors had the right to have many concubines.
他扮演的古代皇帝气度恢宏。
Tā bànyǎn de gǔdài huángdì qìdù huīhóng。
The emperor he played was magnanimous.
皇帝还是个小孩子，暂时无法亲政。
Huángdì háishi gè xiǎoháizi，zànshí wúfǎ qīnzhèng。
The emperor is still a child, unable to assume the reins of government.
权臣的提议有时会影响皇帝的决定。
Quánchén de tíyì yǒushí huì yǐngxiǎng huángdì de juédìng。
Suggestions of domineering ministers sometimes affect the emperor\'s decisions.
古代的臣下都愿意为皇帝孝犬马之劳。
Gǔdài de chénxià dōu yuànyì wèi huángdì xiào quǎnmǎ zhī láo。
Courtiers in ancient times were willing to be at the emperor\'s beck and call.
文武官员再三劝进，曹操就是不肯称帝。
Wénwǔ guānyuán zàisān quànjìn，Cáo Cāo jiùshì bùkěn chēngdì。
Civil and military officials urged Cao Cao to ascend the throne again and again, but he refused every time.
陪同皇帝游历的这几天，我一直是如临深渊，如履薄冰，生怕自己做错事。
Péitóng huángdì yóulì de zhè jǐ tiān，wǒ yìzhí shì rúlín shēnyuān，rúlǚbóbīng，shēngpà zìjǐ zuò cuòshì。
Those days when I accompanied the emperor on his tour, I was afraid of doing something wrong, as if I was standing on the edge of an abyss or treading on thin ice.
汉武帝推行罢黜百家，独尊儒术的政策。
Hànwǔdì tuīxíng bàchù bǎijiā，dúzūn rúshù de zhèngcè。
Emperor Wu in the Han Dynasty carried out a policy of proscribing all non-Confucian schools of thought and espousing Confucianism as the orthodox state ideology.
这个地方山高皇帝远，谁也管不了我。
Zhège dìfāng shāngāo huángdìyuǎn，shéi yě guǎnbùliǎo wǒ。
This is a place beyond the reach of the government, so I am safe from all laws and regulations.
皇帝每年都要祭祀神主。
Huángdì měinián dōuyào jìsì shénzhǔ。
Emperors had to worship gods every year.
帝王不惜劳民伤财地为自己建造生圹。
Dìwáng bùxī láomín shāngcái de wèi zìjǐ jiànzào shēngkuàng。
Emperors spared no efforts in constructing tombs for themselves while they were still alive.
从电视剧中我们经常能见到持手板朝见皇帝的大臣。
Cóng diànshìjù zhōng wǒmen jīngcháng néng jiàndào chí shǒubǎn cháojiàn huángdì de dàchén。
We can often see ministers holding a tablet when having an audience with an emperor in TV serials.
皇帝的嗣子急于继承皇位，竟然发动了叛乱。
Huángdì de sìzǐ jíyú jìchéng huángwèi，jìngrán fādòng le pànluàn。
The emperor\'s eldest son was so eager to take over the crown that he revolted.
过了这道天门就到了皇帝的寝宫了。
Guò le zhè dào tiānmén jiù dào le huángdì de qǐngōng le。
After you pass the door of the royal palace, you arrive at the sleeping quarters of the emperor.
传说中的天帝就居住在天庭之中。
Chuánshuō zhōng de Tiāndì jiù jūzhù zài tiāntíng zhīzhōng。
The legendary Lord of Heaven lives in the Palace of Heaven.
皇帝大婚时，天庭中举办了盛大的仪式。
Huángdì dàhūn shí，tiāntíng zhōng jǔbàn le shèngdà de yíshì。
The wedding ceremony of the emperor was held in the royal palace.
皇帝亲自统带军队抵抗外敌。
Huángdì qīnzì tǒngdài jūnduì dǐkàng wàidí。
The emperor himself led his army to defend against the offensive from outside.
现在的皇帝是个昏君，每天只知道在围场打猎。
Xiànzài de huángdì shì gè hūnjūn，měitiān zhǐ zhīdào zài wéichǎng dǎliè。
The current reigning emperor is fatuous and self-indulgent, he just hunts in the hunting enclosure every day.
据说皇宫里有专门的厨师给皇帝温酒。
Jùshuō huánggōng lǐ yǒu zhuānmén de chúshī gěi huángdì wēnjiǔ。
It is said there were cooks who specialized in warming wines for the emperor.
皇帝一发怒，文武百官都跪了下来。
Huángdì yì fānù，wénwǔbǎiguān dōu guì le xiàlái。
Once the emperor got angry, all the officials would kneel down.
三皇五帝的传说在中国流传得很广。
Sānhuáng wǔdì de chuánshuō zài Zhōngguó liúchuán de hěn guǎng。
The legend of The Three Wise Kings and Five August Emperors is widely known in China.
五帝是中国神话传说中的五个天神。
Wǔdì shì Zhōngguó shénhuàchuánshuō zhōng de wǔ gè tiānshén。
The Five August Emperors are the five gods in Chinese legends.
御厨们每天都为皇帝准备午膳。
Yùchúmen měitiān dōu wèi huángdì zhǔnbèi wǔshàn。
The imperial cooks prepared lunch for the emperor every day.
弟弟是家里的“小皇帝”，什么都得顺着他。
Dìdi shì jiālǐ de“xiǎohuángdì”，shénme dōu děi shùn zhe tā。
My brother is the &quot;little emperor&quot; of the family, who gets whatever he wants.
皇帝喜欢和卫士们一起行猎。
Huángdì xǐhuan hé wèishìmen yìqǐ xíngliè。
The Emperor liked to go hunting with his bodyguards.
这个地方因为曾是皇帝的行在而出名。
Zhège dìfāng yīnwèi céngshì huángdì de xíngzài ér chūmíng。
This place is famous for having once been visited by the Emperor.
皇帝宠信幸臣实非万民之福。
Huángdì chǒngxìn xìngchén shífēi wànmín zhī fú。
It is not a blessing for people if the Emperor dotes on his favorite courtiers.
轩辕黄帝是我们的祖先。
Xuānyuán huángdì shì wǒmen de zǔxiān。
The Yellow Emperor, Xuan Yuan, is our ancestor.
康熙皇帝巡风江南，后来留下许多诗词。
Kāngxī huángdì xúnfēng jiāngnán，hòulái liúxià xǔduō shīcí。
Emperor Kangxi wrote many poems during his inspection tour to the Southland.
历代的皇帝都想一统天下，结束分裂的局面。
Lìdài de huángdì dōu xiǎng yìtǒng tiānxià，jiéshù fēnliè de júmiàn。
Emperors in all dynasties wanted to dominate the whole world and put an end to the disunited nation.
皇帝在遗诏中指明要第二个儿子继位。
Huángdì zài yízhào zhōng zhǐmíng yào dìèr gè érzi jìwèi。
In the edict, the dying emperor designated his second son to ascend to the throne.
中国古代皇帝用的印章一般都雕着龙形印钮。
Zhōngguó gǔdài huángdì yòng de yìnzhāng yìbān dōu diāo zhe lóngxíng yìnniǔ。
Generally, the seals of ancient Chinese emperors would have a knob with a dragon carved on it.
皇帝的船即将靠岸，知府带着一帮官员在码头迎迓。
Huángdì de chuán jíjiāng kào\'àn，zhīfǔ dài zhe yì bāng guānyuán zài mǎtóu yíngyà。
With the coming of the emperor\'s ship, the prefect led a group of officers waiting at the harbor in welcoming the emperor.
据说皇帝用膳都需要好几个人来伺候。
Jùshuō huángdì yòngshàn dōu xūyào hǎo jǐgè rén lái cìhou。
It is said that when the emperor is having his meal, he has several attendants.
这个皇帝暴戾恣睢，荒淫无度。
Zhège huángdì bàolì zìsuī，huāngyín wúdù。
The emperor is reckless and debauched.
看到奏章后，皇帝大吃一惊，他不相信自己的爱臣会造反。
Kàndào zòuzhāng hòu，huángdì dàchī yìjīng，tā bùxiāngxìn zìjǐ de àichén huì zào fǎn。
Having read the memorial, the emperor was greatly shocked. He couldn\'t believe that his favorite official would rise in rebellion against him.
奏折送到皇帝手里的时候已经经过了许多人的手了。
Zòuzhé sòngdào huángdì shǒulǐ de shíhou yǐjing jīngguò le xǔduō rén de shǒu le。
The memorial to the throne had been touched by many people when it was finally delivered to the emperor.
在选择尊号方面，古代帝王有一套严格的制度。
Zài xuǎnzé zūnhào fāngmiàn，gǔdài dìwáng yǒu yítào yángé de zhìdù。
When choosing titles, ancient emperors had a set of strict regualtions.
古时候，文武百官每天早晨都要朝拜皇帝。
Gǔ shíhou，wénwǔ bǎiguān měitiān zǎochén dōuyào cháobài huángdì。
In ancient China, government officials at all levels had morning court with the reigning sovereign every day.
康熙皇帝秉政61年。
Kāngxīhuángdì bǐngzhèng liùshíyīnián。
The Emperor Kangxi ruled for 61 years.
打倒帝国主义！
Dǎdǎo dìguózhǔyì！
Down with imperialism!
在封建社会中，皇帝独揽大权。
Zài fēngjiànshèhuì zhōng，huángdì dúlǎndàquán。
During feudal times, emperors had a monopoly on power.
恺撒大帝被称为罗马历史上空前绝后的军事领袖。
Kǎisā dàdì bèichēngwéi Luómǎ lìshǐ shàng kōngqiánjuéhòu de jūnshì lǐngxiù.
Julius Caesar has been called the most unmatched military general in Roman history.
皇帝饶了他一命。
Huángdì ráole tā yí mìng.
The emperor spared his life.
驻跸(帝王出行时沿途停留暂住)。
宸衷(帝王的心愿)。
谏官(古代专门规劝皇帝的官)。
龙辂(皇帝的车)。
晏驾(帝王死去的委婉说法)。
撄鳞(比喻触怒帝王)。
帝祚。
玉皇大帝
上帝
天帝
三皇五帝
帝王

Koine is a dialect of ancient Greek that was the lingua franca of the empire of alexander the great and was widely spoken throughout the eastern mediterranean area in roman times.
Koine（gòngtóng yǔ）shì yì zhǒng gǔxīlà yǔ fāngyán，shì Yàlìshāndà dàdì dìguó de hùnhé yǔ，guǎngfàn shǐyòng yú luómǎ shíqī de dìzhōnghǎi dōngbùdìqū。
Koine（共同语）是一种古希腊语方言，是亚历山大大帝帝国的混合语，广泛使用于罗马时期的地中海东部地区。

寄生生物
jìshēng shēngwù
parasites
真菌寄生在某些植物中。

Fungus is a parasite on certain plants.
A facultative parasite can exist as a parasite or a saprophyte.
Jiānxìng jìshēngjūn nénggòu xiàng jìshēngchóng huò fǔshēngwù yíyàng shēngcún。
兼性寄生菌能够象寄生虫或腐生物一样生存。
Anyone who has tried to remove a hermit crab from its shell will know how tenacious these creatures can be.

任何一个试图把寄生蟹从它壳里移走的人都会知道这种生物粘得有多么的牢。

jìshēng shēngwù

chénɡqiánbìhòu, zhìbìnɡjiùrén 
learn from past mistakes to avoid future ones, and cure the sickness to save the patient
要以“治病救人”的态度帮助犯错误的同志。
Yào yǐ“zhìbìngjiùrén”de tàidu bāngzhù fàn cuòwù de tóngzhì。

前往/来营救某人

fāchū qiújiù de xìnhào
signal an SOS; send a GMDSS

fāchū qiújiùxìnhào
send out an SOS
河里有人求救

他不会求救的，他自己可以应付这个情况。

我宁愿死也不愿向他求救。
a call for help
求救声
I heard a call for help.

我接了一个求救电话。
I transmitted a distress signal over the radio.
Wǒ tōngguò wúxiàndiàn fāchūle yí gè qiújiùxìnhào。
我通过无线电发出了一个求救信号。
The men heard her pleas for help, but they shrugged their shoulders and did nothing.
Nánrénmen tīngdàole tā de qiújiù，dàn tāmen quēfá xìngqù，méi zuò rènhé shì。
男人们听到了她的求救，但他们缺乏兴趣，没做任何事。
A hand thrusted above the water for help.
Shuǐmiàn shàng shēnchū yì zhī shǒu qiújiù。
水面上伸出一只手求救。
I was within an ace of calling for help.
Wǒ jīhū yào qiújiù。
我几乎要求救。
He radioed for help.
Tā tōngguò wúxiàndiàn fāchū qiújiù xìnhào。
他通过无线电发出求救信号。
The traditional social relief system with its unstandardized working system fails to meet the demands of the socialist market economy.
传统的社会救济制度由于其工作制度不够规范，不能适应社会主义市场经济的要求。
医生认为这个病人没救了。
Yīshēngrènwéi zhège bìngrén méi jiù le。
The doctor considered the patient\'s case hopeless.
这件事由于挽救及时，没有酿成大错，终于雨过天青了。
Zhèjiànshì yóuyú wǎnjiù jíshí，méiyǒu niàngchéng dàcuò，zhōng yú yǔguò tiānqīng le。
Thanks to a timely rescue, this matter didn\'t cause great damage and everything is fine now.
您的救命之恩我没世不忘！
Nín de jiùmìng zhī ēn wǒ mòshì búwàng！
You saved my life, and I shall will remember that my entire life.
吞没救灾物资。
All the ministrant service done by the doctor and nurses did not save the child.
医生和护士的努力救治都没能挽回孩子的生命。
Nothing has been done to right the wrongs of the decade.
Duì shínián de cuòwù méiyǒu cǎiqǔ rènhé bǔjiù cuòshī。
对十年的错误没有采取任何补救措施。
As far as I am aware there is nothing preventing the government from helping the poor.
Jùwǒsuǒzhī，zhèngfǔ jiùjì qióngrén bìng méiyǒu shòudào shénme zǔ\'ài。
据我所知，政府救济穷人并没有受到什么阻碍。
The men heard her pleas for help, but they shrugged their shoulders and did nothing.

男人们听到了她的求救，但他们缺乏兴趣，没做任何事。
All these children without parents will be sent to a charity to get breakfast.
这些没有父母的孩子会被送到救济院吃早餐。
Carl made a brave attempt to save the company from the bankruptcy, but it didn\'t work.
卡尔为了挽救公司不致破产，进行了大胆的尝试，但没能成功。
The early church not unnaturally adopted the position that failure to see the messianic character of his work was really caused by the people\'s own blindness.
Zǎoqī de jiàohuì bìng méiyǒu bù hé chángguī de cǎiqǔ zhè yī lìchǎng，jí rènwéi kàn bú dào tā gōngzuò de jiùshì yìyì qíshí shì yīnwèi rénmen zìshēn de yúmèi。
早期的教会并没有不合常规地采取这一立场，即认为看不到他工作的救世意义其实是因为人们自身的愚昧。
参加急难救助，是每个国民义不容辞的责任。
Cānjiā jínàn jiùzhù，shì měigè guómín yìbùróngcí de zérèn。
It is a duty of every citizen to give others in trouble a helping hand.
他从小就立下悬壶济世，救助贫病的宏愿。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù lìxià xuánhújìshì，jiùzhù pínbìng de hóngyuàn。
From a young age he has aspired to learn medicine well and cure the sick.
政府对流民的救助并不能解决他们生活上的根本问题。
Zhèngfǔ duì liúmín de jiùzhù bìng bùnéng jiějué tāmen shēnghuó shàng de gēnběn wèntí。
Help from government can’t solve the refugees’ root problems in life.
要以“治病救人”的态度帮助犯错误的同志。

They\'re happy to lap up the hospitality of their rescuers.
Tāmen xīnrán jiēshòule nàxiē jiùzhùzhě de hǎoyì。
他们欣然接受了那些救助者的好意。
Any costs recovered will be paid into the legal aid fund.

他协助警方解救人质的行为是值得表扬的。

大救星
dàjiùxīng 
great liberator

他已出现心衰症状，医生正在抢救。
Tā yǐ chūxiàn xīnshuāi zhèngzhuàng，yīshēng zhèngzài qiǎngjiù。
He is beginning to show signs of heart failure, the doctor is trying to rescue him.
医疗队包括10个医生和一辆救护车。
Yīliáoduì bāokuò shígè yīshēng hé yíliàng jiùhùchē。
The medical team is comprised of ten doctors and one ambulance.
他精通岐黄，挽救了不少病人的生命。

He is learned in traditional Chinese medicine and has saved many lives.

Myocardial infarction must be treated immediately, otherwise the patient will die.

It was due to the help of his neighbours that he managed to survive the fire.

医生认为这个病人没救了。
Yīshēngrènwéi zhège bìngrén méi jiù le。
The doctor considered the patient\'s case hopeless.
医生已经尽了最大的努力对他进行疗救。
Yīshēng yǐjing jìn le zuìdàde nǔlì duì tā jìnxíng liáojiù。
The doctor had tried his best to cure him.

the benevolent Goddess of Mercy
救济难民
jiùjì nànmín
give relief to refugees

to help the poor
救济穷人
to relieve the poor
救济贫民
(to be) on the dole
[BRIT] 靠失业救济金生活
to be on social security
靠社会救济金为生的；美 = to be on welfare
The local government provides unemployment relief funds.
当地政府提供失业救济基金。
The traditional social relief system with its unstandardized working system fails to meet the demands of the socialist market economy.
传统的社会救济制度由于其工作制度不够规范，不能适应社会主义市场经济的要求。
This women\'s support centre provide legal consulting service to victims of domestic violence.
这个妇女救济中心为家庭暴力的受害妇女提供法律咨询。
All these children without parents will be sent to a charity to get breakfast.
这些没有父母的孩子会被送到救济院吃早餐。
The government\'s welfare must be distributed to those who need it most.
政府救济应发放给那些最需要它们的人。
The delivery of these reliefs must be conducted methodically.
救济品的发放必须有条不紊地进行。
The poor have accepted doles.
Qióngrén jiēshòule jiùjì。
穷人接受了救济。
He\'ll be unemployed and have to live on the dole.
Tā jiùyào shīyèle，yǐhòu bùdébù yīkào zhèngfǔ jiùjìjīn shēnghuó。
他就要失业了，以后不得不依靠政府救济金生活。
The organisation works to administer charity and relief in the area.
Gāi zǔzhī fùzé zhège dìqū de císhàn jiùjì shìyí。
该组织负责这个地区的慈善救济事宜。
The parishes were required to levy taxes to provide for the relief of the poor.
Gè jiàoqū dōu bìxū zhēngshuì，yǐ gěi qióngrén tígōng jiùjì。
各教区都必须征税，以给穷人提供救济。
As far as I am aware there is nothing preventing the government from helping the poor.
Jùwǒsuǒzhī，zhèngfǔ jiùjì qióngrén bìng méiyǒu shòudào shénme zǔ\'ài。
据我所知，政府救济穷人并没有受到什么阻碍。
Most foreign relief organizations joined in the hue and cry .
Dàduōshù wàiguó jiùjì zǔzhī cānjiāle kàngyì huódòng。
大多数外国救济组织参加了抗议活动。
Er yeah，I\'m waiting on the dole tomorrow honey.
È shì de，wǒ zài děngzhe míngtiān qù lǐng shīyè jiùjìjīn，qīn\'àide。
呃是的，我在等着明天去领失业救济金，亲爱的。
He would go on to receive the money from the government.
Tā jiāng jìxù jiēshòu zhèngfǔ de jiùjìkuǎn。
他将继续接受政府的救济款。
The company donated a miserable $100 for flood relief.
Zhège gōngsī wèi hóngzāijiùjì jǐnjǐn juānle qūqū 100 měiyuán。
这个公司为洪灾救济仅仅捐了区区100美元。

Tā yǐjīng kào jiùjì shēnghuó le duō nián。

Tā kào fúlì jiùjì guòhuó。

Lǚyóuyè shì tāmen jīngjì de jiùmìngdàocǎo。
旅游业是他们经济的救命稻草。
那儿有辆救火车正在进行救火演习。
Nàr yǒu liàng jiùhuǒchē zhèngzài jìnxíng jiùhuǒ yǎnxí。
A fire engine is rehearsing now.
救火车号叫着开来了。
Jiùhuǒchē háojiào zhe kāi lái le。
The fire engine came with its siren screaming.
消防队员正在救火。
Xiāofángduìyuán zhèngzài jiùhuǒ。
The firemen are fighting the fire.
消防员迅速卸下了水龙带，准备抽水救火。
Xiāofángyuán xùnsù xièxià le shuǐlóngdài，zhǔnbèi chōushuǐ jiùhuǒ。
The firefighters rapidly unload the water hose, ready to pump water to put out the fire.
