He didn\'t even stop to wipe off the sweat on his forehead before he went to rescue the rest of the injured.
他死亡的原因是后心受了重创，抢救无效。
Tā sǐwáng de yuányīn shì hòuxīn shòu le zhòngchuàng，qiǎngjiù wúxiào。
The reason of his death was that the middle of his back was badly injured, and it was beyond salvage.
人在逆境，看见救星，似拨云见日，昏镜重磨。
Rén zài nìjìng，kànjiàn jiùxīng，sì bōyún jiànrì，hūnjìng chóngmó。
When people in trouble find a savior, they feel like that the sun has dispelled the clouds and mirrors have restored their shine.
他拿着急救箱快速走出门，向出事地点快速赶去。
Tā ná zhe jíjiùxiāng kuàisù zǒuchū mén，xiàng chūshì dìdiǎn kuàisù gǎnqù。
Carrying a first-aid case, he went out of the door quickly towards the accident site.
这支救护队总是在最危难的时候急难而进。
Zhèzhī jiùhùduì zǒngshì zài zuì wēinàn de shíhou jínán ér jìn。
This rescue team always comes to people\'s help at the most urgent times.
参加急难救助，是每个国民义不容辞的责任。
Cānjiā jínàn jiùzhù，shì měigè guómín yìbùróngcí de zérèn。
It is a duty of every citizen to give others in trouble a helping hand.
他从小就立下悬壶济世，救助贫病的宏愿。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù lìxià xuánhújìshì，jiùzhù pínbìng de hóngyuàn。
From a young age he has aspired to learn medicine well and cure the sick.
救援人员在江心打捞落水的渔船。
Jiùyuán rényuán zài jiāngxīn dǎlāo luòshuǐ de yúchuán。
The rescue men are salvaging the sunken fishing boat in the middle of the river.
这个即将倒闭的企业和经济雄厚的大公司交欢，成功地挽救了自己。
Zhège jíjiāng dǎobì de qǐyè hé jīngjì xiónghòu de dà gōngsī jiāohuān，chénggōng de wǎnjiù le zìjǐ。
The company on the verge of bankruptcy saved itself by building a good relationship with a large prosperous company.
这列火车解运的是救灾粮。
Zhè liè huǒchē jièyùn de shì jiùzāiliáng。
This train delivers food to disaster-stricken areas.
今晚唱大轴的演员病了，你们谁能救场？
Jīnwǎn chàng dàzhóu de yǎnyuán bìng le，nǐmen shéi néng jiùchǎng？
The key actor for tonight\'s show has fallen ill. Who can be his substitute?
政府给遭灾的农民发了救济金。
Zhèngfǔ gěi zāozāi de nóngmín fā le jiùjìjīn。
The government sent out relief funds to farmers in the disaster-stricken area.
每当妈妈要惩罚小明的时候，奶奶就成了小明的救命稻草。
Měi dāng māma yào chéngfá Xiǎo Míng de shíhou，nǎinai jiù chéng le Xiǎo Míng de jiùmìng dàocǎo。
Whenever Xiaoming\'s mother punishes him, he reaches for grandmother as a last straw.
对于贫困地区最好的救穷法不是输血而是造血。
Duìyú pínkùn dìqū zuìhǎo de jiùqióngfǎ búshì shūxiě ér shì zàoxiě。
The best way to relieve a poor area is not to give transfusions, but to help them produce blood.
收到警报后救生筏立刻赶到了出事水域。
Shōudào jǐngbào hòu jiùshēngfá lìkè gǎndào le chūshì shuǐyù。
The lifeboat hurried to the accident scene immediately after receiving the alarm.
出海捕鱼前我要在船上绑几个救生圈。
Chūhǎi bǔyú qián wǒ yào zài chuánshàng bǎng jǐgè jiùshēngquān。
I tie several rubber tires to the boat before I go to the sea to fish.
划船的时候别忘了穿救生衣。
Huáchuán de shíhou biéwàng le chuān jiùshēngyī。
Do not forget to wear a life jacket when you go boating.
五四时期，进步青年担当起了救亡图存的重任。
Wǔsì shíqī，jìnbùqīngnián dāndāngqǐ le jiùwáng túcún de zhòngrèn。
In the May Fourth Movement, enlighted young people carried the burden of saving the country.
洪灾爆发后战士们奔赴抗洪第一线救险。
Hóngzāi bàofā hòu zhànshìmen bēnfù kànghóng dìyī xiàn jiùxiǎn。
The soldiers went to the flood-stricken areas to control the flood.
后续部队要做好救援前方部队的准备。
Hòuxù bùduì yào zuòhǎo jiùyuán qiánfāng bùduì de zhǔnbèi。
The reserve army must get prepared to help the army at the front.
那位重病患者已行将就木，无药可救了。
Nàwèi zhòngbìng huànzhě yǐ xíngjiāng jiùmù，wúyào kějiù le。
The critical patient is dying and we can do nothing about it.
演出期间出现空场主持人就得出来救急。
Yǎnchū qījiān chūxiàn kòngchǎng zhǔchírén jiù děi chūlái jiùjí。
If a player does not appear during the performance, the compere should come out to relieve the emergency.
掉到井里的孩子的母亲在井边喊得已经声嘶力竭了，救援工作还在紧张地进行着。
Diàodào jǐng lǐ de háizi de mǔqīn zài jǐngbiān hǎn de yǐjing shēngsī lìjié le，jiùyuán gōngzuò hái zài jǐnzhāng de jìnxíng zhe。
The mother of the child who has fallen into the well has shouted herself hoarse. The succor is still going on tensely.
此地粮荒严重，政府已经在调拨救济粮了。
Cǐdì liánghuāng yánzhòng，zhèngfǔ yǐjing zài diàobō jiùjìliáng le。
Famine here is very serious. The government has already given out  relieving grain to this area.
医生已经尽了最大的努力对他进行疗救。
Yīshēng yǐjing jìn le zuìdàde nǔlì duì tā jìnxíng liáojiù。
The doctor had tried his best to cure him.
多亏了邻人相救，他才能在火灾中逃生。
Duōkuī le línrén xiāngjiù，tā cáinéng zài huǒzāi zhōng táoshēng。
It was due to the help of his neighbours that he managed to survive the fire.
政府对流民的救助并不能解决他们生活上的根本问题。
Zhèngfǔ duì liúmín de jiùzhù bìng bùnéng jiějué tāmen shēnghuó shàng de gēnběn wèntí。
Help from government can’t solve the refugees’ root problems in life.
经过努力，落入犯罪份子魔手的人质终于获救。
Jīngguò nǔlì，luòrù fànzuìfènzǐ móshǒu de rénzhì zhōng yú huòjiù。
After great effort, the hostages caught by criminals have been rescued.
您的救命之恩我没世不忘！
Nín de jiùmìng zhī ēn wǒ mòshì búwàng！
You saved my life, and I shall will remember that my entire life.
截止目前，难船已经成功营救了130多名遇难人员。
Jiézhǐ mùqián，nànchuán yǐjing chénggōng yíngjiù le yīyìbǎisānshíduōmíng yùnàn rényuán。
Till now, the boat containing refugees has successfully rescued over 130 victims.
这些批拨下来的救灾物资，一定要分发到灾民手中。
Zhèxiē pībō xiàlái de jiùzāi wùzī，yídìng yào fēnfādào zāimín shǒu zhōng。
Make sure to distribute these disaster relief materials to the hands of the victims.
他精通岐黄，挽救了不少病人的生命。
Tā jīngtōng qíhuáng，wǎnjiù le bùshǎo bìngrén de shēngmìng。
He is learned in traditional Chinese medicine and has saved many lives.
请你尽量说清楚自己所处的区位，我们好去救援。
Qǐng nǐ jìnliàng shuō qīngchu zìjǐ suǒ chǔ de qūwèi，wǒmen hǎo qù jiùyuán。
Tell us your location as clearly as you can, so that we can find and rescue you.
我们一定会全力以赴搭救落水者的。
Wǒmen yídìng huì quánlì yǐfù dājiù luòshuǐzhě de。
We will do our best to save the drowning people.
直到救援物资到达，灾区的群众已经缺食近一个月了。
Zhídào jiùyuán wùzī dàodá，zāiqū de qúnzhòng yǐjing quēshí jìn yígèyuè le。
By the time relief arrived, the people in the disaster area had already suffered from insufficient food for a month.
我们解救人质时一定要谨慎，以确保肉票安全！
Wǒmen jiějiù rénzhì shí yídìng yào jǐnshèn，yǐ quèbǎo ròupiào ānquán！
We should be careful when we rescue hostages so as to ensure their safety.
在车祸现场，医务人员正在对伤者紧急施救。
Zài chēhuò xiànchǎng，yīwù rényuán zhèngzài duì shāngzhě jǐnjí shījiù。
Medical workers are urgently rescuing the injured right at the site of the accident.
消防员迅速卸下了水龙带，准备抽水救火。
Xiāofángyuán xùnsù xièxià le shuǐlóngdài，zhǔnbèi chōushuǐ jiùhuǒ。
The firefighters rapidly unload the water hose, ready to pump water to put out the fire.
面对流氓的非礼，她拼命地撕打。并高声呼喊救命。
Miànduì liúmáng de fēilǐ，tā pīnmìng de sīdǎ。bìng gāoshēng hūhǎn jiùmìng。
Faced with rape by the bad man, she tore at him and called &quot;help&quot; at the top of her voice.
他在死亡线上徘徊了好久，终于被抢救了回来。
Tā zài sǐwángxiàn shàng páihuái le hǎo jiǔ，zhōng yú bèi qiǎngjiù le huílái。
He struggled for quite a long time at the verge of death, and was finally saved.
消防员用太平斧砍破大门、救出了伤员。
Xiāofángyuán yòng tàipíngfǔ kǎnpò dàmén、jiùchū le shāngyuán。
The firefighters broke down the door with emergency axes and saved the wounded.
这支部队已向那个发出救援信号的村庄突进了。
Zhèzhī bùduì yǐ xiàng nàge fāchū jiùyuán xìnhào de cūnzhuāng tūjìn le。
This army has already marched towards the village that sent the SOS.
起义军打着救国图存的旗号，深得民心。
Qǐyìjūn dǎ zhe jiùguó túcún de qíhào，shēndé mínxīn。
The revolting army put forward the slogan of &quot;save the nation; struggle for existence&quot;, which helped them win the love of the masses.
他一定是吞服了过量的安眠药，应当赶紧送医院抢救。
Tā yídìng shì tūnfú le guòliàng de ānmiányào，yīngdāng gǎnjǐn sòng yīyuàn qiǎngjiù。
He must have taken a massive overdose of sleeping tablets, and should be sent to hospital at once.
汤姆的情况非常危险，医生正在抢救。
Tāngmǔ de qíngkuàng fēicháng wēixiǎn，yīshēng zhèngzài qiǎngjiù。
Tom\'s condition is very bad, the doctors are trying their best to save him.
王强向医院献旗，感谢医生救了他的命。
Wáng Qiáng xiàng yīyuàn xiànqí，gǎnxiè yīshēng jiù le tā de mìng。
Wang Qiang presents a banner to the hospital to thank the doctors for saving his life.
心梗必须及时抢救，否则患者会有生命危险。
Xīngěng bìxū jíshí qiǎngjiù，fǒuzé huànzhě huì yǒu shēngmìng wēixiǎn。
Myocardial infarction must be treated immediately, otherwise the patient will die.
他已出现心衰症状，医生正在抢救。
Tā yǐ chūxiàn xīnshuāi zhèngzhuàng，yīshēng zhèngzài qiǎngjiù。
He is beginning to show signs of heart failure, the doctor is trying to rescue him.
她忽然血崩，来不及抢救就去世了。
Tā hūrán xuèbēng，láibùjí qiǎngjiù jiù qùshì le。
She died in the sudden flooding, as there wasn\'t enough time even for first aid.
她牙花子都烂了，疼得直叫救命。
Tā yáhuāzi dōu làn le，téng de zhí jiào jiùmìng。
She cries in pain because her gums are rotten.
他胰脏突然出了问题，被送往医院紧急救治。
Tā yízàng tūrán chū le wèntí，bèi sòngwǎng yīyuàn jǐnjí jiùzhì。
He\'s got a problem with his pancreas, so he was sent to the hospital for emergency treatment.
这件事由于挽救及时，没有酿成大错，终于雨过天青了。
Zhèjiànshì yóuyú wǎnjiù jíshí，méiyǒu niàngchéng dàcuò，zhōng yú yǔguò tiānqīng le。
Thanks to a timely rescue, this matter didn\'t cause great damage and everything is fine now.
救援物资将在十分钟后运抵灾区。
Jiùyuán wùzī jiāng zài shí fēn zhōng hòu yùndǐ zāiqū。
Material aids will arrive at the disaster area in ten minutes.
医护队马上就投入到阵地战的救护任务中去了。
Yīhùduì mǎshàng jiù tóurù dào zhèndìzhàn de jiùhù rènwù zhōng qù le。
The medical team begins with the rescue work for the positional warfare immediately.
急救包是人们外出旅行必不可少的装备。
Jíjiùbāo shì rénmen wàichū lǚxíng bìbùkěshǎo de zhuāngbèi。
A first-aid kit is a necessary piece of equipment for people when traveling.
他的心脏病犯了，快去叫救护车。
Tā de xīnzàngbìng fàn le，kuàiqù jiào jiùhùchē。
He had a heart attack; go call an ambulance!
下午去游泳的时候把救生圈带上。
Xiàwǔ qù yóuyǒng de shíhou bǎ jiùshēngquān dàishàng。
Take a life buoy with you when you go swimming.
一艘救生艇从我身边疾驰而过。
Yì sōu jiùshēngtǐng cóng wǒ shēnbiān jíchí ér guò。
A lifeboat quickly passed me.
隔壁的王大爷居然无意中救了一只鹦鹉螺。
Gébì de wángdàye jūrán wúyì zhōng jiù le yì zhīyīngwǔluó。
Uncle Wang, who lives next door, accidentally saved a nautilus.
医疗队包括10个医生和一辆救护车。
Yīliáoduì bāokuò shígè yīshēng hé yíliàng jiùhùchē。
The medical team is comprised of ten doctors and one ambulance.
我们必须采取补救措施。
Wǒmen bìxū cǎiqǔ bǔjiùcuòshī。
We must adopt remedial measures.
单纯地注入资金是无法挽救公司的。

掉换工作
diàohuàn gōngzuò 
be assigned a new job; be transferred to another post
以兽皮换工业品
yǐ shòupí huàn ɡōnɡyèpǐn 
exchange (or barter) furs for industrial products
他换工作了吗？
Tā huàn gōngzuò le ma? 
Has he changed his job?
我想换个工作。
Wǒxiǎng huàn gè gōngzuò。
I want to change jobs.

Mr. ____, I have decided to change my job environment, please allow me to leave, thank you.

Lǐngdǎo bānzi zǒumǎ huànjiànghòu，gōngzuò yǒu le qǐsè。

这台新式交换机大大的减少了交换台的工作量。

用工业品换取农产品
yònɡ ɡōnɡyèpǐn huànqǔ nónɡchǎnpǐn 
exchange (or barter) industrial products for farm produce
日班和夜班的工人正在换班。

Daytime and nighttime workers are changing shifts now.
那个工厂实行换休制。

huàn yígè shuōfa

双方坦率地交换了意见。
Shuāngfāng tǎnshuài de jiāohuàn le yìjiàn。
The two sides had a frank exchange of views.
套换外汇
tàohuàn wàihuì 
engage in arbitrage (of foreign exchange); arbitrage
教练决定让3号替换8号。
Jiàoliàn juédìng ràng sānhào tìhuàn bāhào。
The coach decided to replace player No. 8 with No. 3.
带上一套替换的衣服。
Dàishàngyí tào tìhuàn de yīfu。
Take a change of clothes with you.
这种支票，可以在全国范围内随时通兑或交换。
Zhè zhǒng zhīpiào，kěyǐ zài quánguó fànwéi nèi suíshí tōngduì huò jiāohuàn。
This kind of check can be cashed or exchanged at any time anywhere in the country.
偷换概念
tōuhuàn ɡàiniàn 
play tricks with concepts
推心置腹地交换意见
tuīxīnzhìfù de jiāohuàn yìjiàn 
have a confidential (or heart-to-heart) exchange of views
货物出门，概不退换。
Huòwù chūmén, ɡài bú tuìhuàn。 
Goods sold are not returnable.
得到脱胎换骨的改造
Dédào tuō tāihuàngǔ de gǎizào 
cast off one\'s old self and take on a new self; make a change in one\'s very nature
换人，四号下，三号上。
Huànrén，sì hào xià，sān hào shàng。
Substitution, No. 3 for No. 4.
心平气和地交换意见
xīnpíngqìhé de jiāohuàn yìjiàn
exchange views calmly
山村换新装。
Shāncūn huàn xīnzhuānɡ。
The mountain village takes on a new look.
一刹间，布景换了。
Yíchàjiān，bùjǐnghuàn le。
In a twinkling the scene changed.
交换照会
jiāohuàn zhàohuì 
exchange notes
转换方向
zhuǎnhuàn fāngxiàng 
change direction
转换话题
zhuǎnhuàn huàtí 
change the subject of conversation; switch the conversation to another subject
人员不断更换，就像走马灯似的。
Rényuán búduàn gēnghuàn，jiù xiàng zǒumǎdēngshì de。
Personnel were shifted about as often as if they were on a running horse lantern (or a merry-go-round).
领导班子走马换将后，工作有了起色。
Lǐngdǎo bānzi zǒumǎ huànjiànghòu，gōngzuò yǒu le qǐsè。
Things are looking up as a result of a reshuffle of the leading group.
交换
jiāohuàn
exchange; swop
我用美元兑换了些澳门元。
Wǒ yòng měiyuán duìhuàn le xiē àoményuán。
I exchanged US dollars into Macau dollars.
请您放心，如果有质量问题我们包退包换。
Qǐng nín fàngxīn，rúguǒ yǒu zhìliàng wèntí wǒmen bāotuì bāohuàn。
We assure you that if there are any quality problems, you can either have your money back or exchange for another one.
你能帮我更换一下保险丝吗？
Nǐ néng bāng wǒ gēnghuàn yíxià bǎoxiǎnsī ma？
Can you change the fuse for me, please?
我换了同学的电脑用，总觉得有些不对劲儿。
Wǒ huàn le tóngxué de diànnǎo yòng，zǒng juédé yǒuxiē búduìjìnr。
I did not feel right using a classmate’s computer.
这件事你不妨换个角度去想一想。
Zhèjiànshì nǐ bùfáng huàngè jiǎodù qù xiǎngyixiǎng。
Why don’t you think about it from a different perspective?
家里应该换个新的菜墩子了。
Jiā lǐ yīnggāi huàngè xīn de càidūnzi le。
We should buy a new chopping board.
这个变压器已经烧毁了，早该拆换一个新的了。
Zhège biànyāqì yǐjing shāohuǐ le，zǎo gāi chāihuàn yígè xīn de le。
This transformer has burnt out. It should have been replaced a long time ago.
这个铲斗的容量太小了，应当更换一个更大一些的。
Zhège chǎndǒu de róngliàng tài xiǎo le，yīngdāng gēnghuàn yígè gèngdà yìxiē de。
This scraper bucket is too small.  We need a bigger one.
我们需要给这个秤换一根新的秤纽了。
Wǒmen xūyào gěi zhège chènghuàn yìgēn xīn de chèngniǔ le。
We need a new lifting cord for the steelyard.
这次演出，我被抽换下来，心情很不好。
Zhècì yǎnchū，wǒ bèi chōuhuàn xiàlái，xīnqíng hěnbùhǎo。
I felt bad when I was replaced by others during the performance.
这些都是臭子儿，换一些用吧。
Zhèxiē dōushì chòuzǐr，huàn yìxiē yòng ba。
All of these bullets are now useless.  You need to get some useful ones.
他刚给自己的电脑换了一个处理器。
Tā gāng gěi zìjǐ de diànnǎo huàn le yígè chǔlǐqì。
He has just changed a processor on his computer.
这个会场的传声装置真是太差了，下次开会要换地方了。
Zhège huìchǎng de chuánshēng zhuāngzhì zhēnshì tài chà le，xià cì kāihuì yào huàn dìfāng le。
The loudspeakers of this conference hall are too bad. We should change to another place next time.
你们两个人的参考书可以串换着看，省得都去买了。
Nǐmen liǎnggè rén de cānkǎoshū kěyǐ chuànhuàn zhe kàn，shěng de dōu qù mǎi le。
You two can share your reference books so that you don\'t both have to buy them.
我家的窗机坏了，爸爸决定换个分体式的壁挂机。
Wǒjiā de chuāngjī huài le，bàba juédìng huàn gè fēntǐshì de bìguàjī。
Our window air conditioner is broken, so my father has decided to replace it with a separate hanging air conditioner.
这个瓷瓶已经坏了，你们应该尽快更换新的，以免漏电伤人。
Zhège cípíng yǐjing huài le，nǐmen yīnggāi jìnkuài gēnghuàn xīn de，yǐmiǎn lòudiàn shāngrén。
This insulation is damaged. You should change it for a new one as soon as possible so as to prevent people from being hurt by the leakage of electricity.
领导班子的大换血肯定能让这座城市变得更有活力。
Lǐngdǎo bānzi de dàhuànxuè kěndìng néng ràng zhèzuò chéngshì biàn de gèng yǒu huólì。
Introducing plenty of fresh personnel into the leadership will certainly make the city more vigorous.
天热了，换条单裤穿吧。
Tiān rè le，huàn tiáo dānkù chuān ba。
It\'s getting hot, you should put on unlined trousers.
你换件衣服吧，这件不够挡风。
Nǐ huàn jiàn yīfu ba，zhèjiàn búgòu dǎngfēng。
You\'d better change coats, this one won\'t protect you from the wind.
这台机床的电耗太大了，我们最好换另外一台。
Zhètái jīchuáng de diànhào tài dà le，wǒmen zuìhǎo huàn lìngwài yì tái。

这件衣服穿在身上短撅撅的，应该换一件了。

The coat has shrunk, you\'d better buy another one.
购买这种饮料可以获取一定分值，以后可以兑换奖品。

You can get certain bonus points by buying this kind of drink, which can be exchanged for gifts in the future.
今天我们学习了小数与复名数的相互转换。

Today we have learnt how to change between decimal fractions and compound numbers.
他当官以后，家里改换门庭，不再被人瞧不起。
Tā dāngguān yǐhòu，jiā lǐ gǎihuàn méntíng，búzài bèi rén qiáobuqǐ。
After he became a government official, his family status was changed; they were no longer looked down upon by others.
因为不受重视，他打算改换门庭，另投他人。
Yīnwéi búshòu zhòngshì，tā dǎsuàn gǎihuàn méntíng，lìng tóu tārén。
Because he\'s not receiving attention, he plans to switch allegiance to a new master.
订婚宴上，男女双方互换了庚帖。
Dìnghūnyàn shàng，nánnǚ shuāngfāng hùhuàn le gēngtiè。
The man and the woman exchanged documents of their horoscopes on the engagement party.
由于攻防转换速度太慢，我方失去一次得分的机会。
Yóuyú gōngfáng zhuǎnhuàn sùdù tài màn，wǒ fāng shīqù yícì défēn de jīhuì。
We lost a chance of scoring due to the slow switch between attacking and defending.
这个机器上的辊轴应该更换了。
Zhège jīqì shàng de gǔnzhóu yīnggāi gēnghuàn le。
The machine\'s roll shaft should be replaced.
我家的锅底已经换过一次了，现在又漏了。
Wǒjiā de guōdǐ yǐjing huànguò yícì le，xiànzài yòu lòu le。
I have replaced the bottom of the pot once, but now it is leaking again.
我的计算机汉卡的版本太低了，需要更换一个。
Wǒ de jìsuànjī hànkǎ de bǎnběn tài dī le，xūyào gēnghuàn yí gè。
The edition of the Chinese card in my computer is out-dated and needs to be replaced.
这个夯砣很沉，你还是换个轻的吧。
Zhège hāngtuó hěnchén，nǐ háishi huàn gè qīng de ba。
This heavy end of the rammer is too heavy. You\'d better change to a lighter one.
生活窘迫的他拿新衣服换了些红票。
Shēnghuó jiǒngpò de tā ná xīn yīfu huàn le xiē hóngpiào。
He was so poor that he had to exchange the new clothes for money.
有效地利用化学能，使其转换成机械能。

Make use of chemical energy effectively, and transform it into mechanical energy.
想到达目的地，中间得换乘地铁。
Xiǎng dàodá mùdìdì，zhōng jiān děi huànchéng dìtiě。
To reach the destination, we must switch subway lines.
这两个字一换个儿，意思完全不同。
Zhè liǎnggè zì yíhuàngèr，yìsi wánquán bùtóng。
Once the two characters exchange positions with each other, the meaning will be totally different.
今年年底，咱公司可能要换马。

这间屋子的窗户太少，必须得安个换气扇。

The room has too few windows. A ventilator must be installed.
她总是觉得自己不够漂亮，于是在医院做了换容术。

She alwasys feels she isn\'t beautiful enough, so she has had plastic surgery at hospital.
经过我们的共同努力，终于使这间旧房换容了。

Through our common efforts, the appearance of the old room have finally changed.
他们结拜过后就彼此换贴，成了不离不弃的好兄弟。
Tāmen jiébài guòhòu jiù bǐcǐ huàntiē，chéng le bùlí búqì de hǎoxiōngdì。
After they swore to be brothers, they exchanged cards and became good brothers who would never betray one another.
本市的交警和司机进行了一次换位体验。
Běnshì de jiāojǐng hé sījī jìnxíng le yícì huànwèi tǐyàn。
The police, and drivers in the city have gained a lot driving experience.
李明做了换心手术，现在身体恢复得很好。
Lǐ Míng zuò le huànxīn shǒushù，xiànzài shēntǐ huīfù de hěnhǎo。
Li Ming has had a heart transplantation operation. He is now he is recovering well.
想要拥有知心朋友，贵在以心换心。
Xiǎngyào yōngyǒu zhīxīn péngyou，guì zài yǐ xīn huàn xīn。
If you want to have intimate friends, it is very important for you to be sincere.
他说吃饱了，换言之，是不想吃了。
Tā shuō chībǎo le，huànyánzhī，shì bùxiǎng chī le。
He said he was full. In other words, he didn\'t want to have more.
他去汇市兑换美元，结果走错了地方。

He wanted to change some dollars at the Money Exchange, but went to the wrong place.
新换的这个机子比原来那个灵巧多了。
Xīnhuàn de zhège jīzi bǐ yuánlái nàge língqiǎo duō le。
The new machine is much more ingenious than the old one.
这辆车的减速器性能很差，可以换一个了。

我打算把积攒的一大把角票换成整元。

节候转换之时要注意防病。

时间长了，电线杆上的那些绝缘子也需要检修更换。

After being in use for a long time, the insulators on the electric wire poles should be examined and replaced with new ones.
这一捆子柴火拿到集上能换回半斤肉呢！
Zhè yì kǔnzi cháihuo nádào jí shàng néng huànhuí bàn jīn ròu ne！
This bale of firewood can be sold on the market and is worth half a kilo of meat.
他把小车换成大车就是为了揽货方便。

He changed the small truck for a big one in order to ship goods more conveniently.
这次他是下定决心要重新做人了，真是浪子回头金不换呀！
Zhècì tā shì xiàdìng juéxīn yào chóngxīn zuòrén le，zhēnshì làngzǐ huítóu jīn bùhuàn ya！
He decided to start his life afresh, in accordance with the Chinese saying, &quot; A repentant libertine is worth more than gold.&quot;
这个轮胎该换里带了，现在漏气漏得厉害。
Zhège lúntāi gāi huàn lǐdài le，xiànzài lòuqì lòu de lìhai。
The inner tube of the tire should be changed. Now it leaks air badly.
我家煤气灶的炉嘴儿该换一个了。
Wǒjiā méiqìzào de lúzuǐr gāi huàn yígè le。

我家的录音机太老了，应该换一台了。

Our tape recorder is too old, we should replace it.
我打算明年开始在渔场换成轮养的方式养鱼。
Wǒ dǎsuàn míngnián kāishǐ zài yúchǎng huànchéng lúnyǎng de fāngshì yǎngyú。
I am going to start keeping various species of fish in rotation in the fishing ground.
这个螺口的大小不太合适，需要换一个。
Zhège luókǒu de dàxiǎo bú tài héshì，xūyào huàn yí gè。
This screw is not suitable; give me another type.
天气渐渐暖和了，他换上了一件轻薄的毛衫。
Tiānqì jiànjiàn nuǎnhé le，tā huànshàng le yíjiàn qīngbáo de máoshān。
It is turning warm, so he\'s changing into a thin sweater.
缸里的大米已经装得冒尖了，要再换一个容器了。
Gāng lǐ de dàmǐ yǐjing zhuāng de màojiān le，yào zài huàn yígè róngqì le。

你一定要在晚上做饭之前更换一个新的煤气罐。

请问这个美制单位怎么换算成英制单位。
Qǐngwèn zhège měizhì dānwèi zěnme huànsuànchéng yīngzhì dānwèi。

这个门已经关不上了，看来要更换一个门扇了。
Zhège mén yǐjing guānbúshàng le，kànlái yào gēnghuàn yígè ménshàn le。
This door can not be shut. We need to change the door leaf.
这个100瓦的泡子太费电了，还是换个30瓦的吧。
Zhège yìbǎiwǎ de pàozi tài fèidiàn le，háishi huàn gè sānshíwǎ de ba。

她那个车胎的气门芯是新换的，应该没问题。

Kàn diànyǐng shí wǒ xǐhuan bǎ tā qiēhuàn chéng zhōng wén zìmù。
I like to switch onto Chinese sub-titles when watching movies.
睡觉前他换上了寝衣。
Shuìjiào qián tā huànshàng le qǐnyī。
He puts on his nightclothes when sleeping.

Wǒ xiǎng qù yínháng duìhuàn wǔ wàn rìyuán。

现在的剧本经常以设置悬念来吸引观众，而悬念经常是在时空变换上下功夫的。
Xiànzài de jùběn jīngcháng yǐ shèzhì xuánniàn lái xīyǐn guānzhòng，ér xuánniàn jīngcháng shì zài shíkōng biànhuàn shàng xià gōngfu de。
Today\'s plays often use suspense to attract audiences, and suspense is often created through changes in space and time.
面对日益变换的社会环境，我们不应该抱怨自己的时运不济，而是应该识时务，而后应时而动。
Miànduì rìyì biànhuàn de shèhuì huánjìng，wǒmen bùyīnggāi bàoyuàn zìjǐ de shíyùn bújì，ér shì yīnggāi shí shíwù，ér hòu yìngshí ér dòng。
Faced with the ever-changing society, we should rather make good judgment about current affairs and take corresponding actions than complain about bad luck.
这种交易虽然不会挣来多少实益，却能为我们换得良好声誉。
Zhèzhǒng jiāoyì suīrán búhuì zhènglái duōshǎo shíyì，què néng wèi wǒmen huàndé liánghǎo shēngyù。
Such trade fairs can\'t bring us too many practical benefits, but they can earn us a good name.
请您拿小票到收银台交款、并换取发票。
Qǐng nín ná xiǎopiào dào shōuyíntái jiāokuǎn、bìng huànqǔ fāpiào。

给盆花换盆时，要留一些宿土。
Gěi pénhuā huàn pén shí，yào liú yìxiē sùtǔ。

这两个词同义，可以相互替换使用。

These two words are synonyms, and can replace each other.

我换到了一挡。

[US] 换挡

小屋在这个地区遍地都是。
We walked together over to the cottage.
Wǒmen yìqǐ bùxíng，láidàole nà zhuàng xiǎowū。
我们一起步行，来到了那幢小屋。
You never can tell how many mice there are in the shed!
Nǐ gēnběn wúfǎ yùliào nàgè xiǎo wūzi lǐ yǒu duōshǎo lǎoshǔ。
你根本无法预料那个小屋子里有多少老鼠。
He built himself a cabin in a hollow high up in the Appalachians.
Tā zài Ābālāqìyà Shān shàng de yí gè shāndòng zhōng jiànzàole yí zuò xiǎowū。
他在阿巴拉契亚山上的一个山洞中建造了一座小屋。
She liked the old cottage; its quaintness was appealing.
Tā xǐhuan nàgè lǎojiù de xiǎowū，qí qíqiǎo de fēnggé hěn xīyǐn rén。
她喜欢那个老旧的小屋，其奇巧的风格很吸引人。
Next vacation, I would like to go to a cabin in the middle of nowhere.
下个假期，我想去某个无名的小木屋里度过。
Before he went to the town, he lived in this log cabin.
在去镇上之前，他住在这个小木屋里。
We rented a cabin in the mountains.
Wǒmen zài shānqū zūle gè xiǎo mùwū。
我们在山区租了个小木屋。
They built a small wooden hut with wooden sticks on the top that looked a bit like radio antennae.
Tāmen xiūjiànle yígè xiǎo mùwū，wūdǐng shàng háiyǒu mùgùn，mùgùn kànshàngqù yǒudiǎnxiàng wúxiàndiàn tiānxiàn。
他们修建了一个小木屋，屋顶上还有木棍，木棍看上去有点像无线电天线。
We booked into the bungalow in the camp site.
wǒmen dēngjì rùzhù le lùyíngdì de xiǎomùwū。
我们登记入住了露营地的小木屋。
She led him to a small back room in her house.
Tā bǎ tā lǐngdào le tā jiālǐ de yì jiān xiǎohēiwū lǐ。
她把他领到了她家里的一间小黑屋里。
To get into their cabins, he has to steal the keys from under their noses.
Xiǎng yào jìn dào tāmen de xiǎomùwū lǐ，tā děi cóng tāmen yǎnpí dǐxià tōudào yàoshi。
想要进到他们的小木屋里，他得从他们眼皮底下偷到钥匙。
He repaired to his cabin in the woods.
Tā jīngcháng qù tā zài lín zhōng de xiǎo mùwū。
他经常去他在林中的小木屋。
The stream curved to the left in front of the house.
Zhè tiáo xiǎoxī zài wūzi ménqián xiàngzuǒ wānyán。
这条小溪在屋子门前向左蜿蜒。
The white blanket lapped over the roofs of the outbuildings of the little farm.
Báisè de tǎnzi diégài zài xiǎonóngchǎng wàiwū de wūdǐng shàng。
白色的毯子叠盖在小农场外屋的屋顶上。
This room is too small and feels like a cage.
这屋子太小了，感觉像个鸟笼。
It was almost concealed by the small columns which held up the roof.
Tā jīhū bèi zhīchēng wūdǐng de jǐ gēn xiǎozhùzi zhēyǎn zhù le。
它几乎被支撑屋顶的几根小柱子遮掩住了。
My house has a small yard in the back.
我屋子后边有个小院子。
You have so many pets, there are little creatures everywhere in this house.
你的宠物真不少，屋里到处都是小动物。
You need a roof strong enough to support the weight of a small garden.
你得要有个非常结实的屋顶，这样才能支撑起小花园的重量。
Out of the wigwam crawled the boy who\'d shot the arrow.
Máocǎowū wài，yí gè zài púfú ér xíng de xiǎonánhái zài shèjiàn。
茅草屋外，一个在匍匐而行的小男孩在射箭。
重新刷了白粉，旧屋子就跟新屋一样亮堂。
Chóngxīn shuā le báifěn，jiùwūzi jiù gēn xīnwū yíyàng liàngtáng。
The house looks just like new after being painted.
这间屋子光线太暗。
Zhè jiān wūzi guāngxiàn tài àn。
This room is too dark.
这间屋子摆布得十分雅致。
Zhè jiān wūzi bǎibu de shífēn yǎzhì。
The room is tastefully furnished.
屋子里摆设得很整齐。
Wūzi lǐ bǎishè de hěn zhěngqí。
The room is decorated neatly.
这屋子太敞。
Zhè wūzi tài chǎng。
This room is too big.
这间屋子很敞亮。
Zhè jiān wūzi hěn chǎngliàng。
This room is light and spacious.
这屋子太潮。
Zhè wūzi tài cháo。
The room is too damp.
下了七八天雨，屋子里什么都是潮呼呼的。
Xià le qībā tiān yǔ，wūzi lǐ shénme dōushì cháohūhu de。
After a week\'s rain, everything in the house became damp and clammy.
这间屋子太潮湿，不适宜住人。
Zhè jiān wūzi tài cháoshī，bú shìyí zhù rén。
This room is too damp to live in.
屋子打扫得很彻底。
Wūzi dǎsǎo de hěn chèdǐ。
The room has been given a thorough cleaning.
屋子里陈设着几件工艺品。
Wūzi lǐ chénshè zhe jǐ jiàn gōngyìpǐn。
There is some artware set out in the room.
这间屋子太小，盛不了这么多东西。
Zhè jiān wūzi tài xiǎo，chéngbu liǎo zhèmeduō dōngxi。
The room is too small to hold all these things.
屋子里充满着阳光。
Wūzi lǐ chōngmǎn zhe yángguāng。
The room is full of sunshine.
那间屋子有这间两个大。
Nà jiān wūzi yǒu zhè jiān liǎnggè dà。
That roomis twice the size of this one.
她单独住一间屋子。
Tā dāndú zhù yìjiān wūzi。
She has a room to herself.
他老是这么丢三落四的。你看，又把房门钥匙锁在屋子里了。
Tā lǎoshì zhème diūsānlàsì de。Nǐ kàn，yòu bǎ fángmén yàoshi suǒ zài wūzi lǐ le。
He\'s so scatterbrained. Look, he\'s locked his key inside his room again.
三间东倒西歪的屋子
sān jiān dōngdǎoxīwāi de wūzi
three tumbledown rooms
屋子里静悄悄的，一点动静也没有。
Wūzi lǐ jìngqiāoqiāo de，yìdiǎn dòngjìng yě méiyǒu。
It was quiet in the room, nothing was stirring.
这屋子很宽敞，而且光线充足。
Zhè wūzi hěn kuānchǎng，érqiě guāngxiàn chōngzú。
The room is spacious and bright.
这间屋子光线不够。
Zhè jiān wūzi guāngxiàn bú gòu。
There\'s not enough light in this room.
屋子不大，收拾得倒还干净。
Wūzi bú dà，shōushi de dào hái gānjìng。
The room is small, but it\'s kept quite tidy.
屋子里黑糊糊的。
Wūzi lǐ hēihūhū de。
It\'s rather dark in the room.
屋子里横七竖八地堆放着许多杂物。
Wūzi lǐ héngqīshùbā de duīfàng zhe xǔduō zá wù。
The room was cluttered with all sorts of things.
他走出了屋子，回手把门带上。
Tā zǒuchū le wūzi，huíshǒu bǎ mén dàishàng。
He went out of the room and closed the door behind him.
这屋子又干净，又豁亮。
Zhè wūzi yòu gānjìng，yòu huòliàng。
The room is clean, bright and spacious.
屋子犄角里有一个衣架。
Wūzi jījiǎo lǐ yǒu yígè yījià。
A clothes tree stands in a corner of the room.
这间屋子既宽敞，又亮堂。
Zhè jiān wūzi jì kuānchang，yòu liàngtang。
The room is both light and spacious.
四间屋子
sì jiān wūzi 
four rooms
屋子近旁
wūzi jìnpáng
near the house
屋子里静悄悄的。
Wūzi lǐ jìngqiāoqiāo de。
It was very quiet in the room.
这间屋子可以住四个人。
Zhè jiān wūzi kěyǐ zhù sì gè rén。
This room can accommodate four people.
这间屋子很宽绰。
Zhè jiān wūzi hěn kuānchuo。
The room is spacious.
这屋子老不住人，有股霉味儿。
Zhè wūzi lǎo bú zhù rén，yǒu gǔ méiwèir。
This room has been left vacant for a long time, so there is a mouldy smell.
屋子里里外外都打扫得很干净。
Wūzi lǐlǐwàiwài dōu dǎsǎo de hěn gānjìng。
The house has been given a thorough cleaning inside and out.
屋子里亮着灯光。
Wūzi lǐ liàng zhe dēngguāng。
Lights were shining in the room.
这屋子又宽敞又亮堂。
Zhè wūzi yòu kuānchǎngyòu liàngtang。
The room is light and spacious.
零七八碎的东西放满了一屋子。
Língqībāsuì de dōngxi fàngmǎn le yì wūzi。
The room is cluttered up with all kinds of things.
他的屋子乱七八糟的。
Tā de wūzi luànqībāzāo de。
His room was in great disorder.
屋子里乱糟糟的。
Wūzi lǐ luànzāozāo de。
The room is in a mess.
这间屋子没有十平方米。
Zhè jiān wūzi méiyǒu shí píngfāngmǐ。
This room is not more than 10 metres square.
闷屋子住着憋气。
Mènwūzi zhù zhe biēqì。
I feel suffocated in a tightly closed room.
炉子一着，屋子就暖和了。
Lúzi yì zháo，wūzi jiù nuǎnhé le。
The room became warm when the fire got going.
屋子外面漆黑一片。
Wūzi wàimiàn qīhēi yí piàn。
Outside the house it was pitch-black.
屋子太小，今晚权且住一宿，明天再想办法。
Wūzi tài xiǎo，jīnwǎn quánqiě zhù yì xiǔ，míngtiān zài xiǎng bànfǎ。
Small as this room is, let\'s just make do with it for the night and look for another place tomorrow.
我们把屋子拾掇一下。
Wǒmen bǎ wūzi shíduō yíxià。
Let\'s tidy up the room.
收拾屋子
shōushi wūzi
tidy up the room
这屋子阴，东西容易受潮。
Zhè wūzi yīn，dōngxi róngyì shòucháo。
The room gets no sun and things easily become damp.
这时满屋子的人又说又笑，兴高采烈。
Zhè shí mǎn wūzi de rén yòu shuō yòu xiào，xìnggāocǎiliè。
The room was then full of people chatting animatedly and laughing.
屋子太闷了，打开窗子透透气。
Wūzi tài mēn le，dǎkāi chuāngzi tòutouqì。
The room is too stuffy. Open the windows and let some air in.
三间屋子
sān jiān wūzi 
three rooms
屋子里的东西被匪徒们洗劫一空。
Wūzi lǐ de dōngxi bèi fěitúmen xǐjiéyìkōng。
The bandits made off with everything in the house.
这是两间相通的屋子。
Zhè shì liǎngjiān xiāngtōng de wūzi。
These are two communicating rooms.
那间屋子向东。
Nà jiān wūzi xiàng dōng。
That room faces east.
树阴底下比屋子里要凉快些。
Shùyīn dǐxià bǐ wūzi lǐ yào liángkuài xiē。
It is cooler under the tree than in the room.
一屋子的人都欢腾起来。
Yì wūzi de rén dōu huānténgqǐlái。
Everybody in the room was overjoyed.
朝北的屋子太荫。
Cháoběi de wūzi tài yìn。
The rooms with a northern exposure are too damp and chilly.
给某人匀兑一间屋子
gěi mǒurén yúnduì yìjiān wūzi
spare sb. a room
这幅画给这间屋子增色不少。
Zhèfúhuà gěi zhè jiān wūzi zēngsè bùshǎo。
The picture adds beauty to the room.
这屋子直里有六米，横里有三米。
Zhè wūzi zhí lǐ yǒu liù mǐ，hénglǐ yǒu sān mǐ。
The room is 6 metres in length and 3 in width.
黑屋子
hēiwūzi
a dark room
收拾房间时，妈妈将杂物放在屋子的背角处。
Shōushí fángjiān shí，māma jiāng záwù fàngzài wūzi de bèijiǎochù。
When cleaning the room, Mother put the odds and ends in the unnoticed corner of the house.
老屋子里的这把太师椅已经残旧不堪。
Lǎowūzi lǐ de zhè bǎ tàishīyǐ yǐjing cánjiù bùkān。
This armchair in the old house is old and broken.
摄影师正在屋子里测光。
Shèyǐngshī zhèngzài wūzi lǐ cèguāng。
The photographer is measuring the brightness of his object in the room.
屋子里吵吵嚷嚷，秩序混乱。
Wūzi lǐ chǎochǎorǎngrǎng，zhìxù hùnluàn。
The atmosphere in the room is extremely chaotic.
安静的屋子，突然传来了絛彫的声音。
Ānjìng de wūzi，tūrán chuánlái le tāodiāo de shēngyīn。
Suddenly a swishing sound came out of the quiet room.
满屋子都是烟，是不是烟筒倒烟了？
Mǎnwūzi dōushì yān，shìbushì yāntǒng dàoyān le？
The air is chocking in here. Is smoke coming in from the chimney?
据说有人在这间屋子里看见过吊死鬼。
Jùshuō yǒurén zài zhè jiān wūzi lǐ kànjiàn guò diàosǐguǐ。
It is said that some people have seen ghosts of people who hanged themselves.
警方施放了毒气弹，把劫匪逼出了屋子。
Jǐngfāng shīfàng le dúqìdàn，bǎ jiéfěi bī chū le wūzi。
The police used poisonous gas to force the robbers out of the house.
这几间屋子是用隔板隔开的。
Zhè jǐ jiān wūzi shì yòng gébǎn gékāi de。
These rooms are partitioned with partition boards.
这间屋子的窗户太少，必须得安个换气扇。
Zhè jiān wūzi de chuānghu tài shǎo，bìxū děi ān gè huànqìshàn。
The room has too few windows. A ventilator must be installed.
因为打扫屋子，他把自己弄得灰头土脸的。
Yīnwéi dǎsǎo wūzi，tā bǎ zìjǐ nòng de huītóu tǔliǎn de。
He was covered with dirt because he just swept the room.
这个屋子里的东西太多了，叽里旮旯儿的地方都清扫不干净。
Zhège wūzi lǐ de dōngxi tài duō le，jīlǐgālár de dìfāng dōu qīngsǎo bùgānjìng。
There are so many things in this house that it\'s impossible to clean very nook and corner.
他屋子里的东西太多了，积案盈箱，连站的地方都没有了。
Tā wūzi lǐ de dōngxi tài duō le，jīàn yíngxiāng，lián zhàn de dìfāng dōu méiyǒu le。
There are too many books and documents stored in his house, almost leaving no room to stand.
屋子里的立柱是承重的，千万不能拆掉。
Wūzi lǐ de lìzhù shì chéngzhòng de，qiānwàn bùnéng chāidiào。
The erecting column in the room is to bear the weight of the room. You mustn\'t remove it.
这个屋子已经很久没人居住了，散发着霉气。
Zhège wūzi yǐjing hěnjiǔ méirén jūzhù le，sànfā zhe méiqì。
This house has not been lived in for a long time, so it smells mouldy.
屋子里散置着几把椅子，没有一个人。
Wūzi lǐ sǎnzhì zhe jǐ bǎ yǐzi，méiyǒu yígè rén。
Several chairs were placed dispersedly in the room. No one was in.
神婆不住地在屋子里跳神儿，口中还念念有词。
Shénpó búzhù de zài wūzi lǐ tiàoshénr，kǒu zhōng hái niànniàn yǒucí。
The witch kept on dancing in a trance in the room, and mumbled at the same time.
这只电灯功率太小了，屋子里只有一些微明！
Zhèzhī diàndēng gōnglǜ tài xiǎo le，wūzi lǐ zhǐyǒu yìxiē wēimíng！
The power of this light is too small, there is only very weak light in the room.
每次父亲生气的时候都会坐在屋子西头，沉默不语。
Měi cì fùqīn shēngqì de shíhou dōuhuì zuòzài wūzǐ xītóu，chénmò bùyǔ。
His father would sit at the west end of the house, and refused to speak everytime he was angry.
他把自己关在屋子里，谢却一切打扰。
Tā bǎ zìjǐ guān zài wūzi lǐ，xièquè yíqiè dǎrǎo。
He shuts himself in his room and allows no interruptions.
你们少抽点烟，满屋子的烟气谁受得了。
Nǐmen shǎo chōudiǎn yān，mǎn wūzi de yānqì shuí shòudéliǎo。
Smoke fewer cigarettes! Who can bear all the smoke in the room?
屋子里燕语莺声，她们在开舞会。
Wūzi lǐ yànyǔ yīngshēng，tāmen zài kāi wǔhuì。
The house is full of voices as pleasant as those of nightingales and swallows, they are holding a ball.
地震把屋子里的羊眼给震坏了。
Dìzhèn bǎ wūzi lǐ de yángyǎn gěi zhènhuài le。
The earthquake broke the screw eye in the house.
屋子正中挂着的爷爷的遗影足足有12寸。
Wūzi zhèng zhōng guà zhe de yéye de yíyǐng zúzú yǒu shí\'èrcùn。
My grandpa\'s portrait, which is hung in the center of the wall, is over twelve cun in size.
深夜，黝暗的屋子里伸手不见五指。
Shēnyè，yǒuàn de wūzi lǐ shēnshǒu bújiàn wǔzhǐ。
Late at night, nothing can be seen in the dark room.
由于没有灯，屋子黝黯异常，什么也看不到。
Yóuyú méiyǒu dēng，wūzi yǒuàn yìcháng，shénme yě kànbúdào。
As there is no light, the room is extremely dark and nothing can be seen.
屋子的四壁刷上了白色乳胶漆，看起来整洁干净。
Wūzi de sìbì shuā shàngle báisè rǔjiāoqī，kànqǐlái zhěngjié gānjìng。
The four walls of the house have been painted with white emulsion paint and now it looks clean and tidy.
屋子的角落里挂了很多蜘蛛网。
Wūzi de jiǎoluò lǐ guàle hěnduō zhīzhūwǎng.
There were a lot of spider webs in the corner of the room.
屋子久未整理，一片狼藉。
Wūzi jiǔ wèi zhěnglǐ，yípiànlángjí.
This room hasn\'t been tidied for ages – it\'s a complete mess.
屋子里
wūzilǐ
in the room
屋子里透出一丝亮光。
Wūzi lǐ tòuchū yìsī liàngguāng.
A ray of light shone through the room.
屋子里没人。
Wūzi lǐ méi rén.
There\'s no one in the room.
屋子里七零八落地放着一些书。
Wūzi lǐ qīlíngbāluò de fàngzhe yìxiē shū.
Books were scattered around the room.
屋子里暖暖的，睡觉真香！
Wūzi lǐ nuǎnnuǎn de，shuìjiào zhēn xiāng！
The room was very warm so I slept very soundly.
一屋子烟
Yì wūzi yān
full of smoke
我朝屋子里喊了两声，没人应。
Wǒ cháo wūzi lǐ hǎnle liǎngshēng，méirén yìng。
I shouted twice towards the room but no-one answered.
屋子被门帘遮掩着。
Wūzi bèi ménlián zhēyǎnzhe。
The room is obscured by a door curtain.
搬走一张桌子，屋里松快多了。
Bānzǒu yìzhāng zhuōzi，wūlǐ sōngkuai duō le。
With a desk moved out, there\'s much more space in the room.
我打算用这些木材来制作房屋的檩子。
Wǒ dǎsuàn yòng zhèxiē mùcái lái zhìzuò fángwū de lǐnzi。
I decided to make the houses frame out of lumber.
进屋一看，孩子不见了，她急眼了。
Jìnwū yí kàn，háizi bújiàn le，tā jíyǎn le。
When she came into the room and saw that her child was nowhere to be seen, she became very anxious.
雹子打在屋顶上乒乓乱响。
Báozi dǎzài wūdǐngshàng pīngpāngluànxiǎng。
Hailstones were rattling on the roofs.
别把孩子们整天关在屋里。
Bié bǎ háizimen zhěngtiān guān zài wūlǐ。
Don\'t keep the children inside all day.

The new room in my house is just wonderful.
Wǒ wūzi lǐ lìngwài de fángjiān fēicháng bàng。
我屋子里另外的房间非常棒。
Portia is remaining out in the still night rather than returning to the house.
Bōxīyà nìngyuàn zài jìjìng de yèlǐ dāizài wàibiān，yě búyuàn huí wū。
波西亚宁愿在寂静的夜里呆在外边，也不愿回屋。
他屋里的书一直摞到屋顶。
Tā wūlǐ de shū yìzhí luòdào wūdǐng。
The books in his room piled up to the ceiling.
重新刷了白粉，旧屋子就跟新屋一样亮堂。
Chóngxīn shuā le báifěn，jiùwūzi jiù gēn xīnwū yíyàng liàngtáng。
The house looks just like new after being painted.
我在里屋看书，忽听外屋妈妈叫我。
Wǒ zài lǐwū kànshū，hūtīng wàiwū māma jiào wǒ。
I was reading in the inner room, and heard my mother suddenly calling me from the outhouse.
矮小的房屋
ǎixiǎo de fángwū 
a small, low house
这间屋子光线太暗。
Zhè jiān wūzi guāngxiàn tài àn。
This room is too dark.
屋里灯光暗淡。
Wū li dēngguāng àndàn。
The room is dimly lit.
这间屋子摆布得十分雅致。
Zhè jiān wūzi bǎibu de shífēn yǎzhì。
The room is tastefully furnished.
屋里摆放着新家具。
Wū lǐ bǎifàng zhe xīn jiājù。
The room is furnished with new furniture.
屋子里摆设得很整齐。
Wūzi lǐ bǎishè de hěn zhěngqí。
The room is decorated neatly.
北屋
běi wū 
a room with a southern exposure
屋里太闷，憋得人透不过气来。
Wū lǐ tài mēn，biē de rén tòu búguò qì lái。
The room was so stuffy, one could hardly breathe.
他不声不响地走进屋来。
Tā bùshēngbùxiǎng de zǒujìn wū lái。
He slipped into the room without a word.
屋里不透气。
Wū li bú tòuqì。 
The room is stuffy.
老太太颤巍巍地走出屋来。
Lǎotàitai chànwēiwēi de zǒuchū wū lái。
The old lady came tottering out of her room.
这屋子太敞。
Zhè wūzi tài chǎng。
This room is too big.
这间屋子很敞亮。
Zhè jiān wūzi hěn chǎngliàng。
This room is light and spacious.
这间屋朝阳。
Zhè jiān wū cháoyáng。
The room has a southern exposure.
这屋子太潮。
Zhè wūzi tài cháo。
The room is too damp.
下了七八天雨，屋子里什么都是潮呼呼的。
Xià le qībā tiān yǔ，wūzi lǐ shénme dōushì cháohūhu de。
After a week\'s rain, everything in the house became damp and clammy.
这间屋子太潮湿，不适宜住人。
Zhè jiān wūzi tài cháoshī，bú shìyí zhù rén。
This room is too damp to live in.
屋子打扫得很彻底。
Wūzi dǎsǎo de hěn chèdǐ。
The room has been given a thorough cleaning.
屋子里陈设着几件工艺品。
Wūzi lǐ chénshè zhe jǐ jiàn gōngyìpǐn。
There is some artware set out in the room.
青藏高原素有世界屋脊之称。
Qīngzàng gāoyuán sùyǒu shìjiè wūjǐ zhī chēng。
The Qinghai-Xizang Plateau has long been known as the roof of the world.
这间屋子太小，盛不了这么多东西。
Zhè jiān wūzi tài xiǎo，chéngbu liǎo zhèmeduō dōngxi。
The room is too small to hold all these things.
冲塌房屋
chōngtā fángwū 
dash against the houses and wash them away
屋子里充满着阳光。
Wūzi lǐ chōngmǎn zhe yángguāng。
The room is full of sunshine.
房屋出租。
Fánɡwū chūzū。 
Houses to let.
那间屋子有这间两个大。
Nà jiān wūzi yǒu zhè jiān liǎnggè dà。
That roomis twice the size of this one.
她单独住一间屋子。
Tā dāndú zhù yìjiān wūzi。
She has a room to herself.
她把小孩儿倒锁在屋里，出门去买东西。
Tā bǎ xiǎoháir dào suǒ zài wū lǐ，chūmén qù mǎi dōngxi。
She locked her baby in the room and went shopping.
屋顶上的雪化了，滴答着水。
Wūdǐng shàng de xuě huà le，dida zhe shuǐ。
The snow on the roof melted and dripped down.
用房屋做抵
yòng fángwū zuò dǐ 
mortgage a house
这样叠床架屋，文章就太啰嗦了。
Zhèyàng diéchuángjiàwū，wénzhāng jiù tài luōsuo le。
So much needless repetition makes the article long-winded.
屋里顶多不过十个人。
Wū lǐ dǐngduō búguò shí gè rén。
There were at most ten people in the room.
他老是这么丢三落四的。你看，又把房门钥匙锁在屋子里了。
Tā lǎoshì zhème diūsānlàsì de。Nǐ kàn，yòu bǎ fángmén yàoshi suǒ zài wūzi lǐ le。
He\'s so scatterbrained. Look, he\'s locked his key inside his room again.
三间东倒西歪的屋子
sān jiān dōngdǎoxīwāi de wūzi
three tumbledown rooms
屋子里静悄悄的，一点动静也没有。
Wūzi lǐ jìngqiāoqiāo de，yìdiǎn dòngjìng yě méiyǒu。
It was quiet in the room, nothing was stirring.
这屋子很宽敞，而且光线充足。
Zhè wūzi hěn kuānchǎng，érqiě guāngxiàn chōngzú。
The room is spacious and bright.
翻修房屋
fānxiū fángwū
have the house rebuilt or renovated
白墙反光，屋里显得很敞亮。
Báiqiáng fǎnguāng，wūlǐ xiǎnde hěn chǎngliàng。

把一间屋隔成两间
Bǎ yìjiānwū géchéng liǎngjiān
partition a room into two
房屋的骨架
fángwū de gǔjià
the framework of a house
别把孩子们整天关在屋里。
Bié bǎ háizimen zhěngtiān guān zài wūlǐ。
Don\'t keep the children inside all day.
这间屋子光线不够。
Zhè jiān wūzi guāngxiàn bú gòu。
There\'s not enough light in this room.
屋子不大，收拾得倒还干净。
Wūzi bú dà，shōushi de dào hái gānjìng。
The room is small, but it\'s kept quite tidy.
从屋里传来连续不断的鼾声。
Cóngwūlǐ chuánlái liánxù búduàn de hānshēng。
The continuous sound of snoring was heard from the room.
屋子里黑糊糊的。
Wūzi lǐ hēihūhū de。
It\'s rather dark in the room.
屋子里横七竖八地堆放着许多杂物。
Wūzi lǐ héngqīshùbā de duīfàng zhe xǔduō zá wù。
The room was cluttered with all sorts of things.
买卖房屋的任何一方不得轰撵住户搬家。
Mǎimài fángwū de rènhé yì fāngbùdé hōngniǎn zhùhù bān jiā。
Both parties to a housing-contract are forbidden to evict the current occupant of the house.
屋后
wū hòu
behind (or at the back of) a house
我恍惚听见他进屋去了。
Wǒ huǎnghū tīngjiàn tā jìn wū qù le。
I was faintly aware that he entered the room.
他走出了屋子，回手把门带上。
Tā zǒuchū le wūzi，huíshǒu bǎ mén dàishàng。
He went out of the room and closed the door behind him.
太阳下山了，屋里渐渐昏暗起来。
Tàiyángxiàshān le，wūlǐ jiànjiàn hūn\'àn qǐlái。
The sun was setting, and the room was getting darker and darker.
房子起了火，火舌正在吞没屋顶。
Fángzi qǐ le huǒ，huǒshé zhèngzài tūnmò wūdǐng。
The flames were licking the roof of the burning building.
这屋子又干净，又豁亮。
Zhè wūzi yòu gānjìng，yòu huòliàng。
The room is clean, bright and spacious.
屋子犄角里有一个衣架。
Wūzi jījiǎo lǐ yǒu yígè yījià。
A clothes tree stands in a corner of the room.
进屋一看，孩子不见了，她急眼了。
Jìnwū yí kàn，háizi bújiàn le，tā jíyǎn le。
When she came into the room and saw that her child was nowhere to be seen, she became very anxious.
小屋挤不下那么多人。
Xiǎo wū jǐ bu xià nàme duō rén。
It\'s impossible to pack so many people into the small room.
这间屋子既宽敞，又亮堂。
Zhè jiān wūzi jì kuānchang，yòu liàngtang。
The room is both light and spacious.

sì jiān wūzi

jìn wū

Jìn wū lái ba，wàimiàn tài lěng le。

屋子近旁
wūzi jìnpáng

Wūzi lǐ jìngqiāoqiāo de。

这间屋子可以住四个人。
Zhè jiān wūzi kěyǐ zhù sì gè rén。

这间屋子很宽绰。
Zhè jiān wūzi hěn kuānchuo。
The room is spacious.
他发现一个形迹可疑的人向屋内窥视。
Tā fāxiàn yígè xíngjì kěyí de rén xiàng wū nèi kuīshì。
He spotted a suspicious character peeping into the house.
这屋子老不住人，有股霉味儿。
Zhè wūzi lǎo bú zhù rén，yǒu gǔ méiwèir。
This room has been left vacant for a long time, so there is a mouldy smell.
屋子里里外外都打扫得很干净。
Wūzi lǐlǐwàiwài dōu dǎsǎo de hěn gānjìng。
The house has been given a thorough cleaning inside and out.
屋里很亮。
Wū li hěn liànɡ。 
The room is very bright.
屋子里亮着灯光。
Wūzi lǐ liàng zhe dēngguāng。
Lights were shining in the room.
这屋子又宽敞又亮堂。
Zhè wūzi yòu kuānchǎngyòu liàngtang。
The room is light and spacious.
他趔趄着走进屋来。
Tā lièqie zhe zǒu jìn wū lái。
He staggered into the room.
房屋出赁
fánɡwū chū lìn 
house to let
零七八碎的东西放满了一屋子。
Língqībāsuì de dōngxi fàngmǎn le yì wūzi。
The room is cluttered up with all kinds of things.
屋里很乱，请你把它收拾一下。
Wū lǐ hěn luàn，qǐng nǐ bǎ tā shōushi yíxià。

他的屋子乱七八糟的。
Tā de wūzi luànqībāzāo de。

屋子里乱糟糟的。
Wūzi lǐ luànzāozāo de。
The room is in a mess.
天麻麻黑了，屋里逐渐模糊起来。
Tiān māmahēi le，wūlǐ zhújiàn móhu qǐlái。
As dusk fell, the room got dimmer and dimmer.
这下可麻烦了，我把钥匙锁在屋里了。
Zhè xià kě máfan le，wǒ bǎ yàoshi suǒ zài wūlǐ le。
What a nuisance. I\'ve locked my key in the room.
看你那股埋汰劲，不许你进屋。
Kàn nǐ nà gǔ máitaijìn，bùxǔ nǐ jìnwū。
Look, how dirty you are! You can\'t go inside.
他忙从里屋出来。
Tā mánɡ cónɡ lǐwū chūlái。
He came hurrying out of the inner room.
屋里没有人。
Wū lǐ méiyǒu rén。

这间屋子没有十平方米。
Zhè jiān wūzi méiyǒu shí píngfāngmǐ。
This room is not more than 10 metres square.
开开窗吧，屋里太闷了。
Kāikai chuāngba，wūlǐ tài mēn le。
Open the windows. It\'s too stuffy in here.
别老闷在屋里看书，出来活动活动。
Bié lǎo mēn zài wūlǐ kànshū，chūlái huódònghuódòng。
Don\'t shut yourself indoors reading all day long. Come outside and stretch your legs.
闷屋子住着憋气。
Mènwūzi zhù zhe biēqì。
I feel suffocated in a tightly closed room.
南屋
nán wū
a room with a northern exposure
这屋里太闹。
Zhè wūlǐ tài nào。
This room is too noisy.
炉子一着，屋子就暖和了。
Lúzi yì zháo，wūzi jiù nuǎnhé le。
The room became warm when the fire got going.
屋里有火，快进来暖和暖和吧！
Wū lǐ yǒu huǒ，kuài jìnlái nuǎnhe nuǎnhe ba。
There is a fire in here; come in and warm yourself up.
雹子打在屋顶上乒乓乱响。
Báozi dǎzài wūdǐngshàng pīngpāngluànxiǎng。
Hailstones were rattling on the roofs.
小屋很破陋。
Xiǎowū hěn pòlòu。
The hut is dilapidated.
屋子外面漆黑一片。
Wūzi wàimiàn qīhēi yí piàn。
Outside the house it was pitch-black.
他冲进屋去，气吁吁地报告了这消息。
Tā chōngjìn wū qù，qìxūxū de bàogào le zhè xiāoxi。
He dashed into the room and gasped out the message.
他在窗外窃听屋里人谈话。
Tā zài chuānɡ wài qiètīnɡ wū li rén tánhuà。
He hid just outside the window and eavesdropped on the conversation going on inside the room.

qióngxíng de wūdǐng
a vaulted roof

Wū lǐ yípiàn luàn rāngrang。

把客人让进里屋
bǎ kèrén ràngjìn lǐwū

Lúhuǒ hěn wàng，wūlǐ rèhōnghōng de。

我们把屋子拾掇一下。
Wǒmen bǎ wūzi shíduō yíxià。

那儿的房屋是木头的。
Nàr de fángwū shì mùtou de。

收拾屋子
shōushi wūzi

这屋子阴，东西容易受潮。
Zhè wūzi yīn，dōngxi róngyì shòucháo。
The room gets no sun and things easily become damp.
这时满屋子的人又说又笑，兴高采烈。
Zhè shí mǎn wūzi de rén yòu shuō yòu xiào，xìnggāocǎiliè。
The room was then full of people chatting animatedly and laughing.
搬走一张桌子，屋里松快多了。
Bānzǒu yìzhāng zhuōzi，wūlǐ sōngkuai duō le。
With a desk moved out, there\'s much more space in the room.
屋里太闷热，出去松散松散吧。
Wūlǐ tài mēnrè，chūqù sōngsan sōngsan ba。

屋宇邃密。
Wūyǔ suìmì。

这屋里不通风。
Zhè wūlǐ bùtōngfēng。

Wūzi tài mēn le，dǎkāi chuāngzi tòutouqì。

屋中炉火烧得正旺。
Wū zhōng lúhuǒ shāo de zhèngwàng。

Shùyīn dǐxià bǐ wūzi lǐ yào liángkuài xiē。

Yì wūzi de rén dōu huānténgqǐlái。

Cháoběi de wūzi tài yìn。

屋里有人吗？

gěi mǒurén yúnduì yìjiān wūzi

Zhèfúhuà gěi zhè jiān wūzi zēngsè bùshǎo。

Zhè wūzi zhí lǐ yǒu liù mǐ，hénglǐ yǒu sān mǐ。
The room is 6 metres in length and 3 in width.
我住这间屋。
Wǒ zhù zhè jiān wū。

黑屋子
hēiwūzi
a dark room
堂屋
tángwū
central room (of a one-storey Chinese traditional house consisting of several rooms in a row)
那个人拿着板刀从屋里冲了出来。
Nàge rén ná zhe bǎndāo cóng wūlǐ chōng le chūlái。
The man rushed out of  the room with a broadsword in his hand.
收拾房间时，妈妈将杂物放在屋子的背角处。
Shōushí fángjiān shí，māma jiāng záwù fàngzài wūzi de bèijiǎochù。
When cleaning the room, Mother put the odds and ends in the unnoticed corner of the house.
阳光洒在屋前的冰挂上，折射出七彩眩光。
Yángguāng sǎ zài wūqián de bīngguà shàng，zhéshèchū qīcǎi xuànguāng。
The sun shines on the glazed ice, and reflects wonderful colors.
屋檐下挂了许多冰溜，孩子们可喜欢了。
Wūyán xià guà le xǔduō bīngliū，háizimen kě xǐhuan le。
There are many icicles hanging under the roof, which is loved by the children.
这个饼屋在附近很有名气。
Zhège bǐngwū zài fùjìn hěnyǒu míngqì。
This cake shop is famous in the neighborhood.
老屋子里的这把太师椅已经残旧不堪。
Lǎowūzi lǐ de zhè bǎ tàishīyǐ yǐjing cánjiù bùkān。
This armchair in the old house is old and broken.
摄影师正在屋子里测光。
Shèyǐngshī zhèngzài wūzi lǐ cèguāng。
The photographer is measuring the brightness of his object in the room.
场屋里堆满了农具。
Chǎngwū lǐ duīmǎn le nóngjù。
The room in the yard is stacked with farming tools.
屋子里吵吵嚷嚷，秩序混乱。
Wūzi lǐ chǎochǎorǎngrǎng，zhìxù hùnluàn。
The atmosphere in the room is extremely chaotic.
深山中的这座小屋真是个与尘嚣隔绝的好地方。
Shēnshān zhōng de zhèzuò xiǎowū zhēn shì gè yǔ chénxiāo géjué de hǎo dìfāng。
The hut is hidden on a remote mountain, and is really a good place to escape from busy city life.
为防止雨天漏雨，爸爸重修了家里的屋顶。
Wéi fángzhǐ yǔtiān lòuyǔ，bàba chóngxiū le jiā lǐ de wūdǐng。
Father repaired the roof of our house again, to prevent leaks in rainy days.
今天早晨我用吸尘器把屋里抽吸得很干净。
Jīntiān zǎochén wǒ yòng xīchénqì bǎ wūlǐ chōuxī de hěngānjìng。
This morning I thoroughly cleaned the room with a dust catcher.
这屋里臭乎乎的，什么味啊？
Zhè wūlǐ chòuhūhū de，shénme wèi a？
The house stinks, what is that smell?
他用手指捅了个窗眼，偷看屋里人的情况。
Tā yòng shǒuzhǐ tǒng le gè chuāngyǎn，tōukàn wūlǐ rén de qíngkuàng。
He poked a hole in the window with his finger and peeped at the people inside.
安静的屋子，突然传来了絛彫的声音。
Ānjìng de wūzi，tūrán chuánlái le tāodiāo de shēngyīn。
Suddenly a swishing sound came out of the quiet room.
工人们正在修缮这座寺院的大屋顶。
Gōngrénmen zhèngzài xiūshàn zhèzuò sìyuàn de dàwūdǐng。
The workers are repairing the roof of the temple.
满屋子都是烟，是不是烟筒倒烟了？
Mǎnwūzi dōushì yān，shìbushì yāntǒng dàoyān le？
The air is chocking in here. Is smoke coming in from the chimney?
由于年代久远，这个房屋的地基开始低陷了。
Yóuyú niándài jiǔyuǎn，zhège fángwū de dìjī kāishǐ dīxiàn le。
The foundations of this house are beginning to sink due to its old age.
屋里太冷了，我要去买一个电暖器。
Wū lǐ tài lěng le，wǒ yào qù mǎi yígè diànnuǎnqì。
It\'s too cold in the room. I\'ll buy an electric heater.
据说有人在这间屋子里看见过吊死鬼。
Jùshuō yǒurén zài zhè jiān wūzi lǐ kànjiàn guò diàosǐguǐ。
It is said that some people have seen ghosts of people who hanged themselves.
警方施放了毒气弹，把劫匪逼出了屋子。
Jǐngfāng shīfàng le dúqìdàn，bǎ jiéfěi bī chū le wūzi。
The police used poisonous gas to force the robbers out of the house.
在房屋设计装修时，卫生间一定要留有风道。
Zài fángwū shèjì zhuāngxiū shí，wèishēngjiān yídìng yào liúyǒu fēngdào。
When designing the house, the toilet must be equipped with ventilation equipment.
这几间屋子是用隔板隔开的。
Zhè jǐ jiān wūzi shì yòng gébǎn gékāi de。
These rooms are partitioned with partition boards.
他们家房子特别紧张，一家五口共居在一间十几平米的小屋里。
Tāmen jiā fángzi tèbié jǐnzhāng，yìjiā wǔ kǒu gòngjū zài yìjiān shí jǐ píngmǐ de xiǎowū lǐ。
Their home is especially packed.  All five familie members live together in a room of less than 20 square meters.
老城区的房屋管线老化较严重，我们要集中力量进行一次维修更新。
Lǎochéngqū de fángwū guǎnxiàn lǎohuà jiào yánzhòng，wǒmen yào jí zhōng lìliang jìnxíng yícì wéixiū gēngxīn。
The pipes and power lines of the old city area are aging seriously. We should concentrate all efforts on maintaining them and replace them with new ones if necessary.
我家的合家欢就挂在里屋的墙上。
Wǒjiā de héjiāhuān jiù guàzài lǐwū de qiáng shàng。
Our family picture is hung on the wall of the inner room.
这间屋子的窗户太少，必须得安个换气扇。
Zhè jiān wūzi de chuānghu tài shǎo，bìxū děi ān gè huànqìshàn。
The room has too few windows. A ventilator must be installed.
他购买了许多灰膏准备新建房屋。
Tā gòumǎi le xǔduō huīgāo zhǔnbèi xīnjiàn fángwū。
She bought a lot of white lime, preparing to build a new house.
因为打扫屋子，他把自己弄得灰头土脸的。
Yīnwéi dǎsǎo wūzi，tā bǎ zìjǐ nòng de huītóu tǔliǎn de。
He was covered with dirt because he just swept the room.
这个屋子里的东西太多了，叽里旮旯儿的地方都清扫不干净。
Zhège wūzi lǐ de dōngxi tài duō le，jīlǐgālár de dìfāng dōu qīngsǎo bùgānjìng。
There are so many things in this house that it\'s impossible to clean very nook and corner.
他屋子里的东西太多了，积案盈箱，连站的地方都没有了。
Tā wūzi lǐ de dōngxi tài duō le，jīàn yíngxiāng，lián zhàn de dìfāng dōu méiyǒu le。
There are too many books and documents stored in his house, almost leaving no room to stand.
在建盖房屋墙壁时对墙面的基底是有要求的。
Zài jiàngài fángwū qiángbì shí duì qiángmiàn de jīdǐ shì yǒu yāoqiú de。
When walls are built, their foundations must meet certain standards
当房屋架起脊檩，建房者会举行庆祝仪式。
Dāng fángwū jiàqǐ jǐlǐn，jiànfángzhě huì jǔxíng qìngzhù yíshì。
When ridge-poles are put up in a house, its owner will hold a celebration.
这间小木屋建盖在湫隘的山谷里。
Zhè jiān xiǎomùwū jiàngài zài jiǎoài de shāngǔ lǐ。
The hut is built in a narrow and low-lying valley.
路边的这家食品精品屋是我开的。
Lùbiān de zhè jiā shípǐn jīngpǐnwū shì wǒ kāi de。
I run this roadside food stall.
狂涛一阵一阵地袭来，海边的茅草屋眼看要被淹没了。
Kuángtāo yízhèn yí zhèn de xílái，hǎibiān de máocǎowū yǎnkàn yào bèi yānmò le。
Raging waves are sweeping the seashore; the thatched hut at the seaside will be submerged soon.
快把客人让到里间屋里暖和暖和。
Kuài bǎ kèrén ràng dào lǐjiān wūlǐ nuǎnhé nuǎnhé。
Lead the guests to the inner room to quickly warm up.
屋里头明明没人了，怎么还有动静呢？
Wū lǐtóu míngmíng méi rén le，zěnme háiyǒu dòngjìng ne？
Obviously there are no people in the room, but why is there noise there?
屋子里的立柱是承重的，千万不能拆掉。
Wūzi lǐ de lìzhù shì chéngzhòng de，qiānwàn bùnéng chāidiào。
The erecting column in the room is to bear the weight of the room. You mustn\'t remove it.
我打算用这些木材来制作房屋的檩子。
Wǒ dǎsuàn yòng zhèxiē mùcái lái zhìzuò fángwū de lǐnzi。
I decided to make the houses frame out of lumber.
拉开窗帘，流光照进屋里。
Lākāi chuānglián，liúguāng zhàojìn wū lǐ。
Moonlight fills the room after the curtain is pulled open.
他将圣母玛利亚的肖像挂在屋内。
Tā jiāng shèngmǔ Mǎlìyà de xiāo xiàng guàzài wū nèi。
He hangs the picture of Holy Mary in the room.
这个屋子已经很久没人居住了，散发着霉气。
Zhège wūzi yǐjing hěnjiǔ méirén jūzhù le，sànfā zhe méiqì。
This house has not been lived in for a long time, so it smells mouldy.
屋顶上的明瓦，经过岁月的打磨已经不那么透明了。
Wūdǐng shàng de míngwǎ，jīngguò suìyuè de dǎmó yǐjing bú nàme tòumíng le。
The translucent tiles on the roof are no longer as transparent as before due to years of wear.
老屋的排杈儿用料很好，就是上边的纸太破旧了。
Lǎowū de páichàr yòngliào hěnhǎo，jiùshì shàngbiān de zhǐ tài pòjiù le。
The partitions of the old house are of good quality, but the paper on them is old and worn.
父母正房东侧的那个披屋，就是她的房间。
Fùmǔ zhèngfáng dōngcè de nàge pīwū，jiùshì tā de fángjiān。
The room to the west of her parents\' principal room is hers.
村民全都搬迁走了，这里只留下了几座圮塌的破屋。
Cūnmín quándōu bānqiān zǒu le，zhèlǐ zhǐ liúxià le jǐ zuò pǐtā de pòwū。
All the villagers have moved away, only several collapsing houses remain.
他气哼哼地把包一扔就进屋了。
Tā qìhēngheng de bǎ bāo yìrēng jiù jìn wū le。
He shook off his bag and entered the room angrily.
他气咻咻地跑进屋，一头栽倒在床上就大哭起来。
Tā qìxiūxiū de pǎo jìn wū，yī tóu zāidǎo zài chuáng shàng jiù dàkū qǐlái。
He rushed into the house angrily, dropped onto the bed and cried loudly.
没有契税证的房屋是不能进行二手房交易的。
Méiyǒu qìshuìzhèng de fángwū shì bùnéng jìnxíng èrshǒufáng jiāoyì de。
Houses without a contract tax certificate cannot be exchanged in the second-hand house market.
她在小区的布告栏里贴出了求售房屋的广告。
Tā zài xiǎoqū de bùgàolán lǐ tiēchū le qiúshòu fángwū de guǎnggào。
She posted an advertisement seeking a house on the housing estate\'s bulletin board.
屋子里散置着几把椅子，没有一个人。
Wūzi lǐ sǎnzhì zhe jǐ bǎ yǐzi，méiyǒu yígè rén。
Several chairs were placed dispersedly in the room. No one was in.
我要用这些泥灰苫背屋顶。
Wǒ yào yòng zhèxiē níhuī shànbèi wūdǐng。
I will lay the foundation of the roof with the marl.
这一带民居的屋顶都使用深灰色的瓦片。
Zhèyídài mínjū de wūdǐng dōu shǐyòng shēn huīsè de wǎpiàn。
Dark gray tiles are used on the roof of ordinary people\'s houses in this neighborhood.
神婆不住地在屋子里跳神儿，口中还念念有词。
Shénpó búzhù de zài wūzi lǐ tiàoshénr，kǒu zhōng hái niànniàn yǒucí。
The witch kept on dancing in a trance in the room, and mumbled at the same time.
房屋年久失修，墙面有点渗水。
Fángwū niánjiǔ shīxiū，qiángmiàn yǒu diǎn shènshuǐ。
Some water comes through the walls because the house hasn\'t been repaired for a long time.
在这样的草屋中看着远处的青山，真有一番天趣。
Zài zhèyàng de cǎowū zhōng kàn zhe yuǎnchù de qīngshān，zhēn yǒu yìfān tiānqù。
It\'s so much fun to look at the faraway mountains from a straw house like this one.
有铁将军把门，看来咱们不能进屋了。
Yǒu tiějiāngjūn bǎmén，kànlái zánmen bùnéng jìnwū le。
There\'s the door lock, I\'m afraid we won\'t be able to enter the house.
屋顶漏雨了，我去买点望砖来修一修。
Wūdǐng lòuyǔ le，wǒ qù mǎi diǎn wàngzhuān lái xiūyixiū。
The roof is leaking, I\'ll go to buy some sheathing tiles to cover it.
这只电灯功率太小了，屋子里只有一些微明！
Zhèzhī diàndēng gōnglǜ tài xiǎo le，wūzi lǐ zhǐyǒu yìxiē wēimíng！
The power of this light is too small, there is only very weak light in the room.
爷爷家老宅的屋顶两端有吻兽。
Yéye jiā lǎozhái de wūdǐng liǎngduān yǒu wěnshòu。
There are decorative animal sculptures on the two sides of the roof of my grandfather\'s house.
屋基务必要打牢一点，否则盖好的房子也不会结实！
Wūjī wùbì yào dǎ láo yìdiǎn，fǒuzé gàihǎo de fángzi yě bùhuì jiēshi！
The groundsill should be firm, otherwise the house would be unstable.
小张有每天晚上坐在屋角温习功课的习惯。
Xiǎo Zhāng yǒu měitiān wǎnshàng zuòzài wūjiǎo wēnxí gōngkè de xíguàn。
Xiao Zhang always revises his lessons at the corner of the house every evening.
中国古代皇室的屋宇总是非常气派的。
Zhōngguó gǔdài huángshì de wūyǔ zǒngshì fēicháng qìpài de。
The imperial residence is always very grand.
每次父亲生气的时候都会坐在屋子西头，沉默不语。
Měi cì fùqīn shēngqì de shíhou dōuhuì zuòzài wūzǐ xītóu，chénmò bùyǔ。
His father would sit at the west end of the house, and refused to speak everytime he was angry.
我们住在森林小屋里，夏夜总能听到片片蛙声。
Wǒmen zhùzài sēnlín xiǎowūlǐ，xiàyè zǒngnéng tīngdào piànpiàn wāshēng。
We live in a hut in the woods.  On summer nights, we can always hear the croak of frogs.
他把自己关在屋子里，谢却一切打扰。
Tā bǎ zìjǐ guān zài wūzi lǐ，xièquè yíqiè dǎrǎo。
He shuts himself in his room and allows no interruptions.
有一只小燕子正在我家的屋檐下絮窝。
Yǒu yìzhī xiǎoyànzi zhèngzài wǒjiā de wūyán xià xùwō。
A little swallow has made a nest under my eaves.
你们少抽点烟，满屋子的烟气谁受得了。
Nǐmen shǎo chōudiǎn yān，mǎn wūzi de yānqì shuí shòudéliǎo。
Smoke fewer cigarettes! Who can bear all the smoke in the room?
屋子里燕语莺声，她们在开舞会。
Wūzi lǐ yànyǔ yīngshēng，tāmen zài kāi wǔhuì。
The house is full of voices as pleasant as those of nightingales and swallows, they are holding a ball.
地震把屋子里的羊眼给震坏了。
Dìzhèn bǎ wūzi lǐ de yángyǎn gěi zhènhuài le。
The earthquake broke the screw eye in the house.
屋子正中挂着的爷爷的遗影足足有12寸。
Wūzi zhèng zhōng guà zhe de yéye de yíyǐng zúzú yǒu shí\'èrcùn。
My grandpa\'s portrait, which is hung in the center of the wall, is over twelve cun in size.
乙方按规定给付租金，甲方必须将房屋租给乙方居住。
Yǐfāng àn guīdìng gěifù zūjīn，jiǎfāng bìxū jiāng fángwū zūgěi yǐfāng jūzhù。
Party B pays rent to Party A according to the contract, Party A should rent his house out to Party B.
深夜，黝暗的屋子里伸手不见五指。
Shēnyè，yǒuàn de wūzi lǐ shēnshǒu bújiàn wǔzhǐ。
Late at night, nothing can be seen in the dark room.
由于没有灯，屋子黝黯异常，什么也看不到。
Yóuyú méiyǒu dēng，wūzi yǒuàn yìcháng，shénme yě kànbúdào。
As there is no light, the room is extremely dark and nothing can be seen.
过去，女人只能在灶屋吃饭。
Guòqù，nǚrén zhǐnéng zài zàowū chī fàn。
In the past, women were only allowed to eat in the kitchen.
看见一屋的长亲，他感到了前所未有的压力。
Kànjiàn yì wū de zhǎngqīn，tā gǎndào le qiánsuǒ wèiyǒu de yālì。
Looking at the room filled with senior relatives, he felt greater pressure than ever before.
从空中可以看到房屋鳞次栉比地排列着。
Cóng kōng zhōng kěyǐ kàndào fángwū líncìzhìbǐ de páiliè zhe。
Seen from the air, the buildings are in tight rows.
看着老屋里的点点滴滴，他追思着在这里度过的童年。
Kàn zhe lǎowūlǐ de diǎndiǎndīdī，tā zhuīsī zhe zài zhèlǐ dùguò de tóngnián。
Looking at the trivial things in the old house, he reminsced about his childhood spent there.
他饶有闲趣地在自己的小屋前自斟自酌。
Tā ráoyǒu xiánqù de zài zìjǐ de xiǎo wū qián zìzhēn zìzhuó。
He is leisurely drinking by himself in front of his small house.
电灯泡突然熄灭了，屋里一片漆黑。
Diàndēngpào tūrán xīmiè le，wūlǐ yípiàn qīhēi。
The light bulb suddenly went out, and the room became pitch black.
买卖双方要交纳百分之三的间接税给房屋中介公司。
Mǎimài shuāngfāng yào jiāonà bǎifēn zhī sān de jiānjiēshuì gěi fángwū zhōng jiè gōngsī。
The buyer and seller are obliged to pay an indirect tax amounting to 3% of the price of the house to the real estate company.
我家房屋的居住面积为90㎡。
Wǒjiā fángwū de jūzhù miànjī wéi jiǔshí píngfāngmǐ。
The residential area of my house is 90 square meters.
屋子的四壁刷上了白色乳胶漆，看起来整洁干净。
Wūzi de sìbì shuā shàngle báisè rǔjiāoqī，kànqǐlái zhěngjié gānjìng。
The four walls of the house have been painted with white emulsion paint and now it looks clean and tidy.
他真是爱屋及乌，竟然喜欢上了女友听的音乐。
Tā zhēnshì àiwūjíwū，jìngrán xǐhuanshàngle nǚyǒu tīngde yīnyuè。
This really is a case of love me, love my dog. Now he\'s suddenly started to like his girlfriend\'s music.
总呆在屋里憋得慌。
Zǒng dāizài wūlǐ biēdehuāng。
Staying indoors all day will make you feel absolutely suffocated.
我公司承揽房屋装修业务。
Wǒgōngsī chénglǎn fángwūzhuāngxiū yèwù。
My company\'s contracted to do the decorating work.
写文章切忌叠床架屋。
Xiěwénzhāng qièjì diéchuángjiàwū。
When you write an essay you should avoid repeating yourself.
她正在屋里东找西翻。
Tā zhèngzài wūlǐ dōngzhǎoxīfān。
She is rummaging around in her room.
建筑房屋
jiànzhù fángwū
build houses
屋子的角落里挂了很多蜘蛛网。
Wūzi de jiǎoluò lǐ guàle hěnduō zhīzhūwǎng.
There were a lot of spider webs in the corner of the room.
飓风把房屋卷走了。
Jùfēng bǎ fángwū juǎnzǒule.
The hurricane swept the house away.
屋子久未整理，一片狼藉。
Wūzi jiǔ wèi zhěnglǐ，yípiànlángjí.
This room hasn\'t been tidied for ages – it\'s a complete mess.
里屋
lǐwū
inner room
屋子里
wūzilǐ
in the room
屋子里透出一丝亮光。
Wūzi lǐ tòuchū yìsī liàngguāng.
A ray of light shone through the room.
房屋出赁
fángwū chū lìn
room for rent
屋子里没人。
Wūzi lǐ méi rén.
There\'s no one in the room.
屋子里七零八落地放着一些书。
Wūzi lǐ qīlíngbāluò de fàngzhe yìxiē shū.
Books were scattered around the room.
先把客人让进屋
xiān bǎ kèrén ràng jìn wū
invite guests to enter a room first
屋里家具太少。
Wū lǐ jiājù tài shǎo。
There is very little furniture in the room.
屋子里暖暖的，睡觉真香！

Sounds wafted into the room.

四坡屋顶有倾斜的断点，没有山墙。

那儿的房屋是木头的。

The houses there are built of wood.

mini-story

声波
shēngbō
sound wave; acoustic wave

这名歌手的声音波动起伏。
The only noise was the chop of the waves against the side of the boat.

The airwaves carry the sound.

空气波动传递声音。

共振空腔发出的声音不可能是谐波响应的唯一决定因素。

seething (or turbulent) waves
风波迭起。
Fēngbō diéqǐ。
Disturbances arose repeatedly.
平地起风波
píngdì qǐ fēngbō
a storm out of nowhere

Yībāyīsì nián Bōpáng wángcháo zài Fǎguó fùbì。

gòngzhèn shìbōqì 

bōlàng pāidǎzhe chuánxián

Dàhǎi zhōng bōtāopéngpài。

Xiǎochuán suíbō piāodànɡ。

一场风波平息了。
Yìcháng fēngbō píngxī le。
The tumult has subsided. or The trouble is over.
德国入侵波兰是第二次世界大战的前奏。
Déguó rùqīn Bōlán shì Dì Èr Cì Shìjiè Dàzhàn de qiánzòu。
The German invasion of Poland was a prelude to World War II.
清风徐来，水波不兴。
Qīngfēng xú lái，shuǐbō bùxīng。
A cool breeze blew gently, without starting a ripple.
暗送秋波
ànsòngqiūbō
(of a woman) cast amorous glances; make eyes; ogle
这家航空公司目前正在用波音747取代DC10。
Zhèjiā hángkōng gōngsī mùqián zhèngzài yòng bōyīn qīsìqī qǔdài DC shí。

bōlànɡ tāotiān

Yǒu de xǐfà xiāngbō néngqù tóuxiè。

煽风点火，推波助澜，极尽挑拨离间之能事

the Persian Gulf

bōtāo xiōnɡxiōnɡ

Who could have thought that a trivial matter would cause such a stir (or cause so much agitation)?

中缅两国之间的胞波友谊不断得到发展和巩固。
Zhōng Miǎn liǎngguó zhījiān de bāobō yǒuyì búduàn dédào fāzhǎn hé gǒnggù。
The friendship between China and Myanmar is continuing to deepen over time.
他站在岸边，呆呆地望着荡漾的碧波。
Tā zhàn zài ànbiān，dāidāi de wàng zhe dàngyàng de bìbō。
He stood by the bank of the river, staring blankly at the ripples in the water.
他用微波炉化开了冰硬的鱼。
Tā yòng wēibōlú huàkāi le bīngyìng de yú。
He put the frozen fish in the micro-wave oven to defrost.
望着波光粼粼的湖面，他心中无限感慨。
Wàng zhe bōguāng línlín de húmiàn，tā xīn zhōng wúxiàn gǎnkǎi。
Looking at the shining ripples of the lake, he was overwhelmed by a thousand emotions.
他新买的裙子，裙摆是波浪形的。
Tā xīnmǎi de qúnzi，qúnbǎi shì bōlàngxíng de。
The newly bought skirt has a wave-like shape.
波罗蜜果实的重量可大于10公斤。
Bōluómì guǒshí de zhòngliàng kě dàyú shígōngjīn。
A pineapple can weigh up to 10 kilograms.
他念了一句“波罗蜜”，就离开了。
Tā niàn le yíjù“bōluómì”，jiù líkāi le。
He muttered “sanckrit” and left.
波斯菊又名秋英，原产于墨西哥。
Bōsījú yòumíng qiūyīng,yuánchǎn yú Mòxīgē.
Calliopsis is also named as “qiuying”, and originally grew in Mexico.
根据心电图的波形来看，他的心脏没有问题。
Gēnjù xīndiàntú de bōxíng lái kàn，tā de xīnzàng méiyǒu wèntí。
The shape of the waves on his cardiogram shows that he has no heart problems.
超声波技术已经被广泛应用于工程测量。
Chāoshēngbō jìshù yǐjing bèi guǎngfàn yìngyòngyú gōngchéng cèliáng。
Ultrasonic technology has been widely used in engineering surveys.
他接受了一次超声波浴，现在感觉好多了。
Tā jiēshòu le yícì chāoshēngbōyù，xiànzài gǎnjué hǎo duō le。
Now he feels much better after an ultrasonic shower.
科学家正在研究这种冲击波是如何形成的。
Kēxuéjiā zhèngzài yánjiū zhèzhǒng chōngjībō shì rúhé xíngchéng de。
Scientists are now studying how the shock wave was formed.
假帐所造成的冲击波正对该公司的发展产生致命的影响。
Jiǎzhàng suǒ zàochéng de chōngjībō zhèng duì gāi gōngsī de fāzhǎn chǎnshēng zhìmìng de yǐngxiǎng。
The shock wave from the fraudulent accounting scandal has had a lethal effect on the company\'s development.
倒阁风波渐渐平息了。
Dǎogé fēngbō jiànjiàn píngxī le。
The disturbance from the down fall of the cabinet has been gradually quelled.
我所在的部队向敌阵发起了一波猛烈地攻击。

My army is launching a fierce attack on the enemy position.
这个仪器可以检测到微弱的地波。
Zhège yíqì kěyǐ jiǎncè dào wēiruò de dēbō。
This instrument can detect weak surface waves.
地震发生的时候会发出横向和纵向两种地震波。
Dìzhèn fāshēng de shíhou huì fāchū héng xiàng hé zòng xiàng liǎngzhǒng dìzhènbō。
When earthquakes happen, two kinds of earthquake waves spread, a horizontal one and a vertical one.
海面上波涛翻涌，看来台风快来了！
Hǎimiàn shàng bōtāo fānyǒng，kàn lái táifēng kuài lái le！
The billowing waves on the sea indicate a forthcoming hurricane.
机械波的形成需要振源和介质。
Jīxièbō de xíngchéng xūyào zhènyuán hé jièzhì。
A vibration source and a medium are needed to form a mechanical wave.

Jīchǎng xīnmǎi de bōyīn fēijī míngtiān jiējī。
The airport will sent someone to pick up the new aircraft tomorrow.
她的头发冷烫过了，一个个大波浪真好看。
Tā de tóufà lěngtàng guò le，yígègè dàbōlàng zhēn hǎokàn。
Her hair was styled by cold waves, and the big waves looked really beautiful.
月光照耀下，湖面一片鳞波闪烁。
Yuèguāng zhàoyào xià，húmiàn yípiàn línbō shǎnshuò。
Under the shinning moonlight, the lake is flickering with scale-like ripples.
我们在实验中要用到滤波技术。
Wǒmen zài shíyàn zhōng yào yòngdào lǜbō jìshù。

The serial novel of Henry Potter can bring you into a mysterious world.
到南方旅行的时候，我们第一次吃到了木波罗。

When traveling in the southern region, I ate jackfruit for the first time.
那些水草都随着水波四处地漂荡。
Nàxiē shuǐcǎo dōu suí zhe shuǐbō sìchù de piāodàng。
These water plants float at the mercy of the waves on the water.

Zuìjìn tóng de qījià bōdòng hěndà，tóuzīzhě dōu hěnjǐnshèn。
Recently, the futures price of copper has fluctuated wildly, so investors are cautious.
我家微波炉的功率是1千瓦。
Wǒjiā wēibōlú de gōnglǜ shì yìqiānwǎ。
The power of my micro-wave oven is 1000 watts.
时俗流弊是我们应当反对的，不可以随波逐流。

我们需要在这里安装一台天波发射装置。
Wǒmen xūyào zài zhèlǐ ānzhuāng yìtái tiānbō fāshè zhuāngzhì。

海面上波涛汹涌，茫茫然无涯际 。

The sea is rough and limitless.

由这件事引起的平地风波至今还未平息。

The unexpected trouble caused by this matter hasn\'t yet quietened down.
住在烟波浩淼的湖边，你可真会享受 。
Zhùzài yānbō hàomiǎo de húbiān，nǐ kě zhēn huì xiǎngshòu。
Living by the mist-covered waters, you do enjoy yourself.
微波炉内壁采用的是耐热合金材料，所以不会烫坏。
Wēibōlú nèi bì cǎiyòng de shì nàirèhéjīn cáiliào，suǒyǐ búhuì tàng huài。
The inside wall of the microwave oven is made of heat-proof alloy, so it won’t be burned.
我一直使用格兰仕牌微波炉，质量很有保证。

The voltage induced in the pickup coil by this waveform is directly proportional to the rate of change of magnetic induction.

不能把失利的责任归罪于下级。
胜利归功于全体将士
不能把错误都归咎于别人
之子于归。
Life after death is nothingness.
死亡后生命归于虚无。
to bury the hatchet
言归于好
to come to grief
[plan+] 归于失败
The profits benefit a small minority, while the vast numbers of workers have no choice but to risk their lives in dangerous working conditions.
利润只归于一小撮人,大多数工人没有选择的余地,只能在危险的环境中拿生命作赌注。
The publisher agreed to credit the author for his contributions.
Jīyú zuòzhě de gòngxiàn，chūbǎnshāng tǒngyī bǎ gōngláo guīyú zuòzhě。
基于作者的贡献，出版商统一把功劳归于作者。
I tried to make it up to her, but failed miserably.
Wǒ xiǎng hé tā chóngguīyúhǎo， dàn què bēicǎn de shībài le。
我想和她重归于好，但却悲惨地失败了。
He tried to make peace with his parents before they passed away.
Tā shìzhe zài tā fùmǔ qùshì yǐqián，hé tāmen chóngguīyúhǎo。
他试着在他父母去世以前，和他们重归于好。

Jǐ bēi píjiǔ guòhòu，wǒmen yánguīyúhǎo。
几杯啤酒过后，我们言归于好。

她非常幸运，她的成功大部于归功于运气而不是学识。

Bǎoliú tiáokuǎn yòngyú shǐ yùndòngyuán guīshǔ yú tèdìng de qiúduì jùlèbù。
保留条款用于使运动员归属于特定的球队俱乐部。
The UN\'s predictions of famine owe more to art than science.

联合国关于饥荒的预言更加归因于艺术而不是科技。
Jealousy was assigned as the motive for the crime.
把犯罪的动机归因于忌妒。
to lay the blame on someone
责怪某人；将罪责归咎于某人
He owes his good health to his wife.
他把自己的健康归功于妻子的照顾。
She blamed the robbery on me although I had locked the door.
尽管我当时锁门了，她还是把这次遭抢事件归咎于我。
to attribute sth to sth
[+situation，cause] 把某事归因于某事
to blame sth on sb
把某事归咎于某人
to take the credit for sth
把某事归功于自己
to credit sb with sth
将某事归功于某人
to owe sth to sb
[+success，life] 应把某事归功于某人
to pin sth on sb
把某事归罪于某人
I put it down to arthritis.
我把它归因于关节炎。
to rate sb/sth among
把某人/某事物归类于
to be a tribute to sth
归功于某事
I attribute all my success to my parents\' education and support.
我将所有的成就归功于我父母的教育和支持。
Paul owes his success to his precise workmanship.
保罗将他的成功归功于严谨的工作态度。
We can affiliate the widespread panic to the irresponsible words of the minister.
我们可以把这大范围的恐慌归咎于那位部长不负责任的发言。
The decrease in sales was blamed on the bad economy.
Xiāoshòu\'é de xiàjiàng bèi guījiù yú jīngjì bù jǐngqì。
销售额的下降被归咎于经济不景气。
She advanced this theory to the child psychoanalyst to whom she was delivered the next day.
Tā bǎ zhè yī lǐlùn guīgōngyú zhè wèi értóng xīnlǐ fēnxīxuéjiā，bìngqiě míngtiān tā jiāng xiàng tā chénshù zhè yī lǐlùn。
她把这一理论归功于这位儿童心理分析学家，并且明天她将向他陈述这一理论。

我的继母总是把她生活中的错误归咎于我。

他把失败归因于恶劣的天气。

Gǔdài de xiānxiánmen dōu tíchàng tiānzǐ shī rénzhèng lái shǐ sìfāng guīhuà。
Scholars of ancient times suggested that the emperor should adopt a policy of benevolence as a way to make people of all walks of life come and pledge allegiance to the country.
犯罪分子就是跑到天涯海角，我们也要把他捉拿归案。

他能获得这样的成功，应该归功于他的人格魅力。

to take the credit for sth
把某事归功于自己
to credit sb with sth
将某事归功于某人
to owe sth to sb
[+success，life] 应把某事归功于某人
to be a tribute to sth
归功于某事

我将所有的成就归功于我父母的教育和支持。

give strict orders to bring the criminal to justice
捉拿归案
zhuōná ɡuī\'àn 
arrest and bring a criminal to justice

The criminal was finally caught. As the saying goes, justice has long arms.
犯罪分子就是跑到天涯海角，我们也要把他捉拿归案。

逃犯终将会被逮捕归案。

杀人犯逍遥法外10年，现在终于被抓获归案。

他归根到底也没从国外回来。
Tā guīgēn dàodǐ yě méi cóng guówài huílái。

归根结柢是我不对，我认错。

归根结蒂是你错了，你要向父母道歉。

The founding heroes resigned from office and returned home one after another because of the fatuous and self-indulgent ruler.
做到水肥归田，就能使土地肥沃起来。
Zuòdào shuǐféi guītián，jiù néng shǐ tǔdì féiwò qǐlái。
Irrigating the land with good water is a way to make the land fertile.
请大家归位，我们的会议马上就要开始了。
Qǐng dàjiā guīwèi，wǒmen de huìyì mǎshàng jiùyào kāishǐ le。
Everyone go back to seat. The meeting is going to begin in any minute.
老先生已经驾鹤归西，你来晚了。
Lǎoxiānshēng yǐjing jiàhè guīxī，nǐ lái wǎn le。
You are too late. The old man has already passed away.
让我们都归向内心深处的家园。
Ràng wǒmen dōu guīxiàng nèixīn shēnchù de jiāyuán。
Let everybody turn towards their homeland at the bottom of their hearts.
大家都归心于他，这次肯定能当选总经理。
Dàjiā dōu guīxīn yú tā，zhècì kěndìng néng dāngxuǎn zǒngjīnglǐ。
As everyone submits to him willingly, it is certain that he will be elected general manager this time.
我真是归心似箭，想快点见到多年没见的母亲。
Wǒ zhēnshì guīxīnsìjiàn，xiǎng kuài diǎn jiàndào duōnián méijiàn de mǔqīn。
How I wish that I could return home with the swiftness of an arrow so that I could see my mother, who I haven\'t seen for years, as soon as possible.
今年寒假，我陪妻子归省。
Jīnnián hánjià，wǒ péi qīzǐ guīxǐng。
This winter holiday, I will accompany my wife to see her parents.
他已经归依佛门，不再问世事了。
Tā yǐjing guīyī fómén，búzài wèn shìshì le。
He has already converted to Buddhism and cares no more about the human world.
我的心早就有所归依了。
Wǒ de xīn zǎo jiù yǒusuǒ guīyī le。
I have already found someone to rely on.
老先生已经归隐多年，估计很难再请他出山了。
Lǎoxiānshēng yǐjing guīyǐn duōnián，gūjì hěnnán zài qǐng tā chūshān le。
This old man has been dwelling in seclusion for many years. It is probably very difficult to bring him back to society.
他母亲临终时嘱咐儿女把她归葬原籍。
Tā mǔqīn lín zhōng shí zhǔfù érnǚ bǎ tā guīzàng yuánjí。
Before passing away, she asked her sons and daughters to bury her at her ancestral home.
这家饭店的装饰反璞归真，很有特色。
Zhèjiā fàndiàn de zhuāngshì fǎnpú guīzhēn，hěnyǒu tèsè。
The pure and simple style of this restaurant\'s decoration is really unique.
他已经归真，我们不必太过悲伤。
Tā yǐjing guīzhēn，wǒmen búbì tàiguò bēishāng。
He has returned to Allah. We shouldn\'t be too sad.
你快归整一下，我们马上就出发。
Nǐ kuài guīzhěng yíxià，wǒmen mǎshàng jiù chūfā。
Put everything in order, we are leaving any minute.
这个权臣把持朝政多年，众人都要求他归政于君主。
Zhège quánchén bǎchí cháozhèng duōnián，zhòngrén dōu yāoqiú tā guīzhèng yú jūnzhǔ。
After being in power for many year, this official was asked to return the power of the imperial government to the emperor.
这次回老家，他准备认祖归宗。
Zhècì huí lǎojiā，tā zhǔnbèi rènzǔ guīzōng。
He is planning to return to his ancestors during his trip to his hometown.
你归总一下这次活动所用的经费，我们该年终报账了。
Nǐ guīzǒng yíxià zhècì huódòng suǒyòng de jīngfèi，wǒmen gāi nián zhōng bàozhàng le。
Summarize the cost of this activity. It is time to present the annual expenses bill.
参加这次活动的人归总有一百多位。
Cānjiā zhècì huódòng de rén guīzǒng yǒu yìbǎiduōwèi。
The number of people participating in this activity comes to more than a hundred.
你不能把事情都归罪于客观原因，你的粗心大意才是主要原因。
Nǐ bùnéng bǎ shìqing dōu guīzuì yú kèguān yuányīn，nǐ de cūxīn dàyì cáishì zhǔyào yuányīn。
You can\'t find objective reasons to blame for everything. Your carelessness was the main cause of this incident.
现在海归派人员越来越多，这将给我国的科技发展注入新鲜的血液。
Xiànzài hǎiguīpài rényuán yuèláiyuè duō，zhè jiāng gěi wǒguó de kējì fāzhǎn zhùrù xīnxiān de xuèyè。
Now there are more students who have returned and they will infuse new blood into technology development in China.
由于历史原因，这个海域海洋权的归属一直存在争议。
Yóuyú lìshǐ yuányīn，zhège hǎiyù hǎiyángquán de guīshǔ yìzhí cúnzài zhēngyì。
Due to historical reasons, the maritime ownership rights of this sea area has been contradictory.
他在乞求神灵能够护佑他的哥哥从战场平安归来。
Tā zài qǐqiú shénlíng nénggòu hùyòu tā de gēge cóng zhànchǎng píngān guīlái。
He prayed to God to bless his elder brother, so that he could return home safely from the battlefield.
这个工厂被评为花园工厂，真是实至名归。
Zhège gōngchǎng bèi píngwéi huāyuán gōngchǎng，zhēnshì shízhìmíngguī。
This factory is appraised as the Garden Factory. It is really worthy of the name.
这种植物只生长在回归带以北，在其他地方很少见。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù zhǐ shēngzhǎng zài huíguīdài yǐ běi，zài qítā dìfāng hěnshǎojiàn。
This type of plant only grows on the north of the tropic. They are quite rare in other places.
回归年与恒星年是不同的两个概念。
Huíguīnián yǔ héngxīngnián shì bùtóng de liǎnggè gàiniàn。
Tropical year, and sidereal year are two different concepts.
我们在地图上找到了回归线的位置。
Wǒmenzàidìtú shàng zhǎodào le huíguīxiàn de wèizhi。
We find the position of the tropics on the map.
树木被大片砍伐动物生存亟亟可危，人们无家可归。
Shùmù bèi dàpiàn kǎnfá dòngwù shēngcún jíjí kěwēi，rénmen wújiā kěguī。
Trees are being felled on a large scale, animals are facing immediate extinction and people are losing their homes.
我公司依然属于集体所有制企业，归集体所有。
Wǒ gōngsī yīrán shǔyú jítǐ suǒyǒuzhì qǐyè，guī jítǐ suǒyǒu。
Our company is still an enterprise of collective ownership, belonging to the collective.
他说想散尽家财后归隐山林，不问世事。
Tā shuō xiǎng sànjìn jiācái hòu guīyǐn shānlín，búwèn shìshì。
He said that he was going to distribute his property to others and move to the woods, not concerned with secular affairs any more.
在超市的促销广告上总能看到“最终解释权归某某超市所有”的字样。
Zài chāoshì de cùxiāo guǎnggào shàng zǒng néng kàndào“zuì zhōng jiěshìquán guī mǒumǒu chāoshì suǒyǒu”de zìyàng。

Wǒ yǐ jiāng tā de dōngxi jìnshù guīhuán。
I have returned all his stuff.

成语故事“完壁归赵”中那个主角的身份是个客卿。

敌军统帅决定来归，我军表示欢迎。
Díjūn tǒngshuài juédìng láiguī，wǒ jūn biǎoshì huānyíng.
We welcomed the commander of the enemy who defected to our side.
古代女孩儿来归的时候，是不穿白色婚纱的。
Gǔdài nǚháir láiguī de shíhou，shì bùchuān báisè hūnshā de。
When girls married in ancient times, they did not wear white wedding dresses.
他已离乡十几年了，今日归来真是感慨万千。

He has left his hometown for more than ten years. Returning home today,he felt his heart welling with different emotions.
他带着今天的猎物满载而归。
Tā dài zhe jīntiān de lièwù mǎnzǎi ér guī。

他留洋归来就一直在这家银行工作。
Tā liúyáng guīlái jiù yìzhí zài zhè jiā yínháng gōngzuò。

他能获得这样的成功，应该归功于他的人格魅力。
Tā néng huòdé zhèyàng de chénggōng，yīnggāi guīgōngyú tā de réngé mèilì。
His magnetic personality contributed to his big success.
他能当上这个官也算是民望所归了。
Tā néng dāngshàng zhège guān yě suànshì mínwàng suǒguī le。
He enjoys popular trust, so he can get the official post.
我翘望你成功归来。
Wǒ qiàowàng nǐ chénggōng guīlái。
I am eagerly looking forward to your coming back with success.
他的工作很劬劳，每天都要早出晚归。
Tā de gōngzuò hěnqúláo，měitiān dōuyào zǎochū wǎnguī。
He spares no pains in his work, going out early and returning late every day.
由于我们顽强抵御，敌人最终铩羽而归。
Yóuyú wǒmen wánqiáng dǐyù，dírén zuì zhōng shāyǔérguī。
Because of our persistent resistance, the enemy finally retreated in defeat.
评书演员最爱说的一句话就是书归正传。
Píngshū yǎnyuán zuì ài shuō de yíjù huà jiùshì shūguī zhèngzhuàn。
The most frequent sentence those storytelling performers use is: let\'s return to the subject.
犯罪分子最终被捉拿归案了，可谓“天网恢恢、疏而不漏”呀。

The criminal was finally caught. As the saying goes, justice has long arms.
犯罪分子就是跑到天涯海角，我们也要把他捉拿归案。
Fànzuì fènzǐ jiùshì pǎodào tiānyá hǎijiǎo，wǒmen yěyào bǎ tā zhuōná guīàn。

这几名战士与冲上来的敌人同归于尽。

版权归作者所有，未经允许，不得盗用。

根据报纸上的消息，凶嫌已经被抓捕归案了。

他放学归来还要帮助母亲打理庄稼活儿。

Dongcunrui lifted the pack of dynamite, and died together with the enemy.

At last, many scholars had to admit that there are two sects of philosophy and return from false naturalism to classic philosophy.
他不幸患上回归热，现在在住院呢。
Tā búxìng huànshàng huíguīrè，xiànzài zài zhùyuàn ne。

好的旅馆服务让游客有宾至如归的感觉。
