毒贩潜返城里，继续犯罪。
Dúfàn qiánfǎn chénɡli, jìxù fànzuì。
The drug-traffickers returned secretly to the city and continued their activities.
染毒区域
rǎndú qūyù
contamination area
吸毒上了瘾
xīdú shàng le yǐn
be addicted to drugs; be a drug addict
毒如蛇蝎
dú rú shéxiē
as vicious as a viper
私运毒品
sī yùn dúpǐn
smuggle drugs
肃毒行动
sùdú xíngdòng
antidrug action
活性炭吸附毒气和液体中的杂质。
Huóxìngtàn xīfù dúqì hé yètǐ zhōng de zázhì。
Active carbon adsorbs poisonous gases and impurities in liquids.
对他下毒手
duì tā xià dúshǒu
lay murderous hands on him; do him in
他的行动处处受到险毒刁滑的特务的监视。
Tā de xíngdòng chùchù shòudào xiǎndúdiāohuá de tèwù de jiānshì。
His every move was followed by sinister and cunning spies.
毒枭
dúxiāo
drugpusher
用酒精消毒
yònɡ jiǔjīnɡ xiāodú
sterilize in (or with) alcohol
用漂白粉消毒
yòngpiǎobáifěn xiāodú
disinfect with bleaching powder
消毒棉花
xiāodú miánhuɑ
sterilized cotton
消毒牛奶
xiāodú niúnǎi
sterilized (or pasteurized) milk
烟碱中毒
yānjiǎn zhòngdú
nicotinism
一氧化碳中毒
yīyǎnghuàtàn zhòngdú 
carbon monoxide poisoning
肃清封建思想的余毒
sùqīngfēngjiàn sīxiǎng de yúdú 
eliminate the pernicious influence of feudalist ideas
食物中毒
shíwù zhòngdú 
food poisoning
服毒
fúdú
take poison
吸毒
xīdú
take addictive drugs; be addicted to a narcotic
毒害
dúhài
murder by poisoning; poison
妈妈苦苦哀劝他不要再吸毒了，但没有效果。
Māmā kǔkǔ āiquàn tā búyào zài xīdú le，dàn méiyǒu xiàoguǒ。
Mother said everything she could trying to talk him into quitting drugs, but it was no good.
他被人暗下毒手。
Tā bèi rén ànxià dúshǒu.
He was framed.
我上火了，医生说吃这药可以败毒清热。
Wǒ shànghuǒ le，yīshēng shuō chī zhè yào kěyǐ bàidú qīngrè。
I\'m running a fever. The doctor says that this medicine is a great antidote for the fever.
为避免被动吸毒，他们没有立即搬进新装修的房子。
Wéi bìmiǎn bèidòng xīdú，tāmen méiyǒu lìjí bānjìn xīn zhuāngxiū de fángzi。
To avoid breathing in poisonous gas, they didn’t move into the newly decorated house immediately.
他们正在测试这种植物病毒标样。
Tāmen zhèngzài cèshì zhèzhǒng zhíwù bìngdú biāoyàng。
They are testing the sample of the vegetable virus.
附近的农户对匪徒之残毒恨之入骨。
Fùjìn de nónghù duì fěitú zhī cándú hènzhīrùgǔ。
The thugs\' cruelty is the pet hate of the farmers in the neighbourhood.
下面，我将向大家介绍一个清除蔬菜残毒的方法。
Xiàmiàn，wǒ jiāng xiàng dàjiā jièshào yígè qīngchú shūcài cándú de fāngfǎ。
Next, I will show you a method to remove the remaining poisons on the vegetables.
如此惨毒的刑罚，是应该被废止的。
Rúcǐ cǎndú de xíngfá，shì yīnggāi bèi fèizhǐ de。
Such a cruel penalty should be abolished.
藏运毒品是犯罪行为，必须予以严厉打击。
Cángyùn dúpǐn shì fànzuì xíngwéi，bìxū yǔyǐ yánlì dǎjī。
The concealment and trafficking drugs is a criminal act, which must be severely punished.
长期在这种环境下工作会吸入许多尘毒。
Chángqī zài zhèzhǒng huánjìng xià gōngzuò huì xīrù xǔduō chéndú。
You will inhale a lot of poisonous dust if you work under this condition for a long time.
他为了吸毒，开始斥卖家产。
Tā wèi le xīdú，kāishǐ chìmài jiāchǎn。
Addicted to the drug, he began to sell the real estate.
赤链蛇并没有毒，被咬伤也不用太担心。
Chìliànshé bìng méiyǒu dú，bèi yǎoshāng yě búyòng tài dānxīn。
Brown snake is not poisonous. You don\'t need to worry too much if you are bitten by it.
警察在毒贩出货的时候将他们抓获。
Jǐngchá zài dúfàn chūhuò de shíhou jiāng tāmen zhuāhuò。
The police arrested the drug dealers in the act.
他的大老婆人很恶毒，总是欺负手下的人。
Tā de dà lǎopó rén hěnèdú，zǒng shì qīfù shǒuxià de rén。
His official wife is vicious, and always treats her servants high-handedly.
这些带菌医疗器械必须马上消毒。
Zhèxiē dài jūn yīliáo qìxiè bìxū mǎshàng xiāodú。
These equipments carry bacteria. They must be sterilized soon.
氮气在室温下是无色、无毒的。
Dànqì zài shìwēn xià shì wúsè、wúdú de。
Nitrogen is transparent, and innocuous at room temperature.
紫外线灯管可以用来消毒。
Zǐwàixiàn dēngguǎn kěyǐ yònglái xiāodú。
Ultraviolet light tubes can be used for disinfection.
这批农药被认定是低毒的。
Zhè pī nóngyào bèi rèndìng shì dīdú de。
These agricultural pesticides are considered low toxic.
这种电脑病毒传播很厉害，你一定要小心。
Zhèzhǒng diànnǎo bìngdú chuánbō hěnlìhai，nǐ yídìng yào xiǎoxīn。
Be careful. This computer virus is spreading rapidly.
在侦破这起毒案的过程中，有几名战士不幸牺牲。
Zài zhēnpò zhè qǐ dú\'àn de guòchéng zhōng，yǒu jǐ míng zhànshì búxìng xīshēng。
In the investigation of the drug-related crime, some policemen sacrificed their lives.
夏天的时候，很容易被毒虫咬伤。
Xiàtiān de shíhou，hěn róngyì bèi dúchóng yǎo shāng。
In the summer, we often get bitten by poisonous insects.
这种花的花茎上长有毒刺。
Zhèzhǒng huā de huājīng shàng zhǎng yǒu dúcì。
On the stems of these kinds of flowers are poisonous thorns.
他遭到毒打后就一直卧床不起。
Tā zāodào dúdǎ hòu jiù yìzhí wòchuáng bùqǐ。
He has been confined to bed after a fierce beating.
这些毒犯非常狡猾，很不好对付。
Zhèxiē dúfàn fēicháng jiǎohuá，hěn bùhǎo duìfù。
These drug producers and traffickers are very sly and extremely difficult to deal with.
这一带有很多毒贩，我们一定要把他们绳之以法。
Zhè yídài yǒu hěnduō dúfàn，wǒmen yídìng yào bǎ tāmen shéngzhīyǐfǎ。
There are a great number of drug traffickers in this place, and we are determined to bring them to justice.
这简直就是人身攻击，放毒箭。
Zhè jiǎnzhí jiùshì rénshēn gōngjī，fàng dújiàn。
It\'s personal attack, vicious slander.
这些都是毒菌，绝对不能食用。
Zhèxiē dōushì dújūn，juéduì bùnéng shíyòng。
These fungi are poisonous and thus should not be eaten.
他本是去劝解她的，没想到竟遭到了毒骂。
Tā běn shì qù quànjiě tā de，méi xiǎng dào jìng zāodào le dúmà。
He had wanted to persuade her, but was cursed by her instead.
他一心想杀我，所以才设下了这个毒谋。
Tā yìxīn xiǎng shā wǒ，suǒyǐ cái shè xià le zhège dúmóu。
He had every intention to kill me, that\'s why he set up such a sinister plot.
警方施放了毒气弹，把劫匪逼出了屋子。
Jǐngfāng shīfàng le dúqìdàn，bǎ jiéfěi bī chū le wūzi。
The police used poisonous gas to force the robbers out of the house.
烈火的毒焰烧毁了七八间民宅。
Lièhuǒ de dúyàn shāohuǐ le qībā jiān mínzhái。
The raging flames burned down nearly eight people\'s homes.
我们要坚决扑灭这些犯罪分子的毒焰。
Wǒmen yào jiānjué pūmiè zhèxiē fànzuìfènzǐ de dúyàn。
We have to be determined to reduce the criminals\' aggressiveness.
禽流感期间，要严防往来迁徙的飞禽传播病毒。
Qínliúgǎn qījiān，yào yánfáng wǎnglái qiānxǐ de fēiqín chuánbō bìngdú。
During an epidemic of bird flu we must moniter the transmission between migrating species.
边境线上，毒品封禁的新一轮战役再次打响。
Biānjìngxiàn shàng，dúpǐn fēngjìn de xīnyìlún zhànyì zàicì dǎxiǎng。
A new battle against drugs on the borders has started.
你的呼吸道感染是由冠状病毒引起的。
Nǐ de hūxīdào gǎnrǎn shì yóu guānzhuàng bìngdú yǐnqǐ de。
The infection in your respiratory tract is caused by a coronary virus.
人体通过汗液和尿液排毒。
Réntǐ tōngguò hànyè hé niàoyè páidú。
The human body eliminates toxins through sweat, and urine.
黄曲霉菌可能产生有毒的代谢物，从而危害人类身体健康。
Huángqǔméijūn kěnéng chǎnshēng yǒu dú de dàixièwù，cóngér wēihài rénlèi shēntǐjiànkāng。
Aflatoxin may produce poisonous metabolizing substances, and do harm to human\'s health.
用火针排毒听起来很吓人，其实并不痛。
Yòng huǒzhēn páidú tīngqǐlái hěnxiàrén，qíshí bìng bútòng。
Ignipuncture sounds frightening, but actually it doesn\'t hurt at all.
火针在使用之前也是需要消毒的。
Huǒzhēn zài shǐyòng zhīqián yěshì xūyào xiāodú de。
Ignipuncture needles also need sterilizing before use.
警方这次搜查缉获了大量的毒品。
Jǐngfāng zhècì sōuchá jīhuò le dàliàng de dúpǐn。
The police have seized a great deal of drugs this time.
封建礼教对人的毒害不只是当时当地，对后代也贻害无穷。
Fēngjiàn lǐjiào duì rén de dúhài bùzhǐshì dāngshí dāngdì，duì hòudài yě yíhài wúqióng。
Feudal ethical codes did not poison people of that time, but also brought endless harm to generations to come.
请你放心，被这种盲蛇咬伤是不会中毒的。
Qǐng nǐ fàngxīn，bèi zhèzhǒng mángshé yǎoshāng shì búhuì zhòngdú de。
Rest assured! You will not be poisoned by a blind snake.
一定要严防由于煤炉泄露造成的煤气中毒。
Yídìng yào yánfáng yóuyú méilú xièlòu zàochéng de méiqì zhòngdú。
We should take strict precautions against gas poisoning caused by coal stove leaks.
由于棉饼中包含有毒成分，所以一定要谨慎使用。
Yóuyú miánbǐng zhōng bāohán yǒu dú chéngfèn，suǒyǐ yídìng yào jǐnshèn shǐyòng。
Cottonseed cakes must be used very carefully, because they contain toxins.
在打针之前一定要用含有酒精的棉签进行消毒。
Zài dǎzhēn zhīqián yídìng yào yòng hányǒu jiǔjīng de miánqiān jìnxíng xiāodú。
Before an injection, the skin should be disinfected by a cotton applicator with alcohol.
在进行手术之前，一定要进行消毒灭菌。
Zài jìnxíng shǒushù zhīqián，yídìng yào jìnxíng xiāodú mièjūn。
Disinfection, and sterilization is an inevitable procedure before an operation.
卫生部辟谣：中国内地从来没有发现过埃博拉病毒感染病例！
Wèishēngbù pìyáo：Zhōngguó nèidì cónglái méiyǒu fāxiàn guò āibólā bìngdú gǎnrǎn bìnglì！
The Ministry of Public Health denied the rumor, saying that there are no people affected by the Ebola virus in the mainland.
最近是流行病高发季节，公共场所应该适当泼洒些消毒水。
Zuìjìn shì liúxíngbìng gāofā jìjié，gōnggòng chǎngsuǒ yīnggāi shìdàng pōsǎ xiē xiāodúshuǐ。
It\'s the season when epidemics happen frequently, so we should sprinkle some disinfectant in public
昨天海关用燃烧弹销毁了一批毒品。
Zuótiān hǎiguān yòng ránshāodàn xiāohuǐ le yì pī dúpǐn。
Yesterday, customs destroyed a collection of drugs with incendiary bombs.
蛇毒可以用来防治血栓形成。
Shédú kěyǐ yònglái fángzhì xuèshuān xíngchéng。
Snake poisons can be used to prevent thrombus.
我们缴获了这伙私枭的全部毒品。
Wǒmen jiǎohuò le zhè huǒ sīxiāo de quánbùdúpǐn。
We confiscated all the drugs from this smuggler gang.
我们从这个犯罪团伙的老窝，搜缴了大量的枪支和毒品。
Wǒmen cóng zhège fànzuì tuánhuǒ de lǎowō，sōujiǎo le dàliàng de qiāngzhī hé dúpǐn。
We captured a lot of guns and drugs in this criminal band\'s headquarters.
这种药有清除宿便的功效，据说能够“排毒养颜”。
Zhèzhǒng yào yǒu qīngchú sùbiàn de gōngxiào，jùshuō nénggòu“páidú yǎngyán”。
This medicine can effectively clean inveterate excrement from the body, and is said to be able to exclude poisons and nourish the skin.
患有胎毒的儿童需要尽早治疗。
Huànyǒu tāidú de értóng xūyào jìnzǎo zhìliáo。
Children with skin infections caused by febrile toxins inherited from their mothers must be treated as early as possible.
我们一定要把那个在饭菜中投毒的人找出来。
Wǒmen yídìng yào bǎ nàge zài fàncài zhōng tóudú de rén zhǎo chūlái。
We must find the person who put poison into the food.
一定要买经过严格消毒的卫生纸才安全卫生。
Yídìng yào mǎi jīngguò yángé xiāodú de wèishēngzhǐ cái ānquán wèishēng。
Only sterilized sanitary towels are safe to use.
市场经济条件下，我们要坚决抵制文化垃圾的毒害。
Shìchǎng jīngjì tiáojiàn xià，wǒmén yào jiānjué dǐzhì wénhuà lājī de dúhài。
Under the market economy, we must firmly resist the bad influence of cultural garbage.
他因为误食菌类食物，引起食物中毒。
Tā yīnwèi wùshí jūnlèi shíwù，yǐnqǐ shíwù zhòngdú。
He was poisoned by the poisonous mushrooms.
线麻是一种毒品，对人体健康极为有害。
Xiànmá shì yìzhǒng dúpǐn，duì réntǐ jiànkāng jíwéi yǒuhài。
Marijuana is a kind of drug which does great damage to the human body.
我们要分清楚文艺作品中香花与毒草。
Wǒmen yào fēn qīngchu wényì zuòpǐn zhōng xiānghuā yǔ dúcǎo。
We must distinguish good and bad literary works.
商场正在进行名牌消毒柜八折优惠活动。
Shāngchǎng zhèngzài jìnxíng míngpái xiāodúguì bā shé yōuhuì huódòng。
The mall is giving a 20% discount on some brand-name sterilizers.
洗碗的时候不要忘记放一点消毒剂。
Xǐwǎn de shíhou búyào wàngjì fàng yìdiǎn xiāodújì。
Don\'t forget to add some disinfectant to the water when you wash the dishes.
病房里有一股浓浓的消毒水味道。
Bìngfáng lǐ yǒu yìgǔ nóngnóng de xiāodúshuǐ wèidào。
The smell of the disinfectant is very strong in the patient\'s room.
连自己的儿子都不放过，你真是个心毒的女人。
Lián zìjǐ de érzi dōu bú fàngguò，nǐ zhēnshì gè xīndú de nǚrén。
You are indeed a wicked woman who doesn\'t even spare her own son!
信石是一种毒药。
Xìnshí shì yìzhǒng dúyào。
Arsenic is a kind of poison.
宣传车上都是吸毒危害身体的照片，很有教育意义。
Xuānchuánchē shàng dōushì xīdú wēihài shēntǐ de zhàopiàn，hěn yǒu jiàoyù yìyì。
The publicity vehicle is quite inspiring, with photos on the theme: smoking harms your health.
沿边地区经常有毒贩出没，大家要严加防范。
Yánbiān dìqū jīngcháng yǒu dúfàn chūmò，dàjiā yào yánjiā fángfàn。
The drug dealers who constantly show up in the coastal areas must be kept away.
针灸用的药针需要消毒，不然会交叉感染。
Zhēnjiǔ yòng de yào zhēn xūyào xiāodú，bùrán huì jiāochā gǎnrǎn。
Acupuncture needles need to be disinfected, or there will be cross infection.
银环蛇有巨毒，大家看到了可千万不要随便捉。
Yínhuánshé yǒu jùdú，dàjiā kàndào le kě qiānwàn búyào suíbiàn zhuō。
Silver-ringed snakes are venomous, don\'t try to capture them when you see them.
驻留在患者体内的毒素会被这种高分子药物降解。
Zhùliú zài huànzhě tǐnèi de dúsù huì bèi zhèzhǒng gāofēnzǐ yàowù jiàngjiě。
Toxins remaining in the patient\'s body will be degraded by this macromolecular medicine.
曾经卓荦出群的他由于吸毒落到沿街乞讨的地步。
Céngjīng zhuóluò chūqún de tā yóuyú xīdú luòdào yánjiē qǐtǎo de dìbù。
Because of drug abuse, he, who used to be outstanding, sank to begging in the streets.
灾情过后，病毒在灾区滋蔓。
Zāiqíng guòhòu，bìngdú zài zāiqū zīmàn。
After the natural disaster passed, viruses began to spread in the areas it had affected.
学校宣传消防知识时，小明学会了如何戴防毒面具。
Xuéxiào xuānchuán xiāofáng zhīshi shí，Xiǎo Míng xuéhuì le rúhé dài fángdú miànjù。
Xiao Ming learnt how to wear a gas mask when they were taught about fire protection.
恐怖分子把投放了炭疽病病毒的邮件寄往了各地。
Kǒngbùfenzǐ bǎ tóufàng le tànjūbìng bìngdú de yóujiàn jìwǎng le gè dì。
Terrorists sent letters around the world with the anthrax virus in the envelopes.
这次禁毒的宣传品很有震撼力，参观的人很多。
Zhècì jìndú de xuānchuánpǐn hěn yǒu zhènhànlì，cānguān de rén hěnduō。
The publicity materials at the anti-drug campaign have attracted a large number of visitors with their huge impact.
衍生物也不一定有毒，你别怕。
Yǎnshēngwù yě bùyídìng yǒudú，nǐ biépà。
Not all ramifications are poisonous, don\'t be afraid.
医生说他上呼吸道被病毒感染了，需要治疗。
Yīshēng shuō tā shànghūxīdào bèi bìngdú gǎnrǎn le，xūyào zhìliáo。
The doctor said his upper respiratory tract was infected, and needed treatment.
石炭酸可作染料、消毒剂等的原料。
Shítànsuān kě zuò rǎnliào 、xiāodújì děng de yuánliào。
Carbonic acid can be made into dyes and disinfectants.
哎呀，电脑又有病毒了。
Āiyā，diànnǎo yòuyǒu bìngdú le。
Oh no, the computer has been infected by a virus again.
败毒
bàidú
counteract a poison
政府采取紧急措施防止病毒传播。
Zhèngfǔ cǎiqǔ jǐnjícuòshī fángzhǐ bìngdúchuánbō。
The government is adopting urgent measures to prevent the spread of disease.
电脑病毒
diànnǎobìngdú
computer virus
当地的毒贩纠合起来走私海洛因。
Dāngdì de dúfàn jiūhé qǐlái zǒusī hǎiluòyīn.
The local drug traffickers worked together on a heroin smuggling operation.
戒毒后，他与过去的生活彻底决裂了。
Jièdú hòu，tā yǔ guòqù de shēnghuó chèdǐ juélièle.
After giving up drugs, he made a complete break with his past life.
刻毒
kèdú
evil

任免事项
rènmiǎn shì xiàng
appointments and removals

铨叙是一种人事任免制度。
Quánxù shì yìzhǒng rénshì rènmiǎn zhìdù。
Examining the records and qualifications of officials when making appointments is a kind of personnel appointment and removal system.
免除一项任务
miǎnchú yí xiàng rènwu
excuse sb. from a task; relieve sb. of a task

难免
nánmiǎn
hard to avoid

Inevitably, a sort of bunker mentality quickly set in.
Yì zhǒng bèishuǐyízhàn de xīntài bùkěbìmiǎn de hěnkuài chǎnshēng le。
一种背水一战的心态不可避免地很快产生了。
I can\'t say more in case I let the cat out of the bag.
Wǒ bù néng zài shuō shénme le， miǎndé xièmì。
我不能再说什么了，免得泄密。
The evil that men do lives after them; the good is oft interred with their bones.
Rénmen zuòle\'èshì，sǐhòu bù miǎn zāo rén tòngmà，dàn tāmen suǒ zuò de shànshì què wǎngwǎng yǔqí chǐgǔ yìqǐ rùtǔ。
人们做了恶事，死后不免遭人痛骂，但他们所做的善事却往往与其尺骨一起入土。

Michael seems less successful in avoiding publicity.
Màikè\'ěr zài bìmiǎn gōngzhòng zhùyì fāngmiàn，sìhū jiù bú shì nàme chénggōng le。

Inevitably, the remains of the building were being hauled down.

Don\'t knock the food--it\'s free.

She cannot tell her friends in case they think she has gone mad.
Tā bùnéng gàosu tā de péngyou，miǎndé tāmen rènwéi tā fēng le。

bìmiǎn qīngshuài xíngdòng

我们不断修改和完善法条，就是为了避免有人打擦边球。

这部分税款应该被抵免。
Zhèbùfen shuìkuǎn yīnggāi bèi dǐmiǎn。

Chuānshàng yígè dùdōu，yǐmiǎn nòngzāng yīfu。

Niánqīngrén zuòshì nánmiǎn fúpiāo。
It\'s inevitable that young people will be careless.
对古籍史料的勾稽工作要严谨、科学地进行，以免误导后人。
Duì gǔjí shǐliào de gōujī gōngzuò yào yánjǐn、kēxué de jìnxíng，yǐmiǎn wùdǎo hòurén。
We should proceed in the compilation of ancient books and files carefully and scientifically so as not to mislead later generations.
一个人校对这么多版面，有些挂漏是难免的。
Yígè rén jiàoduì zhèmeduō bǎnmiàn，yǒu xiē guàlòu shì nánmiǎn de。
Since so many pages were checked by him alone, it is unavoidable for something to be left out.
这家火锅城的锅底儿是免费的。
Zhèjiā huǒguōchéng de guōdǐr shì miǎnfèi de。
The starting broth for the hot pot is free in this hot pot restaurant.
你总毫末不放，未免过于精细。
Nǐ zǒng háomò búfàng，wèimiǎn guòyú jīngxì。
You are too circumspect, you pay attention to every detail.
人与人之间免不了会产生矛盾，这时我们应该学会互谅。
Rén yǔ rén zhījiān miǎnbùliǎo huì chǎnshēng máodùn，zhèshí wǒmen yīnggāi xuéhuì hùliàng。
Conflict between people is unavoidable. When it happens we should learn to understand each other.
人与人之间需要互通，这样才能避免误解的产生。
Rén yǔ rén zhījiān xūyào hùtōng，zhèyàng cáinéng bìmiǎn wùjiě de chǎnshēng。
People need communications. Only in this way can misunderstandings be avoided.
我们解释两个事情时，应避免互训。
Wǒmen jiěshì liǎnggè shìqing shí，yīng bìmiǎn hùxùn。
When we explain two things, we should avoid circular reference.
这块绿地应该围上护栏，免得有人进出。
Zhèkuài lǜdì yīnggāi wéishàng hùlán，miǎndé yǒurén jìnchū。
There should a railing to enclose the green field to prevent people from entering.
这张画符可以用来消灾免难。
Zhèzhāng huàfú kěyǐ yònglái xiāozāi miǎnnàn。
This talisman can block off disasters, and evil things.
我们去少数民族朋友家里时一定要考虑到他们的讳忌，以免闹出不愉快的事。
Wǒmen qù shǎoshù mínzú péngyou jiā lǐ shí yídìng yào kǎolǜ dào tāmen de huìjì，yǐmiǎn nàochū bùyúkuài de shì。
When we are visiting ethnic minority families, we must bear in mind their social taboos so as not to cause any displeasure.
司机机灵地打了个急转弯才避免了一场车祸。
Sījī jīlíng de dǎ le gè jízhuǎnwān cái bìmiǎn le yìcháng chēhuò。
The driver smartly took a sharp turn, thus avoided an accident.
理发店组织一些发型师为老人免费剪发。
Lǐfàdiàn zǔzhī yìxiē fàxíngshī wèi lǎorén miǎnfèi jiǎnfà。
The barber shop sends a few barbers to cut the hair of old people for free.
我们要避免职场中的“近亲繁殖”现象。
Wǒmen yào bìmiǎn zhíchǎng zhōng de“jìnqīn fánzhí”xiàn xiàng。
We must avoid the &quot;close breeding&quot; phenomenon in companies.
年轻人经事少，遇到问题难免想的不周到。
Niánqīngrén jīngshì shǎo，yùdào wèntí nánmiǎn xiǎng de bùzhōudào。
Young people lack experience and can not consider things in a comprehensive way.
为了避免病从口入，饭前要净手。
Wèile bìmiǎn bìngcóng kǒurù，fànqián yào jìngshǒu。
One must wash his hands before meals to avoid diseases.
自从蠲免了政策中不太合理的成份，人人称快。
Zìcóng juānmiǎn le zhèngcè zhōng bú tài hélǐ de chéngfèn，rénrén chēngkuài。
Since the unreasonable parts of the policy have been removed, everyone is very satisfied.
这片枯草还是及时烧掉，以免不小心造成火灾！

This stretch of withered grass should be burned, or it may cause a fire.

这件事还要好好地匡计一下，以免有什么闪失。

This matter should be calculated more carefully in order to avoid any mishaps.
他患的是劳伤，应该避免劳累，一边治疗一边静养。

He has an internal lesion caused by overexertion, so he\'d better avoid fatigue and rest quietly to recuperate.
贪官多出在吏部，因为他们有任免官员的权力。
Tānguān duō chūzài lìbù，yīnwèi tāmen yǒu rènmiǎn guānyuán de quánlì。
Most corrupt officers were form the Ministry of Official Personal Affairs in feudal China, because they had the power of approving and removing officials.
机场的人太多，避免不了漏检的情况发生。
Jīchǎng de rén tài duō，bìmiǎn bùliǎo lòujiǎn de qíngkuàng fāshēng。
There are too many people in the airport, so occasional checking failures cannot be avoided.
这些天家里没人，家具上有落尘是难免的。

他被获准免考英语和数学两门功课。

由于他当晚正好外出，才免遭杀害。

如果你再细心点的话，完全可以避免这些误译。

招生简章
zhāoshēnɡ jiǎnzhānɡ 
school admission brochure
这篇文章简直是废话连篇。

This article is just so much nonsense.

很多人写文章喜欢用些简古的词汇，让人看不明白什么意思。

这篇文章太过冗长，要简缩一下。

The essay is too wordy, you\'d better condense it.

the Scheme for Simplifying Chinese Characters

Nowadays, people are not buying laptops to simply process words and digits, but to make an integrated use of all its functions.

the Scheme for Simplifying Chinese Characters

汉字简化方案
这次修改完全根据1986年重新发表的《简化字总表》
简化审批手续
简化操作方法。
统一税法，公平税负，简化税制。
繁琐的手续简单化了。
The process of stake purchase has been simplified.
购买股本的手续简化了。
The long story was reduced to a few sentences in the summary.
Zhège chángcháng de gùshi zài zhāiyào lǐ bèi jiǎnhuà wéi jǐ jù huà。
这个长长的故事在摘要里被简化为几句话。
This move will simplify our lives.
Zhè xiàng jìnzhǎn nénggòu jiǎnhuà wǒmen de shēnghuó。
这项进展能够简化我们的生活。
We had to simplify the instructions.
Wǒmen bìxū jiǎnhuà zhǐshì。
我们必须简化指示。
Don\'t oversimplify the instructions.
Bú yào guòyú jiǎnhuà zhǐshì。
不要过于简化指示。
The equation may be written in the conventional form as follows.
Jiāng zhège děngshì huàjiǎn hòu de xíngshì lièjǔ rúxià。
将这个等式化简后的形式列举如下。
Some politicians have been caught polishing their own CVs.
rénmen fāxiàn yìxiē zhèngkè zài měihuà zìjǐ de jiǎnlì。
人们发现一些政客在美化自己的简历。
The play was a dramatization of a short story.
Nàgè jùběn shì duì yí gè jiǎnduǎn shìgù de xìjùhuà。
那个剧本是对一个简短事故的戏剧化。
To put it simply, I won\'t give you my things anymore.
简而言之，我再也不会给你东西了。
in brief ...
简而言之…
in short
简而言之
in sum
[frm] 简而言之
in a word
简而言之
To mark plurality one language may add an extra syllable to the word whereas another may simply change the vowel in the existing final syllable.
Wèile biǎoshì fùshù，yì zhǒng yǔyán kěnéng zài dāncí zhī qián jiāshàng éwài de yīnjié，ér lìng yì zhǒng yǔyán kěnéng zhǐshì jiǎndān de gǎibiàn zuìhòu yí gè yīnjié de yuányīn。
为了表示复数，一种语言可能在单词之前加上额外的音节，而另一种语言可能只是简单地改变最后一个音节的元音。
简单明了
jiǎndān míngliǎo
simple and clear; concise and explicit
春凳讲究设计简单，造型明了。
Chūndèng jiǎngjiū shèjì jiǎndān，zàoxíng míngliǎo。
The design for spring benches should be simple and clear.
说话要简单明了。
简单明了。
the bare facts
简单明了的事实
The teacher explained theory of relativity simply and clearly.
老师简单明了的讲解了相对论。
The plain manner of its style all the more tellingly points up the horror of the case.
Qí jiǎndān de zuò\'àn shǒufǎ gèng míngxiǎn de tūchū le ànjiàn de kǒngbù。
其简单的作案手法更明显地突出了案件的恐怖。
看问题简单化
kàn wèntí jiǎndānhuà 
take a naive view; oversimplify a problem
他总喜欢把简单的事情复杂化。
Tā zǒng xǐhuan bǎ jiǎndān de shìqing fùzáhuà。
He always likes to complicate simple matters.
办公一体化使办公室的工作更简单。
Bàngōng yìtǐhuà shǐ bàngōngshì de gōngzuò gèng jiǎndān。
Office integration makes office work easier.
不可用简单的方式对待学生的思想变化。
Bùkě yòng jiǎndān de fāngshì duìdài xuésheng de sīxiǎng biànhuà.
Changes in student attitudes shouldn\'t be treated lightly.
现在人们购买笔记本电脑并不是简单的以文字和数据处理为主要功能，而是趋向应用集成化。
Xiànzài rénmen gòumǎi bǐjìběn diànnǎo bìng búshì jiǎndān de yǐ wénzì hé shùjù chǔlǐ wéi zhǔyào gōngnéng，érshì qū xiàng yìngyòng jíchénghuà。
Nowadays, people are not buying laptops to simply process words and digits, but to make an integrated use of all its functions.
繁琐的手续简单化了。
你简单地说吧，别净绕脖子。
Nǐ jiǎndān de shuō ba，bié jìng rào bózi。
Just speak simply. Don\'t beat about the bush.
I\'ll try to be brief
我尽量简单地说
Marriage is simply two people agreeing to get together .
Jiǎndān de shuō，hūnyīn jiùshì liǎng gè rén tóngyì zài yìqǐ。
简单地说，婚姻就是两个人同意在一起。
Outline his ideas.
Bǎ tā de sīxiǎng jiǎndān de shuō yíxià。
把他的思想简单地说一下。
Please state your case as succinctly as possible.
Qǐng jǐnliàng jiǎndān de shuōmíng xià nǐ de qíngkuàng。
请尽量简单地说明下你的情况。
Briefly, we have a problem.
Jiǎndān de shuō，wǒmen yùdàole gè wèntí。
简单地说，我们遇到了个问题。
你简单地说吧，别净绕脖子。
Nǐ jiǎndān de shuō ba，bié jìng rào bózi。
Just speak simply. Don\'t beat about the bush.
农民在农忙时都来不及回家吃饭，就在塄坎上简单地吃上几口。
Nóngmín zài nóngmáng shí dōu láibùjí huíjiā chīfàn，jiù zài léngkǎn shàng jiǎndān de chī shàng jǐ kǒu。
During the busy farming period, farmers can\'t even spare time to have meals back at home. They will have a quick meal by the field ridge.
医生简单地处理了他的伤口。
Yīshēng jiǎndān de chǔlǐle tā de shāngkǒu.
The doctor treated his wound simply.
这个地区从事简单商品生产的家庭作坊很多。
Zhège dìqū cóngshì jiǎndān shāngpǐn shēngchǎn de jiātíng zuōfāng hěnduō。
There are many domestic workshops in this area, which are engaged in simple commodity production.
I\'ll try to be brief
我尽量简单地说
Her hair was simply drawn into a bun set high on the crown of the head.
Tā de tóufa jiǎndān de wǎnchéng yí gè fàjì gāogāo pánzài tóudǐng shàng。
她的头发简单地挽成一个发髻高高盘在头顶上。
Food, in our society, is used for many reasons other than simply to satisfy hunger.
Zài wǒmen de shèhuì，liángshi chúle jiǎndān de yòng zuò chōngjī wài hái yòngyú xǔduō qítā de yuányīn。
在我们的社会，粮食除了简单地用做充饥外还用于许多其他的原因。
I explained to him briefly what the problem was.
Wǒ jiǎndān de xiàng tā jiěshìle yíxià wèntí suǒzài。
我简单地向他解释了一下问题所在。
One simply finds oneself in the dream-unless it is a day-dream!
Yígè rén kěyǐ jiǎndān de rènwéi mèngxiǎng néng shíxiàn zìwǒ，chúfēi nà shì báirìmèng。
一个人可以简单地认为梦想能实现自我，除非那是白日梦。
They can simply perform a gesture to  choose their selected option.
Tāmen zhǐyào jiǎndān de zuò gè shǒushì，jiù néng xuǎnzé tāmen xuǎndìng de xiàngmù。
他们只要简单地做个手势，就能选择他们选定的项目。
Marriage is simply two people agreeing to get together .
Jiǎndān de shuō，hūnyīn jiùshì liǎng gè rén tóngyì zài yìqǐ。
简单地说，婚姻就是两个人同意在一起。
He stood up and begin to tick off the events.
Tā zhànqǐlái，kāishǐ jiǎndān de miáoshù zhèxiē shìqing。
他站起来，开始简单地描述这些事情。
We had a word or two about it.
Wǒmen jiù cǐ jiǎndān de tánle liǎngjù。
我们就此简单地谈了两句。
Outline his ideas.
Bǎ tā de sīxiǎng jiǎndān de shuō yíxià。
把他的思想简单地说一下。
Please state your case as succinctly as possible.
Qǐng jǐnliàng jiǎndān de shuōmíng xià nǐ de qíngkuàng。
请尽量简单地说明下你的情况。
To mark plurality one language may add an extra syllable to the word whereas another may simply change the vowel in the existing final syllable.
Wèile biǎoshì fùshù，yì zhǒng yǔyán kěnéng zài dāncí zhī qián jiāshàng éwài de yīnjié，ér lìng yì zhǒng yǔyán kěnéng zhǐshì jiǎndān de gǎibiàn zuìhòu yí gè yīnjié de yuányīn。
为了表示复数，一种语言可能在单词之前加上额外的音节，而另一种语言可能只是简单地改变最后一个音节的元音。
She replied briefly.
Tā jiǎndān de zuòle dáfù。
她简单地做了答复。
Briefly, we have a problem.
Jiǎndān de shuō，wǒmen yùdàole gè wèntí。
简单地说，我们遇到了个问题。
I want to be very brief, as I skate over the next couple of chapters.
wǒ xiǎng yào hěn jiǎndān dàlüè de tí yíxià jiēxiàlái de jǐ zhāng。
我想要很简单大略地提一下接下来的几章。
We rely on simple judgement or wishful thinking too often.
Wǒmen tài duō de yīlài yú jiǎndān pànduàn hé yìxiāngqíngyuàn le。
我们太多地依赖于简单判断和一厢情愿了。
The plain manner of its style all the more tellingly points up the horror of the case.
Qí jiǎndān de zuò\'àn shǒufǎ gèng míngxiǎn de tūchū le ànjiàn de kǒngbù。
其简单的作案手法更明显地突出了案件的恐怖。
Commuters that live near each other and share a common destination form the simplest and most common carpool arrangement.
住在附近的上班族，如果上班地点相同，通常采用最简单最常见的方式一起上班--拼车。
We started to use a simple clinometer, graphical reduction of distance to draw maps in caves.
Wǒmen kāishǐ shǐyòng yì zhǒng jiǎndān de cèxiéqì，jiǎnshǎo tújiě jùlí，bìng huìzhì chū guānyú āoxiàn de dìtú。
我们开始使用一种简单的测斜器，减少图解距离，并绘制出关于凹陷的地图。
这事不简单，需要进一步调查。
Zhè shì bùjiǎndān，xūyào jìnyíbùdiàochá。
The matter is not so simple; it requires further investigation.
他有这么大的进步真不简单。
Tā yǒu zhème dà de jìnbùzhēn bùjiǎndān。
It\'s remarkable he\'s made such good progress.
不然，事情没有那样简单。
Bùrán，shìqing méiyǒu nàyàng jiǎndān。
No, it\'s not as simple as that.
搭配简单
dāpèi jiǎndān 
a simple matching
简单多数
jiǎndān duōshù
a simple majority
他只用简单的几笔就勾勒出了马的轮廓。
Tā zhǐ yòng jiǎndān de jǐ bǐ jiù gōulè chū le mǎ de lúnkuò。
He sketched the outline of a horse with just a few rapid strokes.
这种机器构造简单，使用方便。
Zhèzhǒng jīqì gòuzào jiǎndān，shǐyòngfāngbiàn。
This machine is simple in construction and easy to handle.
简单明了
jiǎndān míngliǎo
simple and clear; concise and explicit
这机器构造简单。
Zhè jīqì gòuzào jiǎndān。
The machine is simple in structure.
简单粗暴
jiǎndān cūbào 
do things in an oversimplified and crude way
不能用简单的方法去解决这个问题。
Bùnéng yòng jiǎndān de fāngfǎ qù jiějué zhège wèntí。
This matter cannot be settled in a summary fashion.
看问题简单化
kàn wèntí jiǎndānhuà 
take a naive view; oversimplify a problem
这个问题嘛，很简单。
Zhège wèntí ma，hěn jiǎndān。
As for this problem, it\'s really quite simple.
事情怕不那么简单。
Shìqingpà bú nàme jiǎndān。
I am afraid things are not that simple.
你简单地说吧，别净绕脖子。
Nǐ jiǎndān de shuō ba，bié jìng rào bózi。
Just speak simply. Don\'t beat about the bush.
头脑简单
tóunǎo jiǎndān 
simple-minded; seeing things too simply
我简单说几句做个引子，希望大家多发表意见。
Wǒ jiǎndān shuō jǐ jù zuò gè yǐn zi，xīwàngdàjiā duō fābiǎo yìjiàn。
I\'ll just say a few words to start the ball rolling.
简单
jiǎndān
simple; uncomplicated
医生建议用避孕栓来避孕，因为它用法简单。
Yīshēng jiànyì yòng bìyùnshuān lái bìyùn，yīnwèi tā yòngfǎ jiǎndān。
Contraceptive suppositories are recommended by doctors, as they are easy to use.
我估计事情不会这么简单，肯定有别情。
Wǒ gūjìshì qíng búhuì zhème jiǎndān，kěndìng yǒu biéqíng。
I don’t think that it is so easy, there must be something else.
这次考试很简单，通过者不特我们三人。
Zhècì kǎoshì hěnjiǎndān，tōngguòzhě bú tè wǒmen sān rén。
It is a simple test which many people passed besides the three of us.
经过简单的设计就能在客厅里隔出一个小小的餐室。
Jīngguò jiǎndān de shèjì jiùnéng zài kètīng lǐ géchū yígè xiǎoxiǎo de cānshì。
A small dining room can be separated from the living room with a simple design.
自己闯天下不是像你想得那么简单。
Zìjǐ chuǎngtiānxià búshì xiàng nǐ xiǎng de nàme jiǎndān。
Venturing into the world is not as simple as you think.
春凳讲究设计简单，造型明了。
Chūndèng jiǎngjiū shèjì jiǎndān，zàoxíng míngliǎo。
The design for spring benches should be simple and clear.
他总喜欢把简单的事情复杂化。
Tā zǒng xǐhuan bǎ jiǎndān de shìqing fùzáhuà。
He always likes to complicate simple matters.
现在生活水平提高了，不仅是解决饥饱那么简单，还要吃得有营养。
Xiànzài shēnghuó shuǐpíng tígāo le，bùjǐn shì jiějué jībǎo nàme jiǎndān，háiyào chī de yǒu yíngyǎng。
Now our living standard has been raised, we should take in enough nutrition besides eating enough food.
现在人们购买笔记本电脑并不是简单的以文字和数据处理为主要功能，而是趋向应用集成化。
Xiànzài rénmen gòumǎi bǐjìběn diànnǎo bìng búshì jiǎndān de yǐ wénzì hé shùjù chǔlǐ wéi zhǔyào gōngnéng，érshì qū xiàng yìngyòng jíchénghuà。
Nowadays, people are not buying laptops to simply process words and digits, but to make an integrated use of all its functions.
我已经习惯每天去跳集体舞，既简单又轻松。
Wǒ yǐjing xíguàn měitiān qù tiào jítǐwǔ，jì jiǎndān yòu qīngsōng。
I am used to doing group dancing every day, which is simple and relaxing.
他没什么技能，只能做些简单劳动。
Tā méi shénme jìnéng，zhǐnéng zuò xiē jiǎndān láodòng。
He has mastered no skill, so he can only do a little simple manual work.
这个地区从事简单商品生产的家庭作坊很多。
Zhège dìqū cóngshì jiǎndān shāngpǐn shēngchǎn de jiātíng zuōfāng hěnduō。
There are many domestic workshops in this area, which are engaged in simple commodity production.
原谅我口拙，这么简单的事我都没说清楚。
Yuánliàng wǒ kǒuzhuō，zhème jiǎndān de shì wǒ dōu méi shuō qīngchu。
Please forgive for not clearly explaining something so plain.
我们买车时，就是看中了这车大方简单的款型。
Wǒmen mǎichē shí，jiùshì kànzhòng le zhè chē dàfāng jiǎndān de kuǎnxíng。
We took a fancy to the car\'s tasteful and simple style, so we bought it.
农民在农忙时都来不及回家吃饭，就在塄坎上简单地吃上几口。
Nóngmín zài nóngmáng shí dōu láibùjí huíjiā chīfàn，jiù zài léngkǎn shàng jiǎndān de chī shàng jǐ kǒu。
During the busy farming period, farmers can\'t even spare time to have meals back at home. They will have a quick meal by the field ridge.
礼宾是一门学问，不像我们想象得那么简单。
Lǐbīn shì yìmén xuéwèn，bú xiàng wǒmen xiǎng xiàng de nàme jiǎndān。
How to receive guests decently is a knowledge which is not as easy as we imagine.
虽然理论上利润率的计算方法很简单，但实际操作起来是很复杂的。
Suīrán lǐlùn shàng lìrùnlǜ de jìsuàn fāngfǎ hěnjiǎndān，dàn shíjì cāozuò qǐlái shì hěnfùzá de。
In theory it is simple to calculate profit margin, but in reality it is a complex operation.
他真是聋聩，连这么简单的道理也不明白。
Tā zhēnshì lóngkuì，lián zhème jiǎndān de dàolǐ yě bùmíngbai。
You are so ignorant that you can not understand such a simple reason.
这么简单的道理，不用明言你也应该知道的。
Zhème jiǎndān de dàolǐ，búyòng míngyán nǐ yě yīnggāi zhīdào de。
You can know this simple truth without speaking frankly.
他这官当得太“简单”了，难道靠命令主义可以处理好工作吗？
Tā zhè guān dāng de tài“jiǎndān”le，nándào kào mìnglìngzhǔyì kěyǐ chǔlǐ hǎo gōngzuò ma？
He holds his post too easy. How can he deal with all work through command?
她觉得当个肖像模特儿挺简单，只要坐在画室里就行了。
Tā juédé dāng gè xiāo xiàng mótèr tǐng jiǎndān，zhǐyào zuòzài huàshì lǐ jiùxíng le。
She thinks that it is easy to be an image model for she only needs sitting in an atelier.
他家铺陈简单，但很有韵味。
Tā jiā pūchén jiǎndān，dàn hěnyǒu yùnwèi。
The arrangement of his home is simple, but full of flavor.
我刚开始学琴，只会弹简单的琴曲。
Wǒ gāng kāishǐ xuéqín，zhǐhuì tán jiǎndān de qínqǔ。
I have just begun to learn the piano and I can only play simple compositions.
这项工作看似简单，干起来竟这么难，可真是上贼船了！
Zhè xiàng gōngzuò kàn sì jiǎndān，gàn qǐlái jìng zhème nán，kě zhēnshi shàng zéichuán le ！
The work seems easy, but is extremely difficult. I have been cheated in joining the work group.
驯兽员的工作很危险，不是你想得那么简单。
Xùnshòuyuán de gōngzuò hěn wēixiǎn，búshì nǐ xiǎng de nàme jiǎndān。
Being an animal trainer is extremely dangerous. It\'s not as easy as you think.
电子技术的普及让海关验放简单多了。
Diànzǐ jìshù de pǔjí ràng hǎiguān yànfàng jiǎndān duō le。
The spread of electronic technology makes it easier to be cleared by customs.
办公一体化使办公室的工作更简单。
Bàngōng yìtǐhuà shǐ bàngōngshì de gōngzuò gèng jiǎndān。
Office integration makes office work easier.
小说的引论部分对全书的内容进行了简单介绍。
Xiǎoshuō de yǐnlùn bùfēn duì quánshū de nèiróng jìnxíng le jiǎndān jièshào。
The preamble of the novel briefly introduces the contents of the book.
由此看来，他并不是一个简单的人物。
Yóucǐ kànlái，tā bìng búshì yígè jiǎndān de rénwù。
Thus it can be seen that he is not that simple a figure.
你不要得意，事情远非你想得这么简单。
Nǐ búyào déyì，shìqing yuǎnfēi nǐ xiǎng de zhème jiǎndān。
Don\'t be so complacent; things are not as simple as you think.
真空泵的原理其实很简单。
Zhēnkōngbèng de yuánlǐ qíshí hěn jiǎndān。
The theory of the vacuum pump is actually very simple.
字符集把复杂的汉字结构变得简单了。
Zì fú jí bǎ fùzá de hànzì jiégòu biàndé jiǎndān le。
The character collection simplifies the complicated structure of Chinese characters.
人跑步，车子移动等运动其实就是简单的机械运动。
Rén pǎobù，chēzi yídòng děng yùndòng qíshí jiùshì jiǎndān de jīxiè yùndòng。
People\'s running and cars\' moving are actually simple mechanical motions.

Now our living standard has been raised, we should take in enough nutrition besides eating enough food.

我已经习惯每天去跳集体舞，既简单又轻松。

很多人写文章喜欢用些简古的词汇，让人看不明白什么意思。

由于旱灾，有不少田地断垄了。
Yóuyú hànzāi，yǒu bùshǎo tiándì duànlǒng le。
Due to the drought, much of the of farmland is without seedlings.
这一带田畴都毁于洪水了，真让人惋惜呀。
Zhè yídài tiánchóu dōu huǐ yú hóngshuǐ le，zhēn ràng rén wǎnxī ya。
All the fields here have been destroyed by floods, which is a real pity.
由于连年战乱，百姓流离，田园荒芜。
Yóuyú liánnián zhànluàn, bǎixìnɡ liúlí, tiányuán huānɡwú。
Owing to long years of war, people left their homes and the land was allowed to lie waste.
挖煤苦于种田。
对于农田沙化现象，我们不能视而不见。
Water drafted from the well irrigates the field.
从井中抽出来的水用于灌溉田地。
They have set 10 acres aside for future farming.
Tāmen yǐ liú chū shí yīngmǔ de tiándì yòng yú jiānglái gēngzhòng。
他们已留出十英亩的田地用于将来耕种。
The effects of the drought are apparent to anyone who sees the parched fields.
Duìyú kàndào gānkū de tiándì de rènhé rén láishuō，gānhàn suǒ zàochéng de yánzhòng hòuguǒ shì yìqīng\'èrchǔ de。
对于看到干枯的田地的任何人来说，干旱所造成的严重后果是一清二楚的。
发现一个新油田
fāxiàn yígè xīnyóutián
discover a new oilfield
石油工人进抵新油田。
新翻过的田里散发出泥土的气息。
田径赛场上，这支新军连连得标。
The discovery of new oilfields brought the price down.
新油田的发现使油价有所降低。
The new Toyota outsells the Honda by a wide margin.
Zhèzhǒng xīn Fēngtián chē de xiāoshòuliàng dàdà chāoguòle Běntián chē。
这种新丰田车的销售量大大超过了本田车。
The farmland itself was being eaten up for new road contruction.
Nóngtián běnshēn zhèng bèi xīn jiàn de dàolù yǎngài。
农田本身正被新建的道路掩盖。
每年秋天大家都要认真地芟秋，这样可以防止农田中生长杂草。
Měinián qiūtiān dàjiā dōuyào rènzhēn de shānqiū，zhèyàng kěyǐ fángzhǐ nóngtián zhōng shēngzhǎng zácǎo。
Every autumn we carefully weed a field of crops and loosen the soil to prevent weeds from growing in it.
他望着那碧油油的麦田，心中满是喜悦。
Tā wàng zhe nà bìyóuyóu de màitián，xīn zhōng mǎn shì xǐyuè。
He was filled with joy when he looked at the green cornfield.
村中自流井里的水源源不断地流向麦田。
Cūn zhōng zìliújǐng lǐ de shuǐ yuányuán búduàn dì liú xiàng màitián。
Water from the artesian well in the village is flowing continuously into the wheatland.
The maize waved gently on the fields.
玉米在田地中翩翩起舞。
Their home is on his father\'s land.
他们的屋宅也列在父亲的田产中。
He farmed 75 acres, the greater part of which was pasture.
Tā gēngzhòngle 75 yīngmǔ tiándì，qízhōng dàbùfèn dōushì cǎodì。
他耕种了75英亩田地，其中大部分都是草地。
Among the eyes of newts and toes of frogs are mounds of dried seahorses.
yìduīduī gàn hǎimǎ bǎifàng zài róngyuán yǎn Hétián jītuǐ zhōngjiān。
一堆堆干海马摆放在蝾螈眼和田鸡腿中间。
The local fields were joined together into one collective farm.

当地的田地都集中在一起，成为集体农场。
Water drafted from the well irrigates the field.
从井中抽出来的水用于灌溉田地。
Water drafted from the well will be used to irrigate the field.
从井中汲取的水将被用来灌溉田地。
农民们打算营造护坡林，护田林。
Nóngmínmen dǎsuàn yíngzào hùpōlín，hùtiánlín。
The farmers decided to build shelter belt, and shelter slope.
他把窖肥洒向麦田，让麦子得到更多的营养。
Tā bǎ jiàoféi sǎ xiàng màitián，ràng màizi dédào gèngduō de yíngyǎng。
He poured the water-logged compost into the wheat field in order to nourish the wheat.
实行从农田到餐桌的全程监控，以期改善营养品质。
孟尝君(田文)

shòutǔ bótián

一场田径比赛

The farmers are doing their best to ensure a good harvest.

在老挝被称为“bombies”的遗留未爆炸炸弹使得农民害怕耕作他们的田地。
The landscape was a discontinuous mosaic of fields and forest areas.
Zhèli de fēngjǐng shì duànduàn-xùxù xiāngjiàn de tiándì hé sēnlín。
这里的风景是断断续续相间的田地和森林。
A man with a dog strolled along the edge of a field.
Nánzǐ qiānzhe gǒu zài tiánjiāndìtóu sànbù。
男子牵着狗在田间地头散步。
He blazed down the field in a blur.
Tā chōng xiàng le tiányě，sùdù kuài de ràng rén kànbùqīng。
他冲向了田野，速度快地让人看不清。
The incas terraced their mountainous land.
Yìnjiārén zài tāmen de shāndì shàng xiū tītián。
印加人在他们的山地上修梯田。
The fields vegetate vigorously.
Tiánjiàn zuòwù wàngshèng de chéngzhǎng。
田间作物旺盛地成长。
What looks like a nice smooth field to you could be a field of barley or hay.
Nǐ kàndào de yí piàn píngdì kěnéng shì dà màitián huò yí piàn gāncǎo。
你看到的一片平地可能是大麦田或一片干草。
These lands were parcelled into farms or manors.
Zhèxiē tǔdì bèi fēnchéngle nóngtián hé zhuāngyuán。
这些土地被分成了农田和庄园。
There were in the same area shepherds abiding in the field, watching over their flock at night.
Zài tóngyàng de dìfang，mùyángrén jūzhùzài tiánjiān，tāmen zài yèjiān kānshǒuzhe tāmen de yángqún。
在同样的地方，牧羊人居住在田间，他们在夜间看守着他们的羊群。
They clear the remaining forest by fire, opening it up for their own agriculture.
Tāmen yòng huǒ shāodiàole shèngyú de línmù，yòng zhè kuài tǔdì kāipìle tāmen zìjǐ de nóngtián。
他们用火烧掉了剩余的林木，用这块土地开辟了他们自己的农田。
低产田
dīchǎntián 
low-yield (or low-yielding) land
丰产田
fēngchǎntián
a highyield plot
高产田
gāochǎntián
high-yield field
稳产高产田
wěnchǎn ɡāochǎn tián 
land (or fields) with high, stable yields
今年大田作物的产量与去年持平。
Jīnnián dàtián zuòwù de chǎnliàng yǔ qùnián chípíng。
The crop output this year is equal to that of last year.
大家考虑一下是否可以利用这片闲田开发房地产？
Dàjiā kǎolǜ yíxià shìfǒu kěyǐ lìyòng zhèpiàn xiántián kāifā fángdìchǎn？
Can we consider if it is possible to use this patch of spare land for real estate?
霸占田产
变低产田为高产田
蓝田盛产玉石。
工业污染造成农田大幅度减产以至绝产。
Their home is on his father\'s land.
他们的屋宅也列在父亲的田产中。
to own land
拥有田产
The largest oil field discovered will produce more than 100,000 barrels per day.
Fāxiàn de zuì dà yóutián jiāng měi tiān chǎnyóu chāoguò shíwàn wàn tǒng。
发现的最大油田将每天产油超过10万桶。
田里的地埂把这片农田分成了很多正方形小块。
Tián lǐ de dìgěng bǎ zhèpiàn nóngtián fēnchéng le hěnduō zhèngfāngxíng xiǎokuài。
Low banks of earth in the field turn it into many square sections.
这条田垄以南的都是属于我的田地。
Zhè tiáo tiánlǒng yǐnán de dōushì shǔyú wǒ de tiándì。
South of the ridge are my fields.
下了一场大雪，田野上白茫茫一片。
Xià le yìcháng dàxuě，tiányě shàng báimángmáng yí piàn。
After the heavy snow, the fields were a vast expanse of whiteness.
碧绿的田野
bìlǜ de tiányě 
green fields
绿色的田野，望不到边际。
Lǜsè de tiányě，wàng bú dào biānjì。
Before me is a boundless stretch of green fields.
旱地变水田。
Hàndì biàn shuǐtián。
Dry land has been turned into paddy fields.
把河里的水车到稻田里。
Bǎ hélǐ de shuǐ chēdào dàotián lǐ。
Lift some water from the river into the paddy fields.
赤着脚在稻田里干活
chìzhe jiǎo zài dàotián lǐ gànhuó 
work barefooted in the paddy fields
葱绿的田野
cōnglǜ de tiányě 
verdant fields
打田埂
dǎ tiángěng 
build low ridges between paddy fields
大搞农田水利
dà gǎo nóngtián shuǐlì 
go all out with irrigation and water conservancy
丹田之气
dāntián zhī qì 
deep breath controlled by the diaphragm
低产田
dīchǎntián 
low-yield (or low-yielding) land
五亩肥田
wǔ mǔ féitián
five mu of fertile land
草木灰可以用来肥田。
Cǎomùhuī kěyǐ yònglái féitián。
Plant ash can be used to fertilize the soil.
粪田
fèntián
manure the fields
丰产田
fēngchǎntián
a highyield plot
改洼地为稻田
gǎi wādì wéi dàotián
transform lowlands into paddy fields
高产田
gāochǎntián
high-yield field
田野上沟渠纵横。
Tiányě shàng gōuqú zònghéng。
The fields are crisscrossed by irrigation canals and ditches.
水牛拉着犁，在稻田里咕唧咕唧地走着。
Shuǐniú lā zhe lí，zài dàotián lǐ gūjī gūjī de zǒu zhe。
The water buffalo squelched up and down the paddy fields, pulling the plough.
渠水汩汩地流入稻田。
Qúshuǐ gǔgǔ de liúrù dàotián。
Gurgling water flowed from the irrigation ditch into the paddy fields.
灌田
ɡuàn tián
irrigate the fields
灌溉农田
ɡuànɡài nónɡtián
irrigate the fields
戽水灌田
hùshuǐ ɡuàntián
bail water to irrigate fields
他把试验田划给这个小组负责。
Tā bǎ shìyàntián huàgěi zhège xiǎozǔ fùzé。
He assigned the experimental plot to that group.
美丽的田野是天然的画幅。
Měilì de tiányě shì tiānrán de huàfú。
The beautiful open country is a painting done by nature.
由于连年战乱，百姓流离，田园荒芜。
Yóuyú liánnián zhànluàn, bǎixìnɡ liúlí, tiányuán huānɡwú。
Owing to long years of war, people left their homes and the land was allowed to lie waste.
挤占绿化田地
jǐzhàn lǜhuà tiándì 
encroach upon a green belt
放水浸灌秧田
fànɡ shuǐ jìnɡuàn yānɡtián
irrigate the rice seedling bed
长期干旱，田地龟裂。
Chángqī gānhàn，tiándì jūnliè。
There has been no rain for a long time and the earth is full of cracks.
在荒原上开拓出大片农田
zài huāngyuán shàngkāituò chū dà piàn nóngtián
open up large areas of wasteland and turn them into farmland
田坎儿
tiánkǎnr
a raised path through fields
科学种田
kēxué zhòngtián
scientific farming
宽广的田野
kuānguǎng de tiányě
a broad expanse of country
田径运动的项目很多，例如跳高、跳远、百米赛跑等。
Tiánjìngyùndòng de xiàng mù hěn duō，lìrú tiàogāo、tiàoyuǎn、bǎi mǐ sàipǎo děng。
There are many track-and-field events, such as the high jump, the long jump, the 100-metre dash, etc.
绿茸茸的稻田
lǜrōngrōng de dàotián 
a lush green rice paddy
落到这步田地
luòdào zhèbù tiándì

煤田地质学
méitián dìzhìxué

pī shān zào tián
level off hilltops and turn them into flat fields
坡地梯田化
pōdì tītiánhuà 
terracing of the land on the slopes
春天来了，田野里充满了生机。
Chūntiān lái le，tiányě lǐ chōngmǎn le shēngjī。
Spring has come and the fields are full of life.
前面是一片稻田。
Qiánmian shì yípiàn dàotián。
There is a stretch of rice fields ahead.
瘦土薄田
shòutǔ bótián
poor soil and barren land
疏通田间的排水沟
shūtōng tiánjiān de páishuǐgōu
dredge the irrigation ditches in the fields
油管把原油从油田直接输往港口。
Yóuguǎn bǎ yuányóu cóng yóutián zhíjiē shūwǎng gǎngkǒu。
The pipeline carries crude oil direct from the oil field to the harbour.
月亮把田野照得刷白。
Yuèliang bǎ tiányě zhào de shuàbái。
The fields turned white under the moon.
水平梯田
shuǐpíng tītián

犁田
lí tián

在田里劳动
zài tián li láodònɡ

你怎么落到这步田地！
Nǐ zěnme luòdào zhèbù tiándì！
How did you get into such a plight?
普通田鼠
pǔtōngtiánshǔ

小溪蜿蜒流过田野。
Xiǎoxī wānyán liúguò tiányě。 
The stream winds through the fields.
变沙漠为良田
biàn shāmò wéi liángtián

稳产高产田
wěnchǎn ɡāochǎn tián 
land (or fields) with high, stable yields
沃田
wòtián

昔日荒坡，今日良田。
Xīrì huānɡpō, jīnrì liánɡtián。 
The once barren hillsides are now good farmland.
大雪掩盖着田野。
Dàxuě yǎngài zhe tiányě。
The fields were covered with snow.
眼前是一片碧绿的稻田。
Yǎnqián shì yípiàn bìlǜ de dàotián。
Before our eyes was a stretch of green paddy fields.
移沙造田
yí shā zào tián

yǐn shuǐ ɡuàn tián

改山造田可是硬碰硬的事。
Gǎi shān zào tián kěshì yìngpèngyìng de shì。
To transform hills into fields is an extremely tough job.

引淤肥田
yǐnyūféitián

耕作园田化

张有田直朴诚实，说话不会拐弯。
ZhāngYǒutián zhípǔ chéngshí，shuōhuà bú huì guǎiwān。
Zhang Youtian is forthright, and never beats about the bush.
种子田
zhǒng zitián 
seed-breeding field
过去这里的水田多只种一季，现在全部种两季。
Guòqù zhèlǐ de shuǐtián duō zhǐ zhòngyí jì，xiànzài quánbùzhòngliǎngjì。
Most paddy fields here used to yield only one crop a year, but now they all yield two crops.
肥田粉
féitiánfěn

tiángěng

méitián
coalfield
我家承包了5亩坝田。
Wǒjiā chéngbāo le wǔmǔ bàtián。
My family contracted five mu of flat land.
应该及时拔掉稻田里的稗草。
Yīnggāi jíshí bádiào dàotián lǐ de bàicǎo。
The barnyard grass in the rice fields should be pulled out quickly.
进入春季，要做好农田的保墒保苗工作。
Jìnrù chūnjì，yào zuò hǎo nóngtián de bǎoshāng bǎomiáo gōngzuò。
In the coming spring, it is extremely important to keep the moisture content in farmland up to a certain level, to ensure the growth of crops.
农民们正在田地里开展抗旱保收。
Nóngmínmen zhèngzài tiándì lǐ kāizhǎn kànghàn bǎoshōu。
The farmers are doing their best to ensure a good harvest.
那头牛受惊了，在田地里四处奔突。
Nàtóu niú shòujīng le，zài tiándì lǐ sìchù bēntū。
The startled ox dashed about in all directions in the fields.
他望着那碧油油的麦田，心中满是喜悦。
Tā wàng zhe nà bìyóuyóu de màitián，xīn zhōng mǎn shì xǐyuè。
He was filled with joy when he looked at the green cornfield.
这块薄田没有人愿意耕种。
Zhèkuài bótián méiyǒu rén yuànyì gēngzhòng。
Nobody is willing to till this infertile land.
夜晚的田野里，可以听到一片草虫的叫声。
Yèwǎn de tiányě lǐ，kěyǐ tīngdào yípiàn cǎochóng de jiàoshēng。
The singing of grass hoppers can be heard all over the evening fields
在田间安放一些草人，可以起到吓走鸟兽的作用。
Zài tiánjiān ānfàng yìxiē cǎorén，kěyǐ qǐdào xiàzǒu niǎoshòu de zuòyòng。
Some scarecrows in the fields can scare away birds, and animals.
草野田间，流传着许多动人的故事。
Cǎoyě tiánjiān，liúchuánzhe xǔduō dòngrén de gùshì。
Most moving folklore is orally handed down in the countryside.
他把小麦茬子堆在了田埂边上。
Tā bǎ xiǎomàicházi duīzài le tiángěng biānshàng。
He piled the wheat stubble along the ridge of the fields.
这片田地还要依靠车水来灌溉。
Zhè piàn tiándì háiyào yīkào chēshuǐ lái guàngài。
This field needs to be irrigated by waterwheel.
午休时她们就坐在田边扯闲篇了。
Wǔxiū shí tāmen jiù zuòzài tiánbiān chěxiánpiān le。
They sat by the field, and chatted during the noon break.
为了进行蛏类养殖，他们在海边修建了很多蛏田。
Wèile jìnxíng chēnglèi yǎngzhí，tāmen zài hǎibiān xiūjiàn le hěnduō chēngtián。
They have built many farms by the sea to raise razor clams.
他干了一程子农活，正坐在田边休息。
Tā gàn le yìchéngzi nónghuó，zhèng zuò zài tiánbiān xiūxi。
After a short time of farm work, he is sitting by the fields having a rest.
冲田的形成与该地区的地形状况有关。
Chōngtián de xíngchéng yǔ gāidìqū de dìxíng zhuàngkuàng yǒuguān。
Formation of paddy fields are related to the local terrain.
他正忙着锄田呢，肯定没空去城里。
Tā zhèng máng zhe chútián ne，kěndìng méikòng qù chénglǐ。
He is busy hoeing the fields. I am sure he has no time to go to the city.
村长带着几个人为村里的孤寡老人代耕田地。
Cūnzhǎng dài zhe jǐgè rén wèi cūn lǐ de gūguǎ lǎorén dàigēng tiándì。
The village head led several farmers to plough for the heirless elderly.
这个地区已经开始施行电灌农田了。
Zhège dìqū yǐjing kāishǐ shīxíng diànguàn nóngtián le。
Irrigation by electric power is already used in this region.
由于旱灾，有不少田地断垄了。
Yóuyú hànzāi，yǒu bùshǎo tiándì duànlǒng le。
Due to the drought, much of the of farmland is without seedlings.
肥水不流外人田，这项工程咱们自己包下吧。
Féishuǐ bùliú wàirén tián，zhè xiàng gōngchéng zánmen zìjǐ bāo xià ba。
Rich water should be kept in one\'s own fields, let\'s contract this job ourselves.
那几头耕牛正在耕田。
Nà jǐ tóu gēngniú zhèngzài gēngtián。
These farm cattle are ploughing.
他们家世代靠耕田为生。
Tāmen jiā shìdài kào gēngtián wéi shēng。
They have made a living by working on the farm for generations.
这几亩耕田的土质极好。
Zhè jǐ mǔ gēngtián de tǔzhì jíhǎo。
The soil texture of this cultivated land is extremely good.
君主昏庸，开国元勋们纷纷辞职归田。
Jūnzhǔ hūnyōng，kāiguó yuánxūnmen fēnfēn cízhí guītián。
The founding heroes resigned from office and returned home one after another because of the fatuous and self-indulgent ruler.
做到水肥归田，就能使土地肥沃起来。
Zuòdào shuǐféi guītián，jiù néng shǐ tǔdì féiwò qǐlái。
Irrigating the land with good water is a way to make the land fertile.
望着浩浩的田野，我仿佛回到了故乡。
Wàng zhe hàohào de tiányě，wǒ fǎngfú huídào le gùxiāng。
Staring at the vast field, it seems that have I returned to my birthplace.
农民们打算营造护坡林，护田林。
Nóngmínmen dǎsuàn yíngzào hùpōlín，hùtiánlín。
The farmers decided to build shelter belt, and shelter slope.
还田给农民是上级领导审批的，你必须执行。
Huántián gěi nóngmín shì shàngjí lǐngdǎo shěnpī de，nǐ bìxū zhíxíng。
Returning the farm land to farmers is examined, and approved by the higher-up. You must execute it.
他这几天一直在地里为庄稼还田。
Tā zhè jǐtiān yìzhízàidì lǐ wèi zhuāngjià huántián。
He has been working in the field, top dressing crop-stalk made fertilizers to the crop.
这几天很旱，大家都接天上的雨水，积水浇田。
Zhè jǐtiān hěnhàn，dàjiā dōu jiē tiānshàng de yǔshuǐ，jīshuǐ jiāotián。
It has been too hot in recent days. People are collecting rain water to irrigate the land.
他把窖肥洒向麦田，让麦子得到更多的营养。
Tā bǎ jiàoféi sǎ xiàng màitián，ràng màizi dédào gèngduō de yíngyǎng。
He poured the water-logged compost into the wheat field in order to nourish the wheat.
这一片金晃晃的麦田真美啊。
Zhè yípiàn jīnhuǎnghuǎng de màitián zhēn měi a。
This golden field is so beautiful.
这次的历史考试考了“井田制”的内容。
Zhècì de lìshǐ kǎoshì kǎo le“jǐngtiánzhì”de nèiróng。
The students are tested on the content of &quot;the well-field system&quot; on their history exam.
看着农田的庄稼露苗，他欣慰极了。
Kàn zhe nóngtián de zhuāngjià lòumiáo，tā xīnwèi jí le。
He is satisfied to see the sprouting of the crops.
他每天都要到田地里对苗情作详细的记录。
Tā měitiān dōuyào dào tiándì lǐ duì miáoqíng zuò xiángxì de jìlù。
He goes to the field, and records the detailed growth of the seedlings every day.
为了方便农田灌溉，我们修了条明渠。
Wèile fāngbiàn nóngtián guàngài，wǒmen xiū le tiáo míngqú。
In order to make irrigation convenient, we have built an open ditch.
他有一块用青田石刻的印章。
Tā yǒu yí kuài yòng qīngtiánshí kè de yìnzhāng。
He has a seal made of Qingtian stone.
他正在把种子撒布在田地里。
Tā zhèngzài bǎ zhǒng zi sǎbùzài tiándì lǐ。
He is planting seeds in the fields.
今年的洪水冲坏了无数桑田，真让人痛心。
Jīnnián de hóngshuǐ chōnghuài le wú shù sāngtián，zhēn ràng rén tòngxīn。
This year, the flood has damaged innumerable mulberry fields, which is quite distressing.
我们应该充分利用好这几亩沙田。
Wǒmen yīnggāi chōngfēn lìyòng hǎo zhè jǐ mǔ shātián。
We should make full use of the Mous of beach land.
每年秋天大家都要认真地芟秋，这样可以防止农田中生长杂草。
Měinián qiūtiān dàjiā dōuyào rènzhēn de shānqiū，zhèyàng kěyǐ fángzhǐ nóngtián zhōng shēngzhǎng zácǎo。
Every autumn we carefully weed a field of crops and loosen the soil to prevent weeds from growing in it.
他正在田里辛苦地芟夷呢。
Tā zhèngzài tián lǐ xīnkǔ de shānyí ne。
He is hard at work uprooting wild grass in the field.
随着农业科技不断发展，畲田的历史早就结束了。
Suí zhe nóngyè kējì bùduànfāzhǎn，shētián de lìshǐ zǎo jiù jiéshù le。
Slash-and-burn cultivation has long stopped due to the continuous development of agricultural technology.
播种以前必需先松解田地。
Bōzhǒng yǐqián bìxū xiān sōngjiě tiándì。
The land must be plowed before seeding.
他正在用耥耙给稻田除去杂草。
Tā zhèngzài yòng tǎngpá gěi dàotián chúqù zácǎo。
He is removing weeds with a harrow in the rice field.
我一整天都在田里趟地，快累死了。
Wǒ yì zhěngtiān dōu zài tián lǐ tàngdì，kuài lèisǐ le。
I have been working all day in the field, which has exhausted me.
我决定试着在这块田地里套作两种蔬菜。
Wǒ juédìng shì zhe zài zhèkuài tiándì lǐ tàozuò liǎngzhǒng shūcài。
I\'ve decided to use interplanting in this field.
利用这种提灌设备就可以解决梯田的灌溉问题了。
Lìyòng zhèzhǒng tíguàn shèbèi jiù kěyǐ jiějué tītián de guàngài wèntí le。
This kind of pump drainage irrigation equipment can help achieve the irrigation of terraced fields.
我们要修建一个提水工程，灌溉山上的农田。
Wǒmen yào xiūjiàn yígè tíshuǐ gōngchéng，guàngài shān shàng de nóngtián。
We are planning to build a water-raising project to irrigate the farmland on the hills.
这一带田畴都毁于洪水了，真让人惋惜呀。
Zhè yídài tiánchóu dōu huǐ yú hóngshuǐ le，zhēn ràng rén wǎnxī ya。
All the fields here have been destroyed by floods, which is a real pity.
旧时农户每年都要交纳繁重的田赋。
Jiùshí nónghù měinián dōuyào jiāonà fánzhòng de tiánfù。
In the past, all the peasant households had to hand in a lot of land tax every year.
咱们向前面的田家讨一碗水喝吧。
Zánmen xiàng qiánmiàn de tiánjiā tǎo yìwǎn shuǐ hē ba。
Let\'s ask the peasant family for a cup of water.
我校派出了五名运动员参加这次田径赛。
Wǒ xiào pàichū le wǔ míng yùndòngyuán cānjiā zhècì tiánjìngsài。
The school has sent five athletes to take part in the upcoming track and field meet.
你到田坎上把那袋种子取过来。
Nǐ dào tiánkǎn shàng bǎ nà dài zhǒng zi qǔ guòlái。
Please go to the ridge and bring the bag of seeds here.
我走累了，就坐在田垄上休息。
Wǒ zǒu lèi le，jiù zuòzài tiánlǒng shàng xiūxi。
I was tired after a long walk, so I sat down and had a rest on the ridge.
药店的这个小伙计，还不能分辨出哪个是田七。
Yàodiàn de zhège xiǎo huǒjì，hái bùnéng fēnbiàn chū nǎgè shì tiánqī。
The boy in the medicine shop can\'t tell the pseudo-ginseng from other medicines.
她每天做好了午饭就送到田头去。
Tā měitiān zuòhǎo le wǔfàn jiù sòngdào tiántóu qù。
Every day when she has cooked the meal, she brings it to the side of the fields.
田头里的农活太多，我已经忙不过来了。
Tiántóu lǐ de nónghuó tài duō，wǒ yǐjing mángbúguòlái le。
I\'m too busy with all the work in the fields.
现在的很多都市人向往那种田园化的生活。
Xiànzài de hěnduō dūshìrén xiàng wǎng nàzhǒng tiányuánhuà de shēnghuó。
Many people living in big cities yearn for an idyllic country life.
这是一首多么优美的田园诗呀！
Zhè shì yì shǒu duōme yōuměi de tiányuánshī ya！
What beautiful pastoral poetry it is!
明天又到了交田租的日子了。
Míngtiān yòu dào le jiāo tiánzū de rìzi le。
Tomorrow is the day for paying the land rent.
陶渊明无心做官，最终选择退隐山林，享受田园生活的乐趣。
Táo Yuānmíng wúxīn zuòguān，zuì zhōng xuǎnzé tuìyǐn shānlín，xiǎngshòu tiányuán shēnghuó de lèqù。
Tao Yuanming was not interested in becoming an official, and finally chose to be a hermit in a forest enjoying the fun of rural life.
夏天走近稻田就可以听到一片蛙鸣。
Xiàtiān zǒujìn dàotián jiù kěyǐ tīngdào yípiàn wāmíng。
One can hear the croak of frogs when approaching a paddy field.
我公司在外海海域又发现了一个大油田。
Wǒ gōngsī zài wàihǎi hǎiyù yòu fāxiàn le yígè dàyóutián。
Our company discovered a large oil field in the open sea.
大家考虑一下是否可以利用这片闲田开发房地产？
Dàjiā kǎolǜ yíxià shìfǒu kěyǐ lìyòng zhèpiàn xiántián kāifā fángdìchǎn？
Can we consider if it is possible to use this patch of spare land for real estate?
田野里一片漆黑，只有几点荧火偶尔闪过。
Tiányě lǐ yípiàn qīhēi，zhǐyǒu jǐ diǎn yínghuǒ ǒuěr shǎnguò。
The field was very dark, with just a few glimmering lights.
水稻育秧已经结束，很快就能下田栽种了。
Shuǐdào yùyāng yǐjing jiéshù，hěnkuài jiùnéng xiàtián zāizhòng le。
People have finished raising rice seedlings and will be able to plant them in the field soon.
农民正在田地里栽插水稻。
Nóngmín zhèngzài tiándì lǐ zāichā shuǐdào。
Farmers are transplanting rice seedlings.
我把责任田转借给他耕种。
Wǒ bǎ zérèntián zhuǎnjiè gěi tā gēngzhòng。
I have transferred the possession of my farmland under lease to him.
他把汽车开到蔗田边，拉甘蔗去糖厂。
Tā bǎ qìchē kāidào zhètiánbiān，lā gān zhe qù tángchǎng。
He drove his car to the side of the sugarcane field, and took the sugarcanes to the sugar factory.
他自己没有田地只能为庄园主当庄员。
Tā zìjǐ méiyǒu tiándì zhǐnéng wèi zhuāngyuánzhǔ dāng zhuāngyuán。
As he owns no land, he has no choice but to work as a labourer for the owner of the manor.
村中自流井里的水源源不断地流向麦田。
Cūn zhōng zìliújǐng lǐ de shuǐ yuányuán búduàn dì liú xiàng màitián。
Water from the artesian well in the village is flowing continuously into the wheatland.
今年大田作物的产量与去年持平。
Jīnnián dàtián zuòwù de chǎnliàng yǔ qùnián chípíng。
The crop output this year is equal to that of last year.
农民们在田地里正掰玉米呢。
Nóngmínmen zài tiándì lǐ zhèng bāiyùmǐ ne。
The farmers are picking maize in the fields.
马在田野上奔驰。
Mǎ zài tiányěshàng bēnchí。
The horse is galloping across the fields.
农民在田里播种小麦。
Nóngmín zàitiánlǐ bōzhòng xiǎomài。
Farmers are sowing the field with wheat.
这片田地不久前刚开垦。
Zhèpiàntiándì bùjiǔqián gāngkāikěn。
This land has only just been cultivated.
多年后重返故乡，真有种沧海桑田的感觉。
Duōniánhòu chóngfǎn gùxiāng，zhēn yǒuzhǒng cānghǎisāngtiánde gǎnjué。
Returning home after so many years, I had the impression that the place had undergone a complete transformation.

那些人在田里挖水渠。

在同样的地方，牧羊人居住在田间，他们在夜间看守着他们的羊群。
He farmed 75 acres, the greater part of which was pasture.
Tā gēngzhòngle 75 yīngmǔ tiándì，qízhōng dàbùfèn dōushì cǎodì。
他耕种了75英亩田地，其中大部分都是草地。
They clear the remaining forest by fire, opening it up for their own agriculture.
Tāmen yòng huǒ shāodiàole shèngyú de línmù，yòng zhè kuài tǔdì kāipìle tāmen zìjǐ de nóngtián。
他们用火烧掉了剩余的林木，用这块土地开辟了他们自己的农田。
What looks like a nice smooth field to you could be a field of barley or hay.
Nǐ kàndào de yí piàn píngdì kěnéng shì dà màitián huò yí piàn gāncǎo。
你看到的一片平地可能是大麦田或一片干草。
He blazed down the field in a blur.
Tā chōng xiàng le tiányě，sùdù kuài de ràng rén kànbùqīng。
他冲向了田野，速度快地让人看不清。

The sheep were tearing across the field all bunched up together.

The local fields were joined together into one collective farm.

当地的田地都集中在一起，成为集体农场。
He had to work the fields as a child and consequently did not go to school.

他不得不在小时候就去田里干活，因此没有上过学。
The gates into the fields where the cows were grazing were all shut.
Suǒyǒu tōngxiàng nǎiniú chīcǎo de tiányě de mén dōu guānbì le。

Most of the field was still quilted with cut hay.

大部分的田野里仍然盖着割下的干草。
A man with a dog strolled along the edge of a field.
Nánzǐ qiānzhe gǒu zài tiánjiāndìtóu sànbù。
男子牵着狗在田间地头散步。
Most of the field was still covered with cut hay.
Dàduōshù tiándì réngrán bèi gē xià de gāncǎo fùgàizhe。
大多数田地仍然被割下的干草覆盖着。
The largest oil field discovered will produce more than 100,000 barrels per day.
Fāxiàn de zuì dà yóutián jiāng měi tiān chǎnyóu chāoguò shíwàn wàn tǒng。
发现的最大油田将每天产油超过10万桶。

They had labored in the fields together for several years.

他们已经一起在田里辛苦劳作好几年了。

2008年丰田在美国的销量超过福特，名列第二。
今年大田作物的产量与去年持平。
Jīnnián dàtián zuòwù de chǎnliàng yǔ qùnián chípíng。
The crop output this year is equal to that of last year.
下了一场大雪，田野上白茫茫一片。
Xià le yìcháng dàxuě，tiányě shàng báimángmáng yí piàn。
After the heavy snow, the fields were a vast expanse of whiteness.
我公司在外海海域又发现了一个大油田。
Wǒ gōngsī zài wàihǎi hǎiyù yòu fāxiàn le yígè dàyóutián。
Our company discovered a large oil field in the open sea.
大搞农田水利
dà gǎo nóngtián shuǐlì 
go all out with irrigation and water conservancy

大雪掩盖着田野。
Dàxuě yǎngài zhe tiányě。
The fields were covered with snow.
这几天很旱，大家都接天上的雨水，积水浇田。
Zhè jǐtiān hěnhàn，dàjiā dōu jiē tiānshàng de yǔshuǐ，jīshuǐ jiāotián。
It has been too hot in recent days. People are collecting rain water to irrigate the land.
大家考虑一下是否可以利用这片闲田开发房地产？

每年秋天大家都要认真地芟秋，这样可以防止农田中生长杂草。
Měinián qiūtiān dàjiā dōuyào rènzhēn de shānqiū，zhèyàng kěyǐ fángzhǐ nóngtián zhōng shēngzhǎng zácǎo。

这片大田改种蔬菜

干旱严重，大片稻田都干裂了
泥石流淹埋了大片良田。
一丘二亩大小的稻田。
Cotton，hay，and grain are field crops.
Miánhuā、gāncǎo hé gǔwù dōushì dàtiánzuòwù。

They plan to expand rice plots this year.
他们今年打算扩大稻田面积。
What looks like a nice smooth field to you could be a field of barley or hay.
Nǐ kàndào de yí piàn píngdì kěnéng shì dà màitián huò yí piàn gāncǎo。

The largest oil field discovered will produce more than 100,000 barrels per day.

大多数田地仍然被割下的干草覆盖着。

这种新丰田车的销售量大大超过了本田车。

大部分的田野里仍然盖着割下的干草。
There are acres of corn in the field.
Tiánlǐ yǒu dàliàng de yùmǐ。
田里有大量的玉米。

我在成田机场换乘航班。
田里的地埂把这片农田分成了很多正方形小块。

自习时间
zìxí shíjiān 
time for individual study
自习
zìxí
(of students) study by oneself in scheduled time or free time
早自习时，老师请了一位同学来领读。
Zǎozìxí shí，lǎoshī qǐng le yíwèi tóngxué lái lǐngdú。
The teacher invited a student to lead the reading aloud in morning individual study class.
等我们赶回自习室的时候，门已经落锁了。
Děng wǒmen gǎnhuí zìxíshì de shíhou，mén yǐjing luòsuǒ le。
When we hurried back to the self-study room, the door had already been locked.
每天下晚自习后，我都会从小吃部买两个咸鸭蛋。
Měitiān xià wǎnzìxí hòu，wǒ dōuhuì cóng xiǎochībùmǎi liǎnggè xiányādàn。
I buy two salted eggs in the snack bar every day when I finish my evening classes.
由于交通阻塞，他早自习迟到了。
Yóuyú jiāotōng zǔsè，tā zǎozìxí chídào le。
Due to the traffic jam, he was late for the individual study in the morning.
回想起小时候自己学习不是太努力，他深感内愧。
Huíxiǎng qǐ xiǎoshíhòu zìjǐ xuéxí búshì tài nǔlì,tā shēngǎn nèikuì.
He feels ashamed of himself because he didn\'t study hard when he was young.
他染上了吸毒的恶习，不能自拔。
Tā rǎnshàng le xīdú de èxí，bùnéng zìbá。
He cannot extricate himself from the drug habit.

xiàng gè fāngmiàn xuéxí，fēngfù zìjǐ de zhīshi

口外的人有自己的生活习惯！
Kǒuwài de rén yǒu zìjǐ de shēnghuó xíguàn！
People north of Zhangjiakou have their own habits and customs.
他每天练习书法自得其乐。
Tā měitiān liànxí shūfǎ zìdé qílè。
He practiced calligraphy every day, deriving much pleasure from it.
现在你不好好学习，将来你自会懊悔的。
Xiànzài nǐ bùhǎohāo xuéxí，jiānglái nǐ zì huì àohuǐ de。
If you don\'t study hard now, you will regret it in the future.
我一直怀疑自己有梦游的习惯。
Wǒ yìzhí huáiyí zìjǐ yǒu mèngyóu de xíguàn。
I always suspect that I have somnambulism.
为了学习滑冰，他给自己买了一个冰车。
Wèile xuéxí huábīng，tā gěi zìjǐ mǎi le yígè bīngchē。
He bought himself a device with ice skate blades to learn to skate.
他是个自由惯了的人，最不习惯被羁勒。
Tā shì gè zìyóu guàn le de rén，zuì bùxíguàn bèi jīlè。
He is always free, and so is unaccustomed to being restrained.
学习好的学生往往自觉性比较强。
Xuéxí hǎo de xuésheng wǎngwǎng zìjuéxìng bǐjiào qiáng。
Good students are usually more self-conscious.
学习别人的优点，弥补自己的不足
Xuéxí biéren de yōudiǎn，míbǔ zìjǐ de bùzú。
learn from other people\'s strong points to counteract one\'s own weaknesses
学习别人的长处，克服自己的弱点。
Xuéxí biérén de chángchù，kèfú zìjǐ de ruòdiǎn。
Emulate others\' strong points and overcome one\'s own weaknesses.
她自觉才思不敏，所以学起习来更加努力。
Tā zìjué cáisī bùmǐn，suǒyǐ xuéqǐxílái gèngjiā nǔlì。
She knows that she is not that smart, so she studies a lot harder.
人人要养成遵守法度的习惯，处处严格要求自己。
Rénrén yào yǎngchéng zūnshǒu fǎdù de xíguàn，chùchù yángé yàoqiú zìjǐ。
Everybody should conform to norms and be strict with themselves.
我们应当学习他们的强点来弥补自己的弱点。
Wǒmen yīngdāngxuéxí tāmen de qiángdiǎn lái míbǔ zìjǐ de ruòdiǎn。
We should learn from their strong points to offset our weak ones.
自从失明以后，他已经慢慢习惯于借助盲杖行走了。
Zìcóng shīmíng yǐhòu，tā yǐjing mànmàn xíguànyú jièzhù mángzhàng xíngzǒu le。
Since losing his eyesight, he has gradually gotten used to walking with a cane.
通过学习历史可以鉴往知来，对自己的发展有很大的帮助。

All learners wish to revise their elementary English in small groups or on their own at home.

I wasn\'t used to doing things by myself.
Wǒ bù xíguàn dúzì zuòshì。
我不习惯独自做事。
The scientist corresponds with colleagues in order to learn about matters relevant to her own research.

这个科学家和同事通信是为了学习与她自己的研究有关的东西。

每天练习后，我能自信的游泳了。

她习惯了不为自己辩解。
He formed the habit of taking long solitary walks.
他养成了独自长途徒步走的习惯。
He cut his own throat by not studying for the exams.

我很高兴自己没有赌博的恶习。
Nutritionally, her new diet is suicide.

从营养上来说，她新的饮食习惯简直就是自杀。
The people who never smoke save themselves vast amounts of money.
没有吸烟习惯的人可以为自己节省一大笔钱。

一个瑜伽修炼者，应该控制自己，饮食有益适中，练习调息。

jūnshì yǎnxí

practice with live ammunition

xiāofánɡ yǎnxí
fire drill
民兵演习
mínbīnɡ yǎnxí

yěwài yǎnxí
field exercise
夜间演习
yèjiān yǎnxí
night exercise
战术演习
zhànshù yǎnxí 
tactical manoeuvre
进行真枪实弹的演习
jìnxíngzhēnqiāngshídàn de yǎnxí 
conduct exercises (or manoeuvres) with live ammunition
这次军事演习中，假想敌被我方全部歼灭了。
Zhècì jūnshì yǎnxí zhōng，jiǎxiǎngdí bèi wǒ fāng quánbùjiānmiè le。
In the military exercise, the opposition was annihilated by our army.
在本次军事演习中，将校们在指挥室指挥作战。
Zài běn cì jūnshì yǎnxí zhōng，jiàngxiàomen zài zhǐhuīshì zhǐhuī zuòzhàn。
During this military exercise, high ranking officers commanded the battle from the command room.
士兵在军事演习时必须按教令行动。
Shìbīng zài jūnshì yǎnxí shí bìxū àn jiàolìng xíngdòng。
Soldiers are supposed to follow the instruction manual  during military exercises.
那儿有辆救火车正在进行救火演习。
Nàr yǒu liàng jiùhuǒchē zhèngzài jìnxíng jiùhuǒ yǎnxí。
A fire engine is rehearsing now.
最近一周，他们部队正在进行空降兵演习。
Zuìjìn yìzhōu，tāmen bùduì zhèngzài jìnxíng kōngjiàngbīng yǎnxí。
战斗演习时，我摸哨成功，得到了上级嘉奖。
Zhàndòu yǎnxí shí，wǒ mōshào chénggōng，dédào le shàngjí jiājiǎng。
In the military maneuver, I successfully attacked the enemy sentinels in the dark, and received a citation from my superior.
在军事演习中，蓝军企图摸营，被红军挫败。
Zài jūnshì yǎnxí zhōng，lánjūn qǐtú mōyíng，bèi hóngjūn cuòbài。
In the military maneuver, the blue army attempted to attack the red army’s sentinels in the dark, but was defeated.
参加演习的人都不明白，瞎火怎么可能会爆炸？
Cānjiā yǎnxí de rén dōu bùmíngbai，xiāhuǒ zěnme kěnéng huì bàozhà？
Everyone who took part in the rehearsal are confused as to the reason why a dud can explode.
为确保演习成功，指导员常去相看地形。
Wèi quèbǎo yǎnxí chénggōng，zhǐdǎoyuán chángqù xiāngkàn dìxíng。
The instructor often goes to check the terrain to ensure the success of the military exercises.
昨天的军事演习，甲方放了一个哑炮。
Zuótiān de jūnshì yǎnxí，jiǎfāng fàng le yígè yǎpào。
During yesterday\'s sham battle, party A fired a dud.
由于没有实战经验，我们的海军在很大程度上只能依靠演习。
yóu yú méi yǒu shí zhàn jīng yàn，wǒ men de hǎi jūn zài hěn dà chéng dù shàng zhǐ néng yī kào yǎn xí。
Without tactical experience our navy had to rely heavily on war-gaming.
当年他们就在山上的演兵场练习打靶。
Dàngnián tāmen jiù zài shān shàng de yǎnbīngchǎng liànxí dǎbǎ。
They were doing shooting practice in the drilling ground on the hill that year.
姐姐15岁的时候考入艺校学习小旦表演。
Jiějie shíwǔsuì de shíhou kǎorù yìxiào xuéxí xiǎodàn biǎoyǎn。
My sister was enrolled in an art school at 15 to learn to play the role of xiaodan in Beijing opera.
小王考上了北京电影学院，专门学习影剧表演。
Xiǎo Wáng kǎoshàng le Běijīng diànyǐng xuéyuàn，zhuānmén xuéxí yǐngjù biǎoyǎn。
Xiaowang passed the exam and entered the Beijing Film Academy, majoring in film and play performance.

反恐怖演习。
The flight commander called an end to the tactical phase of the exercise.
Fēixíng zhǐhuīguān jiéshùle yǎnxí zhōng de zhànshù yǎnliàn bùfen。
飞行指挥官结束了演习中的战术演练部分。
a public relations exercise
公关演习
Typically, war-games takes roughly a year to prepare.
一般来说，军事演习需要准备大概一年。
The army will run a war-game next month.
下个月军队将会举行一次军事演习。
Great military force of the country was exposed in the war exercise.
在战争演习中，该国展现出了强大的军事力量。
I began to drill the boys in military exercises and procedures.
Wǒ kāishǐ ànzhào jūnshì yǎnxí hé chéngxù lái xùnliàn nánháimen。
我开始按照军事演习和程序来训练男孩们。
The war exercise was a super attempt to recreate a war.
Jūnshìyǎnxí jiùshì yào zuì dàxiàndù de chángshì chóngxiàn yì chǎng zhànzhēng。
军事演习就是要最大限度的尝试重现一场战争。
All children need to get out of the building during a fire drill.
Zài xiāofáng yǎnxí zhōng，suǒyǒu de háizi dōu bìxū chèchū dàlóu。
在消防演习中，所有的孩子都必须撤出大楼。
The band is accustomed to playing requests for the audience.
Zhège yuèduì xíguàn yú yǎnzòu guānzhòng diǎnbō de jiémù。
这个乐队习惯于演奏观众点播的节目。
I would like to become a good actor, that\'s why I\'m studying so hard.
我想成为一名好演员，这就是我努力学习的原因。
Some people learn how to play jazz by ear.
一些人学习如何不看乐谱来演奏爵士乐。
I used to hesitate when I gave speeches before large groups of people but now I am used to it.
我曾经在很多人面前演讲时会结巴，但现在已经习惯了。
I\'m preparing and studying in order to act the Hamlet part.
我正在为扮演哈姆雷特这个角色而准备和学习。
教授正在为教研复习资料编制引得。
Jiàoshòu zhèngzài wèi jiàoyán fùxí zīliào biānzhì yǐndé。
The professor is drawing up an index for the teaching and research review materials.
他说要闭关学习，专心考研。
Tā shuō yào bìguān xuéxí，zhuānxīn kǎoyán。
He said that he would shut himself in his study to prepare for the graduate school entrance exam.
《创世纪》对于研究纳西族的历史和习俗有很多可以借鉴的地方。
《Chuàngshìjì》 duìyú yánjiū nàxīzú de lìshǐ hé xísú yǒu hěnduō kěyǐ jièjiàn de dìfāng。
Genesis can be used as a reference when studying the history and customs of the Naxi nationality.
经过三个月的总复习，他终于拿下了研究生考试。
Jīngguò sāngè yuè de zǒng fùxí，tā zhōng yú náxià le yánjiūshēng kǎoshì。
After a three-month review, he finally passed the graduate admission examination.
研习书法。
He is studying geology in his room.
Tā zài fángjiān zhōng yánxí dìzhìxué。
他在房间中研习地质学。
She is a grand master of karate, which she has been learning all her life.
她是空手道大师，毕生都在学习研究这项技艺。
Art is not something that is come-at-able by dint of study.
Yìshù bìngfēi shì tōngguò xuéxí yánjiū biànnéng zhǎngwò de dōngxi。
艺术并非是通过学习研究便能掌握的东西。
spend one\'s days in study
把一生花在学习(或研究)上
He studied in the School of East Asian Studies at the university.
Tā zài zhè suǒ dàxué de dōngyà yánjiū xuéyuàn xuéxí guò。
他在这所大学的东亚研究学院学习过。
He is a student of fish life.
他研究鱼的生活习性。
He was admitted to a new program at the university.

他获准加入那所大学的一项综合性研究课程的学习。
He taught a graduate course on learning and memory.
Tā jiàoshòu yǒuguān xuéxí yǔ jìyì de yánjiūshēng kèchéng。

The scientist corresponds with colleagues in order to learn about matters relevant to her own research.

这个科学家和同事通信是为了学习与她自己的研究有关的东西。
This study demonstrates that females do differentiate between males on their shopping habits.
Yánjiū biǎomíng nǚxìng de gòuwù xíguàn yǔ nánxìng shì yǒu chāyì de。
研究表明女性的购物习惯与男性是有差异的。
I have researched into helping children with learning difficulties.
Wǒ zài bāngzhù yǒu xuéxí zhàng\'ài de háizi fāngmiàn zuòchūle yánjiū。
我在帮助有学习障碍的孩子方面做出了研究。
A group of interns with a nine year\'s old wunderkind led by the ministry of education of Korea visited the Microsoft Asia Reasearch Institute.
韩国教育部携包括一名九岁小神童在内的韩国实习生代表团访问了微软亚洲研究院。
New research from Boston University finds that 86 percent of adults carry a store loyalty card and use it, even though cards give stores the right to track consumer purchases.
波士顿大学的最新研究显示，虽然使用会员卡会让商家能追踪到消费者的购物习惯，但还是有高达86%的成年人持有并使用某家商店的会员卡。
他们学习刻苦。
Tāmen xuéxí kèkǔ。
They study hard.
他学习那般刻苦，可学习成绩却依然很糟。
Tā xuéxí nàbān kèkǔ，kě xuéxí chéngjì què yīrán hěnzāo。
Though he studies hard, he performs badly.

kèkǔ xuéxí
study hard

Through hard work, he finally made himself into an erudite man.
学习绘画应该刻苦，不要总想着投机取巧。

One should work hard in studying how to paint, rather than think of playing tricks to avoid difficulties all day long.
通过刻苦学习，他掌握了好几门外国语。

Tā kèkǔ de xuéxí fǎyǔ。

读书是学习，使用也是学习，而且是更重要的学习。
Dúshū shì xuéxí，shǐyòng yěshì xuéxí，érqiě shì gèng zhòngyào de xuéxí。
Reading is learning, but applying is also learning and the more important kind of learning at that.
他学习那般刻苦，可学习成绩却依然很糟。

Though he studies hard, he performs badly.

Tā chúle xuéxí yīngyǔ，hái xuéxí rìyǔ。
Apart from studying English, he also studies Japanese.
条件反射是动物和人后天获得的，是个体生活过程中适应环境变化并经过学习学会的反射。
Tiáojiàn fǎnshè shì dòngwù hé rén hòutiān huòdé de，shì gètǐ shēnghuó guòchéng zhōng shìyìng huánjìng biànhuà bìng jīngguò xuéxí xuéhuì de fǎnshè。
Conditioned reflexes are acquired instead of being inborn. They are a kind of reflex that is learned when adapting to the environment.
课间操对一直坐着学习的学生来说，很有益。
Kèjiāncāo duì yìzhí zuò zhe xuéxí de xuésheng láishuō，hěnyǒu yì。
Recess calisthenics are helpful to those students who always sit and study all day long.
小明不喜欢数学，所以对于学习数学有什么好处，他的心里一片冥茫。
Xiǎo Míng bùxǐhuan shùxué，suǒyǐ duìyú xuéxí shùxué yǒu shénme hǎochu，tā de xīnlǐ yípiàn míngmáng。
Xiaoming doesn’t like mathematics, so he is at loss about the use of learning it.
刚开始学习拼音的小学生们经常要做拼读练习。

Pupils who have just begun to learn Pinyin should do spelling and reading exercises from time to time.

学习投资我们还处于学步阶段，需要不断进步啊！
Xuéxí tóuzī wǒmen hái chǔyú xuébùjiēduàn，xūyào búduàn jìnbùa！
Still at the learning stage in studying investing, we need to make continuous efforts.
学习汉语拼音一定要先学会区分声韵。
Xuéxí hànyǔ pīnyīn yídìng yào xiān xuéhuì qūfēn shēngyùn。
In studying Chinese, one must first learn to distinguish between initial consonants and vowels.
学习外语要用很大的气力才能学好。
Xuéxí wàiyǔ yào yònghěn dà de qìlì cái néngxuéhǎo。
It takes a lot of effort to learn a foreign language well.
学习书法要从临帖开始，这样才学得好。
Xuéxí shūfǎ yào cóng líntiè kāishǐ，zhèyàng cái xué de hǎo。
Learning calligraphy should start from practicing calligraphy after a model. Only in this way, can you learn it well.
学习不能贪多，关键是一步一个脚印，学扎实。
Xuéxí bùnéng tānduō，guānjiàn shì yíbù yígè jiǎoyìn，xué zāshí。

学习应该按部就班，循序渐进。
Xuéxí yīnggāi ànbùjiùbān，xúnxùjiànjìn。
In studying it is imperative to follow the proper order and advance step by step.
现在你不好好学习，将来你自会懊悔的。
Xiànzài nǐ bùhǎohāo xuéxí，jiānglái nǐ zì huì àohuǐ de。
If you don\'t study hard now, you will regret it in the future.
他的学习成绩是拔尖儿的。
Tā de xuéxí chéngjì shì bájiānr de。
He is a top-notch student.

Tā xuéxí hěn xiàjìn。

tántan xuéxí xīndé

Xuéxí biérén de chángchù，kèfú zìjǐ de ruòdiǎn。

xúnwèn wǒmen de xuéxí qíngkuàng

Xuéxí yě hǎo，láodòngyě hǎo，tā dōu hěn jījí。
