业余理论学习
yèyú lǐlùn xuéxí
theoretical study after workhours
一天到晚就是忙，不是工作，就是开会，还要学习。
Yìtiāndàowǎn jiùshì máng，bú shì gōngzuò，jiùshì kāihuì，hái yào xuéxí。
I\'m busy day and night, not only with work, but also with meetings or classes.
用心学习
yònɡxīn xuéxí 
concentrate on one\'s studies; study diligently
学习有得
xuéxí yǒudé 
have profited from one\'s studies
学习英语的人与日俱增。
Xuéxí yīngyǔ de rén yǔrìjùzēng。
The number of people learning English is on the increase.
早婚妨碍工作和学习。
Zǎohūn fáng\'ài gōngzuò hé xuéxí。
Marrying too early hinders one\'s work and study.
在学习上很有长进
zài xuéxí shànghěn yǒu zhǎngjìn 
make good progress in one\'s studies
抓紧学习
zhuājǐn xuéxí 
attend to one\'s studies in earnest; study hard
学习必须专心。
Xuéxí bìxū zhuānxīn。 
Study requires undivided attention.
最近一期的《英语学习》
zuìjìn yì qī de《Yīngyǔ Xuéxí》 
the current issue of English Language Learning
他百折不回的坚强意志值得我们学习。
Tā bǎizhébùhuí de jiānqiáng yìzhì zhídé wǒmen xuéxí。
We must learn from his indomitable spirit.
这次办班是应学生要求，大家学习热情都很高。
Zhècì bànbān shì yìng xuésheng yāoqiú，dàjiā xuéxí rèqíng dōu hěngāo。
The class is in response to the students\' requirements, so they all have good spirits for study.
竞争激烈的环境会逼使我们不断要学习新的东西。
Jìngzhēng jīliè de huánjìng huì bīshǐ wǒmen búduàn yào xuéxí xīn de dōngxi。
Fierce competition forces us to keep learning new things.
他说要闭关学习，专心考研。
Tā shuō yào bìguān xuéxí，zhuānxīn kǎoyán。
He said that he would shut himself in his study to prepare for the graduate school entrance exam.
为了学习滑冰，他给自己买了一个冰车。
Wèile xuéxí huábīng，tā gěi zìjǐ mǎi le yígè bīngchē。
He bought himself a device with ice skate blades to learn to skate.
在学习上不可能一步登天，要知道“冰冻三尺，非一日之寒”。
Zài xuéxí shàng bùkěnéng yíbùdēngtiān，yào zhīdào“bīngdòng sān chǐ，fēi yí rì zhī hán”。
One can not have a skyrocketing rise in study, just like Rome was not built in a day.
这么大了，还不知道好好学习，真不成器。
Zhème dà le，hái bùzhīdào hǎohǎo xuéxí，zhēn bùchéngqì。
It is disappointing to see someone that is old enough to be sensible but fools around all day.
她俩在班里的学习成绩差不大离。
Tā liǎ zài bān lǐ de xuéxí chéngjì chàbúdàlí。
They are equally good at their studies.
进入不惑之年的他仍然在努力学习新的知识，适应新的环境。
Jìnrù búhuò zhī nián de tā réngrán zài nǔlì xuéxí xīn de zhīshi，shìyīng xīn de huánjìng。
Though in his 40s, he still tries to learn new things to adapt to the new environment.
他一向学习很好，不想这次竟然没有通过考试。
Tā yí xiàng xuéxí hěnhǎo，bùxiǎng zhècì jìngrán méiyǒu tōngguò kǎoshì。
He is very studious, but to everyone\'s surprise he failed the exam.
别跟孩子猜枚了，快让他去学习。
Bié gēn háizi cāiméi le，kuài ràng tā qù xuéxí。
Stop playing games with the child, and let him study.
她在戏校专门学习彩调。
Tā zài xìxiào zhuānmén xuéxí cǎidiào。
She majored in local color opera in drama school.
这些小学生们正在学习拼音查字法。
Zhèxiē xiǎoxuéshengmen zhèngzài xuéxí pīnyīn cházì fǎ。
These primary school students are learning how to look for Chinese characters in a dictionary by their phonetic transcription.
职工们被组织起来学习新的厂规。
Zhígōngmen bèi zǔzhī qǐlái xuéxí xīn de chǎngguī。
Workers are organized to learn the new factory rules.
他在音乐学院学习的是美声唱法。
Tā zài yīnyuè xuéyuàn xuéxí de shì měishēng chàngfǎ。
He learned to bel canto in a conservatory.
他学习不刻苦，考试经常吃鸭蛋。
Tā xuéxí bú kèkǔ，kǎoshì jīngcháng chī yādàn。
He often fails his exams, because he doesn\'t study hard.
这个孩子真愁人，学习总是不用心。
Zhège háizi zhēn chóurén，xuéxí zǒngshì bú yòngxīn。
The child worries me because he never takes his studies seriously.
他们公司正在筹组一个代表团，下个月赴欧访问学习。
Tāmen gōngsī zhèngzài chóuzǔ yígè dàibiǎotuán，xià gè yuè fù Ōu fǎngwèn xuéxí。
Their company is planning to organize a delegation to take part in training tour to Europe next month.
雷锋精神垂世远久，值得我们学习。
Léifēng jīngshén chuíshì yuǎnjiǔ，zhídé wǒmen xuéxí。
The Leifeng Spirit will be handed down forever and we should all learn from it.
他从师学习国画已经有两年的时间了。
Tā cóngshī xuéxí guóhuà yǐjing yǒu liǎng nián de shíjiān le。
It has been 2 years since he started following his teacher to learn traditional Chinese painting.
他的学习成绩凑凑合合，也不太稳定。
Tā de xuéxí chéngjì còucòuhéhé，yě bú tài wěndìng。
His study is not bad, but not very consistent.
你再不好好学习，小心被打屁股。
Nǐ zài bùhǎohǎo xuéxí，xiǎoxīn bèi dǎ pìgǔ。
Be careful. If you don\'t work hard, I\'ll spank your bottom.
现在不少孩子都得了电视病，无心学习。
Xiànzài bùshǎo háizi dōu dé le diànshìbìng，wúxīn xuéxí。
Nowadays, many children have TV sickness and are not interested in study.
有着学习更差的人垫底，她就不怕了。
Yǒu zhe xuéxí gèngchà de rén diàndǐ，tā jiù búpà le。
There are people who are worse at study than her, so she is not afraid.
将会有四十名调干来我校学习。
Jiāng huì yǒu sìshí míng diàogàn lái wǒxiào xuéxí。
Around 40 officials will come to our school to study.
学习汉语发音一定要分清楚调类。
Xuéxí hànyǔ fāyīn yídìng yào fēnqīngchu diàolèi。
It is essential to distinguish different tones when studying Chinese.
家长叮咛孩子，到了学校一定要好好学习。
Jiāzhǎng dīngníng háizi，dào le xuéxiào yídìng yào hǎohǎo xuéxí。
The parent urged his child again and again that he must study hard at school.
经过这么多年的学习，他现在对古董已经很懂眼了。
Jīngguò zhèmeduō nián de xuéxí，tā xiànzài duì gǔdǒng yǐjing hěn dǒngyǎn le。
Now he understands the antiques business after years of learning.
他学习成绩太差，看来只能蹲班了。
Tā xuéxí chéngjì tài chà，kàn lái zhǐnéng dūnbān le。
He lags far behind in his studies, and cannot go up to the next grade.
她刚开始学习书法，只能使用仿纸进行摹写。
Tā gāng kāishǐ xuéxí shūfǎ，zhǐnéng shǐyòng fǎngzhǐ jìnxíng móxiě。
She has just begun to learn calligraphy and can only use the practice paper to copy model characters.
她学习十分刻苦，简直到了焚膏继晷的地步。
Tā xuéxí shífēn kèkǔ，jiǎnzhí dào le féngāojìguǐ de dìbù。
She studies hard day and night.
今天我们学习了小数与复名数的相互转换。
Jīntiān wǒmen xuéxí le xiǎoshù yǔ fùmíngshù de xiānghù zhuǎnhuàn。
Today we have learnt how to change between decimal fractions and compound numbers.
现在的高中生学习压力很大。
Xiànzài de gāo zhōng shēng xuéxí yālì hěndà。
Nowadays, high school students are under great pressure.
学习古筝是件不容易的事情。
Xuéxí gǔzhēng shì jiàn bùróngyì de shìqing。
Learning to play the guzheng is not easy.
要想把学习搞上去，就要狠抓基础。
Yào xiǎng bǎ xuéxí gǎoshàngqù，jiùyào hěnzhuā jīchǔ。
If you really want to make progress in your studies, you should make a desperate effort in learning basic knowledge.
大队长被调离执法岗位，进行反省学习，以观后效。
Dàduìzhǎng bèi diàolí zhífǎ gǎngwèi，jìnxíng fǎnxǐng xuéxí，yǐguān hòuxiào。
The captain was removed from his position of executing the law to undertake self-reflection, and study. His future behaviour will be observed.
我买了一双花样刀来学习滑冰。
Wǒ mǎi le yì shuāng huāyàngdāo lái xuéxí huábīng。
I have bought ice skates to learn to figure skate.
这间教室很欢闹，实在不适宜学习。
Zhè jiān jiàoshì hěnhuānnào，shízai bú shìyí xuéxí。
This classroom is very noisy, and really not suitable for studying.
结婚之前要学习一定的婚育知识。
Jiéhūn zhīqián yào xuéxí yídìng de hūnyù zhīshi。
One must learn some knowledge of marriage and child rearing before getting married.
他虽然有心向王老师学习，但是还未及门。
Tā suīrán yǒuxīn xiàng Wáng lǎoshī xuéxí，dànshì hái wèi jímén。
Although he has the intention to study with Mr. Wang, he hasn\'t formally acknowledged him as teacher.
技工学校的学生，要学习专业技能。
Jìgōng xuéxiào de xuésheng，yào xuéxí zhuānyè jìnéng。
Students in technical schools have to study special skills.
通过学习历史可以鉴往知来，对自己的发展有很大的帮助。
Tōngguò xuéxí lìshǐ kěyǐ jiànwǎng zhīlái，duì zìjǐ de fāzhǎn yǒu hěndà de bāngzhù。
Learning history is helpful in that we can review the past and predict the future.
今天的体育课，我们要去跤场学习摔跤。
Jīntiān de tǐyùkè，wǒmen yào qù jiāochǎng xuéxí shuāijiāo。
In today\'s P.E. class, we are going to learn wrestling in the wrestling area.
他儿子学习特别好，是班里的佼佼者。
Tā érzi xuéxí tèbié hǎo，shì bān lǐ de jiǎojiǎozhě。
His son is one of the top students in the class.
这个小男孩的节奏感很强，非常适合学习打击乐。
Zhège xiǎonánhái de jiézòugǎn hěnqiáng，fēicháng shìhé xuéxí dǎjīyuè。
The boy has excellent rhythmical sense and will probably learn percussion instruments quickly.
小明把这个假期的时间可丁可卯全用在学习上了。
Xiǎo Míng bǎ zhège jiàqī de shíjiān kědīng kěmǎo quán yòngzài xuéxí shàng le。
Xiaoming spent all the holiday studying.
他从小就和爷爷学习刻制印章的技术，现在技艺已经很精湛了。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù hé yéye xuéxí kèzhì yìnzhāng de jìshù，xiànzài jìyì yǐjing hěnjīngzhàn le。
He has been learning seal engraving from his grandpa, and now has perfect craftsmanship.
学习不能总是死啃书本，要灵活掌握。
Xuéxí bùnéng zǒngshì sǐkěn shūběn，yào línghuó zhǎngwò。
You can\'t read your books just for the sake of reading them; you should master them thoroughly.
他不好好学习，就知道上网打游戏，这不是空耗青春吗！
Tā bùhǎohǎo xuéxí，jiù zhīdào shàngwǎng dǎ yóuxì，zhè búshì kōnghào qīngchūn ma！
He wastes his life by playing computer games instead of studying hard.
小明总是放空炮，每年他都说要努力学习，可每年又都不努力。
Xiǎo Míng zǒngshì fàng kōngpào，měinián tā dōu shuō yào nǔlì xuéxí，kě měinián yòu dōu bùnǔlì。
Xiaoming always makes empty promises. Every year he says that he\'ll work hard, but he doesn\'t.
如今学习空手道的女孩子多起来了！
Rújīn xuéxí kōngshǒudào de nǚháizi duō qǐlái le！
Now more and more girls are learning karate.
我的学习成绩上去得很快，妈妈很宽怀！
Wǒ de xuéxí chéngjì shàngqù de hěnkuài，māma hěnkuānhuái！
Mom feels relieved that my school record has improved rapidly.
她有什么好狂气的，不就是刚当上学习委员嘛。
Tā yǒu shénme hǎo kuángqì de，bú jiùshì gāng dāngshàng xuéxí wěiyuán ma。
How can she be so arrogant? She has only been elected as a study leader right now.
我在中学学习棱锥的时候就总搞不懂计算其体积的方法。
Wǒ zài zhōng xué xuéxí léngzhuī de shíhou jiù zǒng gǎo bùdǒng jìsuàn qí tǐjī de fāngfǎ。
When I learned about pyramids in middle school, I  couldn\'t always understand how to calculate their volume.
利他的精神是我们应该努力学习的。
Lì tā de jīngshén shì wǒmen yīnggāi nǔlì xuéxí de。
Altruistic spirit should studied by us vigorously.
他是个恋群的人，总是怀念以前一起生活学习过的室友。
Tā shì gè liànqún de rén，zǒngshì huáiniàn yǐqián yìqǐ shēnghuó xuéxí guò de shìyǒu。
He is attached to people around him, and always misses his roommates from when he was a student.
由于学习成绩优秀，他被批准躐等升级。
Yóuyú xuéxí chéngjì yōuxiù,tā bèi pīzhǔn lièděng shēngjí.
Because of excellent grades, he was approved to skip  the normal steps to go up to a higher grade.
台上的那个领诵是我们班的学习委员。
Tái shàng de nàge lǐngsòng shì wǒmen bān de xuéxí wěiyuán。
The lead reader on the platform is our commissary in charge of studies.
今天课上我们学习了龙山文化。
Jīntiān kè shàng wǒmen xuéxí le lóngshān wénhuà。
We studied the Longshan Culture in class today.
我要参加明天的培训班，学习新路规。
Wǒ yào cānjiā míngtiān de péixùnbān，xuéxí xīn lùguī。
I’ll attend the training class tomorrow to learn new railway rules and regulations.
我现在时间充裕，所以想报一个英语学习的慢班。
Wǒ xiànzài shíjiān chōngyù，suǒyǐ xiǎng bào yígè yīngyǔ xuéxí de mànbān。
Having plenty of free time, I want to enroll in a slow progress English class.
刚刚开始学习模特课程，她的猫步还走不好呢。
Gānggāng kāishǐ xuéxí mótè kèchéng，tā de māobùhái zǒubùhǎo ne。
She has begun a modeling course, and can not walk the cat walk well.
他在班里的学习成绩一直都是冒尖的。
Tā zài bān lǐ de xuéxí chéngjì yìzhí dōushì màojiān de。
He has been top notch in his class.
能够在老师门下学习，真是我的荣幸。
Nénggòu zài lǎoshī ménxià xuéxí，zhēnshì wǒ de róngxìng。
It is a great honor for me to learn from you.
孩子已经长大，可以进蒙馆学习了。
Háizi yǐjing zhǎngdà，kěyǐ jìn méngguǎn xuéxí le。
The child is old enough to learn in a private primary elementary school.
我们正当妙年，一定要努力学习文化知识。
Wǒmen zhèngdāng miàonián，yídìng yào nǔlì xuéxí wénhuà zhīshi。
We are in the bloom of youth, so we should try our best to acquire education.
他的学习成绩很好，总在班里名列前茅。
Tā de xuéxí chéngjì hěnhǎo，zǒng zài bān lǐ mínglièqiánmáo。
He does exceedingly well in his studies, and has always been heading the class.
这个孩子中了魔障了，不好好学习，天天为电子游戏而着迷！
Zhège háizi zhòng le mózhàng le，bùhǎohǎo xuéxí，tiāntiān wèi diànzǐ yóuxì ér zháomí！
The child is addicted to electronic games, and plays games rather than studying hard every day.
他从小就拜师学习南拳，如今已经武艺高强了。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù bàishī xuéxí nánquán，rújīn yǐjing wǔyì gāoqiáng le。
He learned southern style boxing from a master when he was very young, and now he is highly skilled in wushu now.
小明从小就脑瓜儿聪明，可惜就是不喜欢学习。
Xiǎo Míng cóng xiǎo jiù nǎoguār cōngmíng，kěxī jiùshì bùxǐhuan xuéxí。
Xiaoming has been clever since he was young, but he doesn’t like studying.
回想起小时候自己学习不是太努力，他深感内愧。
Huíxiǎng qǐ xiǎoshíhòu zìjǐ xuéxí búshì tài nǔlì,tā shēngǎn nèikuì.
He feels ashamed of himself because he didn\'t study hard when he was young.
学习历史是为了了解过去、借鉴经验，可千万不能泥古不化啊！
Xuéxí lìshǐ shì wèi le liǎojiě guòqù、jièjiàn jīngyàn，kě qiānwàn bùnéng nígǔ búhuà a！
We learn history to know the past and use it for reference, but we should never learn it without understanding.
今天派送他们出国学习，是希望明天他们能够回来报效祖国。
Jīntiān pàisòng tāmen chūguó xuéxí，shì xīwàng míngtiān tāmen nénggòu huílái bàoxiào zǔguó。
We send them abroad to study today because we hope that they will come back to serve their country.
她以旁听生的身份学习了中文系的许多课程。
Tā yǐ pángtīngshēng de shēnfèn xuéxí le zhōng wénxì de xǔduō kèchéng。
She took many courses of the department of Chinese language as a listener.
他虽然聪明但不够专心，学习中时常心有旁骛。
Tā suīrán cōngmíng dàn búgòu zhuānxīn，xuéxí zhōng shícháng xīnyǒu pángwù。
He is smart but inattentive, he sometimes fails to concentrate when he is studying.
他学习十分刻苦，经常披卷到深夜。
Tā xuéxí shífēn kèkǔ，jīngcháng pījuàn dào shēnyè。
He studies hard and he often reads books until late at night.
宝宝刚5岁，已经开始学习拼音字母了。
Bǎobao gāng wǔsuì，yǐjing kāishǐ xuéxí pīnyīn zìmǔ le。
The baby, who is just five years old, has already started to  learn Chinese phonetic letters.
我们现在学习专业知识是为将来的工作铺路。
Wǒmen xiànzài xuéxí zhuānyè zhīshi shì wèi jiānglái de gōngzuò pūlù。
Studying professional knowledge now paves the way for the future.
小明在少年宫学习七弦琴。
Xiǎo Míng zài shàoniángōng xuéxí qīxiánqín。
Xiao Ming is studying to play the guqin in the children\'s palace.
为了期终能考出好成绩，我们每天都努力学习。
Wèile qī zhōng néng kǎochū hǎo chéngjì，wǒmen měitiān dōu nǔlì xuéxí。
To get high marks in the final exam, we study hard every day.
我对于其人的评价是：聪明但不爱学习。
Wǒ duìyú qírén de píngjià shì：cōngmíng dàn búài xuéxí。
My judgment of that person is that he is smart but not fond of studying.
其时我还小，不知道学习的重要性。
Qíshí wǒ hái xiǎo，bùzhīdào xuéxí de zhòngyàoxìng。
At that time, I was young, and didn\'t realize the importance of study.
我们要在平时的工作和学习中实践“千里之行，始于足下”的真理。
Wǒmen yào zài píngshí de gōngzuò hé xuéxí zhōng shíjiàn“qiānlǐzhīxíng，shǐyúzúxià”de zhēnlǐ。
We should practice the truth a thousand-li journey starts with the first step in our daily work and study.
他很想拜师学习山东琴书。
Tā hĕn xiǎng bàishī xuéxí Shāndōng qínshū.
He wants to learn Shandong story-telling by following a master.
我们要用求实的态度对待工作和学习。
Wǒmen yào yòng qiúshí de tàidu duìdài gōngzuò hé xuéxí。
We must have a realistic approach to work and study.
随着期末的临近，我们的学习日益趋紧。
Suí zhe qīmò de línjìn，wǒmen de xuéxí rìyì qūjǐn。
As the end of the semester is coming, our study is becoming more tense.
学生应全身心地投入学习之中。
Xuéshēng yīng quánshēnxīn de tóurù xuéxí zhī zhōng。
Students should study with their whole heart.
事情纷纷扰扰，让人无法专心学习。
Shìqíng fēnfēnrǎorǎo，ràng rén wúfǎ zhuānxīn xuéxí。
The confusing matters make him unable to concentrate on his study.
经过一段时间的学习，他能看懂常用的日文了。
Jīngguò yíduàn shíjiān de xuéxí，tā néng kàndǒng chángyòng de rìwén le。
After a period of study, he can read everyday Japanese now.
您的这篇大作，我一定要好好赏阅、学习。
Nín de zhèpiān dàzuò，wǒ yīdìng yào hǎohǎo shǎngyuè，xuéxí。
I will surely carefully read and learn your article.
你今年的学习成绩一定要上台阶。
Nǐ jīnnián de xuéxí chéngjì yídìng yào shàng táijiē。
You must make progress in your studies this year.
我曾经在少年宫学习过两年中国象棋。
Wǒ céngjīng zài shǎoniángōng xuéxíguo liǎng nián zhōng guó xiàng qí。
I have studied Chinese chess in the Children\'s Palace for two years.
他这种舍己为公的行为非常值得我们大家学习！
Tā zhèzhǒng shějǐwéigōng de xíngwéi fēicháng zhídé wǒmen dàjiā xuéxí ！
He sacrificed his own interests for the public interest, it is well worth our study!
由于学习成绩下降，我被父亲申饬了。
Yóuyú xuéxí chéngjì xiàjiàng，wǒ bèi fùqīn shēnchì le。
I was blamed by my father due to the worsening of my study.
父亲深望我能取得更好的学习成绩。
Fùqīn shēnwàng wǒ néng qǔdé gènghǎo de xuéxí chéngjì。
My father sincerely hopes that I can do better in study.
我多年来一直师从张老师学习绘画。
Wǒ duōniánlái yìzhí shīcóng Zhāng lǎoshī xuéxí huìhuà.
I have been learning painting from teacher Zhang for years.
他是班里的文艺骨干，但学习成绩不怎么样。
Tā shì bān lǐ de wényì gǔgàn，dàn xuéxí chéngjì bùzěnmeyàng。
He is a mainstay of literature and art in class, but doesn\'t do well in study.
在学校时，他的学习成绩数得上前10名。
Zài xuéxiào shí，tā de xuéxí chéngjì shǔdéshàng qiánshímíng。
His study results are among the top ten at school.
你的私心杂念太多，怎么能够专心学习呢？
Nǐ de sīxīn zániàn tài duō，zěnme nénggòu zhuānxīn xuéxí ne？
You have too many selfish considerations, how can you concentrate on study?
死记硬背的学习方法，我们是不提倡的。
Sǐjì yìngbèi de xuéxí fāngfǎ，wǒmen shì bùtíchàng de。
We don\'t advocate learning by rote.
他那松柏般高洁的品格很值得后人学习。
Tā nà sōngbǎi bān gāojié de pǐngé hěnzhídé hòurén xuéxí。
His noble lofty sentiments are worth his descendants\' study.
他学习过速算，算起账来又快又准确。
Tā xuéxí guò sùsuàn，suànqǐzhànglái yòu kuài yòu zhǔnquè。
He has studied fast calculation, so can do accounts both quickly and accurately.
你想学习中医，就应当先背熟汤头歌诀。
Nǐ xiǎng xuéxí zhōng yī，jiù yīngdāng xiān bèishú tāngtóu gējué。
If you want to study Chinese traditional medicine, you first have to learn by heart the recipes given in rhymes.
从头学习一种乐器是非常淘神的。
Cóng tóu xuéxí yìzhǒng yuèqì shì fēicháng táoshén de。
To learn an instrument from scratch takes a lot of energy.
她正在向母亲学习如何制作藤编。
Tā zhèngzài xiàng mǔqīn xuéxí rúhé zhìzuò téngbiān。
She is learning from her mother how to make cane products.
我想把儿子送到体校学习足球。

他刚进施工队的时候，最先学习的是铁活。

When he was first admitted into the construction team, he learned ironwork.
他经过不断地刻苦学习终于成为通人。

他从童蒙时代就开始学习中国古代的典籍了。

He has been studying the classics of ancient China since his childhood.
学习绘画应该刻苦，不要总想着投机取巧。

这几天的学习、工作忙得我团团转。
Zhè jǐtiān de xuéxí、gōngzuò máng de wǒ tuántuánzhuàn。
I\'ve been up to my ears in study and work these days.
他因品学兼优被选入团校进一步学习。

jiāoliú xuéxí jīngyàn

yǒu míngquè de xuéxí mùdì

Xuéxí de mùdì shì wèile zēngzhǎng zhīshi.

zài zhōng xué shíxí
do practice teaching at a middle school
她自觉才思不敏，所以学起习来更加努力。

gěi yígè yīn bìng quē kè de xuésheng bǔxí gōngkè
give extra help to a pupil who has missed some classes on account of illness
人们称家族传习的学问为“家学”。
Rénmen chēng jiāzú chuánxí de xuéwèn wéi“jiāxué”。
Learning handed down from generation to generation in a family is called &quot;jiaxue&quot; in Chinese.
考试之前，老师押题不利于学生全面复习。
Kǎoshì zhīqián,lǎoshī yātí búlìyú xuéshēng quánmiàn fùxí.
It is harmful for the students\' overall review if the teacher predicts the test and takes it as the focus of review beforehand.
他曾经是名教习，在那所小学教数学。
Tā céngjīng shì míng jiàoxí，zài nà suǒ xiǎoxué jiā oshùxué。

be not good at swimming

Xiǎo Zhāng yǒu měitiān wǎnshàng zuòzài wūjiǎo wēnxí gōngkè de xíguàn。
Xiao Zhang always revises his lessons at the corner of the house every evening.
因为学习成绩差，老师经常给他开设小锅饭，帮他补习功课。
Yīnwéi xuéxí chéngjì chà，lǎoshī jīngcháng gěi tā kāishè xiǎoguōfàn，bāng tā bǔxí gōngkè。
Due to his poor performance, the teacher often coaches him privately to help him catch up.
他除了学习英语，还学习日语。
Tā chúle xuéxí yīngyǔ，hái xuéxí rìyǔ。
Apart from studying English, he also studies Japanese.
学习应该按部就班，循序渐进。
Xuéxí yīnggāi ànbùjiùbān，xúnxùjiànjìn。
In studying it is imperative to follow the proper order and advance step by step.
现在你不好好学习，将来你自会懊悔的。
Xiànzài nǐ bùhǎohāo xuéxí，jiānglái nǐ zì huì àohuǐ de。
If you don\'t study hard now, you will regret it in the future.
他的学习成绩是拔尖儿的。
Tā de xuéxí chéngjì shì bájiānr de。
He is a top-notch student.
笔头儿练习
bǐtóur liànxí
written exercises
如果不分青红皂白，一概拒绝向外国学习，就只能使中国永远处于落后地位。
Rúguǒ bùfēn qīnghóngzàobái，yígài jùjué xiàng wàiguó xuéxí，jiù zhǐnéng shǐ Zhōngguó yǒngyuǎn chǔyú luòhòu dìwèi。
If we indiscriminately refused to learn anything from foreign countries, China would remain backward forever.
不合当地习俗
bùhé dāngdì xísú 
not conform to the customs of the locality
他染上了吸毒的恶习，不能自拔。
Tā rǎnshàng le xīdú de èxí，bùnéng zìbá。
He cannot extricate himself from the drug habit.
学习材料
xuéxí cáiliào 
material for study

bāngzhù chàshēng bǔxí gōngkè

学习成绩不太好
xuéxí chéngjì bú tài hǎo

刻苦学习，持之以恒

他工作很忙，可是还抽空学习英语。
Tā gōngzuò hěn máng，kěshì hái chōukòngxuéxí yīngyǔ。
Despite the pressure of work, he manages to find time to study English.
为我们的学习创设有利的条件
wèi wǒmen de xuéxí chuàngshè yǒulì de tiáojiàn 
create favourable conditions for our studies
练习的次数越多，熟练的程度越高。
Liànxí de cìshù yuè duō，shúliàn de chéngdù yuè gāo。
The more you practise, the more skilful you\'ll become.
对外开放促使许多人学习外语。
Duìwài kāifàng cùshǐ xǔduō rén xuéxí wàiyǔ。
The policy of opening the country to the outside world spurs many people on to study foreign languages.
练习的答案
liànxí de dá\'àn 
key to an exercise
带职学习
dàizhí xuéxí 
go on a study course without being formally relieved of one\'s post; go on as training course as a mid-career student
涤除旧习
díchú jiùxí 
do away with old customs
改掉坏习气
gǎidiào huài xíqì 
correct bad habits

duānzhèng xuéxí tàidu

染上恶习
rǎn shàng èxí
contract a bad habit; fall into evil ways
恶习不改
èxíbùgǎi
persist in one\'s evil ways

xízì fànběn

xuéxí fāngfǎ

fángkōng yǎnxí

废弃陈规旧习
fèiqì chénguī jiùxí

xiàng gè fāngmiàn xuéxí，fēngfù zìjǐ de zhīshi

风俗习惯
fēngsú xíguàn
customs and habits

Shāngyuánmen hùxiāng fúchí zhe liànxí zǒulù。
Leaning on each other for support, the wounded men practised walking.
实习完毕，明日复课。
Shíxí wánbì, míngrì fùkè。
The field work is completed, and classes will begin again tomorrow.
复习功课
fùxí gōngkè
review (or revise) lessons
睡懒觉的坏习惯我已经改掉了。
Shuì lǎnjiào de huàixíguàn wǒ yǐjing gǎidiào le。
I\'ve given up the bad habit of getting up late.
革除陈规陋习
géchú chénguī lòuxí

去掉孤傲习气
qùdiào ɡū\'ào xíqì

Lǎoshī gǔlì dàjiā xuéxí yīngyǔ。

bǎ yèwù xuéxí shíjiān gùdìngxiàlai
set a regular time for vocational study
痼习难改。
Gùxí nán gǎi。
Confirmed habits are difficult to break.
她参加了学校组织的暑期挂职实习。
Tā cānjiā le xuéxiào zǔzhī de shǔqī guàzhí shíxí。

qīnɡchú ɡuānliáo xíqì

他不习惯戴帽子，一年四季总光着头。
Tā bùxíguàn dài màozi，yìniánsìjì zǒngguāng zhe tóu。
He is not used to wearing a hat and goes bareheaded all year round.
夜深了，他还在学习。
Yè shēn le，tā hái zài xuéxí。
It was late at night and he was still studying.

xuéxí hùzhùzǔ

jījiǔchénɡxí

jīxí nán chú

Tā yīn xuéxí chénɡjì yōuxiù ér shòudào jiǎnɡshǎnɡ。
He was awarded a prize for excellence in his studies.

从小培养好习惯
cóngxiǎo péiyǎnghǎo xíguàn

学习只偏重记忆而忽视理解是不行的。
Xuéxí zhǐ piānzhòngjìyì ér hūshì lǐjiě shì bùxíng de。
In studying one shouldn\'t stress memorization at the expense of comprehension.
学习的道路是崎岖不平的。
Xuéxí de dàolù shì qíqūbùpíng de。
The road of learning is not smooth.
我习惯六点起床。
Wǒ xíɡuàn liù diǎn qǐchuánɡ。
I am in the habit of getting up at six o\'clock.
学习外语要用很大的气力才能学好。
Xuéxí wàiyǔ yào yònghěn dà de qìlì cái néngxuéhǎo。
It takes a lot of effort to learn a foreign language well.
我们应当学习他们的强点来弥补自己的弱点。
Wǒmen yīngdāngxuéxí tāmen de qiángdiǎn lái míbǔ zìjǐ de ruòdiǎn。
We should learn from their strong points to offset our weak ones.
常常练习，慢慢就找着巧劲儿了。
Chángcháng liànxí，mànman jiù zhǎozháo qiǎojìnr le。

学习要有锲而不舍的精神。

rǎnshàng le dǔbó de èxí

Mother doesn\'t allow us to acquire any bad habits.
这些日子我校师生在工厂实习。
Zhèxiē rìzi wǒ xiào shīshēng zài gōngchǎng shíxí。
The teachers and students of our school have been doing field work at a factory recently.
他觉得累了就停止练习，怕有失闪。
Tā jué de lèi le jiù tíngzhǐ liànxí，pà yǒu shīshǎn。

zài zhōng xué shíxí

sòngxí jīngdiǎn

Xiǎo Míng zhèngzài gēn lǎoshī liànxí bāguàzhǎng。

这次办班是应学生要求，大家学习热情都很高。
Zhècì bànbān shì yìng xuésheng yāoqiú，dàjiā xuéxí rèqíng dōu hěngāo。
The class is in response to the students\' requirements, so they all have good spirits for study.
竞争激烈的环境会逼使我们不断要学习新的东西。
Jìngzhēng jīliè de huánjìng huì bīshǐ wǒmen búduàn yào xuéxí xīn de dōngxi。
Fierce competition forces us to keep learning new things.
他有个坏习惯，就是当众扣鼻牛儿。
Tā yǒu gè huàixíguàn，jiùshì dāngzhòng kòu bíniúr。
He has a bad habit, picking his nose in public places.
我习惯用笔形输入法来编辑手机短信。
Wǒ xíguàn yòng bǐxíng shūrùfǎ lái biānjí shǒujī duǎnxìn.
I am used to typing text messages in Chinese via the forms of strokes, and their combination.
他说要闭关学习，专心考研。
Tā shuō yào bìguān xuéxí，zhuānxīn kǎoyán。
He said that he would shut himself in his study to prepare for the graduate school entrance exam.
为了学习滑冰，他给自己买了一个冰车。
Wèile xuéxí huábīng，tā gěi zìjǐ mǎi le yígè bīngchē。
He bought himself a device with ice skate blades to learn to skate.
在学习上不可能一步登天，要知道“冰冻三尺，非一日之寒”。
Zài xuéxí shàng bùkěnéng yíbùdēngtiān，yào zhīdào“bīngdòng sān chǐ，fēi yí rì zhī hán”。
One can not have a skyrocketing rise in study, just like Rome was not built in a day.
最后的复习阶段，我们重点进行查缺补漏。
Zuìhòu de fùxí jiēduàn，wǒmen zhòngdiǎn jìnxíng cháquē bǔlòu。
At the last stage of our preparation for the test, we will focus on locating and making up for deficiencies.
这么大了，还不知道好好学习，真不成器。
Zhème dà le，hái bùzhīdào hǎohǎo xuéxí，zhēn bùchéngqì。
It is disappointing to see someone that is old enough to be sensible but fools around all day.
她俩在班里的学习成绩差不大离。
Tā liǎ zài bān lǐ de xuéxí chéngjì chàbúdàlí。
They are equally good at their studies.
进入不惑之年的他仍然在努力学习新的知识，适应新的环境。
Jìnrù búhuò zhī nián de tā réngrán zài nǔlì xuéxí xīn de zhīshi，shìyīng xīn de huánjìng。
Though in his 40s, he still tries to learn new things to adapt to the new environment.
她自觉才思不敏，所以学起习来更加努力。
Tā zìjué cáisī bùmǐn，suǒyǐ xuéqǐxílái gèngjiā nǔlì。
She knows that she is not that smart, so she studies a lot harder.
他一向学习很好，不想这次竟然没有通过考试。
Tā yí xiàng xuéxí hěnhǎo，bùxiǎng zhècì jìngrán méiyǒu tōngguò kǎoshì。
He is very studious, but to everyone\'s surprise he failed the exam.
别跟孩子猜枚了，快让他去学习。
Bié gēn háizi cāiméi le，kuài ràng tā qù xuéxí。
Stop playing games with the child, and let him study.
她在戏校专门学习彩调。
Tā zài xìxiào zhuānmén xuéxí cǎidiào。
She majored in local color opera in drama school.
这些小学生们正在学习拼音查字法。
Zhèxiē xiǎoxuéshengmen zhèngzài xuéxí pīnyīn cházì fǎ。
These primary school students are learning how to look for Chinese characters in a dictionary by their phonetic transcription.
不规律的饮食习惯，经常诱发肠胃病。
Bùguīlǜ de yǐnshí xíguàn，jīngcháng yòufā chángwèibìng。
Irregular eating habits often lead to bowel disorders.

Zhígōngmen bèi zǔzhī qǐlái xuéxí xīn de chǎngguī。
Workers are organized to learn the new factory rules.
他在音乐学院学习的是美声唱法。
Tā zài yīnyuè xuéyuàn xuéxí de shì měishēng chàngfǎ。
He learned to bel canto in a conservatory.
我们要改变这些不合理的陈规陋习。
Wǒmen yào gǎibiàn zhèxiē bùhélǐ de chénguī lòuxí。
We have to do away with these outdated conventions, and practices.
他习惯于每天早起看晨报。
Tā xíguàn yú měitiān zǎoqǐ kàn chénbào。
He is in the habit of getting up early every day, and reading the morning newspaper.
中国人习惯把媒人称之为红娘。
Zhōngguórén xíguàn bǎ méirén chēng zhī wéi hóngniáng。
The Chinese used to call matchmakers &quot;Hong Niang&quot;.
他学习不刻苦，考试经常吃鸭蛋。
Tā xuéxí bú kèkǔ，kǎoshì jīngcháng chī yādàn。
He often fails his exams, because he doesn\'t study hard.
为了纪念屈原，我们有在重午划龙舟的习俗。
Wèile jìniàn Qūyuán，wǒmen yǒu zài chóngwǔ huá lóngzhōu de xísú。
Dragon Boat Festival is In memory of Quyuan, and we row dragon boats in that day.
重阳节是我国的传统节日，登高赏菊则是重阳节的传统习俗。
Chóngyángjié shì wǒguó de chuántǒng jiérì，dēnggāo shǎngjú zé shì chóngyángjié de chuántǒng xísú。
Chongyang Festival is a traditional festival in our country.  Climbing hills to appreciate the chrysanthemum is one traditional custom during this festival.
这个孩子真愁人，学习总是不用心。
Zhège háizi zhēn chóurén，xuéxí zǒngshì bú yòngxīn。
The child worries me because he never takes his studies seriously.
他们公司正在筹组一个代表团，下个月赴欧访问学习。
Tāmen gōngsī zhèngzài chóuzǔ yígè dàibiǎotuán，xià gè yuè fù Ōu fǎngwèn xuéxí。
Their company is planning to organize a delegation to take part in training tour to Europe next month.

Gǔdài wénhuà de chuánxí hěnzhòngyào。
It is essential to learn and pass on ancient culture.

《Chuàngshìjì》 duìyú yánjiū nàxīzú de lìshǐ hé xísú yǒu hěnduō kěyǐ jièjiàn de dìfāng。
Genesis can be used as a reference when studying the history and customs of the Naxi nationality.
雷锋精神垂世远久，值得我们学习。

The Leifeng Spirit will be handed down forever and we should all learn from it.

Tā cóngshī xuéxí guóhuà yǐjing yǒu liǎng nián de shíjiān le。
It has been 2 years since he started following his teacher to learn traditional Chinese painting.
他的学习成绩凑凑合合，也不太稳定。
Tā de xuéxí chéngjì còucòuhéhé，yě bú tài wěndìng。
His study is not bad, but not very consistent.
他已经习惯了这种粗朴的生活。
Tā yǐjing xíguàn le zhèzhǒng cūpǔ de shēnghuó。
He is used to this kind of simple and plain life.

Every time when celebrating the New Year, the village still maintains its customary celebrations.
你再不好好学习，小心被打屁股。
Nǐ zài bùhǎohǎo xuéxí，xiǎoxīn bèi dǎ pìgǔ。

Wǒ yéye xíguàn le zài diànbǎn shàng xiězì。
My grandfather is accustomed to writing on an under board.
有着学习更差的人垫底，她就不怕了。
Yǒu zhe xuéxí gèngchà de rén diàndǐ，tā jiù búpà le。

Jiāzhǎng dīngníng háizi，dào le xuéxiào yídìng yào hǎohǎo xuéxí。
The parent urged his child again and again that he must study hard at school.
按照习俗，订婚是一定要有定礼的。
Ànzhào xísú，dìnghūn shì yídìng yào yǒu dìnglǐ de。
According to custom, betrothal gifts are necessary for an engagement.

她已经习惯了独居生活。
Tā yǐjing xíguàn le dújū shēnghuó。

Zài Zhōngguó yǒu Duānyáng chī zòngzi de xísú。

他学习成绩太差，看来只能蹲班了。
Tā xuéxí chéngjì tài chà，kàn lái zhǐnéng dūnbān le。
He lags far behind in his studies, and cannot go up to the next grade.
经常用耳勺子掏耳朵，不是好习惯。
Jīngcháng yòng ěrsháozi tāo ěrduo，bú shì hǎo xíguàn。
It is a bad habit to pick one\'s ears with an earpick.
他说每句话之前都习惯性地先“啊”一声，这都成他的发语词了。

He habitually says the function word &quot;ah&quot; whenever he is about to speak.

她手握毛笔，正在练习仿影摹写。
Tā shǒu wò máobǐ，zhèngzài liànxí fǎngyǐng móxiě。
She is copying model characters to practice calligraphy.
她刚开始学习书法，只能使用仿纸进行摹写。

小强虽然学习成绩不好，可同学们也不应该非笑他。

她学习十分刻苦，简直到了焚膏继晷的地步。

She studies hard day and night.

He likes the beautiful scenery and simple customs of this border village.
别把乱说气话当成习惯，因为语言的锋刃一样可以伤人。

你就不能把这些浮滑的习气改掉吗？

Xuéxí gǔzhēng shì jiàn bùróngyì de shìqing。

我已经习惯每天去跳集体舞，既简单又轻松。

他和这帮流氓在一起的时间长了，渐染了一些坏的习气。

通过学习历史可以鉴往知来，对自己的发展有很大的帮助。

Learning history is helpful in that we can review the past and predict the future.
射击场上一些队员在对着箭垛练习射击。

今天的体育课，我们要去跤场学习摔跤。
Jīntiān de tǐyùkè，wǒmen yào qù jiāochǎng xuéxí shuāijiāo。

他儿子学习特别好，是班里的佼佼者。

我正在给孩子们教习这首歌。
Wǒ zhèngzài gěi háizimen jiàoxí zhèshǒugē。
I am teaching the children to sing the song.

Tā céngjīng shì míng jiàoxí，zài nà suǒ xiǎoxué jiā oshùxué。

这个小男孩的节奏感很强，非常适合学习打击乐。

The boy has excellent rhythmical sense and will probably learn percussion instruments quickly.

Zài jīngzhé zhè yìtiān mínjiān yǒu chī lí de xísú。

那儿有辆救火车正在进行救火演习。
Nàr yǒu liàng jiùhuǒchē zhèngzài jìnxíng jiùhuǒ yǎnxí。
A fire engine is rehearsing now.

Lǎolǐngdǎo gāng tuìxiū，hěnbùxíguàn zhèzhǒng kàobiānr zhàn de shēnghuó。
The old leader has just retired, he can\'t get used to a powerless life.
小明把这个假期的时间可丁可卯全用在学习上了。
Xiǎo Míng bǎ zhège jiàqī de shíjiān kědīng kěmǎo quán yòngzài xuéxí shàng le。

他从小就和爷爷学习刻制印章的技术，现在技艺已经很精湛了。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù hé yéye xuéxí kèzhì yìnzhāng de jìshù，xiànzài jìyì yǐjing hěnjīngzhàn le。
He has been learning seal engraving from his grandpa, and now has perfect craftsmanship.
课间操对一直坐着学习的学生来说，很有益。
Kèjiāncāo duì yìzhí zuò zhe xuéxí de xuésheng láishuō，hěnyǒu yì。
Recess calisthenics are helpful to those students who always sit and study all day long.
他像啃骨头似的啃那些练习题，可还是没做完。
Tā xiàng kěn gǔtou sì de kěn nàxiē liànxítí，kě háishi méi zuòwán。
He keeps working on those exercises, but he has not finished yet.
学习不能总是死啃书本，要灵活掌握。
Xuéxí bùnéng zǒngshì sǐkěn shūběn，yào línghuó zhǎngwò。
You can\'t read your books just for the sake of reading them; you should master them thoroughly.
他不好好学习，就知道上网打游戏，这不是空耗青春吗！
Tā bùhǎohǎo xuéxí，jiù zhīdào shàngwǎng dǎ yóuxì，zhè búshì kōnghào qīngchūn ma！
He wastes his life by playing computer games instead of studying hard.
最近一周，他们部队正在进行空降兵演习。
Zuìjìn yìzhōu，tāmen bùduì zhèngzài jìnxíng kōngjiàngbīng yǎnxí。
小明总是放空炮，每年他都说要努力学习，可每年又都不努力。
Xiǎo Míng zǒngshì fàng kōngpào，měinián tā dōu shuō yào nǔlì xuéxí，kě měinián yòu dōu bùnǔlì。
Xiaoming always makes empty promises. Every year he says that he\'ll work hard, but he doesn\'t.
如今学习空手道的女孩子多起来了！
Rújīn xuéxí kōngshǒudào de nǚháizi duō qǐlái le！
Now more and more girls are learning karate.
口外的人有自己的生活习惯！
Kǒuwài de rén yǒu zìjǐ de shēnghuó xíguàn！
People north of Zhangjiakou have their own habits and customs.
我的学习成绩上去得很快，妈妈很宽怀！
Wǒ de xuéxí chéngjì shàngqù de hěnkuài，māma hěnkuānhuái！
Mom feels relieved that my school record has improved rapidly.
她有什么好狂气的，不就是刚当上学习委员嘛。
Tā yǒu shénme hǎo kuángqì de，bú jiùshì gāng dāngshàng xuéxí wěiyuán ma。
How can she be so arrogant? She has only been elected as a study leader right now.
孩子们练习拉丁舞对塑造形体是很有帮助的。
Háizimen liànxí lādīngwǔ duì sùzào xíngtǐ shì hěnyǒu bāngzhù de。
Latin dance can help shape children\'s bodies.
他赌博输的钱老鼻子了，但还是恶习不改。
Tā dǔbó shū de qián lǎobízi le，dàn háishi èxí bùgǎi。
He still indulges in gambling, though he has lost plenty of money.
我在中学学习棱锥的时候就总搞不懂计算其体积的方法。
Wǒ zài zhōng xué xuéxí léngzhuī de shíhou jiù zǒng gǎo bùdǒng jìsuàn qí tǐjī de fāngfǎ。
When I learned about pyramids in middle school, I  couldn\'t always understand how to calculate their volume.
小孩子要从小养成使用礼貌用语的习惯。
Xiǎoháizi yào cóng xiǎo yǎngchéng shǐyòng lǐmào yòngyǔ de xíguàn。
Children should nurture the habit of using courteous formulae since their youth.
利他的精神是我们应该努力学习的。
Lì tā de jīngshén shì wǒmen yīnggāi nǔlì xuéxí de。
Altruistic spirit should studied by us vigorously.
他是个恋群的人，总是怀念以前一起生活学习过的室友。
Tā shì gè liànqún de rén，zǒngshì huáiniàn yǐqián yìqǐ shēnghuó xuéxí guò de shìyǒu。
He is attached to people around him, and always misses his roommates from when he was a student.
我夏天有睡凉枕的习惯。
Wǒ xiàtiān yǒu shuì liángzhěn de xíguàn。
I have the habit of sleeping on a cooling pillow in summer.
由于学习成绩优秀，他被批准躐等升级。
Yóuyú xuéxí chéngjì yōuxiù,tā bèi pīzhǔn lièděng shēngjí.
Because of excellent grades, he was approved to skip  the normal steps to go up to a higher grade.
你的书法水平还很低，要多临池练习。
Nǐ de shūfǎ shuǐpíng hái hěndī，yào duō línchí liànxí。
You have very low level of calligraphy skill. You should practice more.
学习书法要从临帖开始，这样才学得好。
Xuéxí shūfǎ yào cóng líntiè kāishǐ，zhèyàng cái xué de hǎo。
Learning calligraphy should start from practicing calligraphy after a model. Only in this way, can you learn it well.
早自习时，老师请了一位同学来领读。
Zǎozìxí shí，lǎoshī qǐng le yíwèi tóngxué lái lǐngdú。
The teacher invited a student to lead the reading aloud in morning individual study class.
台上的那个领诵是我们班的学习委员。
Tái shàng de nàge lǐngsòng shì wǒmen bān de xuéxí wěiyuán。
The lead reader on the platform is our commissary in charge of studies.
我习惯把新衣服上的领条摘下来再穿。
Wǒ xíguàn bǎ xīn yīfu shàng de lǐngtiáo zhāixiàlái zài chuān。
When putting on a new coat, I’m used to plucking off the collar strip first.
晚饭后，我习惯和爸爸妈妈去遛弯儿。
Wǎnfàn hòu，wǒ xíguàn hé bàba māma qù liùwānr。
I am used to taking a walk with my parents after supper.
今天课上我们学习了龙山文化。
Jīntiān kè shàng wǒmen xuéxí le lóngshān wénhuà。
We studied the Longshan Culture in class today.
我要参加明天的培训班，学习新路规。
Wǒ yào cānjiā míngtiān de péixùnbān，xuéxí xīn lùguī。
I’ll attend the training class tomorrow to learn new railway rules and regulations.
等我们赶回自习室的时候，门已经落锁了。
Děng wǒmen gǎnhuí zìxíshì de shíhou，mén yǐjing luòsuǒ le。
When we hurried back to the self-study room, the door had already been locked.
我现在时间充裕，所以想报一个英语学习的慢班。
Wǒ xiànzài shíjiān chōngyù，suǒyǐ xiǎng bào yígè yīngyǔ xuéxí de mànbān。
Having plenty of free time, I want to enroll in a slow progress English class.
自从失明以后，他已经慢慢习惯于借助盲杖行走了。
Zìcóng shīmíng yǐhòu，tā yǐjing mànmàn xíguànyú jièzhù mángzhàng xíngzǒu le。
Since losing his eyesight, he has gradually gotten used to walking with a cane.
刚刚开始学习模特课程，她的猫步还走不好呢。
Gānggāng kāishǐ xuéxí mótè kèchéng，tā de māobùhái zǒubùhǎo ne。
She has begun a modeling course, and can not walk the cat walk well.
他在班里的学习成绩一直都是冒尖的。
Tā zài bān lǐ de xuéxí chéngjì yìzhí dōushì màojiān de。
He has been top notch in his class.
他习惯于每天夜里提着煤气灯，巡视大院。
Tā xíguànyú měitiān yèlǐ tí zhe méiqìdēng，xúnshì dàyuàn。
He is used to carrying gas lamps and patrolling the yard every night.
能够在老师门下学习，真是我的荣幸。
Nénggòu zài lǎoshī ménxià xuéxí，zhēnshì wǒ de róngxìng。
It is a great honor for me to learn from you.
孩子已经长大，可以进蒙馆学习了。
Háizi yǐjing zhǎngdà，kěyǐ jìn méngguǎn xuéxí le。
The child is old enough to learn in a private primary elementary school.
我一直怀疑自己有梦游的习惯。
Wǒ yìzhí huáiyí zìjǐ yǒu mèngyóu de xíguàn。
I always suspect that I have somnambulism.
我们正当妙年，一定要努力学习文化知识。
Wǒmen zhèngdāng miàonián，yídìng yào nǔlì xuéxí wénhuà zhīshi。
We are in the bloom of youth, so we should try our best to acquire education.
他的学习成绩很好，总在班里名列前茅。
Tā de xuéxí chéngjì hěnhǎo，zǒng zài bān lǐ mínglièqiánmáo。
He does exceedingly well in his studies, and has always been heading the class.
她习惯于把每天的收入和支出都记录在明细账上。
Tā xíguànyú bǎ měitiān de shōurù hé zhīchū dōu jìlù zài míngxìzhàng shàng。
She is used to recording everyday receipts, and expenditures on in a minute account book.
小明不喜欢数学，所以对于学习数学有什么好处，他的心里一片冥茫。
Xiǎo Míng bùxǐhuan shùxué，suǒyǐ duìyú xuéxí shùxué yǒu shénme hǎochu，tā de xīnlǐ yípiàn míngmáng。
Xiaoming doesn’t like mathematics, so he is at loss about the use of learning it.
战斗演习时，我摸哨成功，得到了上级嘉奖。
Zhàndòu yǎnxí shí，wǒ mōshào chénggōng，dédào le shàngjí jiājiǎng。
In the military maneuver, I successfully attacked the enemy sentinels in the dark, and received a citation from my superior.
在军事演习中，蓝军企图摸营，被红军挫败。
Zài jūnshì yǎnxí zhōng，lánjūn qǐtú mōyíng，bèi hóngjūn cuòbài。
In the military maneuver, the blue army attempted to attack the red army’s sentinels in the dark, but was defeated.
这个孩子中了魔障了，不好好学习，天天为电子游戏而着迷！
Zhège háizi zhòng le mózhàng le，bùhǎohǎo xuéxí，tiāntiān wèi diànzǐ yóuxì ér zháomí！
The child is addicted to electronic games, and plays games rather than studying hard every day.
经过三个月的总复习，他终于拿下了研究生考试。
Jīngguò sāngè yuè de zǒng fùxí，tā zhōng yú náxià le yánjiūshēng kǎoshì。
After a three-month review, he finally passed the graduate admission examination.
他从小就拜师学习南拳，如今已经武艺高强了。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù bàishī xuéxí nánquán，rújīn yǐjing wǔyì gāoqiáng le。
He learned southern style boxing from a master when he was very young, and now he is highly skilled in wushu now.
小明从小就脑瓜儿聪明，可惜就是不喜欢学习。
Xiǎo Míng cóng xiǎo jiù nǎoguār cōngmíng，kěxī jiùshì bùxǐhuan xuéxí。
Xiaoming has been clever since he was young, but he doesn’t like studying.
回想起小时候自己学习不是太努力，他深感内愧。
Huíxiǎng qǐ xiǎoshíhòu zìjǐ xuéxí búshì tài nǔlì,tā shēngǎn nèikuì.
He feels ashamed of himself because he didn\'t study hard when he was young.
学习历史是为了了解过去、借鉴经验，可千万不能泥古不化啊！
Xuéxí lìshǐ shì wèi le liǎojiě guòqù、jièjiàn jīngyàn，kě qiānwàn bùnéng nígǔ búhuà a！
We learn history to know the past and use it for reference, but we should never learn it without understanding.
今天派送他们出国学习，是希望明天他们能够回来报效祖国。
Jīntiān pàisòng tāmen chūguó xuéxí，shì xīwàng míngtiān tāmen nénggòu huílái bàoxiào zǔguó。
We send them abroad to study today because we hope that they will come back to serve their country.
她以旁听生的身份学习了中文系的许多课程。
Tā yǐ pángtīngshēng de shēnfèn xuéxí le zhōng wénxì de xǔduō kèchéng。
She took many courses of the department of Chinese language as a listener.
他虽然聪明但不够专心，学习中时常心有旁骛。
Tā suīrán cōngmíng dàn búgòu zhuānxīn，xuéxí zhōng shícháng xīnyǒu pángwù。
He is smart but inattentive, he sometimes fails to concentrate when he is studying.
他学习十分刻苦，经常披卷到深夜。
Tā xuéxí shífēn kèkǔ，jīngcháng pījuàn dào shēnyè。
He studies hard and he often reads books until late at night.
宝宝刚5岁，已经开始学习拼音字母了。
Bǎobao gāng wǔsuì，yǐjing kāishǐ xuéxí pīnyīn zìmǔ le。
The baby, who is just five years old, has already started to  learn Chinese phonetic letters.
破五的习俗是指正月初五这天家人团聚一堂，吃饺子。
Pòwǔ de xísú shì zhǐ zhēngyuè chūwǔ zhè tiān jiārén tuánjù yìtáng，chī jiǎozi。
The custom of Po Wu means that family members reunite to eat dumplings on the fifth day of the first lunar month.
我们现在学习专业知识是为将来的工作铺路。
Wǒmen xiànzài xuéxí zhuānyè zhīshi shì wèi jiānglái de gōngzuò pūlù。
Studying professional knowledge now paves the way for the future.
这个台历用民间的习俗标注月份，比如将五月写成蒲月。
Zhège táilì yòng mínjiān de xísú biāozhù yuèfèn，bǐrú jiāng wǔyuè xiěchéng púyuè。
This desk calendar marks the months according to folk customs, such as writing the fifth month of the lunar year as Pu month.
他正在游泳池里练习蹼泳。
Tā zhèngzài yóuyǒngchí lǐ liànxí púyǒng。
He is practicing swimming with flippers in the swimming pool.
小明在少年宫学习七弦琴。
Xiǎo Míng zài shàoniángōng xuéxí qīxiánqín。
Xiao Ming is studying to play the guqin in the children\'s palace.
为了期终能考出好成绩，我们每天都努力学习。
Wèile qī zhōng néng kǎochū hǎo chéngjì，wǒmen měitiān dōu nǔlì xuéxí。
To get high marks in the final exam, we study hard every day.
我对于其人的评价是：聪明但不爱学习。
Wǒ duìyú qírén de píngjià shì：cōngmíng dàn búài xuéxí。
My judgment of that person is that he is smart but not fond of studying.
其时我还小，不知道学习的重要性。
Qíshí wǒ hái xiǎo，bùzhīdào xuéxí de zhòngyàoxìng。
At that time, I was young, and didn\'t realize the importance of study.
我们要在平时的工作和学习中实践“千里之行，始于足下”的真理。
Wǒmen yào zài píngshí de gōngzuò hé xuéxí zhōng shíjiàn“qiānlǐzhīxíng，shǐyúzúxià”de zhēnlǐ。
We should practice the truth a thousand-li journey starts with the first step in our daily work and study.
他很想拜师学习山东琴书。
Tā hĕn xiǎng bàishī xuéxí Shāndōng qínshū.
He wants to learn Shandong story-telling by following a master.
我们要用求实的态度对待工作和学习。
Wǒmen yào yòng qiúshí de tàidu duìdài gōngzuò hé xuéxí。
We must have a realistic approach to work and study.
他刻苦练习冰球，不知用坏了多少球刀。
Tā kèkǔ liànxí bīngqiú，bùzhī yònghuài le duōshǎo qiúdāo。
He practices ice hockey hard, nobody knows how many hockey blades he has worn out.
随着期末的临近，我们的学习日益趋紧。
Suí zhe qīmò de línjìn，wǒmen de xuéxí rìyì qūjǐn。
As the end of the semester is coming, our study is becoming more tense.
学生应全身心地投入学习之中。
Xuéshēng yīng quánshēnxīn de tóurù xuéxí zhī zhōng。
Students should study with their whole heart.
事情纷纷扰扰，让人无法专心学习。
Shìqíng fēnfēnrǎorǎo，ràng rén wúfǎ zhuānxīn xuéxí。
The confusing matters make him unable to concentrate on his study.
经过一段时间的学习，他能看懂常用的日文了。
Jīngguò yíduàn shíjiān de xuéxí，tā néng kàndǒng chángyòng de rìwén le。
After a period of study, he can read everyday Japanese now.
您的这篇大作，我一定要好好赏阅、学习。
Nín de zhèpiān dàzuò，wǒ yīdìng yào hǎohǎo shǎngyuè，xuéxí。
I will surely carefully read and learn your article.
你今年的学习成绩一定要上台阶。
Nǐ jīnnián de xuéxí chéngjì yídìng yào shàng táijiē。
You must make progress in your studies this year.
我曾经在少年宫学习过两年中国象棋。
Wǒ céngjīng zài shǎoniángōng xuéxíguo liǎng nián zhōng guó xiàng qí。
I have studied Chinese chess in the Children\'s Palace for two years.
他这种舍己为公的行为非常值得我们大家学习！
Tā zhèzhǒng shějǐwéigōng de xíngwéi fēicháng zhídé wǒmen dàjiā xuéxí ！
He sacrificed his own interests for the public interest, it is well worth our study!
由于学习成绩下降，我被父亲申饬了。
Yóuyú xuéxí chéngjì xiàjiàng，wǒ bèi fùqīn shēnchì le。
I was blamed by my father due to the worsening of my study.
父亲深望我能取得更好的学习成绩。
Fùqīn shēnwàng wǒ néng qǔdé gènghǎo de xuéxí chéngjì。
My father sincerely hopes that I can do better in study.
学习汉语拼音一定要先学会区分声韵。
Xuéxí hànyǔ pīnyīn yídìng yào xiān xuéhuì qūfēn shēngyùn。
In studying Chinese, one must first learn to distinguish between initial consonants and vowels.
我多年来一直师从张老师学习绘画。
Wǒ duōniánlái yìzhí shīcóng Zhāng lǎoshī xuéxí huìhuà.
I have been learning painting from teacher Zhang for years.
他从小爱习诗文，不爱棍棒，这让作武将的父亲很不高兴。
Tā cóng xiǎo àixí shīwén，bùài gùnbàng，zhè ràng zuò wǔjiàng de fùqīn hěnbùgāoxīng。
He has been fond of literature rather than martial arts since childhood, which makes his father, a military general, very unhappy.
我做实习生的时候跟着老师们学到了许多书本上学不到的知识。
Wǒ zuò shíxíshēng de shíhou gēn zhe lǎoshīmen xuédào le xǔduō shūběn shàng xuébúdào de zhīshi。
During my internship, I learned much knowledge from the teachers which can\'t be read in books.
我的同学现在已经在律师事务所实习了。
Wǒ de tóngxué xiànzài yǐjing zài lǜshī shìwùsuǒ shíxí le。
My classmate has already started his internship in a law office.
各个地方的守丧习俗不太相同。
Gè gè dìfāng de shǒusàng xísú bú tài xiāngtóng。
The rites for the dead vary from one place to another.
我很熟稔他的习惯，所以我会照顾好他的。
Wǒ hěnshúrěn tā de xíguàn，suǒyǐ wǒ huì zhàogù hǎo tā de。
I know his habits well, so I\'ll take good care of him.
他是班里的文艺骨干，但学习成绩不怎么样。
Tā shì bān lǐ de wényì gǔgàn，dàn xuéxí chéngjì bùzěnmeyàng。
He is a mainstay of literature and art in class, but doesn\'t do well in study.
在学校时，他的学习成绩数得上前10名。
Zài xuéxiào shí，tā de xuéxí chéngjì shǔdéshàng qiánshímíng。
His study results are among the top ten at school.
他有说梦话的习惯，同宿舍的哥们儿们都知道。
Tā yǒu shuō mènghuà de xíguàn，tóng sùshè de gēmenrmen dōu zhīdào。
He often speaks in his dreams, all his dorm-mates know.
生长于朔方，她不习惯南方的生活。
Shēngzhǎng yú shuòfāng，tā bùxíguàn nánfāng de shēnghuó。
Born in the north, she couldn\'t get used to life in the south.
古代的女子手中总是拿着丝帕，在当时是一种习惯。
Gǔdài de nǚzǐ shǒu zhōng zǒngshì ná zhe sīpà，zài dāngshí shì yìzhǒng xíguàn。
It was a custom for ancient girls to hold a silk handkerchief in their hand.
你的私心杂念太多，怎么能够专心学习呢？
Nǐ de sīxīn zániàn tài duō，zěnme nénggòu zhuānxīn xuéxí ne？
You have too many selfish considerations, how can you concentrate on study?
死记硬背的学习方法，我们是不提倡的。
Sǐjì yìngbèi de xuéxí fāngfǎ，wǒmen shì bùtíchàng de。
We don\'t advocate learning by rote.
他那松柏般高洁的品格很值得后人学习。
Tā nà sōngbǎi bān gāojié de pǐngé hěnzhídé hòurén xuéxí。
His noble lofty sentiments are worth his descendants\' study.
他学习过速算，算起账来又快又准确。
Tā xuéxí guò sùsuàn，suànqǐzhànglái yòu kuài yòu zhǔnquè。
He has studied fast calculation, so can do accounts both quickly and accurately.
他开会时有随记的好习惯。
Tā kāihuì shí yǒu suíjì de hǎo xíguàn。
He has the good habit of taking notes in meetings.
学习不能贪多，关键是一步一个脚印，学扎实。

她正在向母亲学习如何制作藤编。

他刚进施工队的时候，最先学习的是铁活。

Wǒmen yīnggāi xiān liǎojiě zǒngzhāng，ránhòu zài qù xuéxí qítā xiǎo de zhāngjié。
We should understand the summary chapter first and then learn the other branch chapters.

Cóng yígèrén de zuòzī néng kànchū tā píngshí de xíguàn。
From their sitting postures, you can know people’s habits.

It is more convenient to study English with an electronic dictionary.

这种传统习俗永远地消失了。
The rituals known as male bonding do not necessarily involve drinking beer together.
Ànzhào xísú nánrén jiāo péngyou bìng fēi yídìng yào zài yìqǐ hējiǔ。
按照习俗男人交朋友并非一定要在一起喝酒。
He had done a lot of parachuting in the army.
Tā zài jūn zhōng jìnxíngle dàliàng tiàosǎn liànxí。
他在军中进行了大量跳伞练习。
They were used to a climatically different environment.
Tāmen xíguànle bùtóng de qìhòu huánjìng。

他从书中间接地学习经验。

Tā zhùcè jìnxíng yǐndǎoshì xuéxí。

他每天都要练习击鼓几个小时。
Martinis are an acquired taste.

Tā kuángyě bùjī de xíngwéi shì duì yāyì xísú de fǎnkàng。

Tā xíguàn wú xìtǒng de gōngzuò。
他习惯无系统地工作。

So far as it is reasonably practical he should practice restraint.

如果可能，他应当学习自我约束自己。
The drinking of cocktails was as canonical a rite as the mixing.
Hē jīwěijiǔ jiùxiàng tiáojiǔ yíyàng shì yí gè chuántǒng de xísú。
喝鸡尾酒就像调酒一样是一个传统的习俗。
The common people determine the group character and preserve its customs from one generation to the next.

Zài xuéxí gēcí zhīqián，xiān shìchàng。

实习医生
shíxí yīshēnɡ 
intern
这些日子我校师生在工厂实习。
Zhèxiē rìzi wǒ xiào shīshēng zài gōngchǎng shíxí。
The teachers and students of our school have been doing field work at a factory recently.
这几名工科大学生在工矿企业实习。
Zhè jǐ míng gōngkē dàxuésheng zài gōngkuàng qǐyè shíxí。
These college students majoring in engineering have become interns in an industrial and mining enterprise.
医院新近来了一批实习生。
A group of interns with a nine year\'s old wunderkind led by the ministry of education of Korea visited the Microsoft Asia Reasearch Institute.
韩国教育部携包括一名九岁小神童在内的韩国实习生代表团访问了微软亚洲研究院。
The intern bandaged the cut as the nurse looked on.
Zhè wèi shíxíshēng zài hùshi de zhàokàn xià gěi bìngrén bāozā shāngkǒu。
这位实习生在护士的照看下给病人包扎伤口。
The preparation of lab specimens usually is done by the interns.
Shíyànshì dòngwùtǐ biāoběn tōngcháng yóu shíxíshēng lái zuò。
实验室动物体标本通常由实习生来做。
We will bring in a few interns to complete the paperwork.
Wǒmen huì gùyōng jǐ míng shíxíshēng wánchéng wénshū gōngzuò。
我们会雇佣几名实习生完成文书工作。
Interns have to rotate for a few months.
Shíxíshēng měi jǐ gè yuè jiùyào lúnhuàn yí cì。
实习生每几个月就要轮换一次。
Public opinion turned when it was revealed that the president had an affair with a white house intern.
Dāng zǒngtǒng bèi jiēshì yǔ yì míng Báigōng shíxíshēng zhījiān yǒu bù xúncháng guānxi shí，yúlùn zhuǎnxiàng le。

帮助实习医生完成工作是这位老医生的职责。
The student doctors were learning new surgical techniques by picking seeds out of pumpkins.
Nàgè shíxí yīshēng zhèngzài tōngguò qǔchū nánguā de zhǒngzi lái xuéxí xīn de wàikē jìshù。
那个实习医生正在通过取出南瓜的种子来学习新的外科技术。

很多高中都为学生提供了实习项目，来使学生对自己将来的职业有个规划。
实习完毕，明日复课。
Shíxí wánbì, míngrì fùkè。
The field work is completed, and classes will begin again tomorrow.

Tā cānjiā le xuéxiào zǔzhī de shǔqī guàzhí shíxí。

zài zhōng xué shíxí

去煤矿实习
qù méikuàng shíxí
go on a field trip to a coal mine

jìnxíng hùlǐ shíxí

实习医生

intern

My classmate has already started his internship in a law office.
实弹演习
shídàn yǎnxí
practice with live ammunition
这样潮湿的天气我实在不习惯。
Zhèyàngcháoshī de tiānqì wǒ shízai bùxíguàn。
I just can\'t get used to this damp weather.
长期的实践学习使我逐步形成了唯物史观。
Chángqī de shíjiàn xuéxí shǐ wǒ zhúbù xíngchéng le wéiwùshǐguān。
I\'ve gradually formed a historical materialistic perspective through long practical study.
进行真枪实弹的演习
jìnxíngzhēnqiāngshídàn de yǎnxí 
conduct exercises (or manoeuvres) with live ammunition
我们要在平时的工作和学习中实践“千里之行，始于足下”的真理。
Wǒmen yào zài píngshí de gōngzuò hé xuéxí zhōng shíjiàn“qiānlǐzhīxíng，shǐyúzúxià”de zhēnlǐ。
We should practice the truth a thousand-li journey starts with the first step in our daily work and study.
这间教室很欢闹，实在不适宜学习。
Zhè jiān jiàoshì hěnhuānnào，shízai bú shìyí xuéxí。
This classroom is very noisy, and really not suitable for studying.
学习语言需要大量实践。
Xuéxí yǔyán xūyào dàliàng shíjiàn。
It requires much practice to learn a language.
我们要用求实的态度对待工作和学习。
Wǒmen yào yòng qiúshí de tàidu duìdài gōngzuò hé xuéxí。
We must have a realistic approach to work and study.
学习不能贪多，关键是一步一个脚印，学扎实。
Xuéxí bùnéng tānduō，guānjiàn shì yíbù yígè jiǎoyìn，xué zāshí。
It\'s not good to bite off more than one can chew in one\'s study. You have to be down-to-earth and try to grasp what you learn.
那些习惯于在水银灯下摆造型、做秀的明星们，其实也都有平凡的一面。
Nàxiē xíguànyú zài shuǐyíndēng xià bǎizàoxíng、zuòxiù de míngxīngmen，qíshí yě dōu yǒu píngfán de yímiàn。
Those stars who are used to posing under mercury lamps also have an ordinary side of their lives.
由于没有实战经验，我们的海军在很大程度上只能依靠演习。
yóu yú méi yǒu shí zhàn jīng yàn，wǒ men de hǎi jūn zài hěn dà chéng dù shàng zhǐ néng yī kào yǎn xí。
Without tactical experience our navy had to rely heavily on war-gaming.

刻苦学习，持之以恒
Kèkǔ xuéxí, chízhīyǐhénɡ。
study assiduously and perseveringly
刻苦学习
kèkǔ xuéxí
study hard
他经过不断地刻苦学习终于成为通人。
Tā jīngguò búduàn de kèkǔ xuéxí zhōng yú chéngwéi tōngrén。
Through hard work, he finally made himself into an erudite man.
通过刻苦学习，他掌握了好几门外国语。
Tōngguò kèkǔ xuéxí，tā zhǎngwò le hǎo jǐ mén wàiguóyǔ。
He mastered several foreign languages through hard work.
他学习那般刻苦，可学习成绩却依然很糟。
Tā xuéxí nàbān kèkǔ，kě xuéxí chéngjì què yīrán hěnzāo。
Though he studies hard, he performs badly.
刻苦地学习
kèkǔde xuéxí
study hard
他们学习刻苦。
Tāmen xuéxí kèkǔ。
They study hard.
他学习不刻苦，考试经常吃鸭蛋。
Tā xuéxí bú kèkǔ，kǎoshì jīngcháng chī yādàn。
He often fails his exams, because he doesn\'t study hard.
她学习十分刻苦，简直到了焚膏继晷的地步。
Tā xuéxí shífēn kèkǔ，jiǎnzhí dào le féngāojìguǐ de dìbù。
She studies hard day and night.
他学习十分刻苦，经常披卷到深夜。
Tā xuéxí shífēn kèkǔ，jīngcháng pījuàn dào shēnyè。
He studies hard and he often reads books until late at night.
学习绘画应该刻苦，不要总想着投机取巧。
Xuéxí huìhuà yīnggāi kèkǔ，búyào zǒng xiǎng zhe tóujīqǔqiǎo。
One should work hard in studying how to paint, rather than think of playing tricks to avoid difficulties all day long.

安娜刻苦学习，因此数学成绩名列全班第一。

七言律诗
qīyán lǜshī
septasyllabic (or seven-syllable) regulated verse
这首诗根本不叶韵，你怎么偏说它是七律呢？
Zhèshǒushī gēnběn bùxiáyùn，nǐ zěnme piān shuō tā shì qīlǜ ne？
This poem has no rhyme at all, how can you call it seven-character &quot;regulated&quot; verse?
七言律诗
qīyán lǜshī
septasyllabic (or seven-syllable) regulated verse
七律
这首七律颇有唐诗神韵。
According to oral tradition, Feast of Weeks was the time of giving the Torah or The Law of Moses at Mount Sinai.
按照口头传统，七七节是摩西律法在西奈山诞生的日子.
By law, statements of account, bank statements and balance sheets must be kept for at least seven years.
Gēnjù fǎlǜ guīdìng，duìzhàngdān、yínháng bàobiǎo hé zīchǎnfùzhàibiǎo bìxū zhìshǎo bǎoliú qīnián shíjiān。
根据法律规定，对账单、银行报表和资产负债表必须至少保留七年时间。
她爱好古典文学，自己也曾经学着写过排律。
Tā àihào gǔdiǎn wénxué，zìjǐ yě céngjīng xué zhe xiěguò páilǜ。
She is fond of classical literature, and has learnt to write long poems in regulated verse.
排律。
There were three distinct rows of law books in the office.
Bàngōngshì lǐ yǒu sān pái fǎlǜ shūjí。
办公室里有三排法律书籍。

There are strict requirements on sound meter in our nation\'s metrical verses.
词和律诗体式不同。

五言律诗
wǔyán lǜshī
pentasyllabic (or five-syllable) regulated verse
七言律诗
qīyán lǜshī
septasyllabic (or seven-syllable) regulated verse
唐代律诗在定型化过程中和定型后，都存在变例。
Tángdài lǜshīzàidìngxínghuà guòchéng zhōng hé dìngxíng hòu，dōu cúnzài biànlì。
There were exceptions in the &quot;regulated&quot; verse of Tang dynasty during and after its shaping.
李白、杜甫都是唐代格律诗的大家。
Lǐ Bái、Dù Fǔ dōushì tángdài gélǜshī de dàjiā。
Both Li Bai and Du Fu are great masters of poetry with strict tonal patterns and rhyme schemes.
这首诗根本不叶韵，你怎么偏说它是七律呢？
Zhèshǒushī gēnběn bùxiáyùn，nǐ zěnme piān shuō tā shì qīlǜ ne？
This poem has no rhyme at all, how can you call it seven-character &quot;regulated&quot; verse?
律诗的二、三两联要对仗。
律诗体制兴盛于唐代。
律诗、绝句都有一定字数。
这首七律颇有唐诗神韵。
这首诗有鲜明的节律
What is the beat of the poem?
Zhè shǒu shī de yùnlǜ shì shénme？
这首诗的韵律是什么？
Metrically, these poems are matched.
Cóng yùnlǜ shàng shuō，zhèxiē shī shì hěn xiétiáo de。
从韵律上说，这些诗是很协调的。
free verse
(不受格律约束的)自由诗
The meter of this poem is what makes it so beautiful.
这首诗正是因其韵律才显得如此美妙。
poetic license
诗中(语法、语序、格律等的)破格
A foot is a group of syllables forming the basic unit of rhythm in poetry.
Yùnjiǎo jiùshì yóu shīgē zhōng de jiǎoběn yùnlǜ dānyuán gòuchéng de yì zǔ yīnjié。
韵脚就是由诗歌中的脚本韵律单元构成的一组音节。
If you don\'t have an ear for a meter, carry on writing free verse or prose.
如果你对韵律不敏感的话，那就继续写自由体诗或散文吧。
When he read his poem, he broke the meter of the poem.
Dāng dú dào zìjǐ de shīcí shí，tā bìngwèi zūnzhào yuánlái de yùnlǜ。
当读到自己的诗词时，他并未遵照原来的韵律。

Zhège lǜshī rènwéi tā de xùshù hé zhè xiàng zhèngjù xiāng fúhé。
这个律师认为他的叙述和这项证据相符合。
The lawyer has to file an affidavit with the court.
Lǜshī bìxū xiàng fǎyuàn tíjiāo yí fèn xuānshìshū。
律师必须向法院提交一份宣誓书。

fǎlǜ chénɡxù 
legal procedure
触犯法律
chùfàn fǎlǜ 
violate (or break) the law
与法律相抵触
yǔ fǎlǜ xiāng dǐchù 
contravene (or go against) the law
法律保护
fǎlǜ bǎohù
legal protection
法律地位
fǎlǜ dìwèi
legal status
法律根据
fǎlǜ gēnjù
legal basis
法律规定
fǎlǜ guīdìng
legal provisions
法律手续
fǎlǜ shǒuxù
legal procedure
法律制裁
fǎlǜ zhìcái
legal sanction
法律面前人人平等。
Fǎlǜ miànqián rénrén píngděng。
All are equal before the law.
在法律许可范围内
zài fǎlǜ xǔkě fànwéi nèi
within the limits permitted by law
攻读法律
gōngdú fǎlǜ 
study law
法律顾问
fǎlǜ ɡùwèn
legal adviser
解释法律
jiěshì fǎlǜ 
interpret laws
在法律规定的权限内
zài fǎlǜ guīdìng de quánxiàn nèi
within the limits of one\'s authority as prescribed by law
国务院依照法律的规定任免行政人员。
Guówùyuàn yīzhào fǎlǜ de guīdìng rènmiǎn xíngzhèng rényuán。
The State Council appoints and removes administrative personnel according to the provisions of the law.
如发生此种情况，我们即诉诸法律。
Rú fāshēng cǐ zhǒng qíngkuàng，wǒmen jí sùzhū fǎlǜ。
In that event, we would take the matter to court.
县里曾三令五申，干什么都得按法律办事。

The county repeatedly enjoined that everything must be done according to law.
受法律制裁
shòu fǎlǜ zhìcái
be dealt with according to law
法律诉讼
fǎlǜ sùsòng
judicial proceedings
不法分子逃脱不了法律的制裁。
Bùfǎ fènzǐ táotuō bùliǎo fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
The lawbreakers will never escape punishment according to law.
法律条款
fǎlǜ tiáokuǎn 
legal provision

yánpìn mǒurén wéi fǎlǜ gùwèn

依照法律规定的条件
yīzhào fǎlǜ guīdìng de tiáojiàn

法律意识
fǎlǜ yìshi 
law awareness

yuányǐn fǎlǜ tiáowén

制定法律
zhìdìnɡ fǎlǜ 
make laws
以事实为根据，以法律为准绳
yǐ shìshí wéi gēnjù，yǐ fǎlǜ wéi zhǔnshéng

维护法律的尊严
wéihù fǎlǜ de zūnyán 
guard the sanctity of the law
遵守法律
zūnshǒu fǎlǜ 
abide by the law
藐视法律
miǎoshì fǎlǜ
defiance of law
法律是公平的。
Fǎlǜ shì gōngpíng de。
案发后，他东躲西藏，可还是没有逃过法律的治裁。
Ànfā hòu，tā dōngduǒxīcáng，kě háishi méiyǒu táoguò fǎlǜ de zhìcái。
After commiting the crime he tried hard to hide from the reach of justice, but he couldn\'t.
无论你有什么理由，触法就要受到法律的制裁。

按照现行法律规定，余额必须由你代偿。

Tā zuì zhōng yídìng huì shòudào fǎlǜ zhìcái。
He is certain to be punished by the law.
世界各国都有各自的反腐倡廉的法律和举措。

每个公民都不应触动法律这条高压线。

国家法律规定，禁药不能随便买卖。

扒灰这种行为是法律和道德都不允许的。

法律早晚会制裁你们这些人渣的。

这个法律条文的涉及面非常广。
Zhège fǎlǜ tiáowén de shèjímiàn fēicháng guǎng。
This legal provision involves many things.

他如此贪贿无厌，终会受到法律制裁的。

His greediness for material comforts will one day bring him to justice.

The school is planning to take the students to listen to a court ruling to help them learn a little basic law.
偷运违禁物品的行为，要受到法律的制裁。

违法乱纪的人必然会受到法律的严惩。
Wéifǎ luànjì de rén bìrán huì shòudào fǎlǜ de yánchéng。
People who violate the law and public discipline will definitely be punished by the law.
对异性进行性侵犯会受到法律制裁。
Duì yìxìng jìnxíng xìng qīnfàn huì shòudào fǎlǜ zhìcái。
Those who sexually harrass the opposite sex will be punished by the law.
我国法律严格规定，休猎期间禁止打猎。
Wǒguó fǎlǜ yángé guīdìng，xiūliè qījiān jìnzhǐ dǎliè。
It is strictly stated in our law that hunting is forbidden during the non-hunting period.
虽然我在大学修读的是法律专业，可毕业后却当了一名会计。

Though I majored in law at university, I became an accountant after graduation.
我国法律规定，优抚金不允许被挪作他用。

Yǒuxiē zhèngzhìfàn wèi duǒbì běnguó de fǎlǜ zhìcái，dào biéguó xúnqiú zhèngzhì bìnàn。
Some political criminals went to other countries as political refuges to escape from their own countries\' legal punishments.
由于法律的不健全，他追偿的事情不得不放弃。
Yóuyú fǎlǜ de bú jiànquán，tā zhuīcháng de shìqing bùdébùfàngqì。
As the law is incomplete, he has to give up pressing for payment.
我国法律明文规定，禁止携带危险品搭乘飞机。
Wǒguófǎlǜ míngwén guīdìng，jìnzhǐ xiédài wēixiǎnpin dāchéng fēijī。
The law in our country clearly states that dangerous objects are prohibited on planes.
我国法律规定，未成年人不得进网吧上网。
Wǒguófǎlǜ guīdìng，wèichéngniánrén bùdé jìnwǎngba shàngwǎng。
According to law, minors are not allowed to go the internet café.

Tā bìyèyú Niújīndàxué fǎlǜxì。
She graduated in law from Oxford University.

fǎlǜ mángdiǎn

规律性的轻度锻炼证实是一种可以避免进一步用药的睿智办法。
Your pulse is as regular as clockwork.
Nǐ de màibó jí yǒu guīlǜ。

Nà wèi yīshēng dīngzhǔ yào jìnxíng yǒuguīlǜ de duànliàn。

required by law

fǎlǜ zhìcái

法律面前人人平等。

All are equal before the law.

zài fǎlǜ xǔkě fànwéi nèi

gōngdú fǎlǜ 

法律顾问
fǎlǜ ɡùwèn

jiěshì fǎlǜ

zài fǎlǜ guīdìng de quánxiàn nèi

shòu fǎlǜ zhìcái

亮晶晶的星星
liàngjīngjīng de xīngxing
glittering stars
亮晶晶的露珠
liàngjīngjīng de lùzhū 
glistening dewdrops
这屋子又宽敞又亮堂。
Zhè wūzi yòu kuānchǎngyòu liàngtang。
The room is light and spacious.
嗓门亮堂
sǎnɡmén liànɡtɑnɡ
have a resonant voice
经过反复讨论，大家心里更亮堂了。
Jīngguò fǎnfù tǎolùn，dàjiā xīnlǐ gèngliàngtang le。

歌声嘹亮。
Gēshēnɡ liáoliànɡ。 
The singing is loud and clear.
嘹亮的号角
liáoliàng de hàojiǎo 
a clarion call
天麻麻亮
tiān māmaliàng
at the crack of dawn
天蒙蒙亮他就起床了。
Tiān mēngmēngliàngtā jiù qǐchuáng le。
He got up at the crack of dawn.

kuānchǎngér míngliàng de jiàoshì
a bright and spacious classroom

míngliàng de yǎnjīng
bright eyes
听了同志们这番解释，老张心里明亮了。
Tīng le tóngzhìmen zhè fān jiěshì，Lǎo Zhāngxīnlǐ míngliàng le。
The comrades\' explanation helped Lao Zhang to straighten out his thinking.
漂亮的小伙子
piàoliàng de xiǎohuǒzi
a handsome young man

piàoliàng de xiǎogūniang
a pretty little girl

天亮前后

shortly before and after daybreak
嗓音清亮
sǎngyīn qīngliàng
a resonant voice

Tā sǎngyīn hóngliàng。

Yuèliang bǎ tiányě zhào de shuàbái。

一睡就睡到大天亮
yí shuì jiù shuìdào dà tiānliàng

yì sī liàngguāng
a thread of light

Zhè chē kàn qǐlái bú tài piàoliang，kě jiùshì kuài。

他绘制的蛋壳彩画，精致漂亮，堪称一绝！
Tā huìzhì de dànké cǎihuà，jīngzhì piàoliàng，kānchēng yìjué！
The eggs he decorated with colored drawings are really exquisite and beautiful. They can be called unique.
谁知道，太阳的亮度有多少个坎德拉？
Shéi zhīdào，tàiyáng de liàngdù yǒu duōshǎo gè kǎndélā？
Who knows how many candelas is the brightness of the sun?
她那么聪明漂亮，是他心中的可人儿！
Tā nàme cōngmíng piàoliàng，shì tā xīn zhōng de kěrénr！
She is so beautiful and smart, she\'s exactly as he likes.
今年春天这匹骒马又生下了一个漂亮的马驹。
Jīnnián chūntiān zhè pǐ luómǎ yòu shēngxià le yígè piàoliàng de mǎjū。
The mare gave birth to another pretty colt this spring.
这个牌子的蔻丹在指甲上保持的时间较久，颜色也鲜亮，许多小姑娘都很喜欢。
Zhège páizi de kòudān zài zhǐjiǎ shàng bǎochí de shíjiān jiào jiǔ，yánsè yě xiānliàng，xǔduō xiǎogūniang dōu hěnxǐhuan。
The nail polish of this brand, having long persistence and bright color, is many girls\' favorite.
这条裤裙很漂亮，远看就像裙子一样。
Zhè tiáo kùqún hěnpiàoliàng，yuǎnkàn jiù xiàng qúnzi yíyàng。
The culottes are very beautiful and look like a skirt at a distance.
这些盔头的样式颜色都不一样，都很漂亮。
Zhèxiē kuītóu de yàngshì yánsè dōu bùyíyàng，dōu hěnpiàoliàng。
These opera singers\' headpieces are different in style and color, but they are all beautiful.
她新买的小皮包真是漂亮！
Tā xīnmǎi de xiǎopíbāo zhēnshì piàoliàng！
The little leather bag she just bought is really pretty.
作为一个年轻漂亮的坤角儿，她很受大家欢迎。
Zuòwéi yígè niánqīng piàoliàng de kūnjuér，tā hěnshòu dàjiā huānyíng。
A young and beautiful actress, she is very popular.
拉祜族的服饰很漂亮。
Lāhùzú de fúshì hěnpiàoliàng。
The clothes of the Lahu ethnic group are quite beautiful.
拉拉队里面都是漂亮的小姑娘，个个都朝气蓬勃的。
Lālāduì lǐmian dōushì piàoliàng de xiǎogūniang，gègè dōu zhāoqì péngbó de。
Rooters are all beautiful girls full of vigour and vitality.
这种水晶蓝晶晶的，非常漂亮。
Zhèzhǒng shuǐjīng lánjīngjīng de，fēicháng piàoliàng。
This kind of shiny blue crystal is very beautiful.
懒汉鞋虽然看起来不漂亮，但是穿起来很舒服。
Lǎnhànxié suīrán kànqǐlái bú piàoliàng，dànshì chuānqǐlái hěnshūfu。
Though ugly, loafers wear comfortably.
经过治理，这片烂泥塘成了漂亮的荷花塘。
Jīngguò zhìlǐ，zhè piàn lànnítáng chéng le piàoliàng de héhuātáng。
The muddy pond changed into a beautiful lotus pond after harnessing.
这里的风景好漂亮，真算得上是阆苑仙境了！
Zhèlǐ de fēngjǐng hǎo piàoliàng，zhēn suàndéshàng shì làngyuàn xiānjìng le！
The beautiful scenery here is as gorgeous as an imperial garden.
莲座上的莲花还带着水珠，看着清新漂亮。
Liánzuò shàng de liánhuā hái dài zhe shuǐzhū，kàn zhe qīngxīn piàoliàng。
The lotus flowers on the bottom of lotus seeds are still with beads, which look quite fresh and beautiful.
水中的涟漪在阳光的照射下似锦缎布匹一样光滑油亮。
Shuǐ zhōng de liányī zài yángguāng de zhàoshè xià sì jǐnduàn bùpǐ yíyàng guānghuá yóuliàng。
The ripples on the water are as smooth and bright as a brocade under the sunshine.
亮丑不是坏事，能够刺激我们改正缺点。
Liàngchǒu búshì huàishì，nénggòu cìjī wǒmen gǎizhèng quēdiǎn。
Revealing mistakes is not a bad thing. It can stimulate us to correct our shortcomings.
我们的比赛采取当场亮分的形式，以示公正。
Wǒmen de bǐsài cǎiqǔ dāngchǎng liàngfēn de xíngshì，yǐ shì gōngzhèng。
Our competition adopts the form of giving out scores on the spot to show justice.
他的皮鞋总是擦得亮光光的。
Tā de píxié zǒngshì cā de liàngguāngguāng de。
His shoes are always brilliantly brushed.
别拐弯抹角的了，说亮话吧。
Bié guǎiwānmòjiǎo de le，shuō liànghuà ba。
Don\'t talk in a roundabout way. Be frank and straight forward.
不知道前面是什么亮晃晃的物体在发光。
Bùzhīdào qiánmiàn shì shénme liànghuǎnghuǎng de wùtǐ zài fāguāng。
I don\'t know what is the dazzling object shining in front.
他的高风亮节为人所钦佩。
Tā de gāofēng liàngjié wéirén suǒ qīnpèi。
His lofty quality, and exalted morality are admired by others.
她亮丽的外表马上赢得了我的好感。
Tā liànglì de wàibiǎo mǎshàng yíngdé le wǒ de hǎogǎn。
Her beautiful appearance won my favor at once.
他亮牌子后我们才知道他的真实身份。
Tā liàngpáizi hòu wǒmen cái zhīdào tā de zhēnshí shēnfèn。
It was not until he showed his cards that we knew his true identity.
年轻人都喜欢穿亮色的衣服。
Niánqīngrén dōu xǐhuan chuān liàngsè de yīfu。
Young people all like wearing bright colored clothes.
她的钻石耳环在灯光下亮闪闪的。
Tā de zuānshí ěrhuán zài dēngguāng xià liàngshǎnshǎn de。
Her diamond rings are shining under the light.
灯火把整个院子照得亮堂堂的。
Dēnghuǒ bǎ zhěnggè yuànzi zhào de liàngtángtáng de。
The lamplight made the whole yard brilliant.
歹徒突然从包中掏出一把亮锃锃的匕首。
Dǎitú tūrán cóng bāo zhōng tāochū yìbǎ liàngzèngzèng de bǐshǒu。
The gangster suddenly fished out a dazzling dagger from the bag.
他新剪的刘海儿很漂亮。
Tā xīnjiǎn de liúhǎir hěnpiàoliàng。
His new fringe is quite good looking.
看他那隆准，就知道他长大后准漂亮。
Kàn tā nà lóngzhǔn，jiù zhīdào tā zhǎngdà hòu zhǔn piàoliàng。
His prominent nose reveals that he will be a handsome man.
白帽子上的这朵红色的帽花，看着非常鲜艳漂亮。
Báimàozi shàng de zhèduǒ hóngsè de màohuā，kànzhe fēicháng xiānyàn piàoliàng。
The red badge on the white hat looks very nice and bright.
这小姑娘长得虽然不是特别漂亮，但是很耐看。

Though the girl is not beautiful, she withstands scrutiny.
这个小男婴真漂亮，一看就知道长得像他的妈妈。
Zhège xiǎonányīng zhēn piàoliàng，yíkàn jiù zhīdào zhǎng de xiàng tā de māma。
The little baby is handsome, and resembles his mother very much.
她看中了一件漂亮衣服，可是囊中羞涩，所以没有买。
Tā kànzhòng le yíjiàn piàoliàng yīfu，kěshì náng zhōng xiūsè，suǒyǐ méiyǒu mǎi。
She took a fancy to a beautiful garment, but she didn’t buy it because she couldn’t afford it.

Master Li has inherited traditional skills from his predecessors and innovates his own skills in inside-bottle painting, so his works are very beautiful.
这个枕头表面看来很漂亮，内瓤却是破烂的棉花！

The pillow appears beautiful, but the inside is filled with rotten cotton.
新款的冰箱不仅外观漂亮，而且提高了能效，更加节能省电了！

The new-style refrigerator is not only beautiful in appearance but also more efficient in power saving.
他用拟物的文学手法描写了有着红苹果般漂亮脸蛋儿的孩子们。

He applied the skill of objectification to depict the children with beautiful faces like red apples.
画儿上那个古装的小娘子可真漂亮。

小刘婚礼上，我们都看见了他的新娘子，很漂亮。

小王的女儿是个漂亮可爱的小妞妞。

Little Wang\'s daughter is a pretty and lovely little girl.
这个女婴漂亮又可爱，谁见了都喜欢。

The baby girl is pretty and cute, everybody likes her.
这个女优是靠着长相漂亮才成名的，其实演技一般。

她从小就漂亮，大家都夸她是美人坯子。

他的婆姨是村子里最漂亮的女人。

今天在晚会上，她穿了一身漂亮的旗装。

She won the championship of the artistic gymnastics competition with her fluent ball gymnastics.
她不像年轻时那样漂亮了，真是人老珠黄啊。

Like a pearl yellows with age, she is not as beautiful as she used to be.
传统的日光灯虽然亮度很好，但不太节能。

Traditional fluorescent lamps are bright, but energy-saving.

Yuèliàng zhēzhù tàiyáng huì xíngchéng rìpiānshí。
When the moon shuts out the sun, a partial solar eclipse appears.
她想用这块漂亮的色布做书房的窗帘。
Tā xiǎng yòng zhèkuài piàolǐang de sèbùzuò shūfáng de chuānglián。
She wanted to use this beautiful piece of colored cloth to make a curtain for the study.
他总是用色迷迷的眼神看身边走过的漂亮女孩。

He always stares lasciviously at beautiful girls passing by.

Tonight is cloudy, and the moon is faintly seen in the clouds.

This garment is really pretty, but doesn\'t suit her.
传说嫦娥就住在月亮里的水晶宫。

It is said that Chang\'e lives in the Moon Palace.

Tā de lǐfú shàng zhuìmǎn le liàngpiàn，zhēnshì guāngmáng sìshè a。
Her dress was fully covered with tinsel, which glittered to all directions.
她那件白底碎花儿小旗袍很漂亮。
Tā nà jiàn báidǐ suìhuār xiǎo qípáo hěnpiàoliàng。
Her white dress, with scattered small flowers and plants, is very beautiful.
这些木家具上的烫花真古朴、漂亮啊！
Zhèxiē mùjiājù shàng de tànghuā zhēn gǔpǔ、piàoliàng a！
The bronze flowers on this wooden furniture look very beautiful.
古代人们不了解月食出现的原因，误以为是天狗把月亮吃掉了。
Gǔdài rénmen bùliǎojiě yuèshí chūxiàn de yuányīn，wù yǐwéi shì tiāngǒu bǎ yuèliàng chīdiào le。

昨天晚上我们通宿打牌直到天亮。
Zuótiān wǎnshàng wǒmen tōngxiǔ dǎpái zhídào tiānliàng。
We played cards the whole night last night.

妈妈新买了一条黄色的围腰，很漂亮。

Mom has just bought a very beautiful yellow apron.
你的卫生衣真漂亮，请问是从哪买的？

My brother writes very beautiful regular script in small characters.

现在的学生很少有人能写一手漂亮的小篆了。

老王根据看到的晓月判断天就快亮了。

姐姐是个心灵手巧的人，做的衣服很漂亮。

The butterfly pattern on the sleeping dress is embroidered, which looks beautiful and exquisite.

Before dawn, you must occupy the battlefield; this is a mandatory mission.
诸葛亮鞠躬尽瘁、死而后已的精神永世长存！
Zhūgě Liàng jūgōng jìncuì、sǐér hòuyǐ de jīngshén yǒngshì chángcún！
Zhugeliang\'s spirit of dedicating his lifelong energy to his job will live forever!
虽然小王关了电灯，但余辉仍闪亮了一小会儿。

Though Xiaowang has turned off the light, the sunset glow keeps glittering for a while.
诸葛亮即使在战场上也是羽扇纶巾，儒雅从容。
Zhūgě Liàng jíshǐ zài zhànchǎng shàng yěshì yǔshàn guānjīn，rúyǎ cóngróng。
Even on the battlefield, Zhuge Liang still looked natural and unconstrained, with a scholarly bearing.
你这条原毛围巾真漂亮，是从哪儿买的？
Nǐ zhètiáo yuánmáo wéijīn zhēn piàoliàng，shì cóng nǎr mǎi de？
Your raw wool scarf is so beautiful; where did you buy it?
她脖子上扎裹着一条漂亮的围脖。
Tā bózi shàng zhāguǒ zhe yìtiáo piàoliàng de wéibó。
She tied a beautiful scarf around her neck.
那个漂亮的女人是他再娶的老婆。
Nàge piàoliàng de nǚrén shì tā zàiqǔ de lǎopó。
That beautiful woman is his second wife.

Tā néng zuò yìshǒu piàoliàng de zhēnxiànhuór。
She is good at needlework.

Yóuyú zhěngliúqì huài le，diàndēng búliàng le。
As the rectifier is broken, the electric light can\'t be turned on any more.

《Yuèliàngzhīshàng》zhèshǒugē xiànzài hěnliúxíng。
The song named Above the Moon is very popular right now.

Nǐ chuānshàng zhíyèzhuāng kě zhēn piàoliàng a！

Hǎinán de zhíwùyuán kě zhēn piàoliàng。
The botanical garden in Hainan is really beautiful.
今天早晨，周天飘着雪花，很漂亮的。

我已经把销售计划交给史密斯先生了。

Now let me introduce you to Mr. Smith.

Mr Smith fiercely denied any question of sabotaging the talks.
Shǐmìsī xiānsheng jiānjué jùjué rènhé qǐtú zǔnáo tánhuà de tíwèn。
史密斯先生坚决拒绝任何企图阻挠谈话的提问。
He followed Mrs Smith and spied on her.
Tā gēnzōng bìngqiě ànzhōng jiānshìzhe Shǐmìsī fūrén。
他跟踪并且暗中监视着史密斯夫人。
He verified to the court that he had seen Mrs. Smith outside the house.
Tā zài fǎtíng shàng xuānshì zhèngmíng tā zài fángzi wàimiàn kànjiànguò Shǐmìsī fūrén。
他在法庭上宣誓证明他在房子外面看见过史密斯夫人。
Mr Smith hid his anger under a mask of happiness.
Shǐmìsī xiānsheng yòng gāoxìng yǎnshì tā de fènnù。
史密斯先生用高兴掩饰他的愤怒。
I remember Mr. Smith only for his receding chin and prominent spectacles.
Wǒ jìdé Shǐmìsī xiānsheng，zhǐshì yīnwèi tā hòusuō de xiàba hé tūchū de yǎnjìng。
我记得史密斯先生，只是因为他后缩的下巴和突出的眼镜。
Mr. Smith was a stranger to both of us.
Duì wǒmen liǎng gè éryán，Shǐmìsī xiānsheng shì wèi mòshēngrén。

Shǐmìsī xiānsheng chūtíngbiànhù。

在密林深处
zài mìlín shēnchù
in the depths (or recesses) of the forest
钻进密林深处
zuānjìn mìlín shēnchù 
go deep into a forest
寻访深山密林。
密林深处
The path pierced the jungle.
Zhè tiáo xiǎolù shēnrù mìlín。
这条小路深入密林。
There was a deep plot to assassinate the leader.
Yǒu gè cìshā lǐngdǎorén de lǎomóushēnsuàn de mìmóu。
有个刺杀领导人的老谋深算的密谋。

她长着一头浓密的深色头发。

人们会告诉我他们最深处最隐秘的秘密。
Their closeness grew as the night wore on.

这个城市的人口密度很低。
Zhège chéngshì de rénkǒumìdù hěn dī。
The population density of this city is low.
单位人口密度
dānwèirénkǒumìdù
population density by area
这个地区人口密度很大。
Zhège dìqū rénkǒumìdù hěn dà.
This region has a high population density.
the density of population
人口密度
The population density of the province is very low.
这个省的人口密度很低。
The city\'s population density has grown twofold over the last ten years.
Chéngshì de rénkǒumìdù yǐjīng zài guòqù shínián zēngjiāle liǎngbèi。
城市的人口密度已经在过去十年增加了两倍。
We measure the concentration of population around capital cities.
Wǒmen cèliáng shěnghuì chéngshì zhōubiān de rénkǒu mìdù。
我们测量省会城市周边的人口密度。
亲密无间
qīnmìwújiàn
be on intimate terms
他们俩从小就是亲密无间的好火伴。
Tāmen liǎ cóng xiǎo jiùshì qīnmì wújiān de hǎohuǒbàn。
They have been close friends since childhood.
亲密无间
qīnmìwújiàn
as thick as thieves
亲密无间
qīnmìwújiàn
be as thick as thieves
亲密无间
亲密无间的友谊。
亲密无间。
to be in solid with someone
与某人亲密无间
We were thick as thieves during school.
Wǒmen zài xuéxiào de shíhou qīnmìwújiàn。
我们在学校的时候亲密无间。
They have been as thick as thieves for all of their lives.
Tāmen yì shēng dōu qīnmì-wújiàn。
他们一生都亲密无间。
They worked together hand in glove.
Tāmen qīnmìwújiàn de hézuò。
他们亲密无间地合作。
我们哀痛失去了一位亲密的战友。
Wǒmen āitòng shīqù le yíwèi qīnmì de zhànyǒu。
We lament the death of a very close friend of ours.
亲密的战友
qīnmì de zhànyǒu
a close comrade-in-arms
他俩非常亲密。
Tāliǎ fēichángqīnmì。
The two of them are on very intimate terms.
两人甚为亲密。
Liǎng rén shèn wéi qīnmì。
They are quite intimate.
亲密
qīnmì
close; intimate
亲密无间
qīnmìwújiàn
be on intimate terms

Tāmen liǎ cóng xiǎo jiùshì qīnmì wújiān de hǎohuǒbàn。
They have been close friends since childhood.

to have a good relationship

mìqiè xiāngguān 
be closely related

to be bound up with sth
与某事密切相关

他的这种情绪化的批评方式与他女性化的性格密切相关。

裁减核武器和防止核扩散是密切相关的两个目标。

他的银行卡密码被盗取了。

这个国家的核机密被这个间谍泄露了。

I should put you in the know, not keep you in the dark.
Wǒ yīnggāi ràng nǐ zhīdào，érbúshì duì nǐ bǎoshǒu mìmì。
我应该让你知道，而不是对你保守秘密。
She was put under close guard by the police.
Tā chǔzài jǐngfāng de yánmì bǎohù xià。
她处在警方的严密保护下。
The eleven faculty members who made the decision are sworn to secrecy.
Zuòle juédìng de shíyīwèi jiàozhíyuán fāshì huì bǎoshǒu mìmì。
做了决定的十一位教职员发誓会保守秘密。
He promised to keep her plans in the dark.
Tā dāying wèi tā de jìhuà bǎoshǒu mìmì。
他答应为她的计划保守秘密。
He remained close on his guard.
Tā yījiù bǎochí jǐnmì jǐngjiè。
他依旧保持紧密警戒。
Why is it so hard for you to keep a secret?
Nǐ bǎoshǒu mìmì zěnme zhème kùnnan ne？

一个严格保守的秘密

那个保险柜的密码是个秘密。
He forgot the combination to the safe.
Tā wàngjìle bǎoxiǎnxiāng de mìmǎ。

你能一直保守这个秘密吗？

I can\'t keep this secret anymore and I just need to get it off my chest.
Wǒ bùnéng zài bǎoshǒu zhège mìmì le，wǒ xūyào bǎ wǒ Xīnli de fánnǎo qīngtǔ chūlái。

他被目前保持五连胜的史密斯以四比三击败。

Gèng gǔlǎo de wénxué shūjí chǔcún zài túshūguǎn shūjià shàng。
更古老的文学书籍储存在图书馆书架上。
It\'s too good a book to put back on the library shelf.
Zhè běn shū tài hǎo le，dōu bù xiǎng bǎ tā fànghuí túshūguǎn de shūjià shàng。
这本书太好了，都不想把它放回图书馆的书架上。
The Library also stocks the geological memoirs and maps for the area.
Nà suǒ túshūguǎn yě bǎocúnle gāi dìqū de dìlǐ xuéshù lùnwén hé dìtú。
那所图书馆也保存了该地区的地理学术论文和地图。
The town boasts a fine new library.
这个城镇以有一个好的新图书馆而自豪。
a suburban branch of a library
某图书馆的郊区分馆
charge a library book
把图书馆出借的书记在…名下
to choose a book at the library
在图书馆里挑一本书
to make the library one\'s haunt
使图书馆成为某人经常光顾的地方
to inaugurate a new library
为新图书馆举行落成仪式
a library index
图书馆目录
a library numbering 10,000 volumes
一个藏有10，000卷书的图书馆
to contribute toward a new library
为新图书馆捐款
The library is just behind the animal shop.
图书馆就在宠物商店的后面。
My friend gave me a lift to the library.
我搭朋友的车去了图书馆。
You can always find interesting books at the library.
你总能在图书馆找到有意思的书。
I need to go to the library to look for a book.
我得去图书馆找本书。
The American Library Association is the largest one in the world.
美国的图书馆协会是世界同类协会中规模最大的。
The Library of Congress may be old, but it is doing modern things.
国会图书馆虽然历史悠久，但作风却很现代。
This is the pick of the library.
这是图书馆的精选。
I returned a library book this morning.
今天早上我去图书馆还了一本书。
The dormitory is east the library.
宿舍在图书馆的东边。

如果你喜欢这本书，可以从校图书馆免费借阅。
They\'ve just computerized the whole library system.
他们刚刚实现用电脑管理整个图书馆系统。
Many libraries close on Saturdays at 1 p.m.
很多图书馆星期六下午一点关门。
Our university library has collections of all the great authors.
我们大学的图书馆收藏着所有著名作家的书。
The new search facility on the library website allows you to find the exact books you need.
图书馆网页上的新搜索工具可以让你很快找到需要的书。
The book I need is always on loan in the library, so I decide to buy one.
图书馆里我需要的那本书，总是借出状态，所以我决定买一本。
I will go to the library with you if nothing prevents.
没有事的话，我就和你去图书馆。
There are two libraries in the community.
这个地区有两座图书馆。
We can borrow books from the library.
我们可以从图书馆借书。
The library insists upon strict silence.
图书馆要求绝对肃静。
She was sitting next to her tutor in the library.
Tā zài túshūguǎn āizhe tā de jiātíng lǎoshī zuòzhe。
她在图书馆挨着她的家庭老师坐着。
From this page, you can read about the wide array of services provided by the library.
Zài zhè yí yè shàng，nǐ kěyǐ kàndào túshūguǎn tígōng de guǎngfàn fúwù xiàngmù。
在这一页上，你可以看到图书馆提供的广泛服务项目。
She was carrying a big dictionary into the library.
Tā zhèng názhe yì běn dà cídiǎn jìnrù túshūguǎn。
她正拿着一本大辞典进入图书馆。
A diffuse dictionary should not be used in a library.
Túshūguǎn lǐ bù yīng shǐyòng fánrǒng de cídiǎn。
图书馆里不应使用繁冗的词典。
The teacher acquainted herself with the new school library.
Zhè wèi lǎoshī shúxīle xuéxiào de xīn túshūguǎn。
这位老师熟悉了学校的新图书馆。
He acquired enough books to start a library.
Tā yōngyǒu nàmeduō shū，dōu zúgòu bàn yígè túshūguǎn le。
他拥有那么多书，都足够办一个图书馆了。
The physics department sits across the quad from the library.
Cóng túshūguǎn héngchuān guò sìfāngyuàn jiùshì wùlǐxì。
从图书馆横穿过四方院就是物理系。
All of the books in the library have been catalogued.
Túshūguǎn lǐ de suǒyǒu shū dōu jìnxíngle biānmù fēnlèi。
图书馆里的所有书都进行了编目分类。
Libraries all over the city have made a concerted effort to attract young people.
Zhěnggè chéngshì de Túshūguǎn dōu zuòchūle gòngtóng de nǔlì lái xīyǐn niánqīngrén。
整个城市的图书馆都做出了共同的努力来吸引年轻人。
In the school library he hunted out books on politics.
Tā zài xuéxiào túshūguǎn nǔlì de cházhǎo guānyú zhèngzhìxué de shūjí。
他在学校图书馆努力的查找关于政治学的书籍。
He preferred to spend time in the school library.
Tā gèng xǐhuan huā shíjiān dāizài xuéxiào túshūguǎn lǐ。
他更喜欢花时间待在学校图书馆里。
The library is on the very next street down the road.
Túshūguǎn jiù zài zhè tiáo lù de xià ygè jiēdào。
图书馆就在这条路的下一个街道。
He also quit cocaine, busying himself by working in the library.
Tā shǐ zìjǐ mángyú túshūguǎn de gōngzuò lái jièdiào kěkǎyīn。
他使自己忙于图书馆的工作来戒掉可卡因。
The price of the book may preclude its private purchase, but it would be a useful addition to any library.
Zhè běn shū de jiàgé huòxǔ huì lìng gèrén fàngqì gòumǎi，dàn tā duì rènhé yì jiā túshūguǎn éryán dōushì yǒuyòng de bǔchōng。
这本书的价格或许会令个人放弃购买，但它对任何一家图书馆而言都是有用的补充。
There are many fictions to choose from at the library.
Túshūguǎn yǒu xǔduō xiǎoshuō kěgōng xuǎnzé。
图书馆有许多小说可供选择。
The library was packed with students studying for finals.
Túshūguǎn jǐmǎnle zhǔnbèi qīmò kǎoshì de xuésheng。
图书馆挤满了准备期末考试的学生。
Only the teachers were allowed into the library.
Zhège túshūguǎn zhǐ zhǔnxǔ lǎoshī jìnrù。
这个图书馆只准许老师进入。
The book may be borrowed from the library.
Zhè běn shū kěnéng shì cóng túshūguǎn jiè de。
这本书可能是从图书馆借的。
You can\'t burst out in the library.
Nǐ bù néng zài túshūguǎn dàjiào。

Wǒ yāoqiú wǒ de shìyǒu guīhuán nàxiē zài Túshūguǎn jiè de shū。
我要求我的室友归还那些在图书馆借的书。
On my way home, it suddenly came to me that I hadn\'t returned my books to the library.
Zài huíjiā de lùshàng，wǒ hūrán xiǎngqǐ hái méiyǒu bǎ shū háihuí túshūguǎn。
在回家的路上，我忽然想起还没有把书还回图书馆。
The library is crowded with students.
Túshūguǎn jǐmǎnle xuésheng。
图书馆挤满了学生。
All he wants is a fair copy to keep in his library.

所有他想要的是有一个誊清本保存在他的图书馆。
She was fined for not returning the library books.
Yīnwèi méi huán túshūguǎn de shū，tā zāo fákuǎn le。
因为没还图书馆的书，她遭罚款了。
He hit out at their decision to delay spending two million on a new library.
Tā duì tāmen juédìng tuīchí huā liǎngbǎi wàn jiàn túshūguǎn zuòchūle měngliè pēngjī。
他对他们决定推迟花两百万建图书馆做出了猛烈抨击。

Tā zài túshūguǎn lǐ zhǎodàole yí cè。
她在图书馆里找到了一册。
The students in the library were in a brown study.

He made advances towards a pretty girl in the library.
Tā wèi Túshūguǎn de yí gè piàoliang nǚhái diànfùle qián。

The library was open to the public.

Journals are not available for loan and must not be removed from library.
Zázhì bú wàijiè，bù néng bèi dàichū túshūguǎn。
杂志不外借，不能被带出图书馆。
A Library Assistant has been seconded to the project to assist with its general activities.
Yí wèi túshūguǎn zhùlǐ yǐ bèi diào dào zhège xiàngmù shàng xiézhù yìbān huódòng。
一位图书馆助理已被调到这个项目上协助一般活动。
This library can stack up to seven high.
Zhè zuò túshūguǎn yǒu qī céng gāo。
这座图书馆有七层高。
The library subscribes to approximately 40 medical related journals.
Gāi túshūguǎn dìngyuèle jiāngjìn 40 běn hé yīliáo xiāngguān de zázhì。
该图书馆订阅了将近40本和医疗相关的杂志。
The books were taken from the library.
Zhèxiē shū shì cóng túshūguǎn ná de。
这些书是从图书馆拿的。
People continued to leave the library in a state.
Rénmen jìxù ràng túshūguǎn língluànbùkān。
人们继续让图书馆凌乱不堪。
The local library is a valuable resource.
Nàgè dìfāng túshūguǎn shì yíxiàng bǎoguì de zīyuán。
那个地方图书馆是一项宝贵的资源。
They had brandy in the library.
Tāmen zài túshūguǎn zhōng hē báilándì。
他们在图书馆中喝白兰地。
This library was well conceived.
Zhè zhǒng túshūguǎn de gòusī hěn qiǎomiào。
这种图书馆的构思很巧妙。
The library was a member of the interlibrary loan association.

A nice lady at the library helped me.

They are friends of the library.
Tāmen shì túshūguǎn de chángkè。
他们是图书馆的常客。
The library had to discard books that had lost their topicality.
Nàgè túshūguǎn bùdébù bǎ zhǔtí nèiróng yǐ guòshí de shūjí qīnglǐ diào。
那个图书馆不得不把主题内容已过时的书籍清理掉。
A library catalog is metadata because it describes publications.
Túshūguǎn mùlù shì yuán shùjù，yīnwèi tā miáoshùle chūbǎnwù xìnxī。
图书馆目录是元数据，因为它描述了出版物信息。
What did you rout out in the library?
Nǐ zài Túshūguǎn wāchū shénme bǎobèi le？

The children secretly went to the movies when they were supposed to be at the library.
Háizǐmen běn yīnggāi qù tú shù guǎn，dàn tāmen què tōutōu qù kàn diànyǐng le。
孩子们本应该去图书馆，但他们却偷偷去看电影了。
我打算带儿子去参观一下天文馆，让他增长一些天文学知识。
Wǒ dǎsuàn dài érzi qùcānguān yíxià Tiānwénguǎn，ràng tā zēngzhǎng yìxiē tiānwénxuézhīshi。
I\'m planning to take my son to the planetarium so that he will learn something about astronomy.
Let\'s see the stars from the planetarium.
我们去天文馆看星星吧。
She\'s giving a paper on Archeology at the National Museum this afternoon.

Nǐ cāi wǒ zuó wǎn zài shǒudū tǐyùguǎn pèngjiàn shuí le?
Who do you think I ran into at the Capital Stadium last night?
队长他们都在体育馆里练球。

The captain and his team (or men) are in the gym practising.
这个体育馆有18，000个座位。
Zhège tǐyùguǎn yǒu yíwàn bāqiān gè zuòwèi。
The stadium seats 18,000.
体育馆里正在进行一场篮球比赛，对阵双方是中国队和美国队。
