A basketball match is going on in the stadium between the Chinese team and the American team.
市体育馆游泳池里的水每天都会换。
Shì tǐyùguǎn yóuyǒngchí lǐ de shuǐ měitiān dōuhuì huàn。
The water in the municipal stadium\'s swimming pool is changed every day.

There is a machine at the gym that constantly measures your heartbeat.
体育馆里有一种机器可以一直测试你的脉搏。

大量人群涌入了体育馆，兴奋地想要观看比赛。

我每天都到体育馆练习举杠铃。

Exercising every morning at the gym is a good habit.
每天早晨在体育馆煅练是一种好习惯。
The school will theme its gymnasium in holiday ornaments.

The gym has recently been improved by the addition of new equipment

We all pile off the coach and walk into the stadium and over to the pitch.

我们都离开了汽车，步行到了体育馆和球场。
昨天我在公园的水族馆看到了白鳍豚。
Zuótiān wǒ zài gōngyuán de shuǐzúguǎn kàndào le báiqítún。
Yesterday I saw dolphins in the aquarium in the park.
Cloudy water in the aquarium is caused by a bacteria bloom, while green water is an algae bloom.
水族馆里的混浊水质是由细菌繁殖引起的，而绿色的水是由藻类繁殖引起的。
We saw a ray at the aquarium.
我们在水族馆看见了一只鳐。
His pet snake was cabined in a small aquarium.
Tā de chǒngwù shé bèi juànyǎng zài yí gè xiǎoxíng shuǐzúguǎn lǐ。
他的宠物蛇被圈养在一个小型水族馆里。
I stepped off the boat into an aquarium.
Wǒ líkāi chuán，jìnrù shuǐzúguǎn。

The collections of our school library are quite limited, you can go to the national library to look for materials.

从图书馆借书
cónɡ túshūɡuǎn jiè shū
borrow a book from the library
这个图书馆藏书十万卷。
Zhège túshūguǎn cángshū shíwàn juàn。
This library has 100,000 volumes.
玲玲常到外校图书馆借书，因为那里的书比较多。
Línglíng cháng dào wàixiào túshūguǎn jièshū，yīnwèi nàlǐ de shū bǐjiào duō。
Ling Ling often borrows books from the library of another school, since it has a larger store of books than her own.
用学生证可以到图书馆借书，很方便。
Yòng xuéshengzhèng kěyǐ dào túshūguǎn jièshū，hěn fāngbiàn。
It is quite convenient that students can use their student ID to borrow books from the library.
果不其然，他在图书馆看书。
Guǒbùqírán，tā zài túshūguǎn kànshū。
As expected, he was in the library reading books.
我还欠图书馆一本书。
Wǒ hái qiàn túshūguǎn yìběn shū。
I still owe the library a book.
向图书馆捐赠图书
xiànɡ túshūɡuǎn juānzènɡ túshū
present books to a library
图书馆库藏图书三十万册。
Túshūguǎn kùcáng túshū sānshíwàn cè。
There are 300,000 books in the library.
图书馆里每本书都被编上了号头。
Túshūguǎn lǐ měi běn shū dōu bèi biānshàng le hàotóu。
All the books in the library are numbered.
在图书馆里，看过的书要放还原处。
Zài túshūguǎn lǐ，kàn guò de shū yào fànghuán yuánchù。
You should put back the books you have read in their original places in the library.
我在图书馆借了几本书。
Wǒ zài túshūguǎn jièle jǐběn shū.
I borrowed several books from the library.
我从图书馆借了几本书。
Wǒ cóng túshūguǎn jièlejǐběnshū.
I borrowed some books from the library.
学校的图书馆馆藏大量的史书。
Xuéxiào de túshūguǎn guǎncáng dàliàng de shǐshū。

Tōngguò shōují guòqù de wénwù，zhège bówùguǎn kěyǐ qīngxī de biǎomíng lìshǐ。
通过收集过去的文物，这个博物馆可以清晰地表明历史。
They had brandy in the library.
Tāmen zài túshūguǎn zhōng hē báilándì。
他们在图书馆中喝白兰地。
The inn was a renovation of a colonial house.
Zhèjiā lǚguǎn shì jiāng zhímíndì de fángwū zhěngxiū hòu ér chéng de。
这家旅馆是将殖民地的房屋整修后而成的。
The Library also stocks the geological memoirs and maps for the area.
Nà suǒ túshūguǎn yě bǎocúnle gāi dìqū de dìlǐ xuéshù lùnwén hé dìtú。
那所图书馆也保存了该地区的地理学术论文和地图。
The local library is a valuable resource.
Nàgè dìfāng túshūguǎn shì yíxiàng bǎoguì de zīyuán。
那个地方图书馆是一项宝贵的资源。
I walked the length of the main street twice, looking for the inn or a place of refreshment.
Wǒ yánzhe jiēdào zǒule liǎng biàn，xúnzhǎo lǚguǎn huò yí gè xiūxi de dìfang。
我沿着街道走了两遍，寻找旅馆或一个休息的地方。
The inn is one mile hence.
那家小旅馆在离这一英里的地方。
There are two libraries in the community.
这个地区有两座图书馆。

to make the library one\'s haunt

He corrected his watch to local time when he got to the hotel.

他在一家著名餐馆当火夫，收入还不错。
Tā zài yìjiā zhùmíng cānguǎn dāng huǒfū，shōurù hái búcuò。
He is a mess cook in a famous restaurant and earns a decent income.
遥想古代的客舍，一定没有现代的旅馆高级。
Yáoxiǎng gǔdài de kèshě，yídìng méiyǒu xiàndài de lǚguǎn gāojí。
Inns in ancient times certainly could not have been as high-ranking as hotels today.
在博物馆里陈列着以前文人们用过的各式各样的老花镜。
Zài bówùguǎn lǐ chénliè zhe yǐqián wénrénmen yòngguò de gè shì gè yàng de lǎohuājìng。
Types of presbyopic glasses used by scholars are exhibited in the museum.
我们在茶馆里闲坐聊天儿。
Wǒmen zài cháguǎn lǐ xiánzuò liáotiānr。
We sat in the tea shop, chatting.
我找到了一个在餐馆做零杂工的工作。

I found an odd job in a restaurant.
再向前走就是你要找的楼堂馆所。
Zài xiàng qián zǒu jiùshì nǐ yàozhǎo de lóutáng guǎnsuǒ。
Keep going forward and there are the office buildings you\'re looking for.
我们下榻在一间三星级的宾馆。
Wǒmen xiàtà zài yìjiān sānxīngjí de bīnguǎn。
We stayed at a three-star hotel.
失恋后，他总是去小酒馆买醉。
Shīliàn hòu,tā zǒngshì qù xiǎojiǔguǎn mǎizuì.
He always bought liquor and drank greatly after failure in love.
我家最近请了一个先生来教门馆。
Wǒjiā zuìjìn qǐng le yígè xiānshēng lái jiàoménguǎn。
My family recently engaged a family tutor.
我想租一间门面房，开一个小餐馆。
Wǒ xiǎng zū yìjiān ménmiànfáng，kāi yígè xiǎo cānguǎn。
I want to rent a house with street frontage, and open a restaurant.
孩子已经长大，可以进蒙馆学习了。
Háizi yǐjing zhǎngdà，kěyǐ jìn méngguǎn xuéxí le。
The child is old enough to learn in a private primary elementary school.
咱们就在那家小饭馆吃午饭吧。
Zánmen jiù zài nàjiā xiǎo fànguǎn chī wǔfàn ba。
Let’s have lunch in that small restaurant.
在博物馆里，我们看见了那柄有名的莫邪宝剑。

In the museum, we saw the famous Moxie double-edged sword.
美术馆下周要举办木版画展，咱们去看看吧！
Měishùguǎn xiàzhōu yào jǔbàn mùbǎn huàzhǎn，zánmen qù kànkàn ba！
A woodcut exhibition will be held in the art museum next week. Let’s go to see it.
她喜欢吃木樨肉，每次在餐馆吃饭，总点这个菜。
Tā xǐhuan chī mùxīròu，měi cì zài cānguǎn chīfàn，zǒng diǎn zhège cài。
She likes scrambled eggs. Every time she goes to a restaurant, she will order this dish.
北京新建的那个奥运场馆，仿照了鸟巢的结构造型。
Běijīng xīnjiàn de nàge àoyùnchǎngguǎn，fǎngzhào le niǎocháo de jiégòu zàoxíng。
The Olympic stadium just built in Beijing follows the structure of a nest.
这个饭馆的服务员跑堂儿都很勤快。
Zhège fànguǎn de fúwùyuán pǎotángr dōu hěnqínkuài。
The waiters in this restaurant work hard.
博物馆里的这个炮艇，曾在战争中立过战功。
Bówùguǎn lǐ de zhège pàotǐng，céng zài zhànzhēng zhōng lìguò zhàngōng。
The gunboat in the museum made a great contribution to the war.
那个明代的偏殿如今是我们博物馆的西展厅了。

自然博物馆里的展览品剖示了吸烟者的肺。

The exhibitions in the natural history museum show a smoker\'s lungs.

今天你的餐馆开业，他特为打来电话祝贺。

Zhèzhǒng zhōng yào duì zhìliáo nǚxìng jīngxiě bútiáo hěnyǒuxiào。
This kind of traditional Chinese medicine is very effective in treating menstrual disorders.
他头痛发烧，吃了几回平熄内风的中药汤，很见效果。
Tā tóutòng fāshāo，chī le jǐ huí píngxī nèifēng de zhōng yàotāng，hěnjiàn xiàoguǒ。
He had a headache and a fever. After taking some traditional Chinese medicinal soup several times, which is used to cure disease caused by pathological changes of internal organs, he is now better.
现在增强免疫力的中药成了抢手货。
Xiànzài zēngqiáng miǎnyìlì de zhōng yào chéng le qiǎngshǒuhuò。
Now traditional Chinese medicine to improve one\'s immunity has become a fast-selling product.
经过炮制以后，青皮就成了一味中药。
Jīngguò pàozhì yǐhòu，qīngpí jiù chéng le yíwèi zhōng yào。
The green orange peel turns into a kind of Chinese traditional medicine after roasting and refining.
鸡嗉囊可以制成中药，有助消化的功效。
Jīsùnáng kěyǐ zhìchéng zhōng yào，yǒu zhù xiāohuà de gōngxiào。
Chicken crops can be made into Chinese traditional medicines to help people digest food.
胎衣可入药，作中药时名为紫河车。
Tāiyī kě rùyào，zuò zhōng yào shí míng wéi zǐhéchē。
Human after-birth can be used for medicinal purposes. When used as a kind of Chinese traditional medicine, it is usually called the placenta hominis.
这家制药厂正在研究修治一种新型中药。
Zhèjiā zhìyàochǎng zhèngzài yánjiū xiūzhì yìzhǒng xīnxíng zhōng yào。
This pharmaceutical company is researching the production of a new kind of Chinese medicine.
你最近身体不好，虚火上升，要吃点中药调理一下。
Nǐ zuìjìn shēntǐ bùhǎo，xūhuǒ shàngshēng，yào chī diǎn zhōng yào tiáolǐ yíxià。
You haven\'t been well these days, with the depletion fire syndrome going up. You\'d better have some Chinese medicine to nurse your health.
你这是中医说的虚症，吃点中药吧。
Nǐ zhèshì zhōng yī shuō de xūzhèng，chī diǎn zhōng yào ba。
This is what the traditional Chinese medicine science calls a deficiency illness. Take some Chinese medicine.
他经常去山里采集中药材。
Tā jīngcháng qù shān lǐ cǎijí zhōng yàocái。
He always went to the mountains to collect medicinal materials for traditional Chinese medicine.
她去中药店买药了，您找她有事吗？
Tā qù zhōng yàodiàn mǎi yào le，nín zhǎo tā yǒu shì ma？
She has gone to the Chinese pharmacy to buy medicines. Is there anything she can get for you?
他是中药房的售货员。
Tā shì zhōng yàofáng de shòuhuòyuán。
He is a shop assistant at a Chinese pharmacy.
请您到中药房取药。
Qǐng nín dào zhōng yàofáng qǔ yào。
Please go to the department of traditional Chinese medicine to get your medicine.
他到中药房抓取了五味药。
Tā dào zhōng yàofáng zhuāqǔ le wǔ wèi yào。
He had a prescription for five kinds of Chinese herbal medicines written at the traditional Chinese pharmacy.

zhōngyàode fúfǎ
directions for using traditional Chinese medicine

果酸存在于植物之中，可入药。

Fruit acid existing in foliage can be used as medicine.

Gunpowder was used in China as far back as the 11th century.

The hospital buys silkworms at a high price, from which they can make medicine.
他把药材放在石槽中，然后用磙子碾碎了它们。

He put the medicine into the stone groove and used a roller to grind it.

Zhōngyī dàifū gěi tā kāi le gè qīngxīn de yàofāng。

老中医对他详细问诊后，对症下药开了处方。

The old doctor inquired about his condition carefully, and prescribed him medicine accordingly.
老中医给我开了几服扶正祛邪的药。
Lǎo zhōng yī gěi wǒ kāi le jǐ fù fúzhèng qūxié de yào。
The old doctor prescribed some medicine to improve my health.
老中医说想治他的病必须用豨莶做药引。
Lǎo zhōng yī shuō xiǎng zhì tā de bìng bìxū yòng xīxiān zuò yàoyǐn。
The old herbalist doctor said that common St.Paulswort is needed to make the guiding drug to treat his illness.
他的庭院中长满了石松，可他并不知道这种植物能做药材。
Tā de tíngyuàn zhōng zhǎngmǎn le shísōng，kě tā bìng bùzhīdào zhèzhǒng zhíwù néng zuò yàocái。

In order to enhance its popularity, the drugstore invited a famous professor of Chinese medicine to practice medicine there.

To prevent and cure heatstroke, the school hospital has prepared medicines such as Rendan.
Advances have been in medicine, science, and technology in the last ten years.
Zài guòqù de shínián zhōng，yīyào、kēxué hé jìshù děng lǐngyù dōu yǒusuǒ fāzhǎn。
在过去的十年中，医药、科学和技术等领域都有所发展。
医药采购的主渠道是通过医院对药品进行招投标。
Yīyào cǎigòu de zhǔqúdào shì tōngguò yīyuàn duì yàopǐn jìnxíng zhāo tóubiāo。
The main channel for purchaing medicines is through medicine auctions held by hospitals.
中国医药学是一个伟大的宝库。
Zhōngguó yīyàoxué shì yígè wěidà de bǎokù。
Chinese medicine and pharmacology are a great treasure-house.
医药费
yīyàofèi
medical expenses
灾区需用医药，急如星火。
Zāiqū xūyòngyīyào，jírúxīnghuǒ。
Medical aid must be sent to the stricken area posthaste.
医药常识
yīyào chángshí 
general medical knowledge
医药专家呼吁，伽马刀不可滥用。
Yīyào zhuānjiā hūyù，jiāmǎdāo bùkě lànyòng。
Experts on medicine appeal to the whole world not to misuse the gamma knife.
他考上了梦寐以求的中医药大学。
Tā kǎoshàng le mèngmèiyǐqiú de zhōng yīyào dàxué。
He has realized his dream and entered the Traditional Chinese Medicine University.
一些医药代理人赚的都是昧心钱。
Yìxiē yīyào dàilǐrén zhuàn de dōushì mèixīnqián。
Some medicine salesmen earn ill-gotten money against their conscience.
医药费
yīyàofèi
medical expenses
他在山区工作过，对那里缺医少药的情况有切身体会。
Tā zài shānqū gōngzuòguò，duì nàlǐ quēyīshǎoyào de qíngkuàngyǒu qièshēn tǐhuì。
He has worked in mountainous areas before, and has first-hand knowledge of the lack of doctors and medicine there.
缺医少药
quēyī shǎoyào
be short of doctors and medicine
送医送药上门
sòng yī sòng yào shàngmén
deliver medical care right to the patient\'s home
边远农村缺医少药。
Biānyuǎn nóngcūn quēyī shǎoyào。
Remote rural areas are short of doctors and medicine.
医生的药方中有芦根这味中药。
Yīshēng de yàofāng zhōng yǒu lúgēn zhèwèi zhōng yào。
The doctor writes reed rhizome in the prescription.
你的伤还没好，记得每天都要来医院上药啊。
Nǐ de shāng hái méihǎo，jì de měitiān dōuyào lái yīyuàn shàngyào a。
Your wound has not recovered. Remember to come to the hospital to apply ointment every day.
应按照医嘱服药。
Yīng ànzhào yīzhǔ fúyào。
You should take your medicine according to the doctor\'s orders.
医生开的药方里，包括草珊瑚这味中药。
Yīshēng kāi de yàofāng lǐ，bāokuò cǎoshānhú zhèwèi zhōng yào。
The prescription given by the doctor contains the traditional Chinese medicine Sarcandra Glabra .
马医生医术高超，药到病除。
Mǎ yīshēng yīshù gāochāo，yàodào bìngchú。
Doctor Ma has superb medical skills, the medicine he prescribed works wonders.
医疗站的药品奇缺，给人民看病带来不便。
Yīliáozhàn de yàopǐn qíquē，gěi rénmín kànbìng dàilái búbiàn。
The health clinic is short of medicine, which is inconvenient for treating people\'s illnesses.
我上火了，医生说吃这药可以败毒清热。
Wǒ shànghuǒ le，yīshēng shuō chī zhè yào kěyǐ bàidú qīngrè。
I\'m running a fever. The doctor says that this medicine is a great antidote for the fever.
医生说这种药比较迟效，让我坚持服用。
Yīshēng shuō zhèzhǒng yào bǐjiào chíxiào，ràng wǒ jiānchí fúyòng。
The doctor said the medicine was slow-acting and suggested that I take it persistently.
她服药自杀，医生正在给她灌洗肠胃。
Tā fúyào zìshā，yīshēng zhèngzài gěi tā guànxǐ chángwèi。
She took pills to kill herself, the doctor is cleaning out her stomach.
医生给他的药方里有罗勒这味药。
Yīshēng gěi tā de yàofāng lǐ yǒu luólè zhèwèi yào。
The doctor wrote sweet basil in his prescription.
请医生开一张药方。
Qǐng yīshēng kāi yìzhāng yàofāng.
Ask the doctor to write out a prescription.
他患了鹅掌风，医生让他按时用药擦洗。
Tā huàn le ézhǎngfēng，yīshēng ràng tā ànshí yòngyào cāxǐ。
He suffered from a fungal infection of his hands, and the doctor suggested that he apply external medicine regularly.
在进行手术之前，兽医给老虎打了蒙药。
Zài jìnxíng shǒushù zhīqián，shòuyī gěi lǎohǔ dǎ le méngyào。
Before the operation, the veterinarian injected the tiger with anesthetic.
有病不能随便用药，一定要到医院检查。
Yǒu bìng bùnéng suíbiàn yòngyào，yídìng yào dào yīyuàn jiǎnchá。
When sick, you shouldn\'t take medicine without serious consideration; you must go to the hospital and have some tests.
医生说他需要服用药物来清除体内的病原虫。
Yīshēng shuō tā xūyào fúyòng yàowù lái qīngchú tǐnèi de bìngyuánchóng。
His doctor said that he needed to take some medicine to remove the protozoon in his body.
他扭伤了脚，医生建议他用些末药，以便消肿镇痛。
Tā niǔshāng le jiǎo，yīshēng jiànyì tā yòng xiē mòyào，yǐbiàn xiāozhǒng zhèntòng。
He sprained his foot. The doctor suggests him using myrrh to alleviate the swelling and easing pain.
他一定是吞服了过量的安眠药，应当赶紧送医院抢救。
Tā yídìng shì tūnfú le guòliàng de ānmiányào，yīngdāng gǎnjǐn sòng yīyuàn qiǎngjiù。
He must have taken a massive overdose of sleeping tablets, and should be sent to hospital at once.
你这是中医说的虚症，吃点中药吧。
Nǐ zhèshì zhōng yī shuō de xūzhèng，chī diǎn zhōng yào ba。
This is what the traditional Chinese medicine science calls a deficiency illness. Take some Chinese medicine.
医生给我开了一张药方。
Yīshēng gěi wǒ kāile yìzhāng yàofāng。
The doctor wrote me out a prescription.
为了防治学生中暑，校医务室准备了人丹等药物。
Wèile fángzhì xuésheng zhòngshǔ，xiào yīwùshì zhǔnbèi le réndān děng yàowù。
To prevent and cure heatstroke, the school hospital has prepared medicines such as Rendan.
你怎么把药饵给吃了，快去医院。
Nǐ zěnme bǎ yàoěr gěi chī le，kuài qù yīyuàn。
Having taken the poison bait, you need to go to the hospital as soon as you can.
医生说要等麻醉剂的药劲过了他才能醒。
Yīshēng shuō yào děng mázuìjì de yàojìn guòle tā cáinéng xǐng。
The doctor says that he will not wake until the anesthetic loses potency.
这是药王留下的书，很有医学价值的。
Zhè shì yàowáng liúxià de shū，hěn yǒu yīxué jiàzhí de。
The book was left by Sun Simiao, the &quot;king of medicine&quot;, so it is of great medicinal value.
这种药需要筋脉注射，你让医生来给你打吧。
Zhèzhǒng yào xūyào jīnmài zhùshè，nǐ ràng yīshēng lái gěi nǐ dǎ ba。
This kind of medicine must be injected; let the doctor do it for you.
中医大夫给他开了个清心的药方。
Zhōngyī dàifū gěi tā kāi le gè qīngxīn de yàofāng。
The TCM doctor prescribed a remedy to relieve his internal heat.
老中医对他详细问诊后，对症下药开了处方。
Lǎo zhōng yí duì tā xiángxì wènzhěn hòu，duìzhèng xiàyào kāi le chǔfāng。
The old doctor inquired about his condition carefully, and prescribed him medicine accordingly.
医生会根据你的病情对症下药的。
Yīshēng huì gēnjù nǐ de bìngqíng duìzhèng xiàyào de。
The doctor will prescribe treatment according to your symptoms.
老中医给我开了几服扶正祛邪的药。
Lǎo zhōng yī gěi wǒ kāi le jǐ fù fúzhèng qūxié de yào。
The old doctor prescribed some medicine to improve my health.
医生告诉他得了痔疮后要用药剂坐浴七天。
Yīshēng gàosù tā dé le zhìchuāng hòu yào yòng yàojì zuòyù qī tiān。
The doctor told him to have a hip bath for seven days after having piles.
老中医说想治他的病必须用豨莶做药引。
Lǎo zhōng yī shuō xiǎng zhì tā de bìng bìxū yòng xīxiān zuò yàoyǐn。
The old herbalist doctor said that common St.Paulswort is needed to make the guiding drug to treat his illness.
医生给他开的处方里有红参这味药。
Yīshēng gěi tā kāi de chǔfāng lǐ yǒu hóngsēn zhèwèi yào。
The prescription made by the doctor included ginseng.
医生说他患了牙龈炎，需要吃点消炎药。
Yīshēng shuō tā huàn le yáyínyán，xūyào chī diǎn xiāoyányào。
The doctor says that he has gingivitis and needs to take some antibiotic medicine.
医生在给他的处方里写上了蒌叶这味药。
Yīshēng zài gěi tā de chǔfāng lǐ xiěshàng le lóuyè zhèwèi yào。
The doctor wrote betel in his prescription.
医院把高价收购到的养蚕户家中的僵蚕做成药材。
Yīyuàn bǎ gāojià shōugòu dào de yǎngcánhù jiā zhōng de jiāngcán zuòchéng yàocái。
The hospital buys silkworms at a high price, from which they can make medicine.
药店为了提高知名度，请来了大名鼎鼎的中医教授坐堂。
Yàodiàn wèi le tígāo zhīmíngdù，qǐnglái le dàmíngdǐngdǐng de zhōng yī jiàoshòu zuòtáng。
In order to enhance its popularity, the drugstore invited a famous professor of Chinese medicine to practice medicine there.
医药费由所属单位报销。

Advances have been in medicine, science, and technology in the last ten years.
Zài guòqù de shínián zhōng，yīyào、kēxué hé jìshù děng lǐngyù dōu yǒusuǒ fāzhǎn。
在过去的十年中，医药、科学和技术等领域都有所发展。
The pharmacist must check all aspects of the preparation of the medicines and sign.
Yàojìshī bìxū jiǎnchá yīyào zhìjì de suǒyǒu fāngmiàn bìng qiānzì。
药剂师必须检查医药制剂的所有方面并签字。
His knowledge of medicine came at an education.
Tā duì yīyào de zhīshi láizì jiàoyù。
他对医药的知识来自教育。
Professional occupations include medicine and the law and teaching.
Zhuānyèhuà zhíyè bāokuò yīyàolèi、fǎlǜlèi hé jiàoyùlèi。
专业化职业包括医药类、法律类和教育类。
The medical establishment doesn\'t profit from preventive medicine.
Nà jiā yīyào gōngsī méiyǒu tōngguò yùfángxìng yàowù huòlì。
那家医药公司没有通过预防性药物获利。
No one will die from lack of education as he will from lack of food or basic health care.
Yǔ shíbùguǒfù huò quēyīshǎoyào ér zhìrén-sǐwáng de zhuàngkuàng xiāngbǐ，méiyǒu rén huì yīnwèi jiàoyù de quēshī ér sǐwáng。
与食不果腹或缺医少药而致人死亡的状况相比，没有人会因为教育的缺失而死亡。
The physician prescribed a commercial preparation of the medicine.
Yīshēng kāile yào de pèizhì cáiliào。
医生开了药的配制材料。
My doctor has the last word on the medicines I take.
Wǒ chī shénme yào yóu yīshēng dìngduó。
我吃什么药由医生定夺。
duty chemist/officer/doctor
值班药剂师/官员/医生
The doctor suggested rubbing this ointment into your feet.
医生建议把这种药膏擦到脚上。
The doctor recited the list of possible side effects of the drug.
Zhè wèi yīshēng lièchūle zhè zhǒng yàopǐn kěnéng cúnzài de yídàduī fùzuòyòng。
这位医生列出了这种药品可能存在的一大堆副作用。
The doctor prescribed the tapering of the dose.
Yīshēng kāile dìjiǎn de yàoliàng。
医生开了递减的药量。
The doctor prescribed a pain reliever.
医生开了一副止疼药。
The hospital refused to reveal the name of the drug.
Yīyuàn jùjué tòulù zhè zhǒng yàowù de míngchēng。
医院拒绝透露这种药物的名称。
The doctor has given her some pills to calm her down.
Yīshēng gěi tā fúle yìxiē yàopiàn bāngzhù tā zhènjìng xiàlái。
医生给她服了一些药片帮助她镇静下来。
He took mind-altering drugs for nonmedicinal reasons.
Tā fúyòng gǎibiàn nǎozi de yàowù bìngfēi yóuyú yīliáo fāngmiàn de yuányīn。
他服用改变脑子的药物并非由于医疗方面的原因。
Physicians are now more circumspect about recommending its use.
Xiànzài de yīshēng zài tuījiàn shǐyòng gāi yàowù shí gèngjiā shènzhòng le。
现在的医生在推荐使用该药物时更加慎重了。
The doctor gave the patient a dose of medicine.
Yīshēng gěi bìngrén kāile yí jì yào。
医生给病人开了一剂药。
The doctor prescribed some medicine for the disorder.
Yīshēng wèi bìngrén kāile yìxiē yào。
医生为病人开了一些药。
The doctor recommended several preventatives.
Yīshēng tuījiànle jǐ zhǒng yùfáng yàowù。
医生推荐了几种预防药物。
A doctor accidentally injected himself with the medicine.
Yīshēng yìwài de gěi tā zìjǐ zhùshèle yào。
医生意外地给他自己注射了药。
The doctor decided that the patient must be purged.
Yīshēng rènwéi zhè míng bìngrén bìxū chī xièyào。
医生认为这名病人必须吃泻药。
The nurse administered the doses as the doctors looked on.
Zài jǐgè yīshēng de zhàokàn xià hùshi gěi bìngrén fūleyào。
在几个医生的照看下护士给病人敷了药。
He told the doctor that he had been taking his prescription regularly.
Tā gàosu yīshēng tā yì zhí zài dìngqī fúyòng tā kāi de yào。
他告诉医生他一直在定期服用他开的药。
Prescription drugs cannot be bought without a doctor\'s permission.
Méiyǒu yīshēng yǔnxǔ，bùnéng gòumǎi píng chǔfāng gòumǎi de yào。
没有医生允许，不能购买凭处方购买的药。
The doctor prescribed some medicine for my brother\'s mental disorder.
医生为我弟弟的精神紊乱疾病开了些药。
The medicine reacted badly with system and I had to go to the hospital.
Zhè zhǒng yào yǔ tǐ nèi xìtǒng yǒu hěn qiáng de duìkàngxìng，wǒ bìxū qù yīyuàn。
这种药与体内系统有很强的对抗性，我必须去医院。
人参的药用价值很高。
Rénsēn de yàoyòng jiàzhí hěngāo。
Ginseng is of great medicinal value.
野蚕可以入药，而且药用价值很高。
Yěcán kěyǐ rùyào，érqiě yàoyòng jiàzhí hěngāo。
Wild silkworms can be used as medicine, furthermore they have great medicinal value.
Pharmacologically, this plant could have important applications.
Cóng yàolǐxué shàng láishuō，zhèzhǒng zhíwù yǒu zhòngyào de shíyòng jiàzhí。
从药理学上来说，这种植物有重要的实用价值。
海螵蛸可以入药，用来止血。
Hǎipiāoxiāo kěyǐ rùyào，yònglái zhǐxiě。
Cuttlebone can be used as a medicine to stanch bleeding.
鸡头米可做药用，是一种很稀有的植物。
Jītóumǐ kě zuò yàoyòng，shì yìzhǒng hěnxīyǒu de zhíwù。
Gordon euryale is a rare plant which can be used as a medicine.
做海鲜的厨师介绍说江珧柱不仅味道鲜美而且还有药用功能。
Zuò hǎixiān de chúshī jièshào shuō jiāngyáozhù bùjǐn wèidào xiānměi érqiě háiyǒu yàoyòng gōngnéng。
According to the chef cooking seafood, the dried adductor of scallops not only tastes good but is also a valuable medicine.
人参的药用价值很高。
Rénsēn de yàoyòng jiàzhí hěngāo。
Ginseng is of great medicinal value.
野蚕可以入药，而且药用价值很高。
Yěcán kěyǐ rùyào，érqiě yàoyòng jiàzhí hěngāo。
Wild silkworms can be used as medicine, furthermore they have great medicinal value.
他把药片用水化开。
Tā bǎ yàopiàn yòngshuǐ huàkāi。
He dissolved the pills in water.
这药需用开水冲服。
Zhèyào xū yòngkāishuǐ chōngfú。
This medicine should be taken mixed with boiled water.
常用药材
chángyòng yàocái 
medicinal herbs most in use
外用药水
wàiyònɡ yàoshuǐ 
lotion
医生说他需要服用药物来清除体内的病原虫。
Yīshēng shuō tā xūyào fúyòng yàowù lái qīngchú tǐnèi de bìngyuánchóng。
His doctor said that he needed to take some medicine to remove the protozoon in his body.
他患了鹅掌风，医生让他按时用药擦洗。
Tā huàn le ézhǎngfēng，yīshēng ràng tā ànshí yòngyào cāxǐ。
He suffered from a fungal infection of his hands, and the doctor suggested that he apply external medicine regularly.
用药期间，最好别吃鱼虾等发物！
Yòngyào qījiān，zuì hǎo bié chī yú xiā děng fāwù！
When taking this medicine you\'d better not eat stimulating food such as fish and shrimp.
这些中草药需要用砂锅熬制。
Zhèxiē zhōng cǎoyào xūyào yòng shāguō áozhì。
These Chinese herbal medicines need to be boiled in an earthenware pot.
这种药剂是用蛇胆提炼而成的。
Zhèzhǒng yàojì shì yòng shédǎn tíliànérchéng de。
This medicine was extracted from the gallbladder of snakes.
药品的用量和用法说明书上都有详细说明。
Yàopǐn de yòngliàng hé yòngfǎ shuōmíngshū shàng dōuyǒu xiángxì shuōmíng。
Proper dosage of the medicine and its use are explained in detail in its instructions.
有病不能随便用药，一定要到医院检查。
Yǒu bìng bùnéng suíbiàn yòngyào，yídìng yào dào yīyuàn jiǎnchá。
When sick, you shouldn\'t take medicine without serious consideration; you must go to the hospital and have some tests.
医生告诉他得了痔疮后要用药剂坐浴七天。
Yīshēng gàosù tā dé le zhìchuāng hòu yào yòng yàojì zuòyù qī tiān。
The doctor told him to have a hip bath for seven days after having piles.
适量用药
shìliàng yòngyào
take medicine in appropriate doses
针对不同年龄用药。
Zhēnduì bùtóng niánlíng yòngyào。
Vary the dose according to age.
抵消药物的作用
dǐxiāo yàowù de zuòyòng 
counteract the effect of a medicine
灾区需用医药，急如星火。
Zāiqū xūyòngyīyào，jírúxīnghuǒ。
Medical aid must be sent to the stricken area posthaste.
监测新药的副作用
jiāncè xīnyào de fùzuòyòng
monitor the side effects of new drugs
远在公元十一世纪，中国已使用火药。
Yuǎn zài gōngyuán shíyī shìjì，Zhōngguó yǐ shǐyònghuǒyào。
Gunpowder was used in China as far back as the 11th century.
这几种感冒药最好单用。
Zhè jǐzhǒng gǎnmàoyào zuìhǎo dānyòng。
These cold cures should be taken separately.
据说桑椹作为药材可以用来消暑。
Jùshuō sāngshèn zuòwéi yàocái kěyǐ yònglái xiāoshǔ。
It is said mulberry fruit can be used to keep cool as medicinal materials.
针灸用的药针需要消毒，不然会交叉感染。
Zhēnjiǔ yòng de yào zhēn xūyào xiāodú，bùrán huì jiāochā gǎnrǎn。
Acupuncture needles need to be disinfected, or there will be cross infection.
这些带有神经麻醉作用的药品由上级主管部门专控。
Zhèxiē dàiyǒu shénjīng mázuì zuòyòng de yàopǐn yóu shàngjí zhǔguǎn bùmén zhuān kòng。
These anaesthesia medicines are under the special control of the superior management departments.
用消毒药水冲洗伤口
yòngxiāodú yàoshuǐ chōngxǐ shāngkǒu 
wash a wound with a disinfectant
麻醉药物的副作用
mázuì yàowù de fùzuòyòng
side effects from the use of anaesthetics
此药需空腹服用。
Cǐ yào xū kōngfù fúyòng。
This medicine is to be taken on an empty stomach.
你不能因为睡眠不好就滥用安眠药。
Nǐ bùnéng yīnwèi shuìmián bùhǎo jiù lànyòng ānmiányào。
Because you have difficulty sleeping it doesn\'t mean you can overdose on sleeping pills.
有人说，服用避孕药还具有美容的功效。
Yǒu rén shuō，fúyòng bìyùnyào hái jùyǒu měiróng de gōngxiào。
It is said that taking birth pills can make one more beautiful.
这种感冒药有表汗作用，可以预防流感。
Zhèzhǒng gǎnmàoyào yǒu biǎohàn zuòyòng，kěyǐ yùfáng liúgǎn。
These pills have the effect of making one sweat, driving the cold out of your body and guarding you against flu.
这种药因有副作用而被禁用。
Zhèzhǒng yào yīn yǒu fùzuòyòng ér bèi jìnyòng。
This kind of medicine is banned because of its side effects.
他扭伤了脚，医生建议他用些末药，以便消肿镇痛。
Tā niǔshāng le jiǎo，yīshēng jiànyì tā yòng xiē mòyào，yǐbiàn xiāozhǒng zhèntòng。

病人必须先脱敏，然后才能服用这种药物。
Bìngrén bìxū xiān tuōmǐn，ránhòu cáinéng fúyòng zhèzhǒng yàowù。
It\'s only after desensitization that patients can take this medicine.
你的身体需要用中成药来好好调理一下。
Nǐ de shēntǐ xūyào yòng zhōng chéngyào lái hǎohǎo tiáolǐ yíxià。
Your body should be nursed with a traditional Chinese medicine patent prescription.
用纱布把药淋一下
yòngshābùbǎ yào lín yíxià
strain the herbal medicine with a piece of gauze

这种新药已经发现有副作用。

纤维蛋白溶解药物已被用于临床治疗。

医生的药方中有芦根这味中药。

bāozhì bǎibìng de yàofāng

kāi yàofānɡ

医生给我开了一张药方。
Yīshēng gěi wǒ kāile yìzhāng yàofāng。

老中医对他详细问诊后，对症下药开了处方。

医生说他需要服用药物来清除体内的病原虫。

His doctor said that he needed to take some medicine to remove the protozoon in his body.
他朋友从药店为他买来了补酒。

他说话就好像吃枪药，太冲了。

这种药物散发着刺鼻的臭味。

这颗果树都是病虫，需要赶紧打药。

这批农药被认定是低毒的。
Zhè pī nóngyào bèi rèndìng shì dīdú de。
These agricultural pesticides are considered low toxic.
这条小巷的东头有一家药店。
Zhè tiáo xiǎo xiàng de dōngtóu yǒu yìjiā yàodiàn。
There is a medicine store at the east end of the lane.
医生会根据你的病情对症下药的。
Yīshēng huì gēnjù nǐ de bìngqíng duìzhèng xiàyào de。
The doctor will prescribe treatment according to your symptoms.
这个药方里有莪术。
Zhège yàofāng lǐ yǒu ézhú。
The prescription contains aromatic turmeric.
他患了鹅掌风，医生让他按时用药擦洗。
Tā huàn le ézhǎngfēng，yīshēng ràng tā ànshí yòngyào cāxǐ。
He suffered from a fungal infection of his hands, and the doctor suggested that he apply external medicine regularly.
用药期间，最好别吃鱼虾等发物！
Yòngyào qījiān，zuì hǎo bié chī yú xiā děng fāwù！
When taking this medicine you\'d better not eat stimulating food such as fish and shrimp.
大夫说，吃药期间戒辛辣油腻，你可别让他犯戒啊！
Dàifu shuō，chīyào qījiān jiè xīnlà yóunì，nǐ kě bié ràng tā fànjiè a！
The doctor said that he could not have spicy or rich food during his treatment period, please ensure that he doesn\'t.

Hùshì zhèngzài gěi shāngbìngyuán fūyào。
The nurse is applying the medicine to the injured soldier.
这服中药可以扶正祛寒。

This kind of traditional medicine is used to treat colds.
老中医给我开了几服扶正祛邪的药。

The old doctor prescribed some medicine to improve my health.
医药专家呼吁，伽马刀不可滥用。
Yīyào zhuānjiā hūyù，jiāmǎdāo bùkě lànyòng。
Experts on medicine appeal to the whole world not to misuse the gamma knife.
葛麻是可以入药的。
Gěmá shì kěyǐ rùyào de。
Kudzu vine can be used as medicine.
这种药的功力真是大。
Zhèzhǒng yào de gōnglì zhēnshì dà。
This medicine has a very strong effect.
这些弹药都是供应舰补给的。
Zhèxiē dànyào dōushì gōngyìngjiàn bǔjǐ de。
These ammunitions are all furnished by the supply vessel.
谷芽入药可治疗消化系统疾病。
Gǔyá rùyào kě zhìliáo xiāohuà xìtǒng jíbìng。
Rice sprouts can be used in medicines that treat illness of the digestive system.
她服药自杀，医生正在给她灌洗肠胃。
Tā fúyào zìshā，yīshēng zhèngzài gěi tā guànxǐ chángwèi。
She took pills to kill herself, the doctor is cleaning out her stomach.
国药治病讲求标本兼治。
Guóyào zhìbìng jiǎngqiú biāoběn jiānzhì.
Chinese medicine stresses treating both the outward symptoms, and root causes of a disease at the same time.
果酸存在于植物之中，可入药。
Guǒsuān cúnzài yú zhíwù zhī zhōng，kě rùyào。
Fruit acid existing in foliage can be used as medicine.
海螵蛸可以入药，用来止血。
Hǎipiāoxiāo kěyǐ rùyào，yònglái zhǐxiě。
Cuttlebone can be used as a medicine to stanch bleeding.
医生给他开的处方里有红参这味药。
Yīshēng gěi tā kāi de chǔfāng lǐ yǒu hóngsēn zhèwèi yào。
The prescription made by the doctor included ginseng.
世上没有卖后悔药的，早知今日，何必当初！
Shìshàng méiyǒu mài hòuhuǐyào de，zǎozhī jīnrì，hébì dāngchū！
There is no medicine to cure regret in the world. You shouldn\'t have behaved like that in the beginning when you knew what the result would be.
虎骨作为一种中药现在已禁止使用。
Hǔgǔ zuòwéi yìzhǒng zhōng yào xiànzài yǐ jìnzhǐ shǐyòng。
Tiger bones used in Chinese medicine has been forbiddern.
磕得那么重，你得吃点活血化淤的药。
Kē de nàme zhòng，nǐ děi chī diǎn huóxuè huàyū de yào。
Hurt so badly, you must take some medicine to dispel the gore and make the blood circulate smoothly.
这种外敷药可以有效化瘀，效果不错。
Zhèzhǒng wàifūyào kěyǐ yǒuxiào huàyū，xiàoguǒ búcuò。
The medicine applied from outside can dispel gore effectively, and has good effects.
此药对于治理黄病有很好的疗效。
Cǐyào duìyú zhìlǐ huángbìng yǒu hěnhǎo de liáoxiào。
The medicine was very effective in curing icterus.
此种药的主要成分是黄连素，治疗拉肚子很有效。
Cǐ zhǒng yào de zhǔyào chéngfèn shì huángliánsù，zhìliáo lādùzi hěnyǒuxiào。
The basis of this medicine is berberine which is very effective in curing loose bowels.
在火药库附近没有及时熄灭烟火，就留下了祸种，随时会引起火灾。
Zài huǒyàokù fùjìn méiyǒu jíshí xīmiè yānhuǒ，jiù liúxià le huòzhǒng，suíshí huì yǐnqǐ huǒzāi。
Those unextinguished butts near the powder magazine could cause a fire at any time.
鸡头米可做药用，是一种很稀有的植物。
Jītóumǐ kě zuò yàoyòng，shì yìzhǒng hěnxīyǒu de zhíwù。
Gordon euryale is a rare plant which can be used as a medicine.
乱吃减肥药对人体的危害很大。
Luànchī jiǎnféiyào duì réntǐ de wēihài hěndà。
Taking obesity drugs without prescription is harmful to one\'s body.
做海鲜的厨师介绍说江珧柱不仅味道鲜美而且还有药用功能。
Zuò hǎixiān de chúshī jièshào shuō jiāngyáozhù bùjǐn wèidào xiānměi érqiě háiyǒu yàoyòng gōngnéng。
According to the chef cooking seafood, the dried adductor of scallops not only tastes good but is also a valuable medicine.
医院把高价收购到的养蚕户家中的僵蚕做成药材。
Yīyuàn bǎ gāojià shōugòu dào de yǎngcánhù jiā zhōng de jiāngcán zuòchéng yàocái。
The hospital buys silkworms at a high price, from which they can make medicine.
这两种叫法不同的药品成分相同。
Zhè liǎngzhǒng jiàofǎ bùtóng de yàopǐn chéngfèn xiāngtóng。
These two medicines of different names actually have the same ingredients.
这种药需要筋脉注射，你让医生来给你打吧。
Zhèzhǒng yào xūyào jīnmài zhùshè，nǐ ràng yīshēng lái gěi nǐ dǎ ba。
This kind of medicine must be injected; let the doctor do it for you.
国家法律规定，禁药不能随便买卖。
Guójiā fǎlǜ guīdìng，jìnyào bùnéng suíbiàn mǎimài。
The laws say that banned medicine is not allowed to be traded.
这种药因有副作用而被禁用。
Zhèzhǒng yào yīn yǒu fùzuòyòng ér bèi jìnyòng。
This kind of medicine is banned because of its side effects.
这种中药对治疗女性经血不调很有效。
Zhèzhǒng zhōng yào duì zhìliáo nǚxìng jīngxiě bútiáo hěnyǒuxiào。
This kind of traditional Chinese medicine is very effective in treating menstrual disorders.
这服药专治精气不足，很适合病人服用。
Zhè fú yào zhuānzhì jīngqì bùzú，hěnshìhé bìngrén fúyòng。
This kind of medicine can deal with a lack of kidney Qi effectively, and is very suitable for patients.
那位重病患者已行将就木，无药可救了。
Nàwèi zhòngbìng huànzhě yǐ xíngjiāng jiùmù，wúyào kějiù le。
The critical patient is dying and we can do nothing about it.
他才两岁啊，天天打针吃药，怪可怜见的！
Tā cái liǎng suì a，tiāntiān dǎzhēn chīyào，guài kěliánjiàn de！
He is just two years old. What a pity that he has to take pills and have injections every day.
这个药没有苦味，小孩子吃起来都不哭！
Zhège yào méiyǒu kǔwèi，xiǎoháizi chī qǐlái dōu bùkū！
Children never cry when taking this medicine, for it does not taste bitter.
她这老病已经有十几年了，整日药不离口。
Tā zhè lǎobìng yǐjing yǒu shí jǐnián le，zhěngrì yào bùlíkǒu。
She has had this chronic illness for over ten years, and takes medicine every day.
你内火很大，需要吃些凉药败败火。
Nǐ nèihuǒ hěndà，xūyào chī xiē liángyào bàibài huǒ。
You have got a heat inside, and need to take some medicine to ward it off.
传说中这种灵药可以治百病。
Chuánshuō zhōng zhèzhǒng língyào kěyǐ zhìbǎibìng。
According to the legend, the panacea can cure all kinds of diseases.
他的这个建议真如一剂灵药，使公司起死回生。
Tā de zhège jiànyì zhēn rú yí jì língyào，shǐ gōngsī qǐsǐ huíshēng。
His suggestion was like a panacea, which has raised the dying company.
这副药可以消除你的流火。
Zhè fù yào kěyǐ xiāochú nǐ de liúhuǒ。
This dose of medicine will eradicate your erysipelas.
要想治好他的病，需要龙齿这味药。
Yào xiǎng zhìhǎo tā de bìng，xūyào lóngchǐ zhèwèi yào。
Fossil teeth of ancient mammals are needed to cure him.
医生在给他的处方里写上了蒌叶这味药。
Yīshēng zài gěi tā de chǔfāng lǐ xiěshàng le lóuyè zhèwèi yào。
The doctor wrote betel in his prescription.
药房里有驴皮胶出售。
Yàofáng lǐ yǒu lǘpíjiāo chūshòu。
E-gelatin is sold in drug stores.
马醉木可以加工成药剂，预防虫害。
Mǎzuìmù kěyǐ jiāgōng chéng yàojì，yùfáng chónghài。
Japanese andromeda can be processed into drugs to prevent pests.
在进行手术之前，兽医给老虎打了蒙药。
Zài jìnxíng shǒushù zhīqián，shòuyī gěi lǎohǔ dǎ le méngyào。
Before the operation, the veterinarian injected the tiger with anesthetic.
他扭伤了脚，医生建议他用些末药，以便消肿镇痛。
Tā niǔshāng le jiǎo，yīshēng jiànyì tā yòng xiē mòyào，yǐbiàn xiāozhǒng zhèntòng。
He sprained his foot. The doctor suggests him using myrrh to alleviate the swelling and easing pain.
爷爷的脑血管有些阻塞，必须常吃活血的药。
Yéye de nǎoxuèguǎn yǒuxiē zǔsāi，bìxū chángchī huóxuè de yào。
Grandpa\'s blood vessel on the brain is a little blocked, so he must often take blood-activating medicine.
他头痛发烧，吃了几回平熄内风的中药汤，很见效果。
Tā tóutòng fāshāo，chī le jǐ huí píngxī nèifēng de zhōng yàotāng，hěnjiàn xiàoguǒ。
He had a headache and a fever. After taking some traditional Chinese medicinal soup several times, which is used to cure disease caused by pathological changes of internal organs, he is now better.
现在增强免疫力的中药成了抢手货。
Xiànzài zēngqiáng miǎnyìlì de zhōng yào chéng le qiǎngshǒuhuò。
Now traditional Chinese medicine to improve one\'s immunity has become a fast-selling product.
经过炮制以后，青皮就成了一味中药。
Jīngguò pàozhì yǐhòu，qīngpí jiù chéng le yíwèi zhōng yào。
The green orange peel turns into a kind of Chinese traditional medicine after roasting and refining.
这药具有清肺的功效，较适合于热感冒患者服用。
Zhè yào jùyǒu qīngfèi de gōngxiào，jiào shìhéyú rè gǎnmào huànzhě fúyòng。
This drug can be used to cool and refresh the lungs and is suitable for people who have caught a heat cold.
中医大夫给他开了个清心的药方。
Zhōngyī dàifū gěi tā kāi le gè qīngxīn de yàofāng。
The TCM doctor prescribed a remedy to relieve his internal heat.
为了防治学生中暑，校医务室准备了人丹等药物。
Wèile fángzhì xuésheng zhòngshǔ，xiào yīwùshì zhǔnbèi le réndān děng yàowù。
To prevent and cure heatstroke, the school hospital has prepared medicines such as Rendan.
据说桑椹作为药材可以用来消暑。
Jùshuō sāngshèn zuòwéi yàocái kěyǐ yònglái xiāoshǔ。
It is said mulberry fruit can be used to keep cool as medicinal materials.
这些中草药需要用砂锅熬制。
Zhèxiē zhōng cǎoyào xūyào yòng shāguō áozhì。
These Chinese herbal medicines need to be boiled in an earthenware pot.
我吃了3个山药蛋，肚子有些撑得难受。
Wǒ chī le sāngè shānyaodàn，dǔzi yǒuxiē chēng de nánshòu。
Having eaten three potatoes, I feel stuffed.
你的伤还没好，记得每天都要来医院上药啊。
Nǐ de shāng hái méihǎo，jì de měitiān dōuyào lái yīyuàn shàngyào a。
Your wound has not recovered. Remember to come to the hospital to apply ointment every day.
这种药剂是用蛇胆提炼而成的。
Zhèzhǒng yàojì shì yòng shédǎn tíliànérchéng de。
This medicine was extracted from the gallbladder of snakes.
他用麻醉枪把麻醉药剂射入了发疯的大象的体内。
Tā yòng mázuìqiāng bǎ mázuì yàojì shèrù le fāfēng de dà xiàng de tǐnèi。
He used an anesthetic rifle to inject the drug into the body of the mad elephant.
他把药材放在石槽中，然后用磙子碾碎了它们。
Tā bǎ yàocái fàngzài shícáo zhōng，ránhòu yòng gǔnzi niǎnsuì le tāmen。
He put the medicine into the stone groove and used a roller to grind it.
他的庭院中长满了石松，可他并不知道这种植物能做药材。
Tā de tíngyuàn zhōng zhǎngmǎn le shísōng，kě tā bìng bùzhīdào zhèzhǒng zhíwù néng zuò yàocái。
Staghorn is everywhere in his courtyard, yet he doesn\'t know that this plant can be made into medicine.
这种兽药对于防治兽类掉毛很有效。
Zhèzhǒng shòuyào duìyú fángzhì shòulèi diàomáo hěnyǒuxiào。
This veterinary product is very effective in preventing animal molt.
这种药有清除宿便的功效，据说能够“排毒养颜”。
Zhèzhǒng yào yǒu qīngchú sùbiàn de gōngxiào，jùshuō nénggòu“páidú yǎngyán”。
This medicine can effectively clean inveterate excrement from the body, and is said to be able to exclude poisons and nourish the skin.
鸡嗉囊可以制成中药，有助消化的功效。
Jīsùnáng kěyǐ zhìchéng zhōng yào，yǒu zhù xiāohuà de gōngxiào。
Chicken crops can be made into Chinese traditional medicines to help people digest food.
药店的这个小伙计，还不能分辨出哪个是田七。
Yàodiàn de zhège xiǎo huǒjì，hái bùnéng fēnbiàn chū nǎgè shì tiánqī。
The boy in the medicine shop can\'t tell the pseudo-ginseng from other medicines.
这些药可以起到通便的作用。
Zhèxiē yào kěyǐ qǐdào tōngbiàn de zuòyòng。
The medicine can be used as a laxative.
他靠生产土药发了不义之财。
Tā kào shēngchǎn tǔyào fā le búyì zhī cái。
He made a fortune by growing opium.
这些炮竹经检验是由土药制成的。
Zhèxiē pàozhú jīng jiǎnyàn shì yóu tǔyào zhìchéng de。
Tests show that these fireworks are made of locally produced gunpowder.
这剂土药有可能治好他的病。
Zhè jì tǔyào yǒu kěnéng zhìhǎo tā de bìng。
The medicine in this folk prescription might be able to cure his illness.
他从小商贩那儿买了一些土制炸药。
Tā cóng xiǎo shāngfàn nàr mǎi le yìxiē tǔzhì zhàyào。
He bought some home-made explosives from the street traders.
他一定是吞服了过量的安眠药，应当赶紧送医院抢救。
Tā yídìng shì tūnfú le guòliàng de ānmiányào，yīngdāng gǎnjǐn sòng yīyuàn qiǎngjiù。
He must have taken a massive overdose of sleeping tablets, and should be sent to hospital at once.
病人必须先脱敏，然后才能服用这种药物。
Bìngrén bìxū xiān tuōmǐn，ránhòu cáinéng fúyòng zhèzhǒng yàowù。
It\'s only after desensitization that patients can take this medicine.
老中医对他详细问诊后，对症下药开了处方。
Lǎo zhōng yí duì tā xiángxì wènzhěn hòu，duìzhèng xiàyào kāi le chǔfāng。
The old doctor inquired about his condition carefully, and prescribed him medicine accordingly.
老中医说想治他的病必须用豨莶做药引。
Lǎo zhōng yī shuō xiǎng zhì tā de bìng bìxū yòng xīxiān zuò yàoyǐn。
The old herbalist doctor said that common St.Paulswort is needed to make the guiding drug to treat his illness.
这种药材的主要成份是从香薷里提取的吧！
Zhèzhǒng yàocái de zhǔyào chéngfèn shì cóng xiāngrú lǐ tíqǔ de ba！
The main ingredient of this kind of medicinal material is extracted from elsholtzia.
你这是邪火攻心，需要服点降火的药。
Nǐ zhè shì xiéhuǒ gōngxīn，xūyào fú diǎn jiànghuǒ de yào。
You are suffering from excessive internal heat and need some medicine to treat it.
这种新药对癌症有很好的疗效。
Zhèzhǒng xīnyào duì áizhèng yǒu hěnhǎo de liáoxiào。
This kind of new medicine is very effective in treating cancer.
信石是一种毒药。
Xìnshí shì yìzhǒng dúyào。
Arsenic is a kind of poison.
你最近身体不好，虚火上升，要吃点中药调理一下。
Nǐ zuìjìn shēntǐ bùhǎo，xūhuǒ shàngshēng，yào chī diǎn zhōng yào tiáolǐ yíxià。
You haven\'t been well these days, with the depletion fire syndrome going up. You\'d better have some Chinese medicine to nurse your health.
你这是中医说的虚症，吃点中药吧。
Nǐ zhèshì zhōng yī shuō de xūzhèng，chī diǎn zhōng yào ba。
This is what the traditional Chinese medicine science calls a deficiency illness. Take some Chinese medicine.
严查违禁药品，不能让坏人逍遥法外。
Yánchá wéijìn yàopǐn，bùnéng ràng huàirén xiāoyáo fǎwài。
Illegal medicine should be investigated strictly and those who break the law should be punished.
马医生医术高超，药到病除。
Mǎ yīshēng yīshù gāochāo，yàodào bìngchú。
Doctor Ma has superb medical skills, the medicine he prescribed works wonders.
你怎么把药饵给吃了，快去医院。
Nǐ zěnme bǎ yàoěr gěi chī le，kuài qù yīyuàn。
Having taken the poison bait, you need to go to the hospital as soon as you can.
药工今天放假，你明天来拿吧。
Yàogōng jīntiān fàngjià，nǐ míngtiān lái ná ba。
The processors of Chinese medicine are taking a holiday today, you can come back tomorrow.
药面太粗了，再磨细点。
Yàomiàn tài cū le，zài mó xì diǎn。
The medicine powder is too coarse, keep grinding it.
我看他是药石罔效，让他平静地过完最后的日子吧。
Wǒ kàn tā shì yàoshí wǎngxiào，ràng tā píngjìng de guòwán zuìhòu de rìzi ba。
In my opinion, no medicine is effective for him, let him pass his last days quietly.
药石之言，爱听不听。
Yàoshí zhī yán，ài tīng bùtīng。
Sincere advice, though seemingly unpalatable, must be followed.
这是药王留下的书，很有医学价值的。
Zhè shì yàowáng liúxià de shū，hěn yǒu yīxué jiàzhí de。
The book was left by Sun Simiao, the &quot;king of medicine&quot;, so it is of great medicinal value.
昨天去求了药王菩萨，希望他的病早点痊愈。
Zuótiān qù qiú le yàowáng púsà，xīwàng tā de bìng zǎo diǎn quányù。
I prayed to the medicine king bodhisattva that he can recover soon.
他们厂就是专门做药械的。
Tāmen chǎng jiùshì zhuānmén zuò yàoxiè de。
Their factory specializes in manufacturing insecticide-spreading equipment.
药液顺着他的嘴角流下来。
Yàoyè shùn zhe tā de zuǐjiǎo liú xiàlái。
Liquid medicine runs down the corners of his mouth.
人参的药用价值很高。
Rénsēn de yàoyòng jiàzhí hěngāo。
Ginseng is of great medicinal value.
针灸用的药针需要消毒，不然会交叉感染。
Zhēnjiǔ yòng de yào zhēn xūyào xiāodú，bùrán huì jiāochā gǎnrǎn。
Acupuncture needles need to be disinfected, or there will be cross infection.
一般来说，病人吃这种药都没有什么不良反应。
Yìbān láishuō，bìngrén chī zhèzhǒng yào dōu méiyǒu shénme bùliáng fǎnyìng。
Generally speaking, patients who took this medicine suffered no ill results.
药品的用量和用法说明书上都有详细说明。
Yàopǐn de yòngliàng hé yòngfǎ shuōmíngshū shàng dōuyǒu xiángxì shuōmíng。
Proper dosage of the medicine and its use are explained in detail in its instructions.
有病不能随便用药，一定要到医院检查。
Yǒu bìng bùnéng suíbiàn yòngyào，yídìng yào dào yīyuàn jiǎnchá。
When sick, you shouldn\'t take medicine without serious consideration; you must go to the hospital and have some tests.
药品的有有效期快到了，必须尽快销出去。
Yàopǐn de yǒu yǒuxiàoqī kuàidào le，bìxū jǐnkuài xiāochūqù。
The expiration date of this medicine is coming soon; we must sell it as quickly as possible.
他的病又不是疑难杂症，吃点药就会好的。
Tā de bìng yòu búshì yínán zázhèng，chī diǎn yào jiùhuì hǎo de。
His disease isn\'t very serious. After taking some pills, he will be fine.
这种药品需要遮光保存。
Zhèzhǒng yàopǐn xūyào zhēguāng bǎocún。
This kind of medicine should be kept away from light.
你的身体需要用中成药来好好调理一下。
Nǐ de shēntǐ xūyào yòng zhōng chéngyào lái hǎohǎo tiáolǐ yíxià。
Your body should be nursed with a traditional Chinese medicine patent prescription.
他经常去山里采集中药材。
